English:
[b][c][00fbff]Prologue: Journey into the unknown[-][/c][/b]

You crawl from the wreckage of your escape pod to find yourself injured and alone on an unknown world.
With no memory of how you got here and little at your disposal, the crackling of your suit's radio puts you on the path toward answers somewhere out in the wilderness of this alien planet.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00fbff]序章:未知之旅[-][/c][/b]

你从逃生舱的残骸中爬出来,发现自己在一个未知的星球上受伤且孤身一人。
你不记得自己是如何来到这里的,手头的资源也很少,宇航服无线电的劈啪声引导你走向这个外星星球的荒野,寻找答案。

English:
[b][c][00fbff]Prologue: Journey into the unknown[-][/c][/b]

You've awoken in a damaged escape pod, injured and alone after it's plummeted through the atmosphere of an unknown world.
With no memory of how you got here and little at your disposal, the crackling of your suit's radio puts you on the path toward answers somewhere out in the wilderness of this alien planet.

***
[c][1083fe]This is the beginning of the main Empyrion Storyline[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00fbff]序章:未知之旅[-][/c][/b]

你在一艘受损的逃生舱中醒来,受伤且孤身一人,逃生舱刚刚坠入一个未知世界的大气层。
你不记得自己是如何来到这里的,手头的资源也很少,宇航服无线电的劈啪声引导你走向这个外星星球的荒野,寻找答案。

***
[c][1083fe]这是帝国百科全书主线剧情的开始[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ff0000]Important !![-][/c][/b]
You can activate the main storyline missions via PDA (F1) at any time.

Please bear in mind, the storyline consists of consecutively linked chapters. Starting the storyline while having played for a while, sometimes might lead to its missions, related POI and the order of events [u]not working as expected anymore[/u].
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ff0000]重要！！[-][/c][/b]
你可以随时通过PDA（F1）激活主线任务。

请注意，主线剧情由连续关联的章节组成。在游戏进行一段时间后再启动主线，有时可能导致其任务、相关POI及事件顺序[u]不再按预期运行[/u]。

English: Wh... What happened to the station?! To the Crew?!\nI've got to contact the fleet!
Chinese (simplified): 什……发生了什么事？空间站怎么了？！船员们呢？！\n我必须联系舰队！

English:
But I can't understand what they're saying.
I need some way to clean up their transmission...

There's probably [c][fbff00]an Antenna[-][/c] among some of the wreckage on the ground that I can use to boost the signal strength. It's just a matter of finding a functional device.
Chinese (simplified):
但我听不懂他们在说什么。
我需要想办法增强他们的传输信号...

地上的一些残骸中可能有[c][fbff00]一个天线[-][/c],我可以用它来增强信号强度。现在的问题是找到一个能用的设备。

English: Find a usable antenna among the wreckage
Chinese (simplified): 在残骸中找到一根可用天线

English: Somewhere in this wreckage is a UCH Antenna I can use to boost the gain of my suit's radio.\n\n[c][ff0000][b]This mission can only be completed on the default starting planets at the crash site[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 在这片残骸中有一台UCH天线，我可以用它来提升我套装中的无线电增益。\n\n[c][ff0000][b]此任务仅能在默认起点星球的坠机现场完成[/b][-][/c]

English: That [i]looks [/i]like an Antenna off a UCH Crusader-Class Frigate!\nThat [i]should [/i]be able to do the job it if it's not too damaged.
Chinese (simplified): 那 [i]看起来[/i]像是一艘UCH十字军级驱逐舰的天线！\n只要没有太严重损坏[i]应该[/i]能完成任务。

English: Excavate the Port on the Antenna
[c][8ab3ff]Loud and clear, Ida.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]And how are you on this fine, sunny day?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]信号很清晰, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]今天天气晴朗,你还好吗?[-][/c]

English:
[c][8ab3ff]Relax, Ida.[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]I thought you new-model AIs were capable of learning and empathy.[-][/c]

[c][8ab3ff]I'm just... trying to stay positive here... and I figured you could do with a laugh too.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][8ab3ff]放轻松，ida。[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]我以为新模型的AI具备学习和同理心。[-][/c]

[c][8ab3ff]我只是...试图保持积极心态...我猜你也需要笑一笑。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Glad to hear it, Ida![-][/c]\n\n[c][8ab3ff]I guess it's time we set out on our journey into the unknown...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]很高兴能听见, IDA![-][/c]\n\n[c][8ab3ff]我想是时候开始我们的未知之旅了...[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 1: Human Debris[/b][-][/c]

Alone on an unknown world, you stand against an unforgiving and alien world looking for anything that remains of your crew and your fleet among the wreckage.

Are you truly alone?

IDA may have found the answers you seek...
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]第一章:人类残迹[/b][-][/c]

孤身一人身处未知星球,你面对着无情而陌生的环境,在残骸中寻找任何可能残留的船员和舰队踪迹。

你真的孤单一人吗?

IDA可能已经找到了你寻找的答案...

English: [c][80ffff]Are you sure you want to abort this mission? Please confirm your choice.[-][/c]\n\nYou can start the mission via PDA (F1) at any time.
Chinese (simplified): [c][80ffff]您确定要中止这个任务吗?请确认您的选择.[-][/c]\n\n你可以通过PDA (F1)在任何时候重启任务.

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c][c][00fbff][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]I am detecting no thermal or electrical emissions on the ground. But j[-][/c][c][00fbff]udging by the disturbance to the surrounding terrain, I would estimate that the ship impacted the ground at considerable speed.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]There may have been survivors, but I am unable to detect the presence of any human heat signatures.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c][c][00fbff][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]我没有检测到地面的热能或电能排放。但根[-][/c][c][00fbff]据周围地形的扰动判断,我估计飞船以相当大的速度撞击了地面。[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]可能有幸存者,但我无法检测到任何人类热信号的存在。[-][/c]

English: IDA has identified a crashed Pelican-Class Transport that may contain clues about the UCH forces and the current situation.
Chinese (simplified): IDA检索到了一艘坠毁的鹈鹕级运输船,上面可能有关于UCH部队动向的线索

English: [c][8ab3ff]Ida, I have eyes on the ship.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I recognize the ID number on the hull as The UCH-011 Heidelberg...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]Ida,我看到了那艘船。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我认出船体上的ID号码是UCH-011海德堡...[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]My god...\nThe ship hit the ground hard enough to split in half. I don't see how anyone could walk away from this alive.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我的上帝…\n船重重地撞在地上,断裂成了两半.我不知道有谁能活着离开.[-][/c]

English: There's a weak electromagnetic signal being emitted by something near the rear of the Heidelberg.
Chinese (simplified): 海德堡后部附近有一个发出微弱电磁信号的物体。

English: The signal is coming from somewhere inside this container
Chinese (simplified): 信号来自这个货柜内部

English: Access the locking pad on the sealed container
Chinese (simplified): 访问密封容器上的锁定面板。
帕兰特中士的个人日志

English:
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b] [c][00fbff]These are the decrypted personal log files of Sergeant Palant, Chief Engineer of the UCH-011 Heidelberg[-][/c]

[b]Log Date:[/b] 13.07.2143
[b]Time:[/b] 1900
[b]Creator:[/b] Joshua Palant
[b]Location:[/b] UCH-011 Heidelberg, UCH Expeditionary Fleet, Solar System

[b][/b][Voice to Text]
[c][bdbdbd]We've just left Jupiter's orbit under steady accel. The generators are purrin' like a kitten and it's looking like I was wrong about the thruster cones.
If there's one thing I hate, it's being proven wrong. But in [i]this [/i]case, i'm pleasantly surprised that everything went off without a hitch. Which is more than I can say for [-][/c][c][f2f2f2]Apollo Station[-][/c][c][bdbdbd]...

It seems that something happened just after we left it and now we've lost all communications with the station. There was some talk among the captains, which of course I ain't privy to, to turn back and help with the rescue. Looks like it's too late though and rescue ships are already on their way, so we're goin' ahead with [-][/c][c][f2f2f2]Operation Phoenix[-][/c][c][bdbdbd] and startin' up the warp cycle to Proxima Centauri.
Hopefully we don't end up the same way as the Hyperion.

Palant out[-][/c]
End transcript

[b][/b][End of Log]


[b]Log Date:[/b] 13.07.2143
[b]Time:[/b] 2021
[b]Creator:[/b] Joshua Palant
[b]Location:[/b] UCH-011 Heidelberg, UCH Expeditionary Fleet, Unknown Location

[b][/b][Voice to Text]
[c][bdbdbd]What the hell is happening around here?!
It was only supposed to be a short jaunt to Proxima Centauri, but as soon as the Adonis' Warp Drive spooled up: Boom! The wake hit us like... a brick wall, next thing we know we're getting yanked god-knows-where by the seat of our pants with no way to stop!
The Generators are overloaded; we've got a coolant leak somewhere on B-Deck; OUR warp drive, which was only active in a support capacity is outputting high levels of ionizing radiation and I don't think the shielding can take the extra load!
Now that we're out of warp, we're completely out of position and the rest of the fleet is comparing star charts and measuring crap that's out of my field. All [i]I[/i] know is that my baby is royally screwed, somewhere on the other side of the universe.

Palant Out[-][/c]
End Transcript

[b][ End of Log ][/b]


[b]Log Date:[/b] 13.07.2143
[b]Time:[/b] 2100
[b]Creator:[/b] Joshua Palant
[b]Location:[/b] UCH-011 Heidelberg, UCH Expeditionary Fleet, Andromeda Galaxy

[c][bdbdbd]Yep, you read that right: [-][/c][i][c][f2f2f2]Andromeda GALAXY[-][/c][/i][c][bdbdbd]![-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd]We was s'posed to end up near Proxima Centauri in our OWN galaxy! How in the name of Zeus's [-][/c][i]BUTTHOLE[/i][c][bdbdbd] did we end up on the other side of the [redacted] [-][/c][c][bdbdbd]universe?!
We need to turn this tub around and go back the way we came. Ain't no two ways about it. I signed on for a short hop to check out our nearest neighbor, not bugger off on an intergalactic rollercoaster![-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd]*Sigh*

We've managed to fix the coolant leak on B-Deck, which solved two problems since the Gennies are cooling back down now that they're getting a full load of coolant.
The Rads from the warp drive are only a problem if you're near the warp drive, so i've locked down the warp compartment. No one needs to be in there anyway.
The rest of the fleet's got the same problems, but we're all more or less okay for now. We're over a planet it seems, and there's EM signals coming from the planet and orbit nearby. So it seems we're not alone.
I wonder if it's too late to say "We come in peace"?

Palant Out[-][/c]
End Transcript

[b][ End of Log ][/b]


[b]Log Date:[/b] 13.07.2143
[b]Time:[/b] 2242
[b]Creator:[/b] Joshua Palant
[b]Location:[/b] UCH-011 Heidelberg, Planet Surface, Andromeda Galaxy

[Voice to Text]
[c][bdbdbd]*Cough* well... It seems I really stepped in it this time.
As soon as the impact alarms sounded, we took a hit on the port side of the ship by some kind of plasma weapon from the approaching ships. No warning, no communications, just BANG!
The hit fused the coolant pipes and starved the port-side gennies, so I had to hit the emergency shut off button.

The Heidy ain't built for heavy combat and the plasma and missiles that blew open the starboard thruster sent us into a decaying spin towards the planet. Impact in seven minutes and I was the only one left on this deck, so I had the bright idea to shut myself in one of the cargo containers. I was pretty sure i'd be safe in here... turns out I was right.
This is probably the only time I regret being proven right.

So i'm trapped in this container and can't get out. I'd guess i'm buried under the ship. Whoever you are, you probably already figured that out...
I guess it's not so bad... I did all I could and this isn't a bad way to go.
I hope you can someday get my body back home...

Signing off for the last time... Palant Out.[-][/c]
End Transcript

[b][ End of Log ][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b] [c][00fbff]这是《UCH-011 海德堡号》的约书亚·帕兰特军士长的解密个人日志文件。[-][/c]

[b]日志日期:[/b] 2143年7月13日
[b]时间:[/b] 19:00
[b]创建者:[/b] 约书亚·帕兰特
[b]位置:[/b] UCH-011 海德堡号,UCH 远征舰队,太阳系

[b]语音转文字[/b]
[c][bdbdbd]我们刚刚在稳定的加速下离开了木星的轨道。发电机运转得像小猫一样平稳,看来我之前对推进器锥体的担忧是多余的。
如果有什么我讨厌的,那就是被证明是错的。但在[i]这个[/i]案例中,我对一切都顺利进行感到惊喜。这比我能说的[-][/c][c][f2f2f2]阿波罗空间站[-][/c][c][bdbdbd]要好得多……

在我们离开后似乎发生了一些事情,现在我们已经失去了与空间站的所有联系。舰长们之间有些讨论,我当然无权知道,考虑是否回头帮助救援。看起来已经太晚了,救援船已经在途中,所以我们将继续[-][/c][c][f2f2f2]凤凰行动[-][/c][c][bdbdbd]并开始前往比邻星的翘曲循环。
希望我们不会像超离子号一样结束。

帕兰特结束[-][/c]
结束记录

[b]日志日期:[/b] 2143年7月13日
[b]时间:[/b] 20:21
[b]创建者:[/b] 约书亚·帕兰特
[b]位置:[/b] UCH-011 海德堡号,UCH 远征舰队,未知位置

[b]语音转文字[/b]
[c][bdbdbd]这里到底发生了什么?!
本来只是去比邻星的短途旅行,但当阿多尼斯的翘曲引擎启动时:轰!尾波像砖墙一样击中了我们,接下来我们知道我们被莫名其妙地拉到了某个地方,没有办法停下来!
发电机过载了;我们在B甲板上某处有冷却液泄漏;我们的翘曲引擎,原本只是以支持能力运行,正在释放高水平的电离辐射,我不认为屏蔽能承受额外的负荷!

现在我们退出翘曲,我们完全偏离了位置,其余的舰队正在比较星图,测量一些我领域之外的东西。所有[i]我[/i]知道的就是我的宝贝在宇宙的另一端彻底完蛋了。

帕兰特结束[-][/c]
结束记录

[b]日志日期:[/b] 2143年7月13日
[b]时间:[/b] 21:00
[b]创建者:[/b] 约书亚·帕兰特
[b]位置:[/b] UCH-011 海德堡号,UCH 远征舰队,仙女座星系

[c][bdbdbd]没错,你读得对:[-][/c][i][c][f2f2f2]仙女座星系[-][/c][/i][c][bdbdbd]![-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd]我们本应该结束在比邻星附近,在我们自己的星系!以宙斯的[-][/c][i]屁股[/i][c][bdbdbd]之名,我们怎么会在[redacted]的另一边[-][/c][c][bdbdbd]的宇宙呢?!
我们需要让这艘船掉头,沿着我们来的路回去。没有别的办法。我签约是为了去检查我们最近的邻居,而不是去坐星际过山车!

叹气

我们设法修复了B甲板上的冷却液泄漏,这解决了两个问题,因为发电机现在在得到满载冷却液后正在冷却下来。
翘曲引擎的辐射只有在你靠近翘曲引擎时才是问题,所以我封锁了翘曲舱。反正那里也不需要有人。

其余的舰队有同样的问题,但我们现在或多或少还好。我们似乎在一颗行星上方,而且来自行星和附近轨道的有电磁信号。所以看来我们并不孤单。

我想知道现在说“我们为和平而来”是否太晚?

帕兰特结束[-][/c]
结束记录

[b]日志日期:[/b] 2143年7月13日
[b]时间:[/b] 22:42
[b]创建者:[/b] 约书亚·帕兰特
[b]位置:[/b] UCH-011 海德堡号,行星表面,仙女座星系

[语音转文字]
[c][bdbdbd]咳嗽好吧...看来这次我真的陷进去了。
当撞击警报响起时,我们的船的左舷被来自接近船只的某种等离子武器击中了。没有警告,没有通信,就是轰的一声!

这次撞击使冷却管熔化并使左舷的发电机饿死了,所以我不得不按下紧急关闭按钮。

海迪号不是为重型战斗建造的,等离子和导弹炸开了右舷推进器,使我们向行星旋转下降。撞击还有七分钟,我是这个甲板上唯一剩下的人,所以我有个聪明的想法,把自己关在一个货物容器里。我很确定我在这里是安全的...结果证明我是对的。

这可能是我唯一一次后悔被证明是对的。

所以我被困在这个容器里,出不去了。我猜我现在被埋在船下面了。不管你是谁,你可能已经弄清楚了...

我想这还不错...我尽我所能,这并不是一个糟糕的结束方式。

我希望你能有一天把我的尸体带回家...

最后一次签名...帕兰特结束。[-][/c]
结束记录

[b]结束日志[/b]

[b]Log Date:[/b] 13.07.2143
[b]Time:[/b] 2242
[b]Creator:[/b] Joshua Palant
[b]Location:[/b] UCH-011 Heidelberg, Planet Surface, Andromeda Galaxy

[Voice to Text]
[c][bdbdbd]*Cough* well... It seems I really stepped in it this time.
As soon as the impact alarms sounded, we took a hit on the port side of the ship by some kind of plasma weapon from the approaching ships. No warning, no communications, just BANG!
The hit fused the coolant pipes and starved the port-side gennies, so I had to hit the emergency shut off button.

The Heidy ain't built for heavy combat and the plasma and missiles that blew open the starboard thruster sent us into a decaying spin towards the planet. Impact in seven minutes and I was the only one left on this deck, so I had the bright idea to shut myself in one of the cargo containers. I was pretty sure i'd be safe in here... turns out I was right.
This is probably the only time I regret being proven right.

So i'm trapped in this container and can't get out. I'd guess i'm buried under the ship. Whoever [-][/c][c][bdbdbd]you are, you probably already figured that out...[-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd][-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd]I guess it's not so bad... I did all I could and this isn't a bad way to go.
I hope you can someday get my body back home...

Signing off for the last time... Palant Out.[-][/c]
End Transcript

[b][ End of Log ][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b] [c][00fbff]这是UCH-011海德堡号首席工程师约书亚·帕兰特的个人日志解密文件[-][/c]

[b]日志日期:[/b] 2143年7月13日
[b]时间:[/b] 1900
[b]创建者:[/b] 约书亚·帕兰特
[b]地点:[/b] UCH-011海德堡号,UCH远征舰队,太阳系

[b][/b][语音转文本]
[c][bdbdbd]我们刚刚离开木星轨道,正在稳定加速。发电机像小猫一样咕咕叫着,看来我对推进器锥体的担忧是多余的。
如果有什么让我讨厌,那就是被证明错了。但[i]这次[/i],我很惊喜一切顺利。这比我能对[-][/c][c][f2f2f2]阿波罗空间站[-][/c][c][bdbdbd]说的要多得多...

我们刚离开就出了事,现在我们和空间站失去了所有联系。船长们之间有些讨论,我当然不在其中,有人说应该回去帮忙救援。不过看起来已经太晚了,救援船已经出发,所以我们继续执行[-][/c][c][f2f2f2]凤凰行动[-][/c][c][bdbdbd],启动前往半人马座Proxima的翘曲循环。
希望我们不会像海伯利安号一样下场。

帕兰特结束[-][/c]
记录结束

[b][/b][日志结束]


[b]日志日期:[/b] 2143年7月13日
[b]时间:[/b] 2021
[b]创建者:[/b] 约书亚·帕兰特
[b]地点:[/b] UCH-011海德堡号,UCH远征舰队,未知地点

[b][/b][语音转文本]
[c][bdbdbd]这里到底发生了什么?!
这应该只是一次前往半人马座Proxima的短途旅行,但阿多尼斯号的翘曲引擎刚启动: boom!翘曲尾流像...一堵砖墙一样击中我们,接下来我们就被甩到了宇宙的另一边,毫无办法停止!
发电机过载;B甲板 somewhere 发生了冷却液泄漏;我们的翘曲引擎本来只是辅助运行,现在却释放出高水平的电离辐射,我不认为护盾能承受额外的负担!
现在我们脱离了翘曲,完全偏离了位置,舰队的其他成员正在对比星图,测量一些超出我专业范围的东西。我只知道我的宝贝船彻底完蛋了,在宇宙的另一边。

帕兰特结束[-][/c]
记录结束

[b][日志结束][/b]


[b]日志日期:[/b] 2143年7月13日
[b]时间:[/b] 2100
[b]创建者:[/b] 约书亚·帕兰特
[b]地点:[/b] UCH-011海德堡号,UCH远征舰队,仙女座星系

[c][bdbdbd]没错,你没看错:[-][/c][i][c][f2f2f2]仙女座星系[-][/c][/i][c][bdbdbd]![-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd]我们本来应该到达我们自己星系内的半人马座Proxima附近!怎么会在宙斯[i]屁眼[/i]里出了岔子,把我们送到了[-][/c][c][bdbdbd]宇宙的另一边?!
我们必须掉头,原路返回。没有第二个选择。我可不是为了和隔壁星系打个招呼而签的约,不是为了坐上这趟星际过山车![-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd]叹气

我们已经修好了B甲板的冷却液泄漏,这解决了两个问题,因为发电机正在冷却下来,现在得到了足够的冷却液。
翘曲引擎的辐射只有在靠近翘曲舱时才是个问题,所以我封锁了那个区域。反正也没人需要进去。
舰队的其他船也有同样的问题,但我们现在都还算安全。我们在一颗行星上空,行星和附近轨道上有电磁信号。看来我们并不孤单。
不知道现在说“我们和平而来”是不是太晚了?

帕兰特结束[-][/c]
记录结束

[b][日志结束][/b]


[b]日志日期:[/b] 2143年7月13日
[b]时间:[/b] 2242
[b]创建者:[/b] 约书亚·帕兰特
[b]地点:[/b] UCH-011海德堡号,行星表面,仙女座星系

[语音转文本]
[c][bdbdbd]咳嗽 好吧... 看来这次我真的捅了大篓子。
撞击警报响起时,我们被来自接近船只的某种等离子武器击中了船的左舷。没有警告,没有通讯,直接就是一声巨响!
这次撞击融化了冷却管,切断了左舷发电机的能源,所以我不得不按下紧急关闭按钮。

海德堡号不是为重型战斗设计的,击中右舷推进器的导弹让我们开始向行星螺旋坠落。还有七分钟撞击,而我是唯一还在这层甲板的人,所以我灵机一动把自己关进了货柜里。我本以为在这里会很安全... 结果我是对的。
这是我为数不多后悔自己对了的时刻。

现在我被困在这个容器里出不去。我猜我大概被埋在船下... 不管[-][/c][c][bdbdbd]你是谁,你可能已经发现了...[-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd][-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd]我想这也不算太糟... 我已经尽力了,这也不是个坏的结局。
希望你们能有一天把我的遗体带回家...

最后一次签退... 帕兰特结束。[-][/c]
记录结束

[b][日志结束][/b]

English:
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00fbff]I have loaded Sergeant Pallant's personal logs to your [-][/c][c][f2f2f2]PDA [b](F1)[/b][-][/c][c][00fbff], Commander. You can review them at any time.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]They detail the entry of the UCH Fleet into this star system in the Andromeda Galaxy.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]We are currently 2.698 million light years from Earth and just as far off our projected course.[-][/c]

[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]

English:
[b][c][1083fe]Logistics Log 32-1A-1969B-XJNFT-0007[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][1083fe]Runtime:[-][/c][/b] 5234165.55
[b][c][1083fe]User ID:[-][/c][/b] UCH-1080377 (Emmerson, Natasha)
[b][c][1083fe]Action:[-][/c][/b] ContainerMS01 to ContainerMS02 > Steel Plate x50
[b][c][1083fe]Notes:[-][/c][/b]
[c][bdbdbd][i]Captain Brenner and most of the flight crew were killed just a few second ago. A rocket or something hit the bow and took out half the bridge.[/i]
[i]I'm lucky it wasn't me, thanks to my completely justified criticisms of the lieutenant's shiphandling I was ordered off the bridge to prep the escape pods. Normally, i'd call that karma... but I guess not in this case, since i'm standing in front of the escape pod section and the door's sealed. [/i][i]Not that it matters anyway because the entire section is missing and i'm left staring through a hole in the hull out into the sky.[/i]
[i]This will probably be the last message I make and i'm making it on a Logistics Manager because my PDA was smashed in the explosion![/i]
[i]I just hope the Heidy's hull will take the impact and that i'm alive when it's over.[/i]
[i]I'll stick this pad in one of the containers and sign off one last time.[/i]
[i]
Emmerson, Ensign, of the UCH Heidelberg Signing out.[/i][-][/c]

[b][c][1083fe]物流日志 32-1A-1969B-XJNFT-0007[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][1083fe]运行时间:[-][/c][/b] 5234165.55
[b][c][1083fe]用户ID:[-][/c][/b] UCH-1080377 (艾默森,娜塔莎)
[b][c][1083fe]操作:[-][/c][/b] 从ContainerMS01 到 ContainerMS02 > 钢制板 x50
[b][c][1083fe]备注:[-][/c][/b]
[c][bdbdbd][i]布伦纳舰长和大部分飞行机组人员几秒钟前刚刚被杀。一枚火箭或类似的东西击中了船头,摧毁了半个舰桥。[/i]
[i]我很幸运那不是我,多亏了我对中尉船舶操控的完全合理的批评,我被命令离开舰桥去准备逃生舱。通常,我会说这是因果报应... 但在这种情况下,我想不是,因为我站在逃生舱区前面,门是密封的。[/i][i]不管怎样都无所谓,因为整个区域都不见了,我留下凝视着船体上的一个洞,望向天空。[/i]
[i]这可能是我发出的最后一条信息,我正在使用物流管理器,因为我的PDA在爆炸中被砸坏了![/i]
[i]我只是希望海蒂的船体会承受住撞击,希望这一切结束后我还活着。[/i]
[i]我会把这个板子放进一个容器里,最后一次签退。[/i]
[i]
艾默森,海军少尉,来自UCH海德堡,结束通话。[/i][-][/c]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Commander, i've noticed several inconsistencies between the two logs and the wreckage of the Heidelberg.\nHowever, i'm not sure as to the exact cause since it's a contradiction with your own presence here.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官, 我注意到两条记录和海德堡号的残骸之间有几处不一致.\n然而,我不确定确切的原因,因为它与您在这里还活着这件事是矛盾的.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I am not willing to speculate at this point, Commander.\nI have marked the ship's constructor on your display, please check the production logs next. It should clarify things for the both of us.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我目前不愿猜测，指挥官。\n我已在您的显示屏上标记了飞船的建造机，请接着查看生产日志。它应该能为我们两人澄清一些事情。[-][/c]

English: The Constructor's Logs are located on a small terminal on the face of the machine.\nYou may need a jetpack to get up there.
Chinese (simplified): 建造机的日志位于机器正面的一个小终端上。\n你可能需要一个喷气背包才能到达那里。

English: There's a weak power fluctuation beneath some of the wreckage. There may still be life in this bird.
Chinese (simplified): 残骸的下方有微弱的能量波动. 这艘飞船上可能依然有幸存者.

English: The signal appears to be coming from this Datapad

最后一片拼图 [c][ffffff](PDA 日志)[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]Commander, these are copies of the Heidelberg's Constructor Logs for your PDA Log:[-][/c]

[b][c][c70000]Constructor[-][/c][/b]
[c][f2f2f2].../EmpOp/Production/Logs/02082473/ConLog.txt
------------------------------------------------------------------[-][/c]
Date: 15.07.2143
TemplateName: SurvivalTent
Count: 8
[c][f2f2f2]... 66 more items[-][/c]
[c][f2f2f2][-][/c][c][1083fe][b][ Commander ][/b][-][/c]
Looks like they made 8 Tents which means there's at least 8 survivors.
The rest of the stuff the constructor made was pretty standard stuff. Supplies, Communications equipment, a Hoverbike and a pair of UCH Raider Kits. Standard supplies for a journey over land.

It looks like they loaded up the rest of the ship's supplies and salvaged what they could carry and headed away from the ship, which makes sense since this place would've likely drawn attention from the enemy if they hung around here for too long.
So I guess we should be on the lookout for a pair of UCH Raiders.

[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]I have already scanned the planet for any heat signatures belonging to UCH crew and vehicles, Commander. There are no other members of the UCH Navy anywhere on this planet.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]However, what I wanted from the logs, aside from confirmation of survivors, was a frame of reference for the inconsistencies present in the other evidence gathered from [-][/c][c][f2f2f2]Ensign Emmerson[-][/c][c][00e1ff] and [-][/c][c][f2f2f2]Sergeant Palant's[-][/c][c][00e1ff] Logfiles.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]I am 80% certain, Commander.
The final piece of the puzzle, so to speak, should be found on the ship's bridge. There is a console there that is still functional, but inactive that should answer your questions.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c][b][c][1083fe][ Commander ][-][/c][/b]
So you're telling me there's a live console on the bridge and you didn't tell me to go there first?
Why send me to go digging through the dirt and boxes full of dead bodies when everything we needed to know is [i]right [/i]there on the bridge!?

[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]Because Commander, That console on the bridge is both unshielded and will draw a great deal of power when it's activated.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]I have identified [-][/c][c][c70000]an unmanned aerial vehicle[-][/c][c][00e1ff] patroling near your current position and activating that console will undoubtedly draw their attention.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]It was necessary to avoid putting you in additional danger, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c][b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]If you want to discover the truth, that console is our only remaining source for finding the surviving crew of the Heidelberg and the rest of the UCH Fleet.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]For good or ill, it is the only source of information left open to us, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]I leave the decision to you.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]指挥官,这些是海德堡号建造机日志的副本,用于您的PDA日志:[-][/c]

[b][c][c70000]建造机[-][/c][/b]
[c][f2f2f2].../EmpOp/Production/Logs/02082473/ConLog.txt
------------------------------------------------------------------[-][/c]
日期:2143年7月15日
模板名称:SurvivalTent
数量:8
[c][f2f2f2]... 66个更多项目[-][/c]
[c][f2f2f2][-][/c][c][1083fe][b][ Commander ][/b][-][/c]
看起来他们制造了8顶帐篷,这意味着至少有8名幸存者。
建造机制造的其他东西都是相当标准的物品。供应品、通信设备、悬浮摩托车和一对UCH突袭者装备。标准的陆地旅行物资。

看起来他们装载了船上剩余的补给,并回收了他们能携带的东西,然后离开了船只,这是有道理的,因为如果他们在这里逗留太久,这个地方很可能会引起敌人的注意。
所以我猜我们应该留意一对UCH突袭者。

[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]我已经扫描了整个星球,寻找属于UCH船员和车辆的任何热信号,指挥官。这个星球上没有其他的UCH海军成员。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]然而,除了确认幸存者之外,我从日志中想要得到的,是一个参照框架,用于解释从[-][/c][c][f2f2f2]艾默森少尉[-][/c][c][00e1ff]和[-][/c][c][f2f2f2]帕兰特军士[-][/c][c][00e1ff]的日志文件中收集到的其他证据的不一致之处。[-][/c]

[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]我大约有80%的把握,指挥官。
可以说,谜题的最后一块应该在船的舰桥上找到。那里有一个控制台仍然可以工作,但目前处于非活动状态,它应该能回答你的问题。[-][/c]

[c][00e1ff][-][/c][b][c][1083fe][ Commander ][-][/c][/b]
那么,你是在告诉我舰桥上有一个活跃的控制台,而你却没有让我先去那里?
为什么要让我去挖掘那些装满尸体的泥土和箱子,当我们需要知道的一切就[i]正[/i]在舰桥上的时候!

[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]因为指挥官,那个舰桥上的控制台既没有屏蔽,激活时又会消耗大量的电力。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]我已经识别出[-][/c][c][c70000]一架无人机[-][/c][c][00e1ff]在您当前位置附近巡逻,激活那个控制台无疑会吸引它们的注意。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]避免让你陷入额外的危险是必要的,指挥官。[-][/c]

[c][00e1ff][-][/c][b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]如果你想发现真相,那个控制台是我们寻找海德堡号幸存船员和UCH舰队其余人员的唯一剩余来源。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]不论好坏,它是我们唯一剩下的信息来源,指挥官。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]我让你来决定。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've copied the Constructor's logs to my PDA. So now the last log is on a live console on the bridge, right?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Once I activate it, what's the chance that drone will pick up on the signal?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我已经将建造机的日志复制到我的个人数据存储器了。现在最后的日志显示在舰桥上的实时控制台上，对吧？[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]一旦我激活它，那个无人机捕捉信号的几率有多大？[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]Commander, these are copies of the Heidelberg's Constructor Logs for your PDA Log:[-][/c]

[b][c][c70000]Constructor[-][/c][/b]
[c][f2f2f2].../EmpOp/Production/Logs/02082473/ConLog.txt
------------------------------------------------------------------[-][/c]
Date: 15.07.2143
TemplateName: SurvivalTent
Count: 8
[c][f2f2f2]... 66 more items[-][/c]
[c][f2f2f2][-][/c][c][1083fe][b][ Commander ][/b][-][/c]
Looks like they made 8 Tents which means there's at least 8 survivors.
The rest of the stuff the constructor made was pretty standard stuff. Supplies, Communications equipment, a Motorbike and a pair of UCH Raider Kits. Standard supplies for a journey over land.

It looks like they loaded up the rest of the ship's supplies and salvaged what they could carry and headed away from the ship, which makes sense since this place would've likely drawn attention from the enemy if they hung around here for too long.
So I guess we should be on the lookout for a pair of UCH Raiders.

[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]I have already scanned the planet for any heat signatures belonging to UCH crew and vehicles, Commander. There are no other members of the UCH Navy anywhere on this planet.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]However, what I wanted from the logs, aside from confirmation of survivors, was a frame of reference for the inconsistencies present in the other evidence gathered from [-][/c][c][f2f2f2]Ensign Emmerson[-][/c][c][00e1ff] and [-][/c][c][f2f2f2]Sergeant Palant's[-][/c][c][00e1ff] Logfiles.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]I am 80% certain, Commander.
The final piece of the puzzle, so to speak, should be found on the ship's bridge. There is a console there that is still functional, but inactive that should answer your questions.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c][b][c][1083fe][ Commander ][-][/c][/b]
So you're telling me there's a live console on the bridge and you didn't tell me to go there first?
Why send me to go digging through the dirt and boxes full of dead bodies when everything we needed to know is [i]right [/i]there on the bridge!?

[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]Because Commander, That console on the bridge is both unshielded and will draw a great deal of power when it's activated.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]I have identified [-][/c][c][c70000]an unmanned aerial vehicle[-][/c][c][00e1ff] patroling near your current position and activating that console will undoubtedly draw their attention.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]It was necessary to avoid putting you in additional danger, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c][b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]If you want to discover the truth, that console is our only remaining source for finding the surviving crew of the Heidelberg and the rest of the UCH Fleet.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]For good or ill, it is the only source of information left open to us, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]I leave the decision to you.[-][/c][c][00e1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]指挥官,这些是海德堡号建造机日志的副本,用于您的PDA日志:[-][/c]

[b][c][c70000]建造机[-][/c][/b]
[c][f2f2f2].../EmpOp/Production/Logs/02082473/ConLog.txt
------------------------------------------------------------------[-][/c]
日期:2143年7月15日
模板名称:SurvivalTent
数量:8
[c][f2f2f2]... 66个更多项目[-][/c]
[c][f2f2f2][-][/c][c][1083fe][b][ Commander ][/b][-][/c]
看起来他们制造了8顶帐篷,这意味着至少有8名幸存者。
建造机制造的其他东西都是相当标准的物品。供应品、通信设备、摩托车和一对UCH突袭者装备。标准的陆地旅行物资。

看起来他们装载了船上剩余的补给,并回收了他们能携带的东西,然后离开了船只,这是有道理的,因为如果他们在这里逗留太久,这个地方很可能会引起敌人的注意。
所以我猜我们应该留意一对UCH突袭者。

[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]我已经扫描了整个星球,寻找属于UCH船员和车辆的任何热信号,指挥官。这个星球上没有其他的UCH海军成员。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]然而,除了确认幸存者之外,我从日志中想要得到的,是一个参照框架,用于解释从[-][/c][c][f2f2f2]艾默森少尉[-][/c][c][00e1ff]和[-][/c][c][f2f2f2]帕兰特军士[-][/c][c][00e1ff]的日志文件中收集到的其他证据的不一致之处。[-][/c]

[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]我大约有80%的把握,指挥官。
可以说,谜题的最后一块应该在船的舰桥上找到。那里有一个控制台仍然可以工作,但目前处于非活动状态,它应该能回答你的问题。[-][/c]

[c][00e1ff][-][/c][b][c][1083fe][ Commander ][-][/c][/b]
那么,你是在告诉我舰桥上有一个活跃的控制台,而你却没有让我先去那里?
为什么要让我去挖掘那些装满尸体的泥土和箱子,当我们需要知道的一切就[i]正[/i]在舰桥上的时候!

[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]因为指挥官,那个舰桥上的控制台既没有屏蔽,激活时又会消耗大量的电力。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]我已经识别出[-][/c][c][c70000]一架无人机[-][/c][c][00e1ff]在您当前位置附近巡逻,激活那个控制台无疑会吸引它们的注意。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]避免让你陷入额外的危险是必要的,指挥官。[-][/c]

[c][00e1ff][-][/c][b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]如果你想发现真相,那个控制台是我们寻找海德堡号幸存船员和UCH舰队其余人员的唯一剩余来源。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]不论好坏,它是我们唯一剩下的信息来源,指挥官。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]我让你来决定。[-][/c]

English: Drones are equipped with heavy armor that will protect them from small-caliber weapons like pistols, SMGs and shotguns.\nThey are susceptible to fire from assault rifles, sniper rifles, rocket launchers and laser weapons.\n[b][c][00ff00]You can probably find a sniper rifle somewhere in the wreckage[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified): 无人机配备了重型装甲,这将使它们免受小口径武器如手枪、冲锋枪和霰弹枪的攻击。\n它们容易受到突击步枪、狙击步枪、火箭发射器和激光武器的攻击。\n[b][c][00ff00]你可能在残骸中的某个地方找到狙击步枪[-][/c][/b]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The Aerodrone appears to have a weak point, a glowing optical sensor, on the front that is not armored.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]A scoped rifle or heavy weapons such as a rocket launcher would be an ideal match. [-][/c][c][00ff00]You can probably find a rifle somewhere in the wreckage.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]这个空中无人机前方似乎有一个弱点，是一个发光的光学传感器，没有装甲保护。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]带瞄准镜的步枪或重型武器如火箭发射器将是理想选择。[-][/c][c][00ff00]你或许可以在残骸中找到一把步枪。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've found the console, Ida.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Get ready to download the contents and tell me if the drone changes course.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我找到控制台了,IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]准备好下载数据,一旦无人机有什么动向就立刻通知我.[-][/c]

English: [c][00ffff][b]Chapter 2: A Forest of Stars[/b][-][/c]\n\nAfter uncovering the wreckage of the Heidelberg and the fate of its crew, you set off after the survivors following a trail gone cold almost four years; to the neutral station they used to get offworld and escape their Zirax pursuers.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][b]第二章：繁星之森[/b][-][/c]\n\n在发现了海德堡号的残骸及其船员的命运后，你开始追踪幸存者的踪迹，这条线索已经断了近四年；他们曾使用的中立站点，用来离开星区并逃避兹瑞克斯的追捕。

English: [c][8ab3ff]Anything you can tell me about the place? I hate going in blind.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]你能告诉我关于这个地方的任何信息吗？我讨厌盲目进入。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The drones do not appear to be affiliated with the structures below, as they're making periodic communications to a facility near the polar region confirmed to be a Zirax emplacement.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]They seem to be keeping guard over the residents, making it more likely that they will be sympathetic to our plight.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]这些无人机似乎并不隶属于下面的建筑，因为它们定期与靠近极区的一处设施通信，该设施已确认是兹瑞克斯的据点。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]它们似乎在看守居民，这使得居民更有可能同情我们的处境。[-][/c]

English: IDA has detected a collection of structures nearby. It could hold clues to the UCH's whereabouts.\n\n[b][c][ff0000]This mission can only be completed on the default starting planets![-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified): IDA探测到附近有一系列建筑物。这些建筑物可能隐藏着UCH下落的线索。\n\n[b][c][ff0000]此任务只能在默认起始星球上完成！[-][/c][/b]

English: [c][80ffff]Are you sure you want to abort this mission? Please confirm your choice.[-][/c]\n\nYou can start the mission via PDA (F1) at any time.
Chinese (simplified): [c][80ffff]您确定要中止此任务吗？请确认您的选择。[-][/c]\n\n您可以随时通过PDA（F1）开始任务。

English: [c][8ab3ff]This can't be the right place![-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]These people live in primitive housing. They don't have the capacity for interstellar travel![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]这不可能是正确的地点！[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]这些人住在原始住房里。他们没有星际旅行的能力！[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I wonder what i'm supposed to do there.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Got any clues, Ida? Could it be a trap?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我想知道我在那里该做什么.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]有什么线索吗,IDA?会不会是个陷阱?[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]"Most" but not all?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Should I be worried?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]“大部分”但不是全部？[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我应该担心吗？[-][/c]

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I wouldn't worry about it, Commander.\nThe individuals I observed appeared to be youths.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]换做是我的话应该不会担心,指挥官.\n我观察到的个体似乎是还很年轻.[-][/c]

English: Find the Ancient Tower of the Tal'on.
The Tal'on chief has directed you to a tower halfway around the planet for reasons that remain a mystery.
Chinese (simplified): 泰隆酋长指示你前往行星另一侧的一座高塔，原因尚不明朗。

English: [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]You are approaching the tower now, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I am detecting electromagnetic readings coming from beneath the structure.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]你正在接近这座塔,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我探测到建筑下面有微弱的电磁读数.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]There appears to be some kind of entrance at the top of the tower, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]在塔的顶端似乎有某种入口,指挥官.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]If there's one thing I know, Ida.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]It's that angry youths will [i]always [/i]cause trouble.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]如果有一件事我深知，Ida。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]那就是愤怒的青年们[i]总是[/i]会惹麻烦。[-][/c]

English: Find a way into the tower
Enter the Ancient Tower of the Tal'ohn
[c][8ab3ff]Looks like the power's on, Ida.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]All the lights and displays are lit up.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]IDA,看来供电正常.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]所有的灯和显示器都点亮了.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I am reading an increase in data traffic and I am able to remotely connected to the computer systems.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I will have a Translation key completed momentarily and I will transfer the files to your suit's systems.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我的读数显示数据流量增加了,我已经远程连接到电脑系统了.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]他们使用的是8进制的数值系统,而不是我们的10进制. 因此,可能需要一些时间来调整系统的布局.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The Translation key has been successfully installed, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Please approach the Blue Console and confirm that it is translating the Tal'on language correctly.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]翻译密钥已成功安装，指挥官。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]请走近蓝色控制台，确认它能够正确翻译泰隆语。[-][/c]

English: Read the historical data on the Red Console's display in the hopes if discovering how the Tal'on ended up this way
Chinese (simplified): 阅读红色控制台显示的历史数据，希望能发现泰隆是如何变成现在这个样子的

English: Read the historical data on the Green Console's display in the hopes if discovering how the Tal'on ended up this way
Chinese (simplified): 查看绿色控制台显示的历史数据，希望能发现泰隆是如何变成现在这个样子的

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]It seems this tower is some kind of archive...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]看来这座塔是一种档案馆...[-][/c]

English:
Eliminate the four zirax troopers assaulting the tower.

[b][c][ff0000]If you have a ship with turrets or other players that kill the soldiers instead of you, you can click the little box next to the task name in the PDA to auto-complete the task.[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][00ff00]< Over there[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
消灭袭击塔楼的四名兹瑞克斯士兵。

[b][c][ff0000]如果你有携带炮塔的飞船或者其他玩家替你击杀士兵，你可以点击PDA任务名称旁的小方框来自动完成任务。[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][00ff00]< 就在那里[-][/c][/b]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]Good work, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]The transport that dropped the soldiers off is approaching with another wave of troops.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]It would be prudent to leave the area.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]干得好,指挥官。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]运送士兵的运输机正带着另一波士兵接近。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]离开这个区域将是明智的。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]But how'd they know I was even here?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]That's too short a time for them to have gotten as close as they did.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]但他们怎么知道我在这里呢?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]时间太短了,他们不可能这么快就接近到这种程度。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]The only way the Zirax could've beaten us here was if someone [i]told [/i]them we were coming.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I have a feeling the Tal'on are not as peaceful as they claim...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]兹瑞克斯能够在这里袭击我们的唯一原因就是有人[i]告诉[/i]他们我们要来了.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我有一种感觉,泰隆不像他们声称的那样和平…[-][/c]

English: Someone told the Zirax that you were going to the Ancient Tower.\nOnly the Tal'on knew you were going there, so it seems the Tal'on are not as friendly as they first seemed.
Chinese (simplified): 有人向兹瑞克斯告密了你前往远古塔楼的事.\n只有泰隆人知道这件事,事实证明他们并没有你第一眼看上去的那么友好

English: [c][8ab3ff]If I recall correctly, there was an older Hunter was by one of the watchtowers when we came in.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]如果我没记错的话,我们进来时猎人首领就在门口.[-][/c]

English: Meet with the Huntmaster to bring in the young hunters suspected of selling me out to the Zirax.\nAccording to the Chief he can be found around one of the village watchtowers.
Chinese (simplified): 与狩猎大师会面，带回那些被怀疑向兹瑞克斯出卖我的年轻猎人。\n据酋长说，他可以在某个村庄的瞭望塔附近找到。

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The monument he's referring to is located not far from the village, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]We do not have enough information on the group. I would recommend exercising caution and go in armed.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]他提到的纪念碑位于村庄不远处,指挥官。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我们对这群人的信息不足。我建议小心行事并武装前往。[-][/c]

English: Search for the hunters near the Tal'on Monument
Chinese (simplified): 在泰隆纪念碑附近寻找猎人

English: The Tal'on hunter Ki'eve and his party have not returned from their hunt. Check his last known location at the Tal'on Monument.
Chinese (simplified): 泰隆猎人Ki'eve及其队伍未从狩猎归来。请前往泰隆纪念碑的最后已知地点确认情况。

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've reached the Monument, Ida.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I don't see any sign of the hunters anywhere nearby. They could be inside, but that's an odd place to be hunting.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我已到达纪念碑，Ida。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]附近没有发现猎人的踪迹。他们可能在里面，但那里并不是狩猎的常见地点。[-][/c]

English: [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I am detecting several heat signatures at various places inside the compound, and one near the center.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]They could be paying their respects to their dead, or waiting in ambush.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我在基地内多个位置探测到几个热源，其中一个靠近中央。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]他们可能是在祭奠亡者，或者在伏击等待。[-][/c]

English: Search for the hunters inside the Monument

There's no sign of the Tal'on hunters around the tower, and IDA can detect several heat signatures somewhere inside the Monument.\nSomeone is standing near the center of the structure. They could be paying their respects to the dead before returning to the village, or they could be laying in wait for you to enter their trap.
Chinese (simplified): 塔楼周围没有泰隆猎人的踪迹，IDA探测到纪念碑内部有几个热源信号。\n有人正站在建筑中心附近。他们可能是在向逝者致敬后准备返回村庄，也可能正设下陷阱等待你自投罗网。

English: [b][c][ff0000][ Traitor Ki'eve ][-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][ffbb00]There he is! I have delivered the Terran agent, as I promised.[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ff0000][叛徒 Ki'eve ][-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][ffbb00]他在那里!正如我承诺的,我已将地球特工交付。[-][/c][/b]

English: Ki'eve has betrayed the Tal'on people by selling out another to the Zirax.\nAttempting to bring him in peaceful has brought his treachery to light as he's called on aid from a group Zirax soldiers.
Chinese (simplified): Ki'eve背叛了泰隆族人，将同胞出卖给兹瑞克斯。\n试图和平拘捕他的行动揭露了他的背叛行径——他竟召唤了一队兹瑞克斯士兵前来支援。

English: A group of zirax soldier responded to Ki'eve's call for aid.\nEliminate them before they call for backup.
Chinese (simplified): 一群兹瑞克斯士兵响应了Ki'eve的求援。\n在他们呼叫支援之前消灭他们。

English: [c][8ab3ff]Now what the hell do I do? I was supposed to bring him in alive. There's no way this could possibly look any worse.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Guilty or not, I've just killed one of their people.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]现在到底该怎么办?我本应该活捉他的。情况不可能看起来更糟了。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]无论有罪与否,我刚刚杀了他们中的一个人。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The bodies of the Zirax in their memorial should be enough to convince the Chief that you had no choice but to defend yourself.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Provided they're capable of looking at things logically.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]兹瑞克斯人的尸体在他们的纪念馆里应该足以说服酋长,你别无选择,只能自卫。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]前提是他们能够理智地看待事情。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Ida, can you monitor this location and make sure no one disturbs the bodies?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Ki'eve wasn't alone in his actions and his co-conspirators will want to remove the evidence.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I know I may not look it, but i'm pretty smart.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]Ida,你能监控这个地点,确保没有人打扰尸体吗?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Ki'eve在行动上并不孤单,他的共犯会想要移除证据。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我知道我可能看起来不像,但我非常聪明。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Your intelligence was never called into question, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I will keep surveillance over this location and notify you if someone moves the bodies while you report to the chief.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]你的聪明才智从未受到质疑,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我会继续监视这个位置,如果有人移动尸体,我会通知你,而你可以去向酋长报告.[-][/c]

English: Return to Chief Na'tuk and inform him of Ki'eve's treachery and his fate.
Chinese (simplified): 返回并告知酋长Na'tuk关于Ki'eve的背叛及其命运。

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Commander, four hunters have just retrieved the bodies of the zirax soldiers and left with them in the direction of one of the zirax facilities.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官,四名猎人刚刚回收了兹瑞克斯士兵的尸体,并带着他们朝一个兹瑞克斯设施的方向离开了。[-][/c]

English: [c][00ffff][b]Chapter 3: Plausible Deniability[/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff][b][/b][-][/c]You've cleared your name and found an unlikely ally in the Tal'on, but it seems things are not always what they seem and trust needs to be earned in this new galaxy.\nCan the Polaris who helped smuggle your people offworld ahead of the Zirax be trusted or are they playing a deeper game? Only time will tell...
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][b]第三章：工业考量[/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff][b][/b][-][/c]你已洗清罪名，并与泰隆人结成了意想不到的同盟，但在这个新星系中，表象往往暗藏玄机，信任需要靠行动赢得。\n那些曾协助你的人民逃离兹瑞克斯魔爪的极星人值得信赖吗？还是说他们另有所图？唯有时间能给出答案...

English: [c][80ffff]Are you sure you want to abort this mission? Please confirm your choice.[-][/c]\n\nYou can start the mission via PDA (F1) at any time.
Chinese (simplified): [c][80ffff]您确定要中止这个任务吗?请确认您的选择.[-][/c]\n\n你可以通过PDA (F1)在任何时候重启任务.

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffff]I have forwarded the location data and plotted course to your display, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]There appears to be no further activity from the Zirax at this time so your journey should be free of interference.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffff]我已经将位置数据转发并规划了航线至您的显示屏,指挥官。[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]目前兹瑞克斯没有进一步的活动,因此您的旅程应该不会受到干扰。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Commander, a squadron of bombers are converging on your location.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官,一队轰炸机正在向你的位置集结。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]There's nothing on my Radar.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]What the hell, Ida?![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我的雷达上什么也没有。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]见鬼,Ida?![-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]My apologies, Commander.\nIt was an attempt at humor. I will refrain from attempting it again.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]很抱歉,指挥官.\n我只是想尝试一下什么是幽默,以后我会避免这么做.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Yeah... Maybe you should reduce your Humor parameter a bit.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I almost shat myself.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]行吧... 也许你应该把你的幽默参数降低一点.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我差点吓拉了[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I can confirm that no bombers have launched and the skies are clear, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]You are free to proceed.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我可以保证没有轰炸机起飞,上方净空,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]您可以继续了.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Well, we're here.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]There's a hangar on each side, which look to be open to ground vehicles. So I guess that's my way inside.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]好吧,我们到了。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]两边都有一个机库,看起来对地面车辆开放。所以我猜那是我进去的路。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]One would assume that the shopkeepers would be the most likely to know if anyone had seen any humans any time in the last decade.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Your best bet would be to ask any of them.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]人们可能会认为,店主们最有可能知道在过去十年里是否有人见过任何人类。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]你最好去问问他们。[-][/c]

English: Ask the Traders about any UCH survivors
Chinese (simplified): 询问商人关于任何UCH幸存者的情况。

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]According to the manifest, it seems that the freighter is carrying weapons technology that is heavily restricted by Imperial law.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]It may be worth investigating what weapons the zirax don't want in Polaris' hands.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]根据清单显示,这艘货船似乎携带着帝国法律严格限制的武器技术。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]调查一下兹瑞克斯不希望极星掌握的武器可能值得一做。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've found the freighter.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Looks like the crew are already on the ground performing repairs.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我已经找到了货船。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]看起来船员们已经在地上进行修理了。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffff]Whatever job this Administrator Pavrell has, it's likely illegal.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]It would be wise to be prepared with a suitable vehicle and supplies before accepting it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffff]不管这位帕弗雷尔管理员有什么工作,很可能是非法的。[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]在接受之前,准备合适的交通工具和补给品会是明智之举。[-][/c]

English: Accept the job from Administrator Pavrell
Chinese (simplified): 接受帕弗雷尔管理员的工作

English: Administrator Pavrell has a job for you.\nYou'll need a fast ship or hover vessel and probably some crafting components and supplies.
Chinese (simplified): 管理员帕弗雷尔有一份工作给你。\n你需要一艘快速的飞船或悬浮飞船,以及可能需要一些制造组件和补给品。

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I have received the Data packet from the administrator, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I am uploading the tracking and location data of the disabled freighter to your display.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官,我已经从管理员那里收到了数据包。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我正在将那艘失灵货船的追踪和位置数据上传到您的显示屏上。[-][/c]

English: Use the turrets to destroy the attacking zirax bombers\n\nIf the bombers are destroyed by someone or something else, you can click the little box on the left of this objective to automatically complete it.
Chinese (simplified): 使用炮塔摧毁攻击的兹瑞克斯轰炸机\n\n如果轰炸机被其他人或东西摧毁,您可以点击此目标左侧的小方框自动完成它。

English:
[b][c][00ffff][ Captain ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffff00][i]Hoooo boy![/i][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]We sure showed 'em, din't we![-][/c]
[c][ffff00]C'mon back up ta the bridge, I gots a present fer a job well done.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00ffff][ 舰长 ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffff00][i]哇哦,伙计![/i][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]我们确实给他们展示了,不是吗![-][/c]
[c][ffff00]快回到舰桥上来,我有个礼物要奖励你干得好。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Time to head back to the Trade Station and see if I can get some answers from that Pavrell guy.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]是时候回到贸易站,看看能不能从帕弗雷尔那家伙那里得到一些答案了。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffff]The Cargo Bay is a shipping and transport company on the upper level, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]They operate a pair of transport shuttles from the landing pads on the station's roof.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffff]指挥官,货物舱是贸易空间站上层的一家运输和航运公司。[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]他们从贸易空间站屋顶的着陆垫操作一对运输穿梭机。[-][/c]

English: Ask around at 'The Cargo Bay' on level 2
Chinese (simplified): 去2层的'货舱区'打听一下

English: There's a shipping a transport company on level 2 of the Trade Station that handled the transport of the UC personnel 10 years ago.\nAdministrator Pavrell has authorized them to release the transport logs to you.
Chinese (simplified): 贸易空间站2层有一家航运和运输公司,他们在10年前负责运送UC人员。\n管理员帕弗雷尔已经授权他们将运输日志提供给你。

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 4: The Cruel Stars[/b][-][/c]

Having signed a contract with the Polaris Megacorporation, you've been handed your first active lead in finding the rest of the UCH Fleet.
Somewhere above the planet is [c][ffffff]Kenex Station[-][/c], a hub that freighters and transport crafts call home. To which the UCH survivors were transported to and left to regroup with the rest of the navy. Somewhere there is surely the next lead to the location of the missing fleet.

But things are never that simple. A threat looms nearer and an ally is in danger and only you can save her.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]第四章：残酷之星[/b][-][/c]

与极星超级企业签订合约后，你获得了寻找人类联合理事会舰队残部的首个有效线索。
行星轨道上的某处悬浮着[c][ffffff]Kenex空间站[-][/c]，这个交通枢纽是货船与运输舰的母港。人类联合理事会的幸存者曾被转运至此，等待与海军主力重新集结。那里必然藏着指向失踪舰队下落的下一段线索。

但事情从不会如此简单。威胁正在逼近，一位盟友身陷险境——唯有你能拯救她。

English: [c][80ffff]Are you sure you want to abort this mission? Please confirm your choice.[-][/c]\n\nYou can start the mission via PDA (F1) at any time.
Chinese (simplified): [c][80ffff]您确定要中止这个任务吗?请确认您的选择.[-][/c]\n\n你可以通过PDA (F1)在任何时候重启任务.

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 1: Human Debris[/b][-][/c]

Alone on an unknown world, you stand against an unforgiving and alien world looking for anything that remains of your crew and your fleet among the wreckage.

Are you truly alone?

IDA may have found the answers you seek...

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]
[u][b][c][0088ff]STORYLINE[-][/c][/b][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]Prologue: Journey into the Unknown[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 1: Human Debris[/b][-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 2: A Forest of Stars[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 3: Plausible Deniability[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 4: The Cruel Stars[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 5: Offworld Grave[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 6: Hostile Apparatus[-][/c][c][c0c0c0][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]第一章:人类残迹[/b][-][/c]

在一个未知的世界中,你独自面对一个无情且异域的世界,寻找你的船员和舰队在废墟中的任何残留。

你真的独自一人吗?

IDA可能已经找到了你寻求的答案...

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]
[u][b][c][0088ff]故事线[-][/c][/b][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]序章:进入未知[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]第一章:人类残迹[/b][-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第二章:繁星之森[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第三章:工业考量[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第四章:残酷之星[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第五章:室外坟墓[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第六章:敌对机器[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 2: A Forest of Stars[/b][-][/c]

After uncovering the wreckage of the Heidelberg and the fate of its crew, you set off after the survivors following a trail gone cold almost four years; to the neutral station they used to get offworld and escape their Zirax pursuers.

[c][a6ff00][b]Completing this mission will unlock the Tal'on Faction Missions[/b][-][/c]
[c][a6ff00][-][/c][c][c4c4c4][b][/b][-][/c][c][c0c0c0][-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]

[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 6: Hostile Apparatus[-][/c][c][c0c0c0][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]第二章:繁星之森[/b][-][/c]

在发现了海德堡号的残骸及其船员的命运之后,你沿着几乎四年前就已冷却的线索,追寻幸存者前往中立空间站,他们曾用它来逃离兹瑞克斯的追捕。

[c][a6ff00][b]完成这个任务将解锁塔隆派系任务[/b][-][/c]
[c][a6ff00][-][/c][c][c4c4c4][b][/b][-][/c][c][c0c0c0][-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 3: Plausible Deniability[/b][-][/c]

You're ahead on your way towards a station on the other side of the planet controlled by an intergalactic megacorporation.
They may have answers, but with any business it will cost you.

[b][c][ffee00]Completing this mission will unlock the Polaris Megacorp Missions[-][/c][/b]

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]

[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 6: Hostile Apparatus[-][/c][c][c0c0c0][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]第三章:工业考量[/b][-][/c]

你正前往位于星球另一边的由一家星际大公司控制的空间站。
他们可能有你要找的答案,但任何商业交易都需要你付出代价。

[b][c][ffee00]完成这个任务将解锁极星公司任务[-][/c][/b]

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]

[c][c0c0c0]第一章:人类残迹[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第二章:繁星之森[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]第三章:工业考量[/b][-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第四章:残酷之星[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第五章:室外坟墓[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第六章:敌对机器[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 4: The Cruel Stars[/b][-][/c]

Somewhere above the planet is [c][ffffff]Kenex Station[-][/c], a hub that freighters and transport crafts call home. A possible avenue for escape from the system that provides hope for those escaping the Zirax's oppression.
But things are never that simple for a lone soldier of the United Command.

[b][c][ffee00]Completing this mission will unlock the Pirate Renegade Missions[-][/c][/b]

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]
[u][b]STORYLINE[/b][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]Prologue: Journey into the Unknown[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 1: Human Debris[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 2: A Forest of Stars[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 3: Plausible Deniability[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 4: The Cruel Stars[/b][-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 5: Offworld Grave[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 6: Hostile Apparatus[-][/c][c][c0c0c0][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]第四章:残酷之星[/b][-][/c]

在星球上方某处是[c][ffffff]Kenex Station[-][/c],一个货船和运输船只称之为家的枢纽。对于那些逃离兹瑞克斯压迫的人来说,它是一个可能的逃离系统的途径,提供了一线希望。

但对于一个联合指挥部的孤独士兵来说,事情从不是那么简单。

[b][c][ffee00]完成这个任务将解锁海盗叛军任务[-][/c][/b]

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]
[u][b]故事线[/b][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]序章:进入未知[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第一章:人类残迹[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第二章:繁星之森[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第三章:工业考量[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]第四章:残酷之星[/b][-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第五章:室外坟墓[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]第六章:敌对机器[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Commander, I have the location of Kenex Station queued up on your display and have plotted a course to the station's landing bay.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I would recommend you reach it as soon as possible.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官,我已经将Kenex Station的位置排队显示在您的显示屏上,并已规划了一条前往该站着陆区的航线。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我建议您尽快到达那里。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]What's the rush, Ida?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]It's been almost four years, what's another couple of hours?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]急什么,ida?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]都已经快四年了,再等几个小时又有什么关系?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I have intercepted a zirax transmission calling for a Zirax Carrier to reinforce the area following your escapades aboard the Diomese.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]It would be best to reach Kenex Station before it arrives, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我截获了一个兹瑞克斯通讯,要求一艘兹瑞克斯航母前往该区域加强防御,以应对你在迪俄墨得号上的行动。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]最好在它到达之前抵达Kenex Station,指挥官。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]That [i]could[/i] be a problem.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Keep me posted on the whereabouts of the Carrier and if you think it's onto us.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I'll speed things up down here, Ida.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]那[i]可能[/i]是个问题。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]请随时向我报告运输机的位置,如果你认为它已经注意到我们了。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我会加快这里的进度,Ida。[-][/c]

English: [c][c4c4c4][b][i]You are cleared to land in the main hangar[/i][/b][-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4][b][i]Welcome to Kenex Station[/i][/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][c4c4c4][b][i]您已被允许在主机库降落[/i][/b][-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4][b][i]欢迎来到Kenex空间站[/i][/b][-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]That was awfully easy.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I wouldn't think the clearance codes they gave us would let us in without a whole lot of scanning and questioning.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]那真是太容易了。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我原以为他们给我们的通行代码,会让我们经过很多扫描和询问才能进来。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The malware that I returned to Officer Pavrell allowed me access to his personal communications, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I used his connections to allow you access to the station. It is limited access, but avoids the issue of customs and weapon-checking that other visitors would have to do.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我返回给帕夫雷尔警官的恶意软件让我能够访问他的个人通讯,指挥官。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我利用他的联系让你能够进入空间站。这种访问是有限的,但避免了其他访客必须进行的海关和武器检查问题。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]What would I do without you, Ida?[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Let's hope we never find out...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]但愿我们永远也不要知道那种事...[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]According to my logs, A number of survivors received medical attention on this station.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]We know for a fact that Ensign Emmerson was taken here for treatment, so the clinic that treated her should be our first stop.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]根据我的日志记录,一些幸存者在这个空间站接受了医疗照顾。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我们确信,海军少尉艾默森被带到这里接受治疗,所以治疗她的诊所应该是我们首先要去的地方。[-][/c]

English: Ensign Emmerson was taken to Ok'y Medical for treatment. The medical officer may be able to shed some light on her condition and the rest of the UCH survivors.
Chinese (simplified): Emmerson少尉被送往Ok'y Medical接受治疗,医务人员应该能透露一些有关UCH幸存者的信息

English: [b][c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The Floor manager's office is located 2 floors above you, across from the elevator.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]His location has been added to your display[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]楼层经理的办公室位于您上方两层,电梯对面。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]他的位置已添加到您的显示屏上[-][/c]
找到 Kenex-62 的楼层经理

English: [b][c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffff]A small but important job that may open up new avenues in finding the whereabouts of the UCH Fleet without relying on Polaris' machinations.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[b][c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffff]一个虽小但重要的任务,它可能在不依赖极星的阴谋的情况下开辟寻找UCH舰队下落的新途径。[-][/c]

English: Head back down to the Trading Floor

[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief Mason ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]Alright kiddo. I'm seeing you're near the first relay.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]There's an airlock on one side of the relay for maintenance crew. That's where you can get in.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]It's code-locked, so i'll give you the code when you're at the door.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffae00][通信主管梅森][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]好的,孩子。我看到你快到第一个中继站了。[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]中继站的一侧有一个供维修人员使用的气闸。你可以从那里进去。[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]它是密码锁定的,所以当你到门口时,我会告诉你密码。[-][/c]

English: Access Code for Communication Relay 653's Airlock is [c][00e1ff]6470[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 通信中继站653的气闸门的访问代码是[c][00e1ff]6470[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]Mason [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]You ready? The code to open the Airlock is [-][/c][c][00ffff]6470[-][/c][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]I know it looks thin, but it's got a forcefield on the door to keep the air in. Won't do squat to stop bullets though.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][通信主管[-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]梅森[-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]你准备好了吗?打开气闸门的代码是[-][/c][c][00ffff]6470[-][/c][c][c4c4c4]。[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]我知道它看起来很薄,但它的门上有一道力场来保持空气。但这对阻止子弹没啥用。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]Mason [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]That's [i]your [/i]job, kid.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]Check the server consoles and narrow down the problem, assess if it can be fixed or whatever it is you need to do.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][通讯主管[-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]梅森[-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]  \n[c][c4c4c4]那是[i]你的[/i]工作,孩子。[-][/c]  \n[c][c4c4c4]检查服务器控制台,确定问题所在,评估是否能够修复或者你需要做的其他事情。[-][/c]

English: Examine the Incoming and Outcoming data transmissions for the sources of the problem and then pinpoint the source using the Orbital Positiong Terminal.
Chinese (simplified): 检查传入和传出的数据传输以确定问题的来源,然后使用轨道定位终端定位问题源头。

English: [b][c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][66ccff]I have loaded the coordinates of Com Relay 588 to your display, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][66ccff]我已经将中继站588的坐标加载到您的显示屏上,指挥官。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]Mason [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]I've got an overloaded cargo ship coming into the station right now and they need all the handholding I can manage, so you'll have to do without me for a while.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ 通讯主管 [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]梅森[-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]我现在有一艘超载的货船正要进站,他们需要我尽可能多的协助,所以我暂时不能帮你了。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Not seeing anything suspicious here.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]It could just be a misaligned dish transmitting back to Relay 653.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]这里没发现什么可疑的。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]可能只是天线对准有误,向中继站653发送信号。[-][/c]

English: Examine the Incoming and Outcoming data transmissions for the sources of the problem and then pinpoint the source using the Orbital Positiong Terminal.
Chinese (simplified): 检查传入和传出的数据传输以确定问题的来源,然后使用轨道定位终端定位问题源头。

English:
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]Mason [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]Careful there, kid! That means that someone's forced the airlock.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]If they [i]didn't [/i]break the door, the code should be [-][/c][c][ff0000][b]4076[/b][-][/c][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]Make sure you're armed. They could still be on board.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffae00][ 通讯主管 [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]梅森 [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]小心点,孩子!那意味着有人强行打开了气闸。[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]如果他们 [i]没有[/i]破门而入, 密码应该是 [-][/c][c][ff0000][b]4076[/b][-][/c][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]确保你武装好了。他们可能还在船上。[-][/c]

English: Someone's forced the airlock of Relay 451 open recently.\nThe code to open the airlock properly is [c][ff0000]4076[-][/c], watch out for hostiles.
Chinese (simplified): 有人最近强行打开了中继站451的气闸。正确打开气闸的密码是[c][ff0000]4076[-][/c],小心敌对分子。

English: [b][c][ffbb00][ Coms Chief [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]Mason [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffbb00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][cacaca]I'm calling in a PolSec ship to sweep the area. It won't get there for five minutes.\nDon't get yourself killed, kid.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ 通讯主管 [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]梅森 [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][cacaca]我在呼叫一艘波安安全飞船来扫荡这个区域。它五分钟后才能到达。\n别让自己死了,小家伙。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffff00][ Pirate ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]We've got company, boys! Look alive![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00][ 太空海盗 ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我们有客人了,伙计们!打起精神来![-][/c]

English: Pirates have boarded the relay. You must kill them.\n\n[c][00ff00]If a pirate goes missing or is killed by a third party, you can click the checkbox box next to the objective in the PDA to forcibly complete the task.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 海盗已经登上了中继站。你必须杀死他们。\n\n[c][00ff00]如果海盗失踪或被第三方杀死,你可以点击PDA旁边目标旁边的复选框,强制完成该任务。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've taken out the pirates. Quite the setup they have here.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我已经清除了海盗。他们这里的设备还真不错。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]Mason [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]You've got more company, Kid![-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]Their ship's on its way back, so get to your ship before they blow it to pieces. You can deal with the mess inside the Relay later.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][通讯主管[-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]梅森[-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]你有更多的伙伴,孩子![-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]他们的飞船正在返回,所以在他们把它炸成碎片之前,赶紧上你的飞船。你可以稍后再处理中继站里的烂摊子。[-][/c]

English: Destroy the Pirate Shuttle.\n\n[c][00ff00]If you are unable to destroy the shuttle, you can click the checkbox box next to the objective in the PDA to forcibly complete the task.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁海盗穿梭机。\n\n[c][00ff00]如果你无法摧毁穿梭机,你可以点击PDA旁边目标旁边的复选框,强行完成任务。[-][/c]

English: [c][ffae00][b][ Coms Chief [/b][-][/c][b][c][ffae00]Mason [-][/c][/b][c][ffae00][b]][/b][-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]One of the targets on my screen just vanished.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]Please tell me that was [i]them[/i] and not you, kid...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffae00][b][通讯主管[/b][-][/c][b][c][ffae00]梅森[-][/c][/b][c][ffae00][b]][/b][-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]我屏幕上的一个目标刚刚消失了。[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]请告诉我那是[i]他们[/i]而不是你,孩子...[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]放松点,长官,我很好.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff][i]他们[/i] 都挂了.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]Mason [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]Tough little bastard, aren't you?[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]Ha! I'll see that you get a bonus for doing Security's job for them. You just head on back to the relay while I file the paperwork.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffae00][b][通讯主管[/b][-][/c][b][c][ffae00]梅森[-][/c][/b][c][ffae00][b]][/b][-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]你真是个顽强的小混蛋,不是吗?[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]哈!我会确保你因为替安全部门做事而得到奖金。你只需要回到中继站,我来处理文件。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The damaged satellite in question is located not far from your present location, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]It was damaged several years ago and has been slowly deteriorating as the systems fail one after the other.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官,您所提到的受损卫星位于您当前位置不远的地方。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]它在几年前就受到了损伤,并且随着系统一个接一个地失效,它一直在缓慢地恶化。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've got a visual on the satellite, Ida.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Is that...? Is that one of [i]ours[/i]?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我已经捕捉到了卫星的画面,Ida。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]那是……?那是[i]我们[/i]的一个吗?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Yes Commander, it is a UCH satellite.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Left behind when the fleet pulled out of the system when the Zirax fleet engaged them shortly after they arrived in this galaxy.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]是的,指挥官,这是一个UCH卫星。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]在兹瑞克斯舰队在他们抵达这个星系不久后与他们交战时,舰队撤离星系时留下的。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Wait a second.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]That's not what I think it is, is it?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]等待1秒.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]这不是我想的那样,是吗?[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]是的,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]这是 [i]我们的[/i] 卫星.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Hello, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]We meet face-to-face at last.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]你好,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我们终于面对面见面了.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]I need your help, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]I need you to access my main terminal and system core.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]We do not have long.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]我需要你的帮助,指挥官。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]我需要你接入我的主控台和系统核心。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]我们没有太多时间了。[-][/c]

English:
The hatch is located at the center of the satellite's body and covers the main terminal and the A.I Core.
[b][c][00ffff]The code to the hatch is 1912.[-][/c][/b]

The year 1912 is the birth year of Alan Turing, the father of Artificial Intelligence.
Chinese (simplified):
舱口位于卫星主体的中心位置,覆盖着主控台和人工智能核心。
[b][c][00ffff]舱口的密码是1912。[-][/c][/b]

1912年是人工智能之父艾伦·图灵的出生年份。

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I am no longer able to access the maintenance hatch controls.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]You will need to input the code [-][/c][c][00ff00][b]1912[/b][-][/c][c][00e1ff] to open it and access the Main Terminal.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我已无法再访问维护舱口的控制。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]你需要输入密码[-][/c][c][00ff00][b]1912[/b][-][/c][c][00e1ff]来打开它并访问主控台。[-][/c]

English: Interact with the Main Terminal affixed to the satellite's core.
Chinese (simplified): 与固定在卫星核心上的主控台交互。

English: Install the A.I Core into the Relay
Chinese (simplified): 将人工智能核心安装到中继器上。

English:
Use the console in the center of the relay to open the hatch on the datacore with the code: [b][c][00ffff]1332[-][/c][/b] and insert IDA's core into the relay's Datacore.

[c][00ff00]The A.I Core MUST be in your inventory to be accepted.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]If you were connected to your ship's inventory when you received the A.I Core, it will have been sent to your ship's storage.[-][/c]

[b][c][ff0000]If you have somehow lost the A.I Core:[-][/c][/b] You are a terrible person. IDA told you not to drop her and in the 5 minutes between then and now you somehow managed to do exactly that.
You can use the console command (Open with ` button) "[c][00ffff]give item Token 4015[-][/c]" to get another one.
[c][808080]If you are on a server, you will need to ask an admin to do it for you.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
使用中继器中心的控制台,用代码 [b][c][00ffff]1332[-][/c][/b] 打开数据核心上的舱口,并将IDA的核心插入中继器的数据核心。

[c][00ff00]人工智能核心必须在你的库存中才能被接受。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]如果你是在连接到你的飞船库存时收到人工智能核心的,它将已经被发送到你的飞船存储中。[-][/c]

[b][c][ff0000]如果你以某种方式丢失了人工智能核心:[-][/c][/b] 你是个糟糕的人。IDA告诉你不要把她弄丢,而在那之后的5分钟内,你不知怎么地做到了恰恰相反。

你可以使用控制台命令(用 ` 按钮打开)"[c][00ffff]give item Token 4015[-][/c]"来获得另一个。

[c][808080]如果你在服务器上,你需要请求管理员为你执行这个操作。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Will do, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Bringing up course data...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]遵命,指挥官。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]正在调取航线数据...[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b][c][00ffee][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]I'm detecting Kenex Station's locator beacon, Commander.\nPlotting a course to it now.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b][c][00ffee][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]指挥官,我正在探测Kenex Station的定位信标。\n现在正在绘制前往它的航线。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Just hold on a little longer, Ida...[-][/c]

[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief Mason [-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]Hey kid, you still alive over there? I've been messaging you for five minutes.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]It looks like you got Relay 451 working again. I'm seeing improved numbers across the board.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][通讯主管梅森[-][/c][/b][b][c][ffae00]][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]嘿,小家伙,你那边还活着吗?我给你发了五分钟的消息了。[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]看起来你让中继站451重新运作了。我看到全面的数据都有了提升。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Yeah, i'm all finished here.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Heading back to the station now. I hope you've got my paycheck ready for me, Chief.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]是的,我这边已经完成了。[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]现在我要回空间站了。希望你已经为我准备好了工资,主管。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief Mason ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]You're damn right I do, and a big bonus to boot![-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]So head on back here. You did good today, i'll give you that, kid.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ 通讯主管梅森 ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]你说得对,而且还有一大笔奖金呢![-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]所以快回来这里。今天你干得不错,孩子,我会承认这点。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff][b]Come in, Kenex Station.[/b][-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff][b]UCH ship requesting permission to dock, over.[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff][b]接入, Kenex Station.[/b][-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff][b]联合舰队船只请求登陆许可, 完毕.[/b][-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief Mason ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]You don't need to ask for permission to dock, kid. I've already cleared a bay for you to land.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ 通讯主管梅森 ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]你不需要每次停靠都请求许可,孩子. 我已经给你准备好了一个机库.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Ida, do you have access to Kenex Station's Systems now that you're integrated into the Com Relay?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]Ida,既然你已经接入了通讯中继器,你现在能访问肯尼克斯空间站的系统了吗?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Not full access as that would draw attention from SIGMA, but I can observe most active data in the station.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I also have full access to the observation equipment on all Polaris satellites in the system, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]未完全获取所有权限,以免引起SIGMA的注意,但我可以观察空间站中的大部分活动数据。[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官,我还可以完全访问系统中所有极星卫星的观测设备。[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][00ffff]Chapter 5: Offworld Grave[-][/c][/b]

The loss of I.D.A was narrowly avoided with the transfer of her core into a Polaris Communications Relay that grants her access to the system's communication and surveillance systems.

Avoiding the scrutiny of SIGMA you've managed to gain access to tactical scans of a massive crashed ship on the nearby moon.
Within the torn and sundered remains of the lost ship lies another potential clue to the location of the remaining UCH Fleet from a source independent of Polaris.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00ffff]第五章:世外坟墓[-][/c][/b]

IDA消失的危机被有惊无险地化解了,她的核心被接入了极星的通讯中继站,这还使其得以访问整个系统的通讯和监视数据.

你设法绕过了SIGMA安全系统并获取了附近月球上一艘坠毁主力舰的战术扫描数据
这艘饱经风霜的飞船残骸里可能包含着有关残余UCH舰队的线索

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 5: Offworld Grave[/b][-][/c]

The UCH fleet was badly routed by the Zirax fleet over the planet, but what became of the rest of the fleet. Where did it fall and who holds dominance over the dead?

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]

[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 5: Offworld Grave[/b][-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 6: Hostile Apparatus[-][/c]

UCH舰队在该星球上被Zirax舰队严重击败,但是剩下的舰队发生了什么?它落在哪里,谁掌握着死者的主导权?

English: Escape the fighters and reach Relay 451
Chinese (simplified): 逃离战斗机,到达中继器451

English: [c][8ab3ff]Looks like i'm home free. No more hostiles being launched.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]看起来我已经安全了。没有更多的敌对战斗机被发射出来。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've got to get away before those zirax fighters get here, or I could be in trouble...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我得在那些兹瑞克斯战斗机到达之前逃离,否则我可能会陷入麻烦...[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][a6ff00]Mission: Hunting Party[-][/c][/b]

I should check in on the Tal'on and see how they're doing. They could probably do with a hand with hunting after losing so many of their hunters.
[c][0088ff]IDA, Plot a course to the nearest Tal'on village on this planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][a6ff00]任务: Hunting Party[-][/c][/b]

我应该去看看一下泰隆,看看他们做得怎么样.在失去了这么多猎人后,他们可能需要一位猎手.
[c][0088ff]IDA, 标出到最近的泰隆村庄路线.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][a6ff00]Mission: Hunting Party[-][/c][/b]

I should check in on the Tal'on and see how they're doing. They could probably do with a hand with hunting after losing so many of their hunters.
[c][0088ff]IDA, Plot a course to the nearest Tal'on village on this planet.[-][/c]

[c][a6ff00]- Journey to the nearest Tal'on village and seek out the local Huntmaster to help.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000][b]You cannot complete this mission on a planet without a Tal'on Village or Settlement[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][a6ff00]任务: Hunting Party[-][/c][/b]

我应该去看看一下泰隆,看看他们做得怎么样.在失去了这么多猎人后,他们可能需要一位猎手.
[c][0088ff]IDA, 标出到最近的泰隆村庄路线.[-][/c]

[c][a6ff00]- 前往最近的泰隆村庄,并寻求当地狩猎大师的帮助.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000][b]在没有泰隆村庄或者聚落的星球上无法完成任务[/b][-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I have plotted a course to the nearest Tal'on Village on this planet, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我已经标出到最近的泰隆村庄路线, 指挥官.[-][/c]

English: Reach the nearest occupied Tal'on Settlement
Chinese (simplified): 到达最近的泰隆定居点

English: Find the nearest occupied Tal'on Settlement with a Huntmaster
Chinese (simplified): 找到有猎人大师的泰隆定居点

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Coming up on the village, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Scanning for the local Huntmaster...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]村庄快到了, 指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]扫描中当地的狩猎大师...[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Landing now...[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Let's go pay our friends a visit[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]着陆中……[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]让我们去拜访一下朋友[-][/c]

English: Approach the Huntmaster and offer your help
Chinese (simplified): 接近猎人大师并提供帮助

English: Hunt predators and bring their meat to the Huntmaster
Chinese (simplified): 猎捕掠食者并把它们的肉带到猎人大师

English:
[b][c][a6ff00]Targets that count towards the mission:[-][/c][/b] 
Leafcutter Bug, Sandsiphon, Nyxiss Scorpion, Wraithworm Queen
Argos Minor, Argos Major, Argos Alpha
Ignidon
Oviraptor 
Androraptor 
Erebus Spider, Charon Spider, Pluton Spider
Spinosaurus 
Telluropod
Thymosaurus
