English: Androraptor ([i]Androraptor Tallodantus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Androraptor ([i]Androraptor Tallodantus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[b][c][ff5c5c]Androraptor[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd](Androraptor Tallodantus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Predator
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 61.5 - 70.2 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 65cm (width), 171cm (height), 292cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: The Androraptor is a theropod dinosaur native to the Andromeda Galaxy. It seems to share a common evolutionary path to those of the Dromaeosaurid Genus of the Cretaceous period, but with a tendency towards a more reptillian form over the feathered contemporaries of our own galaxy.
This development is thought to be due to their environment being primarily tropical where the development of feathers would hinder the creature while stalking prey in the wet jungle and cause numerous health problems.

Androraptors travel and hunt in family packs, with the younger raptors being educated during the daytime by following behind the parents and imitating their actions to take down prey with supervision. During the night however, the parents hunt freely making night time especially hazardous for prey and human alike as these fully-grown raptors are larger, faster and more vicious at night while unrestrained with taking care of youngsters.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Androraptors are widespread across the Andromeda galaxy and common on most breathable Temperate planets. How or why they were spread across the galaxy is still unknown, but due to the slight genetic variations it's believed they were seeded there at least several hundred thousand years ago.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ff5c5c]Androraptor[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd](Androraptor Tallodantus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:捕食者
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b] : 61.5 - 70.2 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 65cm (宽), 171cm (高), 292cm (长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:Androraptor是一种原产于仙女座星系的兽脚亚目恐龙.它似乎与白垩纪驰龙科有着共同的进化路径,但在我们银河系的有羽毛的同时代动物中,它更倾向于爬虫类的形式.
这种发展被认为是由于它们的环境主要是在热带地区,羽毛的发育会阻碍这种生物在潮湿的丛林中追踪猎物并导致许多健康问题.

雄Androraptor龙成群结队旅行和狩猎,年轻的Androraptor在白天接受教育,跟随父母并模仿他们采取行动在监督下击落猎物.然而,在夜间,父母们自由地捕猎,这使得夜间对猎物和人类都特别危险,因为这些成熟的猛禽在夜间更大、更快、更恶毒,而且在照顾幼崽时不受约束.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:Androraptors在仙女座星系广泛分布,在大多数可呼吸的温带行星上都很常见.它们是如何或为什么散布在银河系中的仍然未知,但由于轻微的遗传变异,人们相信它们至少在数十万年前就在那里播种了.
[b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][6bd600]Oviraptor [-][/c][/b][c][6bd600][-][/c]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Oviraptor ([i]Oviraptor Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Oviraptor ([i]Oviraptor Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[c][6bd600][b]Oviraptor[/b] [-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Oviraptor Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Prey
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 64.8 - 77.6 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 67cm (width), 192cm (height), 324cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: The Oviraptor is a theropod dinosaur native to the Andromeda Galaxy. It is distantly related to the Androraptor, but appears to be further up the evolutionary chain and more closely related to the bird-like development as seen in earth's dinosaurs.
Oviraptors move in mated pairs, ranging great distances without claimed territory while raising their offspring. Only building nests to house their eggs and early stages of development of their children until they're old enough to begin moving on their own.

Oviraptors are omnivorous, eating berries, fruit, mushrooms and nuts when available; hunting vertebrates such as Erebus spiders and Leafcutters when easy prey is encountered. But otherwise are completely passive to anything that does not immediately pose a threat to them or their young. Preferring to flee, rather than attack when approached unless something harms their offspring.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Oviraptors prefer cold climates and are often found in or near snow in family groups of two adults and as many as five young. They are not harmful to the environment and do not engage in territorial disputes with other life forms.
Although parents will attack anything that harms their offspring; the children themselves are curious and playful and will often follow and get into mischief in human camps.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][6bd600][b]Oviraptor[/b] [-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Oviraptor Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:猎物
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b] : 64.8 - 77.6 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 67cm (宽), 192cm (高), 324cm (长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:Oviraptor是一种原产于仙女座星系的兽脚亚目恐龙.它与 Androraptor 关系较远,但似乎在进化链上更靠前,与地球恐龙的类鸟发育关系更密切.
Oviraptors 成对移动,在没有领土的情况下进行很长的距离,同时抚养它们的后代.只筑巢以容纳它们的卵和孩子的早期发育阶段,直到他们长大到可以开始自己移动.

Oviraptor是杂食性动物,吃浆果、水果、蘑菇和坚果(如果有的话);当遇到容易猎物时,猎杀脊椎动物,如 Erebus 蜘蛛和 Leafcutters.但除此之外,对任何不会立即对他们或他们的孩子构成威胁的事情都是完全被动的.喜欢逃跑,而不是在接近时攻击,除非有什么东西伤害了它们的后代.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:Oviraptor喜欢寒冷的气候,经常出现在或在两个成年人和多达五个年轻人的家庭团体中接近.它们对环境无害,不与其他生命形式发生领土争端.
虽然父母会攻击任何伤害他们后代的东西;孩子们自己好奇又爱玩,经常会跟随并在人类营地中恶作剧.
[b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][ff5c5c]Ignidon [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Ignidon ([i]Agnipareiasaurus Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Ignidon ([i]Agnipareiasaurus Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[c][ff5c5c][b]Ignidon [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Agnipareiasaurus A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Predator
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 594.0 - 977.6 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 222cm (width), 181cm (height), 370cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: The Ignidon is a large, squat quadruped reptile indigenous to arid and sandy terrain where it survives as an ambush predator and scavenger by burying itself in soft sand or among rocks near a water or food source for other animals.
Having evolved similar to the Pareiasaurus of the Permian period, it was incorrectly identified as a herbivore from a recovered dead Ignidon. Where the mouth was equipped with several sets of heavy molar-like teeth on the creature's palate, assumed to be used for eating plants. Live examples identified that the teeth were used to grind bones and rock salt from dry seabeds.

Ignidon live solitary lives in open dunes, assuming the appearance of rock formations during the day to keep heat down and to lure prey to approach them in search of insects found beneath desert rocks. Roaming the desert at night when it's cooler and relocating to a new resting place by dawn.

Unusually, the Ignidon's upper esophagus is equipped with valve that allows it to vomit an organic oily compound produced in a humped cavity between the creature's shoulders that will ignite when exposed to oxygen. This compound is usually used in mating displays, but can also be propelled with significant range and dispersal to become a jet of flame; amending the name "Agni" (Fire) to the taxonomic name of the creature.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Ignidon are commonly found in arid and desert environments; They appear most commonly in sandy dunes and at the edge of water sources and most prominently at night.
They are not particularly fast on their feet and have limited eyesight, making them only a minor nuisance to locals traversing the desert in hover vessels at night.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ff5c5c][b]Ignidon[/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Agnipareiasaurus A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:捕食者
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b]: 594.0 - 977.6 kg
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 222cm (宽), 181cm (高), 370cm (长)
[b] [c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:Ignidon 是一种大型的、蹲下的四足爬行动物,原产于干旱和沙地,作为伏击捕食者和清道夫,它通过将自己埋在柔软的沙子或在其他动物的水源或食物来源附近的岩石中.
进化类似于二叠纪的 Pareiasaurus,它被错误地识别为来自回收的死 Ignidon 的食草动物.该生物的上颚上长有几组重的臼齿状牙齿,推测是用来吃植物的.活生生的例子表明,牙齿被用来从干燥的海床上磨碎骨头和岩盐.

Ignidon 独自生活在开阔的沙丘中,假设白天出现岩层以保持热量并引诱猎物接近它们寻找在沙漠岩石下发现的昆虫.晚上天气凉爽时在沙漠中漫游,并在黎明时搬迁到新的休息地.

不同寻常的是,Ignidon 的上食道配备了阀门,允许它呕吐在生物肩膀之间的隆起腔中产生的有机油性化合物,遇氧会着火.这种化合物通常用于配对显示器,但也可以以显着的范围和分散推进,成为火焰喷射;将名称“Agni”(火)修改为生物的分类名称.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:Ignidon 常见于干旱和沙漠环境;它们最常见于沙丘和水源边缘,并且在夜间最为突出.
它们的脚步不是特别快,视力有限,因此对于夜间乘坐悬停船穿越沙漠的当地人来说,它们只是一个小麻烦.

English: [b][c][ffffff]Ecology:[-][/c] [c][6bd600]Andromedan Sandworm [-][/c][c][ff5c5c][-][/c][/b]has been added to your Empyriopedia [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][6bd600]Andromedan Sandworm [-][/c][c][ff5c5c][-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Andromedan Sandworm ([i]Androtyphlops Maximus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Andromedan Sandworm ([i]Androtyphlops Maximus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[b][c][6bd600]Andromedan Sandworm[-][/c][c][ff5c5c][-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](Androtyphlops Maximus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Prey
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 22.8 - 87.1 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 43cm (width), 45cm (height), 210cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: The Andromedan Sandworm, is technically a type of blind snake related to the Typhlopidae family of earth. Though not directly descended, it has evolved the same way with a very similar genetic structure.
Unlike those in the Terran Tylphopidae family, the Sandworm is considerably larger and better suited for desert life on desertous worlds; able to defend itself both above and below ground and with larger plate-like scales that are strong enough to resist the bite force of the Pareiadon, their main predator.
While blind, they still possess vestigial eyes capable of detecting light intensity. Relying on seismic vibrations of predator and prey to determine their location, in much the same way that the Sandsiphon does.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Sandworms are commonly found in arid and desert environments. Although they spend most of their time burrowing underground, they form groups on the surface around mid-day for mutual protection while sunning themselves.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][6bd600]仙女座沙虫[-][/c][c][ff5c5c][-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](Androtyphlops Maximus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:猎物
[b][c][ffffff]成人体重[-][/c][/b]:22.8 - 87.1 kg
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]:43cm(宽),45cm (高), 210cm (长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:仙女座沙虫,与地球的Typhlopidae家族有关.虽然不是直属亲族,但它以相同的方式进化,具有非常相似的遗传结构.
与蚯蚓科不同,沙虫体型更大,更适合沙漠世界的沙漠生活;能够在地上和地下进行自我保护,并拥有更大的板状鳞片,足以抵抗主要捕食者 Pareiadon 的咬合力.
虽然失明,但它们仍然拥有能够检测光强度的退化眼睛.依靠捕食者和猎物的地震振动来确定它们的位置,这与 Sandsiphon 所做的大致相同.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:沙虫常见于干旱和沙漠环境.尽管它们大部分时间都在地下挖洞,但它们会在中午左右在地表形成群体,在晒太阳的同时相互保护.
[b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][6bd600]Androzoa [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Androzoa ([i]Aquazoa Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Androzoa ([i]Aquazoa Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[c][6bd600][b]Androzoa[/b] [-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Aquazoa Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Prey
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 63.0 - 77.8 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 96cm (width), 124cm (height), 147cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: The Androzoa is a mobile, slime-like creature similar to the Jellyfish of earth. Developed for mobility over both water and land, the Androzoa is capable of traversing extreme terrains and surviving in hostile environments.

The Androzoa is equipped with fine, needle-sharp stingers across 30% of it's surface that are virtually invisible to the naked eye and carry a painful, but non-fatal hemotoxin; allowing the Androzoa to sting any creature unfortunate enough to attack it. The effects of an Androzoan sting are very similar to Frostbite, causing localized crystalization in the smaller blood vessels.

Androzoa's diet consists primarily of smaller vegetation and carrion. It is too slow and lacks eyesight for any sort of hunting, but is known to eat small animals or birds that attack or land on the Androzoa and are stung enough to render them immobile.
Androzoas will react to any perceived threat to them, including defending others of their kind.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Androzoas are uncommon; usually found on the ocean floor away from most people. Certain variations in environmental conditions may cause them to surface in Swamps and in Cold Climates and seek land.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][6bd600][b]Androzoa[/b] [-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Aquazoa Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:猎物
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b] : 63.0 - 77.8 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 96cm (宽), 124cm (高), 147cm (长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:Androzoa 是一种类似于地球水母的可移动、类似粘液的生物.为在水上和陆地上的机动性而开发,Androzoa 能够穿越极端地形并在恶劣的环境中生存.

Androzoa 在其 30% 的表面上配备了细而尖锐的毒刺,这些毒刺几乎是裸露的眼睛并携带痛苦但非致命的血毒素;允许Androzoa蜇任何不幸攻击它的生物.Androzoa蜇伤的效果与冻伤非常相似,会导致较小的血管局部结晶.

Androzoa的食物主要由较小的植物和腐肉组成.它的速度太慢,而且缺乏视力,无法进行任何形式的狩猎,但众所周知,它会吃小动物或鸟类,这些小动物或鸟类会攻击或降落在Androzoa上,并被蜇到足以使它们无法移动.
Androzoa会对任何感知到的威胁做出反应,包括保护同类.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:Androzoa是不常见的;通常在远离大多数人的海底发现.环境条件的某些变化可能导致它们在沼泽和寒冷气候中浮出水面并寻找土地.
[b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][6bd600]Megalonops [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Megalonops ([i]Megalosaurus Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Megalonops ([i]Megalosaurus Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[b][c][6bd600]Megalonops [-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](Megalosaurus Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Prey
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 588.5 - 959.0 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 193cm (width), 240cm (height), 370cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: The Megalonops is a bipedal Theropod similar in many respects to the dinosaurs of earth. However, in the case of the lumbering Megalonops there appears to be little reason why this creature has survived as long as it has with how poorly-evolved it is.
The megalonops' eyes are developed for the bright conditions typically found in desert or snow environments with large, almost clumsy feet designed to spread it's weight over an uncertain surface like sand or snow. Despite this, the Megalonops' gait is awkward, ponderous and slow. Not a useful development in a predator built for hunting.
Despite this, the Megalonops is capable of hunting the larger of the sand-burrowing creatures such as Wraithworms, Sandworms and Sandsiphons that lack mobility while tunneling; With a long neck and sealable nostrils, the Megalonops is capable of slamming it's massive muzzle into the ground with great force and speed to seize shallow prey.

Unfortunately, this head and body designed for hunting subterranean prey is ill-suited for battle or even running. Making it harmless to anything that should attack it on the surface.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Megalonops are typically found most commonly in desertous environments; with some subspecies found in snowy environments. Evidence of Megalonops outside these biomes has been found in the many bones lying in forests and meadows indicating that they are poorly suited for anything but their home environments.

[b][c][6bd600]Megalonops [-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](Megalosaurus Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]

[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b] : 588.5 - 959.0 kg
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 193cm (宽), 240cm (高), 370cm (长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:Megalonops 是一种双足兽脚亚目,在许多方面与地球上的恐龙相似.然而,就笨重的Megalonops而言,似乎没有什么理由可以解释为什么这种生物能够幸存下来,因为它进化得如此糟糕.
Megalonops的眼睛是为通常在沙漠或雪地中发现的明亮条件而开发的具有大而几乎笨拙的脚的环境,旨在将其重量分散在不确定的表面上,例如沙子或雪.尽管如此,Megalonops 的步态还是笨拙、笨重且缓慢.对于专为狩猎而生的捕食者来说,这并不是一个有用的发展.
尽管如此,Megalonops能够捕食较大的沙穴生物,例如幽灵虫、沙虫和虹吸虫,它们在挖掘隧道时缺乏机动性; Megalonops 拥有长长的脖子和可密封的鼻孔,能够以巨大的力量和速度将其巨大的枪口猛烈撞击地面以捕捉浅层猎物.

不幸的是,这种为猎杀地下猎物而设计的头部和身体不适合战斗甚至跑步.使其对任何应该在地表攻击它的东西都无害.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:Megalonops 通常在沙漠环境中最常见;在下雪的环境中发现了一些亚种.在森林和草地上的许多骨头中发现了这些生物群落之外的巨蜥的证据,这表明它们除了家庭环境外,不适合其他任何环境.

English: Parasaur ([i]Parasaurolophus Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Parasaur ([i]Parasaurolophus Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[b][c][6bd600]Parasaur[-][/c][c][ff5c5c][-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](Parasaurolophus Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Prey
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 1243.1 - 1470.5 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 127cm (width), 212cm (height), 425cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: The Parasaurs of the Andromeda Galaxy are virtually indistinguishable from the Parasaurolophus fossils found on earth, save for their reduced size.
Herbivorous, Parasaurs form family groups and flock much like birds away from potential threats while searching for lush vegetation and berry-laden trees among the wide, open, grassy meadows and rainforest of Temperate planets on which they are most commonly found.

Although uncommon, Parasaurs are capable of attacking by either locking their heads in line with their spines and charging a target head first; or by standing on their tail and kicking, much like a Kangaroo if there is not enough space or time for a charge.
In almost all cases, a Parasaur will choose to flee over fight. Becoming aggressive only when their offspring is in danger and unable to flee.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Parasaurs are found almost exclusively on temperate planets in open regions where they can see in all directions and have ample room to achieve their maximum running speed; greater than that of a Cheetah.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][6bd600]Parasaur[-][/c][c][ff5c5c][-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](Parasaurolophus Andromedus[-][/c] [c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:猎物
[b][c][ffffff]成人体重[-][/c][/b]:1243.1 - 1470.5 kg
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]:127cm(宽),212cm(高度),425cm(长度)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:仙女座星系的Parasaur与地球上发现的副栉龙化石几乎没有区别,除了
草食性,Parasaur形成家庭群体,像鸟类一样成群结队远离潜在威胁,同时在它们最常见的温带行星广阔、开阔、草甸和热带雨林中寻找茂密的植被和长满浆果的树木.

虽然不常见,但Parasaur能够通过将头部与脊椎对齐并首先向目标头部冲锋来进行攻击;或者在没有足够的空间或时间进行冲锋时,像袋鼠一样站在尾巴上踢腿.
在几乎所有情况下,Parasaur都会选择逃跑而不是战斗.只有当它们的后代处于危险之中并且无法逃跑时才会变得具有攻击性.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:Parasaur几乎只在开放的温带行星上发现他们可以看到各个方向并有足够空间达到最大跑步速度的区域;比猎豹还大.
[b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][ff5c5c]Mimicrys [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Mimicrys ([i]Decipitur Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Mimicrys ([i]Decipitur Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[c][ff5c5c][b]Mimicrys [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Decipitur Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Predator
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 68.2 - 90.4 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 86cm (width), 172cm (height), 46cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: A wholly unnatural creature believed to have been mutated by exposure to exotic radiation or viral mutation. The Mimicrys has shed it's lower extremities in favor of a snake-like lower body adapted for moving through water and flora efficiently and silently until it locates prey through heat-sensing pits along its crown and powerful olfactory receptors. It finds an adequate place of concealment before issue a the cry of an injured animal or small child to draw investigation from a nearby target.
Once the unsupecting target passes within reach, the Mimicrys leaps forth to grab hold of the victim's legs and while inverted constricts its tail around the torso in an attempt to force the victim to the ground where it strikes at the target's neck.

Little is known about the Mimicrys' breeding habits, since it is adept at hiding, even from ship-mounted scanners.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Mimicrys can be found on toxic and radioactive planets, often in swamp or places with tall grass and low trees and little light in which it can conceal itself. They are often found inside abandoned buildings, reactors and in tunnels left in the wake of a Legacy Infestation.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ff5c5c][b]Mimicrys [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Decipitur Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:捕食者
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b] : 68.2 - 90.4 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 86cm (宽), 172cm (高), 46cm (长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:一种完全非自然的生物,据信因暴露于外来辐射或病毒突变而发生突变. Mimicrys 已经摆脱了它的下肢,取而代之的是像蛇一样的下半身,它适应于高效而安静地在水和植物群中移动,直到它通过沿着其冠部的热感应坑和强大的嗅觉受体来定位猎物.在发出受伤动物或小孩的叫声之前,它会找到足够的藏身之处,以引起附近目标的调查.
一旦毫无防备的目标经过触手可及的范围,拟态怪就会跳起来抓住受害者的腿,同时倒立它的尾巴在躯干周围收缩,试图将受害者逼到地面,并击中目标的脖子.

人们对Mimicrys的繁殖习性知之甚少,因为它善于躲藏,甚至可以躲避船上的扫描仪.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:拟态可以在有毒和放射性的行星上找到,通常在沼泽或高草低树的地方它可以隐藏自己的光.它们经常出现在废弃的建筑物、反应堆和遗留感染后留下的隧道中.

Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][ff5c5c]Snow Gigas [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Snow Gigas ([i]Giganpagetonus Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Snow Gigas ([i]Giganpagetonus Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[c][ff5c5c][b]Snow Gigas [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Giganpagetonas A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Predator
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 2480 - 4700 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 293cm (width), 264cm (height), 90cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: A humanoid bipedal creature, reminiscent of mythological creatures such as trolls and giants for which it was named. Warm-blooded, the Snow Gigas digs caves in ice and deep snow which it adorns with shiny objects, usually metallic objects and crystals recovered from the floor of gravel canyons and beaches frequently traveled by the Gigas while in search of food.
These shiny objects also play a part in Gigas mating rituals, where large shiny objects are given by the male to a prospective mate in an unusually human gesture not seen elsewhere in Andromedan nature.

Unusually, the Snow Gigas is an egg-laying mammal; Warm-blooded and well-insulated against the cold of their native environment. They fear fire like most animals, but are not readily affected by it due to the thickness of their hide.
As expected of a creature of this size, the Gigas has significant strength and speed coupled with armored knuckles it can deal extreme blunt force trauma with even a glancing blow.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Snow Gigas are found exclusively in places with extremely cold climates and deep snow or on Glaciers. Their fists and fingers are insulated with an external layer of bone that allows them to burrow through solid ice to build their nests.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ff5c5c][b]Snow Gigas [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Giganpagetonas A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:捕食者
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b]: 2480 - 4700 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 293cm (宽), 264cm (高), 90cm (长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:一种人形双足生物,让人联想到以它命名的巨魔和巨人等神话生物. Snow Gigas 是温血动物,在冰和深雪中挖掘洞穴,并用闪亮的物体装饰,这些物体通常是从 Gigas 在寻找食物时经常旅行的砾石峡谷和海滩的地面上发现的金属物体和水晶.
这些闪亮的物体也参与了巨兽的交配仪式,在这种仪式中,雄性以一种在仙女座自然界中未见的异常人类姿态将大型闪亮的物体交给未来的伴侣.

不同寻常的是,Snow Gigas是一种产卵哺乳动物;温血动物,对原生环境的寒冷具有良好的绝缘性.他们像大多数动物一样害怕火,但由于它们的皮很厚,所以不容易受到火的影响.
正如这种体型的生物所期望的那样,Gigas 具有显着的力量和速度,再加上装甲的指关节,它可以处理极端的钝力创伤

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:Snow Gigas只存在于气候极冷、积雪较厚的地方或冰川上.他们的拳头和手指被外层的骨头绝缘,使他们能够在坚硬的冰层中挖洞筑巢.
[b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][ff5c5c]Ripperdog [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Ripperdog ([i]Noncanis Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Ripperdog ([i]Noncanis Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[c][ff5c5c][b]Ripperdog [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Noncanis Andromedus.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Predator
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 48 - 59 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 53cm (width), 85cm (height), 160cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: A common accompaniment to Zirax patrols, the Ripperdog is a domesticated pack-hunting lizard believed to be native to the Zirax homeworld due to the fact that they are almost never found on any planet as a wild animal; encountered only in or around zirax compounds, usually with a handler.
Functioning similar to a guard dog, the Ripperdog appears to be a common pet for the Zirax and the sale or ownership to non-zirax appears to be illegal, or at least require strict licensing and authorization from some unknown Zirax agency.

Much like Domesticated Dogs, the Ripperdog comes in a variety of breeds with varied coloration and identifying features; though for military use a standard breed is used much the same as Police Dogs (German Shepard) due this particular breed possessing good strength, intelligence, trainability and obedience.

Ripperdogs are omnivorous, but prefer a diet of meat; possessing a strong bite and long, narrow tongue designed to break open bones and extract the marrow. Other developments to the body allude to evolution in a largely aquatic environment due to webbing on the feet and fins on the tail which suggest that the development of the mouth was in order to hunt some form of shelled creature like a turtle. Though cannot be confirmed at this time.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Ripperdogs are found only within the care of Zirax personnel and never encountered in the wild. This indicates that their numbers are kept under strict control by the zirax, or that they are unable to breed in certain conditions, if not neutered before being brought offworld.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ff5c5c][b]Ripperdog [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Noncanis Andromedus.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:捕食者
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b]: 48 - 59 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 53cm (宽), 85cm (高), 160cm (长)
[b] [c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:开膛犬是 Zirax 巡逻队的常见伴侣,是一种驯化的蜥蜴,据信原产于 Zirax 家园,因为它们是几乎从未在任何星球上作为野生动物被发现;仅在 zirax 设施内部或周围遇到.
Ripperdog 的功能类似于护卫犬,似乎是 Zirax 的常见宠物,向非 zirax 出售或拥有似乎是非法的,或者至少需要来自一些不知名的 Zirax 机构的严格许可和授权.

与家养狗很像,Ripperdog有多种品种,具有不同的颜色和识别特征;尽管用于军事用途的标准品种与警犬(德国牧羊犬)非常相似,因为这种特殊品种具有良好的力量、智力、可训练性和服从性.

Ripperdog是杂食性的,但更喜欢吃肉;具有强有力的咬合力和狭长的舌头,旨在打破骨头并提取骨髓.身体的其他发展暗示了在很大程度上是水生环境中的进化,这是由于脚上的织带和尾巴上的鳍,这表明嘴的发展是为了捕猎某种形式的有壳生物,如乌龟.虽然目前无法确认.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:Ripperdog只在 Zirax 人员的照顾下被发现,从未在野外遇到过.这表明它们的数量受到 zirax 的严格控制,或者它们在某些条件下无法繁殖,如果在被带离母星之前没有进行绝育的话.

English: [b][c][ffffff]Ecology:[-][/c] [c][ff5c5c]Desert Gigas [-][/c][/b]has been added to your Empyriopedia [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][ff5c5c]Desert Gigas [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Desert Gigas ([i]Giganerimos Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Desert Gigas ([i]Giganerimos Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[c][ff5c5c][b]Desert Gigas [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Giganerimos A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Predator
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 2280 - 4235 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 279cm (width), 257cm (height), 93cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: A humanoid bipedal creature, reminiscent of mythological creatures such as trolls and giants for which it was named. The Desert Gigas has specially developed feet that are unique among Gigas, evolved to distribute weight evenly on sand and compress it beneath the foot of the gigas to prevent vibrations that would alert it's typical prey, the Sandsiphon and Sandworm.
Unlike other members of the Gigas family, the Desert Gigas does not usually build a nest or shelter, preferring to simply dig a hole in the sand and curl up.

The Desert Gigas is an egg-laying mammal; Only creating a "nest" while the female incubates an egg, usually around ahax plants in some of the less arid regions. These nests stay occupied for several months before being abandoned when the offspring is capable of traversing the desert dunes.
As expected of a creature of this size, the Gigas has significant strength and speed coupled with bone-reinforced knuckles it can deal extreme blunt force trauma with even a glancing blow.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Desert Gigas are found exclusively in arid, desertous environments; preferring sand dunes over canyons and ravines. They are known to suffer from some health problems from prolonged travel over rocky or gravelled terrain that can hinder their ability to walk effortlessly on sand.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ff5c5c][b]Desert Gigas[/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Giganerimos A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:捕食者
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b]: 2280 - 4235 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 279cm (宽), 257cm (高), 93cm (长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:一种人形双足生物,让人联想到以它命名的巨魔和巨人等神话生物.Desert Gigas有独特的足部,进化后可以将重量均匀地分布在沙子上,并将其压在Desert Gigas的脚下,以防止振动会提醒它的典型猎物沙虫.
与巨兽家族其他成员不同,沙漠巨兽通常不筑巢或避难所,更喜欢简单地在沙子上挖一个洞并蜷缩起来.

沙漠巨兽是一种产卵哺乳动物;仅在雌性孵化卵时创建一个“巢”,通常在一些不太干旱的地区的斧头植物周围.当后代能够穿越沙漠沙丘时,这些巢穴会被占用几个月,然后被遗弃.
正如预期的一样,Gigas这种体型的生物具有显着的力量和速度,再加上骨骼加固的指关节,它可以承受极端的钝力

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:沙漠巨兽只存在于干旱、荒凉的环境中;比起峡谷和沟壑,更喜欢沙丘.众所周知,他们因长时间在岩石或砾石地形上旅行而遭受一些健康问题,这可能会妨碍他们在沙滩上轻松行走的能力.

English: [b][c][ffffff]Ecology:[-][/c] [c][ff5c5c]Swamp Gigas [-][/c][/b]has been added to your Empyriopedia [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][ff5c5c]Swamp Gigas [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Swamp Gigas ([i]Giganvalto Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Swamp Gigas ([i]Giganvalto Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[c][ff5c5c][b]Swamp Gigas [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Giganvalto A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Predator
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 2611 - 4993 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 291cm (width), 279cm (height), 98cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: A humanoid bipedal creature, reminiscent of mythological creatures such as trolls and giants for which it was named. The Swamp Gigas is far more elusive than others in the Gigas family, being broader in the shoulder and well-camouflaged in the swamplands, bogs and fens that are it's natural environment.
Adapted for water travel, the Swamp Gigas is the only gigas capable of swimming; though prefers to simply walk across the swamp's murky bottom where it can hide itself more effectively. Rising slowly and carefully in the vicinity of prey, typically covered in vines and rotting vegetation to obscure its smell and appearance.

Like other members of the Gigas family, the Swamp Gigas has a tendency to collect shiny objects that it finds while traversing it's home environment; often using them in an elaborate mating ritual by presenting their most impressive finds to a prospective mate in an unusually human act.
Such acts are generally performed after a suitable nest or den has been found or constructed; usually inside large hollow tree trunks above the water line.

As expected of a creature of this size, the Gigas has significant strength and speed coupled with bone-reinforced knuckles it can deal extreme blunt force trauma with even a glancing blow.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Swamp Gigas are found exclusively in humid environments, rich in vegetation and water; preferring the murky waterways than the shore, jungle or beaches. Leaving the water only to construct a den for mating purposes.
Swamp Gigas are very good at concealing themselves, even from thermal scanning. This makes an accurate count of them very difficult, but it's estimated that there are less swamp gigas than either of it's brethren.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ff5c5c][b]Swamp Gigas [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Giganvalto A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:捕食者
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b]:2611 - 4993 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]:291cm(宽)、279cm(高)、98cm(长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:一种人形双足生物,让人联想到以它命名的巨魔和巨人等神话生物. Swamp Gigas 比 Gigas 家族中的其他人更难以捉摸,肩部更宽,并且在其自然环境中的沼泽地、沼泽和沼泽中伪装得很好.
适合水上旅行,Swamp Gigas 是唯一有游泳能力的gigas;虽然更喜欢简单地穿过沼泽的阴暗底部,这样它可以更有效地隐藏自己.在猎物附近缓慢而小心地上升,通常被藤蔓和腐烂的植被覆盖以掩盖其气味和外观.

与巨兽家族的其他成员一样,沼泽巨兽倾向于收集它在穿越时发现的闪亮物体并经常在精心设计的交配仪式中使用它们,将它们最令人印象深刻的发现呈现给未来的配偶.
这种行为通常在找到或建造合适的巢穴或巢穴后进行;通常在吃水线以上的大空心树干中.

这种体型的Gigas 具有显着的力量和速度,再加上骨骼加固的指关节,即使是一击也能造成极端的钝力创伤.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:沼泽巨兽只存在于潮湿环境中,富含植被和水源;比起海岸、丛林或海滩,更喜欢浑浊的水道.离开水只是为了建造巢穴用于交配.
沼泽巨兽非常擅长隐藏自己,即使是热扫描也不例外.这使得准确计算它们变得非常困难,但据估计沼泽巨兽的数量比它们的任何一个兄弟都要少.
[b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][6bd600]Moularidon [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Moularidon ([i]Moularidon Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Moularidon ([i]Moularidon Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[b][c][6bd600]Moularidon [-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](Moularidon A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Prey
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 11,378.5 - 13,150.0 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 204cm (width), 280cm (height), 541cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: The Moularidon is a herbivorous quadruped of the Ceratopsidae Family. Branching off from the main Andromedan genus several hundred thousand years ago, likely due to adverse environmental factors. The result of this evolutionary change includes developed legs designed for prolonged travel at speed and a vertically-aligned mouth developed for eating the bark of the larger and hardier trees; rather than leaves or grass. This trait is also shared by the Leafcutter insect, suggesting a common factor.

Moularidons form family packs or herds of females and offspring much like Elephants. Males, or bulls roam either alone or with other males until breeding season. Although there is often threat displays and sparring among the males when contesting a mate, there are rarely any serious fights that cause injury.

Because of their intelligence, size, strength and stamina, the Tal'ohn utilize Moularidons for transport and heavy lifting. Taking a great deal of care of their Moularidon population and protecting wild herds from Zirax poachers, even at risk to themselves.
Moularidon are also farmed for milk by the Tal'ohn as one of their main exports, commanding a high price on the commodities market. Attempts by outside groups to farm Moularidon for milk on a commercial scale have failed repeatedly, keeping this product firmly in Tal'ohn hands for the forseeable future.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Moularidon are found exclusively on Temperate planets, rich in trees and wildlife. They will typically spend their days in open meadows near a water source and venture into the forest to feed on the bark of the older trees.
They avoid the rainforest and jungles at night due to the increased Androraptor presence as this is the time when the Adults hunt, and are known to target Moularidons.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][6bd600]Moularidon [-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](Moularidon A.[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:猎物
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b]: 11,378.5 - 13,150.0 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 204cm (宽), 280cm (高), 541cm (长)
[b] [c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:Moularidon是角龙科的草食性四足动物.可能是由于不利的环境因素,数十万年前从仙女座主要属分支出来的.这种进化变化的结果包括为长时间高速行驶而设计的腿和为吃更大更坚硬的树皮而开发的垂直对齐的嘴.而不是树叶或草.这种特性也为切叶昆虫所共有,这表明了一个共同因素.

Moularidons 形成家庭群或雌性和后代的群体,就像大象一样.雄性Moularidon独自或与其他雄性一起漫游,直到繁殖季节.虽然在争夺配偶时,雄性之间经常会出现威胁和争吵,但很少有任何严重的战斗会造成伤害.

由于他们的智慧、体型、力量和耐力,泰隆人使用 Moularidons 作为运输和重型起重.非常照顾他们的 Moularidon 种群并保护野生牛群免受 Zirax 偷猎者的伤害,即使他们自己也面临风险.
Tal'ohn 也养殖 Moularidon 以获取牛奶,作为他们的主要出口产品之一,商品价格很高市场.外部团体试图以商业规模种植 Moularidon 以获得牛奶的尝试屡次失败,在可预见的未来,该产品仍牢牢地掌握在泰隆人手中.

[b][c][ffffff]分销[-][/c][/b]:Moularidon 仅在温带行星上发现,有丰富的树木和野生动物.他们通常会在靠近水源的开阔草地上度过他们的日子,然后冒险进入森林以老树的树皮为食.
他们会在夜间避开雨林和丛林,因为以Moularidons为目标的雄性盗龙的存在会增加.

English: [b][c][ffffff]Data Package:[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]Base Attacks[-][/c][/b]\nInformation on [c][2eafff]defending your base [-][/c][c][ff0000](IMPORTANT!)[-][/c] is being downloaded to your PDA (F1)
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]数据包:[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]基地袭击[-][/c][/b]\n有关 [c][2eafff]保卫你基地 [-][/c][c][ff0000]的知识(重要!)[-][/c]已下载至您的PDA (F1)

English: [b][c][ffffff]Package Information:[-][/c][/b]\nThis data package was queued up by [c][ffee00]I.D.A[-][/c] when you spawned in a Base Structure.\nThese files have been added to your Empyriopedia to better explain the threat you now face from building your first base. Be prepared and get your turrets up quick.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]数据包信息:[-][/c][/b]\n这个数据包在你重生时被[c][ffee00]I.D.A[-][/c]安装.\n这些文件已添加到您的帝国百科中,以更好地解释您现在面临的建立第一个基地的威胁. 做好准备,快速启动你的炮塔.

English:
[b][c][00ffee][u]Base Attacks:[/u][-][/c][/b]
You've placed your first Base, which means you're ready to establish advanced production methods required for improved thrusters, weapons and ammunition for higher quality ships. However, the Zirax are aware that you have built a base and likely on a planet in their domain.
They will be sending troop transports, Drones and Bombers to take out your base, so the first thing you need to get in place to protect your investments are [b][c][ff5c5c]TURRETS[-][/c][/b]. Without Turrets, you have no hope of defending your base from even the most minor of attacks.

[b][u][c][00ffee]Point Defense:[-][/c][/u][/b]
The first thing you'll need on your base is a Generator, Fuel Tank, Ammunition Container or Controller, a Small Constructor (for Base) or better. With your constructor powered and supplied, you can now produce your first turrets with basic materials (Iron, Copper, Silicon) that will keep your base defended.

[b][c][ffae00]Projectile Turrets (Base)[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffffff]Minigun Turret:[-][/c][/b] The Minigun Turret is the best weapon for base defense. While it has slightly shorter range than the Cannon Turret, it has a higher rotation speed, better tracking and a higher damage modifier against drones and troop transports. It suffers a damage penalty against blocks though, making it less effective when used offensively against ships and POIs.
[b][c][ffffff]Cannon Turret:[-][/c][/b] The Cannon Turret is best used against ships and blocks. It's more accurate than the minigun turret, but turns slower while tracking a fast object (E.g. Bombers). It suffers from a minor damage penalty against drones and other entities, while receiving a damage bonus against armor blocks.

By taking manual control of either turret, you gain extra combat effectiveness.
[b][c][ffffff]Minigun Turret:[-][/c][/b] By holding LMB + RMB you can remove the safety limiter on the turret and fire it manually far faster than the turret can fire on it's own. You will lose accuracy at long range though.
[b][c][ffffff]Cannon Turret:[-][/c][/b] The Cannon turret will also fire slightly faster while operated manually. RMB lets you change the ammunition settings to fire incendiary rounds that explode when they hit an enemy.

[b][u][c][ff0000]Enemy Units:[-][/c][/u][/b]
[b][c][ff5c5c]Minigun Siege Drones:[-][/c][/b] These relatively slow-moving drones are well armored and equipped with specialized ammunition designed to impart thermal damage to shields; causing more damage than regular UCH ammunition to shields.
Ultimately, these drones are designed for focused attacks and search and destroy missions.

[b][c][ff5c5c]Rocket Siege Drones:[-][/c][/b] High-speed drones equipped with a pair of rocket racks. They circle your base before launching a bombardment of low-impact rockets over a wide area. In order to function at this speed, they are only lightly armored and can be destroyed by a Minigun Turret or two easily.

[b][c][ff5c5c]Light Bomber:[-][/c][/b] The most dangerous unit deployed in early base attacks is the Light Bomber. More durable than the Rocket Siege Drones and with considerably better accuracy; the Light Bomber drops a single high-explosive bomb at key targets on your base.

[b][c][ff5c5c]Troop Transport: [-][/c][/b]The light troop transport is durable, but slow aircraft. It can carry up to 8 troops and is unarmed, but will usually not exceed a squad of 6. Your typical full base attack will consist of at least one Troop transport supported by siege drones acting as both protection and decoys while the transport lands.

[b][u][c][ff0000]Invasion Force:[-][/c][/u][/b]
Invasion level base attacks only occur on higher difficulty planet and ONLY if your base is placed within zirax-claimed territory. You will have a high chance of getting a different set of enemies that are going to [i]really[/i] want to take your base.
[b][c][ff5c5c]Heavy Siege Drone (Minigun)[-][/c][/b]: Twice the firepower, Twice the size, Triple the health.
[b][c][ff5c5c]Heavy Siege Drone (Rocket)[-][/c][/b]: Same firepower, twice the size, twice the health.
[b][c][ff5c5c]Heavy Bomber[-][/c][/b]: A more durable, angrier version of the Light Bomber.
[b][c][ff5c5c]Troop Dropship[-][/c][/b]: Better armored, these dropships can carry up to 16 troops.
A high-end invasion force will not be a couple of drones and a transport; you'll be facing a dozen drones and multiple dropships hell-bent on taking your base or turning it into a smoldering crater.

[b][u][c][00ffee]Tal'on Base Attacks:[-][/c][/u][/b]
If you're unlucky enough to anger the Tal'on, they too will attack your base. Not with drones or transports, but with overwhelming numbers of hunters and animals. It may seem comical, but many people have lost their bases against the Tal'on because they failed to eliminate the Shaman.

In the event of a Tal'on Base Attack, your goal should be the immediate removal of the Tal'on Shaman. You can see their location from the glowing pillar of light they produce. As long as one Shaman remains, more enemies will continue to come.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00ffee][u]基地攻击:[/u][-][/c][/b]
你已经放置了你的第一个基地,这意味着你准备好建立所需的先进生产方法,以改进推进器、武器和弹药,用于更高质量的飞船。然而,兹瑞克斯意识到你已经建立了一个基地,很可能是在一个属于他们的星球上。
他们将派遣部队运输机、无人机和轰炸机来摧毁你的基地,所以你需要首先建立的是[b][c][ff5c5c]炮塔[-][/c][/b]来保护你的投资。没有炮塔,你将无法抵御即使是最轻微的攻击。

[b][u][c][00ffee]点防御:[-][/c][/u][/b]
在你的基地上,你首先需要一个发电机、燃料箱、弹药容器或控制器,一个小型建造机(用于基地)或更好的。有了建造机供电和供应,你现在可以用基本材料(铁、铜、硅)生产你的第一批炮塔,以保护你的基地。

[b][c][ffae00]炮弹炮塔(基地)[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffffff]机枪炮塔:[-][/c][/b] 机枪炮塔是基地防御的最佳武器。虽然它的射程略短于机炮炮塔,但它的旋转速度更高,跟踪更好,对无人机和部队运输机的伤害系数更高。它对方块的伤害有所减少,使其在攻击飞船和POI时效果较差。
[b][c][ffffff]机炮炮塔:[-][/c][/b] 机炮炮塔最适合攻击飞船和方块。它比机枪炮塔更准确,但在跟踪快速移动的目标(例如轰炸机)时旋转速度较慢。它对无人机和其他实体的伤害有所减少,同时对装甲方块有伤害加成。

通过手动控制任一炮塔,你可以获得额外的战斗效果。
[b][c][ffffff]机枪炮塔:[-][/c][/b] 通过按住LMB + RMB,你可以移除炮塔的安全限制器,并手动以比炮塔自身更快的速度射击。不过在远距离时你会失去准确性。
[b][c][ffffff]机炮炮塔:[-][/c][/b] 机炮炮塔在手动操作时也会稍微加快射击速度。RMB可以让你更改弹药设置,发射撞击敌人时爆炸的燃烧弹。

[b][u][c][ff0000]敌军单位:[-][/c][/u][/b]
[b][c][ff5c5c]机枪围攻无人机:[-][/c][/b] 这些相对移动缓慢的无人机装甲坚固,并装备了专门设计的弹药,旨在对护盾造成热能伤害;比常规UCH弹药对护盾造成更多伤害。
最终,这些无人机被设计用于集中攻击和搜索摧毁任务。

[b][c][ff5c5c]火箭围攻无人机:[-][/c][/b] 高速无人机,装备了一对火箭发射架。它们在你的基地周围盘旋,然后对一个广泛区域发动低影响火箭轰炸。为了以这种速度运行,它们的装甲很轻,可以被一两个机枪炮塔轻易摧毁。

[b][c][ff5c5c]轻型轰炸机:[-][/c][/b] 在早期基地攻击中部署的最危险的单位是轻型轰炸机。比火箭围攻无人机更耐用,精度也更好;轻型轰炸机在基地的关键目标上投下一颗高爆弹。

[b][c][ff5c5c]部队运输机:[-][/c][/b]轻型部队运输机是耐用但缓慢的飞机。它可以携带多达8名士兵,并且没有武装,但通常不会超过6人的小组。你的典型完整基地攻击将包括至少一个部队运输机,由围攻无人机提供支持,它们既作为保护也作为诱饵,同时运输机着陆。

[b][u][c][ff0000]入侵部队:[-][/c][/u][/b]
入侵级别的基地攻击只会在更高难度的星球上发生,并且只有在你的基地被放置在兹瑞克斯声称的领土内时才会发生。你将有很高的机会遇到一组不同的敌人,他们将[i]真的[/i]想要夺取你的基地。
[b][c][ff5c5c]重型围攻无人机(机枪)[-][/c][/b]:火力是原来的两倍,大小是原来的两倍,生命值是原来的三倍。
[b][c][ff5c5c]重型围攻无人机(火箭)[-][/c][/b]:火力相同,大小是原来的两倍,生命值是原来的两倍。
[b][c][ff5c5c]重型轰炸机[-][/c][/b]:更耐用,更愤怒的轻型轰炸机版本。
[b][c][ff5c5c]部队空降船[-][/c][/b]:装甲更好,这些空降船可以携带多达16名士兵。
一个高端的入侵部队不会是几架无人机和一架运输机;你将面对一打无人机和多架空降船,它们决心夺取你的基地或将其变成一个冒烟的弹坑。

[b][u][c][00ffee]塔隆基地攻击:[-][/c][/u][/b]
如果你不幸激怒了塔隆,他们也会攻击你的基地。不是用无人机或运输机,而是用压倒性的猎人和动物数量。这可能看起来很有趣,但许多人因为未能消灭萨满而失去了他们的基地。

在塔隆基地攻击的情况下,你的目标应该是立即清除塔隆萨满。你可以从他们产生的发光光柱中看到他们的位置。只要有一个萨满留下,更多的敌人就会继续到来。

English: [b][c][ffffff]Data Package:[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]Base Attacks [-][/c][/b]has been successfully installed to your [c][ffffff]Empyriopedia (F1)[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]数据包:[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]Base Attacks [-][/c][/b]已成功安装到 你的 [c][ffffff]帝国百科(F1)[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffffff]Ecology:[-][/c] [/b][b][c][fb00ff]Infester[-][/c][/b] has been added to your Empyriopedia [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [/b][b][c][fb00ff]Infester[-][/c][/b] 已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Infester has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Infester 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[b][c][fb00ff]Infester[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd](Undesignated[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Legacy
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 45 - 60 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 60cm (width), 205cm (height), 30cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: Infesters are a subset of Abomination; Artificial agents of the Legacy Virus' genetic reformatting where an Abomination that is incapable of evolving into a fourth-stage development will instead divide into two lesser Abominations called "Infesters".

Infesters are physically fragile from repeated division; Instead they are highly mobile without lacking any of their former state's strength. Infesters will typically outnumber Abominations three to one and concentrate themselves in corridors in large numbers, silent and immobile while awaiting outside stimulus. With which they charge at their target with unnatural speed and aggression, swarming in a wave of bodies with the intent to reach their intended victim before they crush each other to death.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Infesters can be found in legacy-infested buildings left abandoned following an infection. They are the result of stalled development in Abomination growth, diverted to reproduction through division.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][fb00ff]Infester[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd](Undesignated[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c] 
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:旧版
[b][c][ffffff]成人体重[-][/c][/b]: 45 - 60 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]:60cm(宽),205cm(高),30cm(长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:感染者是血肉魑魅的一种类型;遗留者病毒基因重组的产物,其中无法进化为第四阶段发展的血肉魑魅将改为分裂成两个称为“感染者”的较小血肉魑魅.

感染者因反复分裂而身体脆弱;取而代之的是,他们具有高度的流动性,而不会缺乏以前物种的任何力量.感染者的数量通常会以三比一的比例超过血肉魑魅,并大量集中在走廊中,在等待外部刺激时保持沉默和不动.他们以不自然的速度和侵略性向目标冲锋,成群结队地涌向目标,然后将对方压死.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:感染者可以在感染后遗弃的遗留感染建筑物中找到.它们是血肉魑魅生长停滞不前的结果,通过分裂转向繁殖.

English: [b][c][ffffff]Ecology:[-][/c] [/b][b][c][fb00ff]Abomination[-][/c][/b] has been added to your Empyriopedia [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [/b][b][c][fb00ff]Abomination[-][/c][/b] 已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Abomination has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Abomination 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[b][c][fb00ff]Abomination[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd](Undesignated[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Legacy
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 70 - 100 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 60cm (width), 215cm (height), 30cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: Abomination are the result of rapid reformatting of genetic structures of ordinary organisms that meet the criteria for infection, transmission and enhancement as determined by a currently unknown factor spread via a viral agent.
Typically resultant of creatures with higher intelligence such as Humans, Zirax and other sapient beings that have been infected by the Legacy Virus. An abomination is the resulting Third Stage of genetic reconditioning by the virus as it has broken down the host's body down to the most vital elements and over time will slowly reconstruct the host by incorporating materials both organic and synthetic to create a new lifeform with the Fourth Stage.
Due to a lack of stimulus and direction from the Gestalt that makes up the Legacy, Abomination very rarely evolve into a fourth-stage entity; eventually falling into stasis at a stalled state of development.

Abomination are physically strong and moderately fast, possessing adaptive thermo-regulation that allows them to survive in the most hostile of environments, including the vaccuum of space. They possess no ranged weapons and due to the presently dormant state of the Legacy Virus, are usually not contagious. They still carry a host of bacterial and viral afflictions for which they are asymptomatic, but still carriers.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Abominations can be found in legacy-infested buildings left abandoned following an infection; usually born from a Legacy Node left submerged beneath the ground from the War of Silence that has activated upon receiving stimulus from intelligent activity or mining operations; awakening it temporarily before it returns to a dormant state, The damage already done.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][fb00ff]血肉魑魅[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd](未指定[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c] 
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:旧版
[b][c][ffffff]成人体重[-][/c][/b]: 70 - 100 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]:60cm(宽)、215cm(高)、30cm(长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:血肉魑魅是普通生物的基因结构快速重新格式化的结果,这些结构符合感染、传播和增强的标准,由目前未知的因素通过病毒剂.
通常由具有更高智力的生物产生,例如人类、Zirax 和其他已被遗留病毒感染的智能生物.血肉魑魅是病毒基因修复的第三阶段,因为它已经将宿主的身体分解成最重要的元素,随着时间的推移,它将通过结合有机和合成材料来慢慢重建宿主,从而创造出具有第四阶段的新生命形式.阶段.
由于缺乏构成遗产的格式塔的刺激和指导,血肉魑魅很少演变成第四阶段的实体;最终在发展停滞状态下陷入停滞.

血肉魑魅体质强壮且速度适中,具有适应性体温调节能力,使它们能够在最恶劣的环境中生存,包括太空真空.他们没有远程武器,而且由于遗留病毒目前处于休眠状态,通常不具有传染性.他们仍然携带许多没有症状的细菌和病毒疾病,但仍然是携带者.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:可以找到可憎的东西在感染后遗弃的遗留感染建筑物中;通常产生于一个遗留在地下的遗留节点,该节点在接收到智能活动或采矿作业的刺激后被激活;在它返回休眠状态之前暂时唤醒它,伤害已经造成.
[b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][fb00ff]Overseer [-][/c][/b]已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Overseer has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Overseer 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[c][fb00ff][b]Overseer [/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](Undesignated[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Legacy
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 711 - 890 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 220cm (width), 265cm (height), 220cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: Overseers are the result of rapid reformatting of genetic structures of ordinary organisms that meet the criteria for infection, transmission and enhancement as determined by a currently unknown factor spread via a viral agent.
Standing as the Fourth Stage of Legacy-based viral reconstruction, the Overseer blurs the lines between living creature and machine as it contains a combination of both organic and synthetic engineering seamlessly interwoven into a single monstrous whole.

Overseers are quadrupeds, possessing four spider-like legs with an external endoskeleton comprised of laminated organoceramics giving them a hardness equal to diamond, with which it unleashes it's primary means of attack.
The overseers also possess a humanoid upper body, and in Zirax records of the War of Silence were usually equipped with energy weapons grown out of the arms and supplied with ammunition by internal bioreactors. While their higher cognitive and fabrication abilities appear to have been lost in the resolution of that long-ago war, they are still a force to be reckoned with. Their internal bioreactors are still functional, but at present only produce waste materials in the form of Pentaxid and other exotic elemental products.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Overseers are comparatively rare among the Legacy's creature; but can be found on barren and metallic planets in quite large numbers. The reason for this is still unknown, since the Legacy did very little material extraction and there is very little or no life on those planets to infect.

Because of the distinction between the Overseers in the past, when the Legacy was fully awake and the remnants left in the wake of the war; the original Overseer is now designed an "Overlord". If anyone should encounter a functioning Overlord, they are to report it to the Zirax High Command immediately.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][fb00ff][b]监督者[/b][-][/c][c][bdbdbd](未指定[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c] 
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:旧版
[b][c][ffffff]成人体重[-][/c][/b]: 711 - 890 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]:220cm(宽),265cm(高),220cm(长)
[b][c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:监督者是普通生物的遗传结构快速重新格式化的结果,这些结构符合感染、传播和增强的标准,由目前未知的因素通过病毒代理.
作为基于遗留者的病毒重建的第四阶段,监督者模糊了生物和机器之间的界限,因为它包含有机和合成工程的组合,无缝交织成一个巨大的整体.

监督者是四足动物,拥有四只蜘蛛状腿,外骨骼由层压有机陶瓷组成,硬度与钻石相当
监督者还拥有一个人形上身,在 Zirax 的沉默战争记录中,通常配备从手臂上长出的能量武器,并由内部生物反应器提供弹药.虽然他们更高的认知和制造能力似乎已经在这场很久以前的战争中消失了,但他们仍然是一股不可忽视的力量.他们的内部生物反应器仍然可以正常工作,但目前仅产生 Pentaxid 和其他外来元素产品形式的废料.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b] :监督者在遗留者的生物中是比较少见的;但可以在相当多的贫瘠和金属行星上找到.造成这种情况的原因仍然未知,因为遗产很少提取物质,而且那些行星上几乎没有生命可以感染.

由于过去监督者之间的区别,当遗留者完全清醒时以及战后留下的残余物;原来的监督者现在被设计为“霸王”.如果有人遇到一个正常运作的霸主,他们要立即向兹瑞克斯最高统帅部报告.

English: Triceratops ([i]Triceratops Andromedus[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Triceratops ([i]Triceratops Andromedus[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[b][c][6bd600]Triceratops [-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](T. Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Prey
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 13,112.3 - 14,740.2 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 224cm (width), 291cm (height), 525cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: The Triceratops is a genus of herbivorous ceratopsid dinosaur indistinguishable from fossils found on earth. The chances of encountering such a unique speciment so like those of prehistoric earth are so astronomically small that it raises more questions than have ever been asked about the dinosaurs.
These particular creatures eat bushes and low-hanging leaves and bear some genetic semblance to their distantly-related cousins, the Moularidon who feed primarily on tree roots and heartwood.

Peaceful and harmless, the Triceratops of Andromeda travel across their planet, young in tow in search of better feeding grounds. However, they can become hostile if they or their offspring are threatened, which makes them particular dangerous as they have the weight and speed of your average land tank, mounted with three very large, very sharp horns.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Triceratops are found primarily in deep forests and along the shoreline of major lakes, staying away from areas that are too hot or too cold as they are poor places to either graze or construct a nest for eggs due to the susceptibility of ceratopsid eggs to temperature.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][6bd600]Triceratops [-][/c][/b][c][bdbdbd](T. Andromedus[-][/c][c][bdbdbd])[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]:猎物
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b]: 13,112.3 - 14,740.2 公斤
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]: 224cm (宽), 291cm (高), 525cm (长)
[b] [c][ffffff]描述[-][/c][/b]:Triceratops是一种草食性角龙类恐龙,与地球上发现的化石无法区分.遇到像史前地球这样独特的标本的机会是如此之小,以至于它提出的问题比以往任何时候都更多关于恐龙的问题.
这些特殊的生物以灌木和低垂的树叶为食,并与它们的基因有一些相似之处远亲的近亲,主要以树根和心材为食的 Moularidon.

仙女座三角龙和平无害地穿越它们的星球,幼小的拖着寻找更好的觅食地.但是,如果它们或它们的后代受到威胁,它们可能会变得敌对,这使得它们特别危险,因为它们具有普通陆地坦克的重量和速度,并安装了三个非常大、非常锋利的角.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:三角龙主要分布在森林深处和主要湖泊的海岸线沿线,远离太热或太冷的地区,因为它们是不适宜居住的地方由于角龙蛋对温度的敏感性,要么游牧,要么筑巢.

Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]生态:[-][/c] [c][ff5c5c]Telluropod[-][/c][/b] 已被添加到您的帝国百科 [c][ffffff](F1)[-][/c]

English: Telluropod ([i]Telluropodus Andromedas[/i]) has been added to your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): Telluropod ([i]Telluropodus Andromedas[/i]) 已被添加到您的帝国百科.

English:
[b][c][ff5c5c]Telluropod[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd](Telluropodus A.)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]Classification[/b][-][/c]: Predator
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Weight[-][/c][/b]: 284.0 - 304.4 kg
[b][c][ffffff]Adult Size[-][/c][/b]: 182cm (width), 120cm (height), 212cm (length)
[b][c][ffffff]Description[-][/c][/b]: Telluropods are a semi-aquatic species unique to the Andromeda Galaxy that operate primarily as Apex predators in and around swamplands where they live as ambush predators in a similar way to the Alligators of Earth.

Male Telluropods are smaller than their female counterpart and live their lives in deep water, with a diet mostly consisting of fish and water-dwelling insects. Female Telluropods are considerably larger than their male counterparts and stay near the land to prevent overfishing male-populated areas.
Female Telluropods do not lay eggs, rather they grow from their backs from an early age; but do not mature until a successful mating.

[b][c][ffffff]Distribution[-][/c][/b]: Telluropods are primarily found in swamplands and shallow water near fens and mudflats. Although found at the water line, they can also be found on land and are particulary hazardous for people navigating the swamplands without transportation due to the unexpected speeds that these creatures move at.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ff5c5c]Telluropod[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd](Telluropodus A.)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][b]分类[/b][-][/c]: 捕食者
[b][c][ffffff]成年体重[-][/c][/b]: 284.0 - 304.4 kg
[b][c][ffffff]成人尺寸[-][/c][/b]:182cm(宽),120cm(高),212cm(长)
[b][c][ffffff]说明[-][/c][/b]: Telluropods 是仙女座星系特有的半水生物种,主要在沼泽地及其周围作为 Apex 捕食者活动,它们以与地球短吻鳄类似的方式作为伏击捕食者生活.

雄性Telluropod比雌性小,生活在深水中,主要以鱼和水栖昆虫为食.雌性Telluropod比它们的雄性同类大得多,并且会呆在陆地附近以防止过度捕捞雄性聚居区.
雌性Telluropod不产卵,而是从小就开始生长;但直到成功交配后才成熟.

[b][c][ffffff]分布[-][/c][/b]:Telluropod主要分布在沼泽地和靠近沼泽和泥滩的浅水中.虽然在吃水线上发现它们,但它们也可以在陆地上发现,并且由于这些生物移动的出乎意料的速度,对于在没有交通工具的情况下在沼泽地中航行的人来说尤其危险.

English: [b][c][ffffff]Package Information:[-][/c][/b]\nThis data package is automatically included in your Empyriopedia.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]数据包信息:[-][/c][/b]\n这个数据包自动包含在你的帝国百科中.

English:
[c][00ffee][u][b]Nutrition:[/b][/u][-][/c]
Unlike the default game, Reforged Galaxy introduces a support system using Nutrition. This does not negatively impact the player, instead providing bonuses of varying strength based on the quality of the food consumed.

[b][c][6bd600]Major Food Bonus:[-][/c][/b] Bonus given by eating high-quality foods like Stew, Pizza, Fruit Pie and Cake.
Gives moderate health regeneration and increases maximum health and hunger by 150.

[b][c][ffae00]Normal Food Bonus:[-][/c][/b] Bonus given by eating medium-quality foods like Veggie Burgers, Waffles and Canned foods.
Gives minor health regeneration and increases maximum health and hunger by 100.

[b][c][ff5c5c]Weak Food Bonus:[-][/c][/b] Bonus given by eating low-quality foods like Steak, Cereal and Fried Vegetables.
Gives very weak regeneration and increases maximum health and hunger by 50

[u][c][00ffee][b]Duration:[/b][-][/c][/u]
Varying based on which foods you have eaten the bonuses have higher or lower chances of being applied, with stronger Food Bonuses lasting the longest and weak food bonuses lasting the shortest amount of time.
Food poisoning, indigestion and eating rotten food will clear away all food bonuses.

[u][c][00ffee][b]Final Notes:[/b][-][/c][/u]
Energy Bars and Emergency Rations DO NOT give any nutrition bonuses.
Eating spoiled food will purge all nutrition bonuses.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffee][u][b]Nutrition:[/b][/u][-][/c]
与默认游戏不同,Reforged Galaxy 引入了一个使用营养的支持系统.这不会对玩家产生负面影响,而是根据所食用食物的质量提供不同强度的奖励.

[b][c][6bd600]主要食物奖励:[-][/c][/b] 食用高品质食物(如炖菜、比萨饼、水果派和蛋糕)获得的奖励.
提供适度的生命恢复,并使最大生命值和饥饿值提高 150.

[b][c][ffae00]普通食物奖励: [-][/c][/b] 食用中等品质的食物(如素食汉堡、华夫饼和罐头食品)可获得加成.
提供少量生命恢复并将最大生命值和饥饿值提高 100.

[b][c][ff5c5c]Weak Food Bonus:[-][/c][/b] 吃牛排、谷物和油炸蔬菜等低质量食物的奖励.
提供非常弱的再生能力,并增加 50 点最大生命值和饥饿值

[u][c][00ffee][b]持续时间:[/b][-][/c][/u]
根据您吃过的食物而有所不同,奖金的获得几率更高或更低已应用,较强的食物奖励持续时间最长,而较弱的食物奖励持续时间最短时间.
食物中毒、消化不良和吃腐烂的食物会清除所有食物奖励.

[u][c][00ffee][b]最后说明:[/b][-][/c] [/u]
能量棒和紧急口粮不会提供任何营养奖励.
吃变质的食物会清除所有营养奖励.

English: [b][c][ffffff]Data Package:[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]Nutrition [-][/c][/b]has been successfully installed to your [c][ffffff]Empyriopedia (F1)[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]数据包:[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]营养[-][/c][/b]已成功安装到您的 [c][ffffff]帝国百科 (F1)[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][00ffee][u]Alignment:[/u][-][/c][/b]
Commonly known as a Karma System in some games, the Alignment System in Reforged Galaxy gives you multiple choice actions with story NPCs and missions that adjust your alignment between Paragon and Renegade.
These have little effect on the story and gameplay except at certain junctions where if your Paragon or Renegade alignment is high enough will allow you to take a special action not otherwise available. It may include interrupting an enemy's monologue to trigger a fight before his reinforcements show up; the ability to sweet-talk a guard into looking the other way; Or the ability to threaten enemy reinforcements into fleeing.

There are certain junctions in the storyline where massively important decisions will sway your alignment one way or the other and completely change the direction the story will go further down the line.

[b]NOTE:[/b] Using a Paragon or Renegade action will reduce your points for the opposite alignment slightly.

[b][u][c][00ffee]Checking your Alignment:[-][/c][/u][/b]
Because the Alignment System is bound to character dialogue, you will need to [b][c][2eafff]Activate this mission[-][/c][/b] to display a dialogue window that will show your present alignment values for both Paragon and Renegade.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00ffee][u]结盟:[/u][-][/c][/b]
在一些游戏中俗称善恶值系统,Reforged Galaxy中的结盟系统给你多种具有故事 NPC 的选择和调整你在 Paragon 和 Renegade 之间完成任务的方式.
这些对故事和游戏玩法几乎没有影响,除非在某些交界处,如果你的 Paragon 或 Renegade 关系足够高,你可以采取其他方式无法使用的特殊动作.它可能包括在敌人的增援出现之前打断敌人的独白以引发战斗;甜言蜜语让守卫看向另一边的能力;或者威胁敌人使增援逃跑的能力.

在故事情节中的某些交叉点,非常重要的决定会左右你的阵营,并完全改变故事的发展方向.

[b]注意:[/b] 使用 Paragon 或 Renegade 动作会稍微减少相反阵营的分数.

[b][u][c][00ffee]检查阵营:[-][/c][/u][/b]
因为结盟系统绑定了人物对话,所以需要[b][c][2eafff]激活这个任务[-][/c][/b]显示一个对话窗口,其中将显示您当前对 Paragon 和 Renegade 的对齐值.

Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][a6ff00]章节1:捍卫者[-][/c][/b]

叛徒Ki'eve也许已经被除掉,但是他那四个叛逃到兹瑞克斯的同伙依然不知所踪;直接起身反抗压迫者也并非Na'tuk酋长的意愿.
也许有其他什么人并不是如此的想要维持现状?

[b][c][ff0000]该任务只能在初始星球上启动[-][/c][/b]

[c][c0c0c0]* * *[-][/c]
[u][b]故事线[/b][/u]
[c][00ffff]章节1:捍卫者[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节2:煽动者[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节3:自由斗士[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节4:奥德赛[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]I can't help but worry that we've put Na'tuk and his clan in danger by allowing those four [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]Renegade Hunters[-][/c][c][2eafff] that were working with Ki'eve to escape, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It's only a matter of time before the Zirax on this planet retaliate against them for helping us...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我不能就这样放着Na'tuk和他的氏族不管,那四个帮助Ki'eve逃跑的[-][/c][c][ff5c5c]变节猎人[-][/c][c][2eafff]肯定会让他们陷入危险,IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]由于对我们进行协助,兹瑞克斯对他们进行报复不过是时间问题...[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]You may be correct, Commander.\nHowever, there is likely nothing you can do that would not go against Chief Na'tuk's pacifist standing.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]你也许是对的,指挥官.\n然而,在不违背Na'tuk酋长的和平主张的前提下,你基本什么都做不到.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Well... [-][/c][c][2eafff]There's no use guessing what he will or won't do.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]So I might as well just go and [-][/c][i][c][2eafff]ask [-][/c][/i][c][2eafff]him.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]这个嘛... [-][/c][c][2eafff]我们光在这里猜他到底会怎么做也没用.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]所以我不如直接去 [-][/c][i][c][2eafff]问问 [-][/c][/i][c][2eafff]他.[-][/c]

English: Speak to Chief Na'tuk in the Tal'ohn Village about dealing with the Renegade Tal'ohn that joined the Zirax.
Chinese (simplified): 在泰隆村庄与Na'tuk酋长商议如何应对加入兹瑞克斯的变节者事宜

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]The Shaman is carrying some unusually advanced technologies despite the restrictions placed by the Zirax on the Tal'ohn.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I was able to identify and add him to your display because of it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]尽管兹瑞克斯对泰隆多有限制,但萨满似乎携带着某种异常先进的科技.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]我也是因为这一点才能够直接将他加入你的显示界面.[-][/c]

English: Na'tuk plans on passing the role of Chief. If anyone knows who is a favored candidate for the role, it would be the village shaman.
Chinese (simplified): Na'tuk准备找人即位.如果说谁最有资格,那必然是村里的萨满了.

English: [c][2eafff]It looks like finding this Khalad will be ours, and [i]their[/i] best bet in ensuring the future of the clan, IDA.\nIt sounds like he won't need much briefing on the situation, but nothing will happen unless he's [i]here[/i].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]看起来找到这个Khalad是我们也是 [i]他们[/i]村庄未来的唯一希望,IDA.\n听上去他不太需要什么简报就能理解当下的状况,但是如果他不在[i]这里[/i]就什么都做不了.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have added the [-][/c][c][6bd600]Tal'on Ziggurat[-][/c][c][00ffee] to your HUD, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I am detecting strong energy readings from the structure, however. I recommend caution.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我已经将[-][/c][c][6bd600]泰隆金字塔[-][/c][c][00ffee]显示在HUD上,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]不过,我从那座建筑中检测到了很强的能量读数,所以多加小心.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Noted.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]But I don't think we're in any danger from the natives this time, IDA.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]明白了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]不过我不认为原住民会对我们造成什么威胁,IDA.[-][/c]

English: The nephew of Shaman Turell and the only remaining candidate to assume the position of Clan Chief is Khalad. A hothead and a passionate leader who was sent to the Ziggurat Temple to serve as a Temple Guardian after insulting the current Chief 2 years ago.\nIt's up to him to organize the Tal'on into a fighting force capable of resisting the Zirax when they come.
Chinese (simplified): 萨满Turell的侄子名叫Khalad,同时他也是酋长的唯一候选人. 2年前,因为冒犯了现任酋长,这个急性子而又热心的预备领导人被送到金字塔神庙并成为了一名守卫.\n只有他才能把泰隆组织成为一支可以抵挡兹瑞克斯进犯的力量.

English: [c][2eafff]This looks like the place.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It's certainly well-built and unusually well-armed for a temple. Let's go inside an take a look around.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]看起来我们到了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]对于神庙来说,这里的的建设和武装都太过完善了.我们进去看看吧.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]This place is far removed from the Chief's Village. They may not be familiar with you and may refuse entry.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Please try to avoid upsetting the locals again, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]这个地方完全与酋长的村子隔绝,他们可能跟你不熟进而拒绝你进入.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]别再让土著们失望了,指挥官[-][/c]

English: The Ziggurat is well-guarded, so it is advised that you don't do anything... offensive while you're here.\nSpeak to the gate guard for permission to enter, if necessary.
Chinese (simplified): 金字塔的防御很严密,在这里最好不要轻举妄动... .\n与守卫交谈以获准进入,如果需要的话.

English: [c][2eafff]It seems I need to speak to the [-][/c][c][ffffff]High Shaman Orizel[-][/c][c][2eafff].[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]According to the guardsman, he's in the room at the top of the stairs.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]看上去我需要和 [-][/c][c][ffffff]至高萨满Orizel[-][/c][c][2eafff]谈谈.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]根据守卫的话,他就在楼顶的房间里.[-][/c]

English: Reach The Room of the Sun
Ascend the steps of the Ziggurat to the Room of the Sun and speak with High Shaman Orizel
Chinese (simplified): 顺着台阶到达楼上的太阳之间并与至高萨满Orizel交谈

English: [c][2eafff]This certainly looks like the right place.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Not quite what I expected of the High Shaman, though.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]这里一定就是了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]虽然至高萨满不是我想的那样.[-][/c]

English: Approach the High Shaman and speak to him.
Chinese (simplified): 接近至高萨满并与他交谈

English: [c][2eafff]IDA, it looks like Khalad was transferred out 2 years ago to one of the Ziggurat's Watchtowers.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]The High Shaman says it's the one [i]without [/i]a Ballista on top. Think you can find it?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]IDA,看起来Khalad在两年前被调任到了金字塔的其中一个瞭望塔.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]至高萨满告诉我就是顶上 [i]没有 [/i]弩炮的那个. 你能帮我找到吗?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, what do you think I am?[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I had located the tower before the shaman had even finished his sentence and queued it up on your display.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官,你把我当成什么了?[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]在他说完之前我就已经找到并且把他的位置加入你的排程了.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]I dunno, IDA. I honestly kinda expected you to be a brunette.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我不到啊, IDA. 也许我希望你是个黑发美人.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]IDA, I just realized that Khalad's been out here for two years. It never occurred to me that he might've been killed.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I just sort of hoped he'd be out here chilling on a stump or something. What if he's dead?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]IDA,我突然意识到Khalad都被送来这里两年了,之前我从来没想过他可能已经死了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我本来只是想着他可能在这里某个树桩上坐着摸鱼,但是如果他死了怎么办?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I do not have any answers for you, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]First, you should start by looking for him. You may be worrying for nothing.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]这问题我没法回答,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]你应该先去找他,也许你的担心完全是多余的.[-][/c]

English: It seems the protection of the Ziggurat does not extend to the outlying watchtowers. They are in a state of disrepair and decay, but appear to still be in use.\nKhalad has been out here for two years. Is he still alive?
Chinese (simplified): 看上去金字塔外围的防护并没有那么好.这些建筑看上去虽然还能用,但是完全是年久失修的样子.\nKhalad被派出来两年了,他还活着吗?

English: Speak to K'zal on top of the Watchtower
Chinese (simplified): 与瞭望塔顶的守卫对话

English: Khalad doesn't appear to be here.\nYou've been directed to speak to the watch captain, [c][ffffff]K'zal on top of the Watchtower[-][/c]. He should know where Khalad is.
Chinese (simplified): Khalad并不在这里.\n你应该与哨塔的长官[c][ffffff]塔顶的K'zal[-][/c]进行交谈. 他应该知道Khalad的下落.

English: [c][2eafff]It looks like Khalad is alive and well after all, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Apparently the ruin he's hiding in is blocking scans, so i'm not sure if you'll be able to detect him.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]听上去Khalad还活着,IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]很明显他躲进的那个遗迹可以阻挡扫描,我不确定你能不能找到他.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I am not detecting any thermal or energy signatures from the described location.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I will adjust the parameters of my search to identify exposed concrete, steel, titanium and sathium.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我无法从符合描述的地点检测到任何能量或是热信号.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]正在将暴露在地面的水泥,钢制,钛制和钑制结构加入筛选条件.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]I have found 12 structures that match the given criteria.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Most are wreckage, but one appears to be a reinforced concrete water purifier that pre-dates the construction of the Ziggurat.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]I have added it to your display, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]根据已知的条件,我找到了12处符合描述的地点.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]大部分都是残骸,但是其中有一个强化水泥制造的净水器是在金字塔之前建成的.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]正在将其添加到显示上,指挥官.[-][/c]

English: Khalad is apparently living out of an old pre-ziggurat water tank of some kind that blocks thermal and energy detection.\nScans for concrete structures in the given area have identified only one match: A water purifier.
Chinese (simplified): 很明显Khalad生活在一个在金字塔之前建成的水罐里,隔绝了所有的能量和热信号.\n在指定区域对水泥制建筑的扫描显示只有一个符合条件的结果:一个水源净化器.

English: [c][2eafff]I can see the structure, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I'm not getting any readings from it either and i'm looking right at it.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I guess i'll have to go inside...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我看到那个建筑了,IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]尽管我已经可以看到它了,但是依然没有任何读数.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我想只能进去了...[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Exercise caution, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]You will lose contact with me when you enter the ruin. If my scans cannot penetrate it, then neither will my transmissions.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]谨慎行事,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]你进入废墟之后会与我失去联系. 既然我的无法扫描,那我也同样无法通讯.[-][/c]

English: Khalad has been living in this ancient concrete tank that is shielded from scans and transmissions.\nThe only way to find if he's home is to go inside, but you'll lose connection with IDA.
Chinese (simplified): Khalad居住的古老水泥制水罐可以屏蔽扫描和通信.\n找到他的唯一办法就是进去看看,但同时你会与IDA失联.

English: [c][bdbdbd][i]This thing has power?[/i][-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd][i]Khalad must've hooked this up himself. This is amazing![/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][bdbdbd][i]这东西居然还有电?[/i][-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd][i]Khalad 肯定是自己搭建了这套系统,真是不可思议![/i][-][/c]

English: [i][c][bdbdbd]No sign of Khalad.[-][/c][/i]\n[i][c][bdbdbd]There's even a computer system down here! It might be able to tell me where he's gone.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][bdbdbd]没有发现 Khalad.[-][/c][/i]\n[i][c][bdbdbd]这下面甚至有一套计算机! 也许它可以告诉我Khalad的去向.[-][/c][/i]

English:
Access Khalad's computer system to find where Khalad's gone.

[c][ff5c5c]If you're playing on a server and you find Khalad at the bottom of the ladder. Just ignore him. It means someone else has done the mission recently and Khalad came home and didn't despawn.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c]I've told Khalad to explain the same thing to you if you try to talk to him.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c]- Vermillion; CEO of Forge Aerospace[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
访问Khalad的计算机以查找他的去向.

[c][ff5c5c]如果你在服务器游玩且在梯子下方看到Khalad,不要管他. 这种情况只是说明最近有人做了这个任务而那时候出现的Khalad还没有刷新掉.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c]如果你想要尝试直接和Khalad对话,我也设置了让Khalad告诉你同样的内容.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c]- Vermillion:锻造宇航CEO 注[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ff5c5c]Put your gun on the ground and step towards me, trespasser.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][哈拉德(Khalad)][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ff5c5c]放下武器过来,入侵者.[-][/c]

English: Looks like Khalad has got the jump on you.\nWell, at least you've found him. I guess it's time to convince him to come home.
Chinese (simplified): 看起来是Khalad先找上了你.\n不管怎样,至少是找到他了.我想是时候劝他回家了.

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Get your ass topside and take out those troops before they drop a grenade down here and kill us both![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][哈拉德(Khalad)][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]你赶快上楼去把那些个士兵干掉,不然一颗手雷下来我们俩都得完蛋![-][/c]

English: A dropship has just dropped off a scouting party outside Khalad's hiding place. That means that someone must've been tracking you.\nTake out the troops and report back to Khalad.
Chinese (simplified): 一艘空投挺刚刚在Khalad的藏身处外放出了一个侦察小队,说明有人在跟踪你.\n解决他们并向Khalad回报.

English: The troops have been dealt with; but probably not the last you'll see now that they know Khalad is here.
Chinese (simplified): 暂时解决了那些兹瑞克斯士兵; 但是他们已经知道Khalad在这了,这不会是最后一次.

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I've got a hardline to an external transmitter you can connect to so you can communicate to the outside.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]It's how I intercept the zirax communications.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][哈拉德(Khalad)][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我这里和一个外部外部通信器有专线连接,你只要接上那里就可以保持通讯了.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]这也是我截获兹瑞克斯通讯的手段.[-][/c]

English: Connecting to Khalad's transmitter will allow you to contact IDA while in The Tank.
Chinese (simplified): 连接至Khalad的发信器以便你在水罐内联系IDA.

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Connection Established, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I take it everything went well?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]连接已建立,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]我就当一切顺利了?[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][6bd600]Chapter 2: Instigator[-][/c][/b]

You've made contact with a young Freedom Fighter named Khalad, but now the Zirax believe the Tal'on are involved with the UCH.
Time is now against you as you must move quickly to secure the future of the Tal'on people by arming the people with the weapons and technology the Zirax have forbidden them for centuries.

[c][c0c0c0]* * *[-][/c]
[u][/u][b][u]STORYLINE[/u][/b]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 1: Vindicator[-][/c]
[c][00ffff]Chapter 2: Instigator[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 3: Freedom Fighter[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 4: Odyssey[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][6bd600]章节2:煽动者[-][/c][/b]

你和名为Khalad的年轻自由斗士取得了联系,但是与此同时兹瑞克斯也开始怀疑泰隆和UCH有所关联.
时间不等人,你必须立刻用几个世纪以来兹瑞克斯禁止泰隆人使用的武器和科技武装他们,让他们的未来还有一丝希望.

[c][c0c0c0]* * *[-][/c]
[u][/u][b][u]故事线[/u][/b]
[c][c0c0c0]章节1:捍卫者[-][/c]
[c][00ffff]章节2:煽动者[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节3:自由斗士[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节4:奥德赛[-][/c]

English:
[c][6bd600][b]Chapter 2: Instigator[/b][-][/c]

You've made contact with a young Freedom Fighter named Khalad, but now the Zirax believe the Tal'on are involved with the UCH.
Time is now against you as you must move quickly to secure the future of the Tal'on people by arming the people with the weapons and technology the Zirax have forbidden them for centuries.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][6bd600][b]章节2:煽动者[/b][-][/c]

你和名为Khalad的年轻自由斗士取得了联系,但是与此同时兹瑞克斯也开始怀疑泰隆和UCH有所关联.
时间不等人,你必须立刻用几个世纪以来兹瑞克斯禁止泰隆人使用的武器和科技武装他们,让他们的未来还有一丝希望.

English: [c][2eafff]IDA, what do you rate the probability that we can drive the zirax off the planet?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]IDA,你认为我们有多大胜算能把兹瑞克斯赶出这颗星球?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Assuming best case scenario, I calculate a 7.2% chance of successfully driving the zirax from this planet, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]However, there remains a 23.9% chance of forcing the zirax forces to retreat into their territory and leave the Tal'on populace alone.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]按照最好的情况估计,有7.2%的概率可以将兹瑞克斯驱逐出这个星球,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]不过,也有23.9%的几率我们可以把兹瑞克斯打回自己的领地,让他们不在打扰泰隆人.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Well, a 31% chance of success isn't too bad.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]还不错,31%的成功率已经不低了.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]That is not accounting for allied losses.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]The remaining 68.9% probabilities include mass genocide and total annihilation.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]That is not optimal, Commander. I do not recommend this course of action.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]计算中并不包括友军损失.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]剩下68.9%的概率一般指向大规模屠杀和种族灭绝.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]这并不是什么乐观的数字,指挥官. 我不推荐朝这个方向发展.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Your objections are noted, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Let's go talk to Khalad and see if we can make those statistics a little more favorable.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我理解你的反对理由,IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]让我们和Khalad谈谈看有没有办法让概率倒向我们这边.[-][/c]

English: Return to the tank and approach Khalad
[c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, may I remind you that arming civilian personnel with UCH armaments is a violation of UCH Rule: 144-33, subsection-B.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官,应该不用我提醒您,为平民派发UCH制式武装是对于UCH守则:144-33,附属章节-B的违反.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Yes, IDA. I know, but subsection-D allows civilians to supply the UCH troops defending them from enemy attack.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]They can't supply us without weapons, so what we're actually doing is planning ahead. How's that?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]你说的没错,IDA.我知道这一点,但是附属章节-D也同时规定平民可以为UCH部队抵御敌方攻击提供支援.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]他们没有武器就无法提供支援,所以我们只不过是在提前进行计划.这样合理了吧?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Yes, Commander.\nI believe that explanation will satisfy any official enquiry. You may have trouble convincing the Admiral if he asks though.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]没错,指挥官.\n我认为这足够应付任何官方质询了,不过如果上将本人问起这件事可能会很麻烦.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]It's good to know we're both on the same page, IDA.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I'll need to get back to camp and get to producing that first batch of Assault Rifles now.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我必须回到营地着手生产第一批武器了.[-][/c]

English:
The Tal'on need a supply of modern weapons to hold off any attacks made by the zirax. Bows and Arrows can deal with the occasional trooper, but firearms and explosives are needed to take out Drones and fortifications.

[b][c][ffffff]Craft, Loot or Buy 20 Assault Rifles[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ff0000]Hold all 20 of them in your inventory[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
泰隆人需要利用现代武器来抵御兹瑞克斯的攻击. 弓箭也许可以抵御单个步兵,但是想要击落无人机和进攻工事,枪械和爆炸物都是必须的.

[b][c][ffffff]制造,搜刮或是购买20把突击步枪[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ff0000]并将20把都置于背包内[-][/c][/b]

English: [c][2eafff]Okay, that's the first batch completed. [-][/c][c][2eafff]Only two more to go.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]行了,第一批造好了. [-][/c][c][2eafff]再来两批就好.[-][/c]

English:
The Tal'on need a supply of modern weapons to hold off any attacks made by the zirax. Bows and Arrows can deal with the occasional trooper, but firearms and explosives are needed to take out Drones and fortifications.

[b][c][ffffff]Craft, Loot or Buy 20 Sniper Rifles[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ff0000]Hold all 20 of them in your inventory[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
泰隆人需要利用现代武器来抵御兹瑞克斯的攻击. 弓箭也许可以抵御单个步兵,但是想要击落无人机和进攻工事,枪械和爆炸物都是必须的.
