English: Your piracy has lowered your reputation with the major factions of the galaxy!
Chinese (simplified): 海盗行为降低了你在全星系各大派系中的声望!

English: The destruction of the outpost's core has weakened the depot's shields and drawn the attention of a nearby patrol vessel!
Chinese (simplified): 前哨核心的破坏削弱了仓储的护盾,并引起了附近巡逻船的注意!
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 旧联合会弹药库

English: [c][ffff00][b]Security assessment:[/b][-][/c] Combat Site Class 3\nThe Syndicate operates a secure munitions depot in this sector for storing stolen military supplies. The depot is protected by an energy shield. Destroying the nearby shield control outposts may weaken the shield but will also attract attention.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][b]安全评估:[/b][-][/c] 3级别战斗区域\n联合会在该地区开设了一个高度安全的弹药库,用于储存被盗的军事物资. 仓库受到能量护盾的保护. 摧毁附近的护盾控制哨站可能会削弱护盾,但也会引起注意.
可疑的无线电信标设置
可疑的无线电信标设置

English: Access the console on the second beacon.
Chinese (simplified): 访问第二个信标处的控制台

English: Access the console on the third beacon.
Chinese (simplified): 访问第三个信标处的控制台

English: Unlock the secure stash with the control console.
Chinese (simplified): 使用控制台解锁安全储藏室。

English: Destroy the enemy fighters. This objective is optional.
Chinese (simplified): 消灭敌方战机. 此为可选目标.
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 可疑的无线电信标

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_1

A radio beacon sits at the center of this sector. Almost as soon as you warped in the beacon was shut off to hide it but not before you pinpointed its location.

Bandits often use radio networks such as these to spy on patrols and coordinate attacks on passing freighters. Whomever owns this radio beacon will be forced to respond if you were to activate it.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_1

无线电信标就被放置在该区域的中心. 几乎就在你翘曲到这个星系的同时信标就被关闭已掩盖它的存在,但你在这之前就已经锁定了其位置 .

强盗经常使用此类无线电网络来监视巡逻人员并协调对过往货船的攻击。如果您要激活它,这个无线电信标的拥有者想必会作出回应.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit Leader ][-][/c]\nWho are you to mess with MY radio beacon? Stop this at once!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][ 强盗头目 ][-][/c]\n你是谁,竟敢干扰我的无线电信标?立刻停止!

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit Leader ][-][/c]\nYou two, get in your interceptors and stop them from tampering with the radio beacon!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗头目][-][/c]\n你们两个,上你们的拦截机,阻止他们干扰无线电信标!

English: The generators are about to overload!\nMove to a safe distance!
Chinese (simplified): 发电机即将过载!\n退回到安全距离!

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit Leader ][-][/c]\nI won't let you trace the radio signal. You'll never find me!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗头目][-][/c]\n我不会让你们追踪无线电信号。你们永远找不到我!

English: Despite his objections, you trace the signal to another nearby radio relay. Approach the relay but use caution.
Chinese (simplified): 无论他嘴上怎么否认,您依然将信号溯源至附近的另一个无线电中继站,接近它但务必小心.

English:
[c][ff0000][ Bandit Leader ][-][/c]
How did we lose? There were two of us and one of them!

[i]With the nearby ships destroyed you can now access the console.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ff0000][强盗头目][-][/c]
我们怎么会输?我们有两个人,他们只有一个!

[i]附近的飞船被摧毁后,你现在可以访问控制台。[/i]

English: The generators are about to overload!\nMove to a safe distance!
Chinese (simplified): 发电机即将过载!\n退回到安全距离!

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit Leader ][-][/c]\nWell aren't you a persistent one.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗头目][-][/c]\n你还真是个坚持不懈的家伙。

English: You have traced the signal to a small structure nearby. Approach the signal but be careful as the bandit leader is not likely to give up without a fight.
Chinese (simplified): 您已将信号溯源到附近的一个小建筑物,接近该信号位置但要一定要小心,因为强盗首领不太可能不战而降。

English: It appears the bandit leader has fled and in his haste accidentally transmitted the unlock codes for his stash!\nThe stash is yours for the taking.
Chinese (simplified): 看来强盗首领已经逃跑了,他在慌乱中意外地发送了他的藏货处的解锁代码!\n这个藏货处是你的了。

English: The bandit leader is long gone, leaving his stash of stolen goods for you to take.
Chinese (simplified): 强盗首领早已不在,把他的赃物拱手相让。

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit Leader ][-][/c]\nYou two cover my escape! If that Terran ship isn't shot so full of holes that it's not even fit for scrap then I'll have both your heads!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗头目][-][/c]\n你们两个掩护我逃跑!如果那艘地球飞船没有被打得千疮百孔,连废铁都不如,我就要你们两个的命!

English: Access the control console on the outside of the secure stash to unlock it.
Chinese (simplified): 访问安全储藏室外部的控制台将其解锁。

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit Leader ][-][/c]\nStop that Terran! He's at the third relay already! Blow up his ship! Use your light missiles!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][ Bandit Leader ][-][/c]\n阻止那个地球人!他已经到达第三个中继站了!炸毁他的飞船!使用你们的轻型导弹!

English: Access the control console on the outside of the second radio beacon
Chinese (simplified): 访问第二个无线电信标外部的控制台

English: Access the control console on the outside of the second radio beacon
Chinese (simplified): 访问第二个无线电信标外部的控制台
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 旧 可疑的无线电信标

English:
[c][ffff00][b]Security assessment:[/b][-][/c] Combat Site Class 1

A radio beacon sits at the center of this sector. Almost as soon as you warped in the beacon was shut off to hide it but not before you pinpointed its location.
Bandits often use radio networks such as these to spy on patrols and coordinate attacks on passing freighters. Whomever owns this radio beacon will be forced to respond if you were to activate it.

[c][9fa19b][i]You may close this window with ESC.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][b]安全评估:[/b][-][/c] 1级战斗区域

无线电信标就被放置在该区域的中心. 几乎就在你翘曲到这个星系的同时信标就被关闭已掩盖它的存在,但你在这之前就已经锁定了其位置.
强盗经常使用此类无线电网络来监视巡逻人员并协调对过往货船的攻击。如果您要激活它,这个无线电信标的拥有者想必会作出回应.

[c][9fa19b][i]按下ESC以关闭该窗口.[/i][-][/c]

English: A radio beacon sits at the center of this sector. Almost as soon as you warped in the beacon was shut off to hide it but not before you pinpointed its location.
Chinese (simplified): 一个无线电信标位于这个星区的中心。几乎就在你翘曲进入的同时,信标被关闭以隐藏它,但在你确定其位置之前没有来得及。

English: Bandits often use radio networks such as these to spy on patrols and coordinate attacks on passing freighters. Whomever owns this radio beacon will be forced to respond if you were to activate it.
Chinese (simplified): 强盗经常使用这样的无线电网络来监视巡逻队,并协调对过往货船的攻击。如果你激活这个无线电信标,拥有它的人将被迫做出回应。

English: The Syndicate operates a secure munitions depot in this sector for storing stolen military supplies. The depot's shields are being reinforced by two shield control outposts that you will have to take out first.\n[c][ff8000]Destroying the shield outposts will attract immediate reinforcements.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 联合会在这个星区运营一个安全的军火库,用于储存被盗的军事物资。军火库的护盾正由两个护盾控制前哨基地加强,你首先需要摧毁它们。\n[c][ff8000]摧毁护盾前哨基地将立即吸引增援。[-][/c]

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT3_1

The Syndicate operates a secure munitions depot in this sector for storing stolen military supplies. The depot's shields are being reinforced by two shield control outposts that you will have to take out first.
[c][ff8000]Commander, I suggest staying in your ship as destroying the shield outposts will attract immediate reinforcements.[-][/c]
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT3_1

联合会在这个星区运营一个安全的军火库,用于储存被盗的军事物资。军火库的护盾正由两个护盾控制前哨基地加强,你首先需要摧毁它们。
[c][ff8000]指挥官,我建议留在你的飞船上,因为摧毁护盾前哨基地将立即吸引增援。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 被占据的通讯站

English: This sector is supposed to contain a subspace radio outpost operated by the Traders Guild, but it is broadcasting suspicious anti-guild messages.
Chinese (simplified): 该区域有一个本应是由贸易协会会运营的亚空间无线电前哨站,但它正在广播可疑的反协会信息.

English: The signals are being relayed to the main outpost from several smaller radio transmitters. Destroying these transmitters will stop the hijacked signal but may draw unwanted attention.
Chinese (simplified): 信号正从几个较小的无线电发信器转发到主要前哨站。摧毁这些发信器将阻止被劫持的信号,但可能会引起不必要的注意.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_2

This sector is supposed to contain a subspace radio outpost operated by the Traders Guild, but it is broadcasting suspicious anti-guild messages.

The signals are being relayed to the main outpost from several smaller radio transmitters. Destroying these transmitters will stop the hijacked signal but may draw unwanted attention.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_2

该区域有一个本应是由贸易协会会运营的亚空间无线电前哨站,但它正在广播可疑的反协会信息.

信号正从几个较小的无线电发信器转发到主要前哨站。摧毁这些发信器将阻止被劫持的信号,但可能会引起不必要的注意.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: [c][00ffff][ Com Station ][-][/c]\nThank you for your assistance. You saved our hides there!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 通讯空间站 ][-][/c]\n谢谢你的帮助。你救了我们!

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nThis communications station is ours! If you destroy any more transmitters you will pay!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n这个通讯空间站是我们的!如果你再破坏任何发射器,你将付出代价!
摧毁被黑入的亚空间发信器
摧毁更多被黑入的发信器
摧毁被黑入的亚空间发信器

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nFirst round of drinks to the crew that brings me their head!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n第一轮酒水免费,给那些能带给我他们头颅的船员!

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nYou three, get that Terran! Our boss will have OUR heads if we don't stop them!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n你们三个,抓住那个地球人!如果我们不阻止他们,我们的老板会要我们的命!

English: [c][00ffff][ Com Station ][-][/c]\nHelp us please! They've taken the control room and are holding hostages! We've managed to remove the lockdown.\nYou can use one of the hangar door control panels to open the main door and gain entry.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][通讯空间站][-][/c]\n请帮助我们!他们占领了控制室并扣押了人质!我们已经设法解除了封锁。\n你可以使用其中一个机库门控制面板来打开主门并进入。

English: Your primary objectives are to secure the control room, rescue any hostages that may still be alive, and kill anyone that gets in your way.
Chinese (simplified): 你的主要目标是确保控制室安全,如果可能的话营救任何幸存的人质,并击毙任何阻碍你的人.
联系贸易协会安保人员
联系贸易协会安保人员

English: Head to the control room of the Occupied Com Station and activate the console to contract Traders Guild Security and claim your reward.
Chinese (simplified): 前往被占领通信站的控制室并激活控制台,与交易者公会安保人员达成合约并领取奖励.

English: You should contact Traders Guild security and inform them of the situation.\nThere is a console in the main control room you can use to do this.
Chinese (simplified): 您应该联系协会保安并告知他们情况.\n主控制室中有一个控制台,您可以使用它来执行此操作.

English: Kill the bandits occupying the station. This is an optional objectice.
Chinese (simplified): 杀死入侵空间站的强盗,这是一个可选目标.

English: It looks like the bandits have barricades themselves in the control room.\nThose cargo boxes blocking your path look fragile. You can probably easily destroy them.
Chinese (simplified): 看来强盗在控制室里设置了障碍.\n那些挡住你去路的货箱看起来很脆弱,或许你可以轻松摧毁它们.

English: You have cleared the station of hostile forces. You should make sure the hostages are safe and the command room is secure.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经清除了车站的敌人你应该确保人质和指挥室的安全.

English: [c][00ffff][ Hostage ][-][/c]\nThank you for saving us! It all happened so quickly. They killed the officer in charge and locked the rest of us in the bathrooms.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][人质][-][/c]\n谢谢你救了我们!一切都发生得太快了。他们杀了负责人,然后把我们其他人锁在了浴室里。

English: Access the communications console in the control room.
Chinese (simplified): 访问控制室内的通讯控制台.

English: Wait for the menu to come up.

[c][abd1ff]Activating this mission will allow you to change some personal settings within the scenario.
These settings will affect only yourself.

Additionally, if you have a [-][/c][c][00ffff]Project Eden Admin Access Card[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your personal inventory you will be able to change some global settings within the scenario that will affect all players. Please see the workshop for more details of how to use this system.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]The global settings menu is only visible for server admins.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]激活这个任务将允许你更改场景中的一些个人设置。
这些设置只会影响你自己。

此外,如果你的个人库存中有[-][/c][c][00ffff]伊甸园计划管理员访问卡[-][/c][c][abd1ff],你将能够更改场景中的一些全局设置,这些设置将影响所有玩家。请查看工作坊以获取如何使用此系统的更多详细信息。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]全局设置菜单仅对服务器管理员可见。[-][/c]

English: A small cluster of automated science satellites sits at the center of this sector. Satellites such as these are often deployed for long term observation of various anomalies.
Chinese (simplified): 一小群自动化科学卫星被放置于该区域的中心,此类卫星通常被部署用于长期观测各种异常现象.

English: It may be possible to hack the satellites to recover valuable reports without being detected.
Chinese (simplified): 你也许可以在不被发现的情况下侵入卫星以获取有价值的报告.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT1_1

A small cluster of automated science satellites sits at the center of this sector. Satellites such as these are often deployed for long term observation of various anomalies.

It may be possible to hack the satellites to recover valuable reports without being detected.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT1_1

一小群自动化科学卫星被放置于该区域的中心,此类卫星通常被部署用于长期观测各种异常现象.

你也许可以在不被发现的情况下侵入卫星以获取有价值的报告.

English: There have been reports that a local gang of bandits have been reinforcing a derelict shipyard in this sector. Use caution as destroying the sentries may alert nearby ships.
Chinese (simplified): 有报告称,当地的一个强盗团伙正在强化该地区的一个废弃造船厂的防御。请小心,因为摧毁哨戒站可能会引起附近船只的警觉.

English: EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_1\n\nThere have been reports that a local gang of bandits have been reinforcing a derelict shipyard in this sector. Use caution as destroying the sentries may alert nearby ships.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_1\n\n有报告称,当地的一个强盗团伙正在强化该地区的一个废弃造船厂的防御。请小心,因为摧毁哨戒站可能会引起附近船只的警觉.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: A group of patrol vessels have warped in to investigate!
Chinese (simplified): 一群巡逻船已跳入进行调查!

English: A group of patrol vessels have warped in to investigate!
Chinese (simplified): 一群巡逻船已跳入进行调查!

English: [c][ffffff][i]Colonist Militia:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]This is the Free Colonists Militia. We have come to assist you in securing this sector.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]殖民者民兵:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]我们是自由殖民者民兵,前来协助您保护这个区域的安全.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Colonist Militia:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]This is the Free Colonists Militia. We have come to assist you in securing this sector.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]殖民者民兵:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]我们是自由殖民者民兵,前来协助您保护这个区域的安全.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Colonist Militia:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Thank you for cleaning up these bandits.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]殖民者民兵:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]感谢您清理这些强盗.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Colonist Militia:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Thank you for cleaning up these bandits.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]殖民者民兵:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]感谢您清理这些强盗.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 轻型平民矿船

English: [c][00ffff][ Civilian Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nWe are under attack and requesting assistance! I repeat, we are under attack! Please help us!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][民用采矿船][-][/c]\n我们遭到攻击,请求援助!重复,我们遭到攻击!请帮助我们!

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nThis asteroid field belongs to us! There is no help coming for you! Let this be a lesson to any who would defy us!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n这片小行星带属于我们!没有人会来救你!让这成为任何敢于反抗我们的人的教训!

English: EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_3\n\nThere is a civilian mining fleet under attack by bandits in this sector.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_3\n\n该区域有一支民用采矿船队正遭到强盗袭击.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Speak with a Miner on board one of the Civilian Mining Vessels in the sector.\nThe vessel must still have power and the bridge must be undamaged.
Chinese (simplified): 与该区域一艘民用采矿船上的矿工交谈.\n船只必须仍保有动力并且舰桥未被损坏.

English: [i][c][ffffff]Civilian Mining Vessel:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]We thank you again for your assistance.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Alright men, time to get back to mining! We're behind schedule so pick up the pace![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]平民采矿船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]再次感谢您的协助.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]好了,伙计们,是时候回去采矿了!我们已经落后于计划了,所以快干起来![-][/c]

English: Destroy the cores of at least 5 bandit vessels while remaining in this sector.\nProtect the mining vessels. At least 1 must remain powered with the bridge intact to obtain your reward.\n[c][ffff00]NOTE: remove Warp Drives from your turret targeting settings to prevent your turrets from accidentally firing on nearby rich asteroids.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 在该区域内摧毁至少5艘强盗船只的核心.\n保护采矿船,至少一艘必须保持动力且舰桥完好无损才能获得奖励.\n[c][ffff00]注意:在你的炮塔目标设置中去除翘曲驱动器,以防止你的炮塔意外地向附近的富矿小行星开火.[-][/c]

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_3

Destroy the cores of at least 5 bandit vessels while remaining in this sector.
Protect the mining vessels. At least 1 must remain powered with the bridge intact to obtain your reward.
[c][ffff00]NOTE: remove Warp Drives from your turret targeting settings to prevent your turrets from accidentally firing on nearby rich asteroids.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_3

在该区域内摧毁至少5艘强盗船只的核心.
保护采矿船,至少一艘必须保持动力且舰桥完好无损才能获得奖励.
[c][ffff00]注意:在你的炮塔目标设置中去除翘曲驱动器,以防止你的炮塔意外地向附近的富矿小行星开火.[-][/c]

English: Destroy the cores of 5 Bandit Vessels that are attacking the Civilian Mining Vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁至少5艘正在攻击平民矿船的强盗船只的核心.

English: [c][00ffff][ Civilian Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nWe thank you again for your assistance. If any of our mining vessels are still powered with the bridge intact please speak with the captain on board.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][民用采矿飞船][-][/c]\n如您再次协助我们,若我们的任何采矿飞船仍通电且舰桥完好,请与船上的舰长交谈。
至少一艘采矿船必须存活

English: Protect the mining vessels. At least 1 must survive.
Chinese (simplified): 保护采矿船,至少一艘必须存活.

English: Destroy any remaining enemy vessels or fighters
Chinese (simplified): 消灭任何剩余敌方飞船或战机

English: [c][00ffff][ VIP Transport ][-][/c]\nWe were being escorted to an important meeting when our warp drive failed. Please come aboard and assist.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][VIP运输][-][/c]\n我们正在被护送到一个重要会议,但我们的翘曲引擎罢工了。请上船并提供帮助。

English: EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_3\n\nThere is a Traders Guild VIP Transport requesting assistance in this sector.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_3\n\n该区域有一艘贸易协会VIP运输船正在请求协助.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: [c][00ffff][ VIP Transport ][-][/c]\nOur scanners have detected an incoming enemy fleet. Get back to your ship and prepare to defend us!\nShields up!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][VIP运输][-][/c]\n我们的扫描仪检测到了一支即将到来的敌军舰队。回到你的飞船上,准备保护我们!\n护盾升起!

English: [i][c][ffffff]VIP Transport:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Our scanners have detected an incoming enemy fleet. Get back to your ship and prepare to defend us![-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Shields up![-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]VIP运输船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]我们的扫描器检测到敌方舰队来袭,返回你的飞船并准备保护我们![-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]护盾,启动![-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c]

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][00ffff][ Militia Escort ][-][/c]\nA fleet of enemy ships have warped in! Defend the transport!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][民兵护卫][-][/c]\n一支敌军舰队翘曲进来了!保卫运输船!

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][00ffff][ Militia Escort ][-][/c]\nIncoming! They have a bomber! Take it out fast!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][民兵护卫][-][/c]\n来袭!他们有一架轰炸机!赶快击落它!

English: Speak with the captain on board the VIP Transport.\nThe transport must still have power.
Chinese (simplified): 登上VIP运输船并舰长对话.\n运输船必须保有动力.

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][00ffff][ Militia Escort ][-][/c]\nMore bandits! This time they have not one, but two bombers!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][民兵护卫][-][/c]\n更多强盗!这次他们不仅有一架,还有两架轰炸机!

English: [c][00ffff][ Militia Escort ][-][/c]\nMore hostiles on scan. Stay sharp!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][民兵护卫][-][/c]\n扫描显示更多敌对目标。保持警惕!

English: [c][00ffff][ Militia Escort ][-][/c]\nAnother wave of ships on scans!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][民兵护卫][-][/c]\n扫描显示另一波飞船来袭!

English: [c][00ffff][ Militia Escort ][-][/c]\nThank you for your assistance. Please, come speak to me aboard the transport.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][民兵护卫][-][/c]\n谢谢你的帮助。请上运输船与我交谈。

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nHello? I am so glad someone is there! Our long range communications are down. Can you come aboard our station and speak with the manager in the upper hangar? We could use your assistance.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n你好?我很高兴有人在这里!我们的远程通讯系统瘫痪了。你能上我们的站,与上层机库的经理交谈吗?我们可能需要你的帮助。

English: EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_3\n\nThere is a Polaris Orbital Refinery requesting assistance in this sector.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_3\n\n该区域有一家极星轨道精炼厂正在请求援助.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Return to within 1000 meters of the Refinery
Chinese (simplified): 返回到精炼厂1000米范围内

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nA fleet of enemy ships have warped in! Defend the refinery!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n一支敌军舰队翘曲进来了!保卫精炼厂!

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nMore hostiles on scan. Stay sharp!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n扫描显示更多敌对目标。保持警惕!

English: Return to within 1000 meters of the Refinery
Chinese (simplified): 返回到精炼厂1000米范围内

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nIncoming! They have a bomber! Take it out fast!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n来袭!他们有一架轰炸机!赶快击落它!

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Captain ][-][/c]\nLooks like you could use some help! Let us take some of the heat off you.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][极星舰长][-][/c]\n看起来你可能需要一些帮助!让我们帮你分担一些压力。

English: Return to within 1000 meters of the Refinery
Chinese (simplified): 返回到精炼厂1000米范围内

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nMore raiders! This time they have not one, but two bombers!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n更多袭击者!这次他们不仅有一架,还有两架轰炸机!

English: Speak with the maanger on the upper hangar of the Refinery.\nThe refinery must still have power.
Chinese (simplified): 在精炼厂的上层与经理对话.\n精炼厂必须保有电力.

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nThank you for your assistance. Please, come speak to us in the upper hangar.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n谢谢你的帮助。请上我们上层机库与我们交谈。

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nOur scanners have detected an incoming enemy fleet. Get back to your ship and prepare to defend us!\nRaising our shields, but they won't last long under fire! Keep them away from the station!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n我们的扫描仪检测到了一支即将到来的敌军舰队。回到你的飞船上,准备保护我们!\n我们正在升起护盾,但在火力下它们不会持续太久!让他们远离站点!

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nAnother wave of ships on scans!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n扫描显示另一波飞船来袭!

English: Return to within 1000 meters of the Refinery
Chinese (simplified): 返回到精炼厂1000米范围内

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nThey sent two fleets at once! Protect the generators!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n他们同时派出了两支舰队!保护发电机!

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nWe lost a generator! If we lose too many this mission will fail!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n我们失去了一个发电机!如果我们失去太多,任务将会失败!

English: This sector contains an abandoned subspace radio transmitter that is now being used by bandits.\nShutting it down would improve the security of the local system.
Chinese (simplified): 该区域有一个废弃的亚空间无线电发射器,目前正被强盗使用.\n关掉它可以提高本星系的安全性.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_4

This sector contains an abandoned subspace radio transmitter that is now being used by bandits.
Shutting it down would improve the security of the local system.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_4

该区域有一个废弃的亚空间无线电发射器,目前正被强盗使用.
关掉它可以提高本星系的安全性.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Incoming hostile ships have been detected!\nGet back to your ship and prepare to fight off the bandits.
Chinese (simplified): 侦测到来袭的敌方飞船!\n返回你的飞船并准备击退他们.
留在受损的无线电发射器附近

English: Return near the Compromised Radio Transmitter.
Chinese (simplified): 留在受损的无线电发射器附近.

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nWell well well... What do we have here? Some little birdy messing with things they shouldn't be. Turn their ship to scrap, men!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n嗯,嗯,嗯……我们这里有什么?一些小鸟在不该搞乱的事情上搞乱。把他们的飞船变成废铁,伙计们!
留在受损的无线电发射器附近

English: Return near the Compromised Radio Transmitter.
Chinese (simplified): 留在受损的无线电发射器附近.

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nYou two, warp in there and finish the job!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n你们两个,翘曲进去,完成工作!

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nGenerator critical! Abandon ship! Abandon ship!
[c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nIt was a good run while it lasted...
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n只要持续了一段美好的时光……
留在受损的无线电发射器附近

English: Return near the Compromised Radio Transmitter.
Chinese (simplified): 留在受损的无线电发射器附近.
消灭敌方战机. 此为可选目标.

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nI bet you 5000 credits I get the killing blow!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n我打赌5000信用点,我会得到致命一击!
留在受损的无线电发射器附近

English: Return near the Compromised Radio Transmitter.
Chinese (simplified): 留在受损的无线电发射器附近.

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nIf we don't blow up that Terran ship the boss is going to have our heads! EVERYONE IN!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n如果我们不炸掉那艘地球飞船,老板会要我们的命!所有人都上!

English: Complete the shutdown sequence on the Compromised Radio Transmitter by accessing the console.
Chinese (simplified): 通过访问控制台完成受损的无线电发射器的关闭程序.

English: The shutdown sequence has completed and is awaiting finalization.\nReturn to the console on the Compromised Radio Transmitter to complete the mission.
Chinese (simplified): 关机程序已完成,正在等待最终确认.\n返回受损的无线电发射器的控制台以完成任务.
返回受损的无线电发射器
返回受损的无线电发射器

English: Trying to hold a molten hot chunk of rock probably wasn't your best idea.
Chinese (simplified): 试图携带一块熔融的热岩石可不是什么好想法.

English: The core sample melts through your backpack!\nMaybe trying to hold a glowing hot chunk of rock wasn't your best idea.\nNext time try [c][ffff00]connecting to a container[-][/c] first.
Chinese (simplified): 核心样本烧穿了你的背包!\n试图携带一块熔融的热岩石可不是什么好想法.\n下次试着先[c][ffff00]连接到[-][/c].

English: This planet is suitable for geothermal energy. Use a geothermal generator to bring it online.
Chinese (simplified): 这个星球适合地热发电,用地热发电机来开始发电.

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nYou! Yes, you there! I see you on scan. Want to make some quick money? Meet me on board my vessel.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][极星采矿船][-][/c]\n你!对,就是你!我在扫描中看到你了。想不想快速赚些钱?来我的船上见我。

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nAlso don't mine anything without speaking to me first! I will wait for you on my ship.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][极星采矿船][-][/c]\n还有,没有先和我说话,不要开采任何东西!我会在我的船上等你。

English: EdenSpace_POI_MiningT1_1\n\nA miner in the sector is asking for assistance.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_MiningT1_1\n\n该区域的一名矿工正在寻求帮助.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nYou can find the crystals all over the local area.\nMine them out either with a hand drill or a vessel mounted drill.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][极星采矿船][-][/c]\n你可以在周边地区找到这些水晶。\n使用手持钻机或船载钻机将它们开采出来。

English: Mine out the crystals in the sector.\nYou can find the crystals throughout the asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): 在本区域挖掘更多晶体.\n你可以在小行星带中找到晶体.

English: Speak with the Polaris Miner on board his vessel in the sector.
Chinese (simplified): 在星区内与飞船上的矿工对话.

English: Return to the Polaris Mining Vessel in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 回到本星区的极星采矿船.

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nI think that should do it. My targeting systems are coming back online now.\nCome speak with me on board my ship and I will give you the reward as promised.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][极星采矿船][-][/c]\n我认为应该足够了。我的瞄准系统现在正在重新上线。\n上我的船来和我说话,我会按照承诺给你奖励。
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 无人机培育中心

English: There is a Drone Swarm Nursery detected in this sector. Extreme caution is advised.
Chinese (simplified): 在该星区侦测到无人机虫群培育中心,建议保持高度警惕

English: There is a Drone Swarm Nursery detected in this sector. Extreme caution is advised.\n[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 在该星区侦测到无人机虫群培育中心,建议保持高度警惕.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Ships and bases require power to run their devices.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Without power, most devices will not function, ships will not fly, and weapons will not fire.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will no longer be protected from most environmental hazards and crops may die.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some devices consume power while turned on.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some devices can be turned off to remove their power use while others have a passive drain that cannot be turned off.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some devices such as constructors, drills, and shield generators have additional power consumption while doing work.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Ships and bases will continue to use fuel while you are away. In single player they will only use fuel while the game is actively running, but on 24/7 dedicated servers they will use fuel even while you are logged off.
It is recommended to create a power saving mode for your ship or base by turning off unnecessary devices while away.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view basic power info of your structure on the Main tab of the control panel or a more detailed breakdown in the Statistics tab of the control panel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Power systems come in two types: [-][/c][c][00ff00]Active[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]Passive[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]飞船和基地需要电力来运行它们的设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]没有电力,大多数设备将无法工作,飞船将无法飞行,武器也无法发射。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你将不再受到大多数环境危害的保护,作物可能会死亡。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一些设备在开启时会消耗电力。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些设备可以关闭以消除它们的电力使用,而其他设备则有一个无法关闭的被动消耗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些设备,如建造机、钻机和护盾发生器,在工作时会有额外的电力消耗。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]即使你不在,飞船和基地也会继续使用燃料。在单人游戏中,只有在游戏积极运行时它们才会使用燃料,但在24/7专用服务器上,即使你离线,它们也会使用燃料。建议在离开时通过关闭不必要的设备为你的飞船或基地创建一个节能模式。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以在控制面板的“主要”标签上查看你结构的基本电力信息,或者在控制面板的“统计”标签上查看更详细的分解。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]电力系统有两种类型:[-][/c][c][00ff00]主动[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]被动[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff][-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]Active power systems are the main power source for ships and bases.[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]All ships and bases require at least one active power system, even if there is enough power from [-][/c][c][00ff00]passive power systems[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to handle the power requirements.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]主动电力系统是飞船和基地的主要电力来源。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]所有飞船和基地至少需要一个主动电力系统,即使有足够的电力来自[-][/c][c][00ff00]被动电力系统[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来满足电力需求。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Passive power systems reduce your power consumption instead of producing their own power, allowing for less fuel use over time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Passive power systems are incapable of powering a structure by themselves and always require at least one [-][/c][c][00ff00]active power system[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Passive power systems can reduce power consumption to zero or even negative, allowing a ship or base to operate indefinitely without using fuel as long as the power consumption remains at or below 0.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Excess negative power consumption can be sent to [-][/c][c][00ff00]solar capacitors[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to recharge them provided there are [-][/c][c][00ff00]solar panels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] also installed.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]被动电力系统通过减少电力消耗而不是产生自己的电力,从而减少随时间的燃料使用。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]被动电力系统无法单独为结构供电,始终至少需要一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]主动电力系统[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]被动电力系统可以将电力消耗减少到零甚至负数,只要电力消耗保持在0或以下,船只或基地就可以无限期地运行而不用燃料。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]多余的负电力消耗可以发送到[-][/c][c][00ff00]太阳能电容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]以充电,前提是也安装了[-][/c][c][00ff00]太阳能板[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Wind turbines use a planet's atmosphere to provide a consistent reduction in power consumption of bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Strict requirements for activation mean it can only be used on planets with fair climates.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Wind Turbine Base:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Used as a base to place wind turbines on top of.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Place at least 2 blocks above ground.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Wind Turbine:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Must be placed outdoors on top of a wind turbine base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Wind turbines will automatically activate after one minute if all of the conditions listed in the wind turbine tooltip are met.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Will reduce power consumption once activated.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can be upgraded to advanced wind turbines via a schematic.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Takes up a large area.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]风力涡轮机利用一个星球的大气层来为基地提供持续的电力消耗减少。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]激活的严格要求意味着它只能在气候温和的星球上使用。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]风力涡轮机基地:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]用作在上方放置风力涡轮机的基础。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]至少放置在地面上方2个方块。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]风力涡轮机:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]必须放置在户外,位于风力涡轮机基地的顶部。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果满足风力涡轮机提示工具中列出的所有条件,风力涡轮机会在一分钟后自动激活。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦激活,将减少电力消耗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以通过图纸升级为高级风力涡轮机。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]占用大面积。[-][/c]
放射性同位素热电发电机(RTG)
放射性同位素热电发电机(RTG)

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]RTGs provide a passive decrease in power consumption but are also [-][/c][c][00ff00]generators[-][/c][c][abd1ff], allowing RTGs to act as both an [-][/c][c][00ff00]active power system[-][/c][c][abd1ff] when combined with [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel tanks[-][/c][c][abd1ff] as well as a [-][/c][c][00ff00]passive power system[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can only be found as rare loot in alien containers.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Picking up the RTG once placed will destroy it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]RTG提供被动的电力消耗减少,但同时也是[-][/c][c][00ff00]发电机[-][/c][c][abd1ff],允许RTG在与[-][/c][c][00ff00]油箱[-][/c][c][abd1ff]结合时充当[-][/c][c][00ff00]主动电力系统[-][/c][c][abd1ff],以及[-][/c][c][00ff00]被动电力系统[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]只能在外星人容器中作为稀有战利品找到。[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]一旦放置,拾取RTG将会销毁它。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Plasma turbines provide a passive decrease in power consumption, improving fuel economy or even allowing structures to operate without using fuel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can be used on ships and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Comes in multiple tiers. Higher tiers are more CPU efficient.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]等离子涡轮机提供被动的电力消耗减少,改善燃料经济性,甚至允许结构在不使用燃料的情况下运行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以在飞船和基地上使用。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]有多个等级。更高等级的CPU效率更高。[-][/c]

English: Your scanners detect high levels of radiation coming from a large asteroid in this sector.\nThere is an old communications tower in this system you should investigate before performing any mining.
Chinese (simplified): 您的扫描器检测到来自该区域的一颗大尺寸小行星的高水平辐射.\n该区域中有一个旧的通信塔,您最好在进行任何挖掘活动之前进行调查.

English: EdenSpace_POI_MiningT1_2\n\nA malfunctioning beacon is in this sector.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_MiningT1_2\n\nA 故障信标就在该区域.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Remove the source of the radiation in the center of the hollow asteroid so the beacon can become functional again.
Chinese (simplified): 移除空心小行星中心的辐射源,以便信标可以再次发挥作用

English: Mine out the large crystals in the center of the hollowed out asteroid.
Chinese (simplified): 开采出空心小行星中心的大型晶体.

English: Return to the Communication Beacon in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 回到该星区的通讯信标.

English: Access the console on the Communications Beacon in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 访问该星区通讯信标的控制台.

English: You have removed the source of most of the radiation.\nReturn to the communication beacon and try to activate it.
Chinese (simplified): 您已移除大部分辐射源.\n返回通信信标并尝试激活它.

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nYou can find the crystals all over the local area.\nMine them out either with a hand drill or a vessel mounted drill.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][极星采矿船][-][/c]\n你可以在周边地区找到这些水晶。\n使用手持钻机或船载钻机将它们开采出来。

English: Remove the source of the radiation in the center of the hollow asteroid so the beacon can become functional again.
Chinese (simplified): 移除空心小行星中心的辐射源,以便信标可以再次发挥作用
[c][00afff](殖民者)[-][/c] 采矿合同: 铁

English: Mining contract available. Open PDA > Contracts to begin.
Chinese (simplified): 开采合约可用. 打开 PDA > 合约以开始.

English: Mine from asteroids while in space.
Chinese (simplified): 在太空中对小行星进行开采.

English: (Colonists) Mining Contract: Iron placed on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): (殖民者) 采矿合同: 铁 已放置于工具栏

English: You have mined enough to fulfill your mining contract. Place the Mining Contract on your personal tool bar to complete the contract.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经开采了足够的资源来完成你的采矿合同。将采矿合同放置在你的个人工具栏上以完成合同。

English: Mine from asteroids in space until you have fulfilled the contract.\nKeep your mining contract, you will need it to complete the contract.
Chinese (simplified): 在太空小行星上采矿,直到履行合约.\n保留您的采矿合同,您将需要它来完成合约.

English:
[c][abd1ff]The Union of Independent Miners is looking for contractors to represent us while performing mining duties in space.
You will keep all ores and other materials found while mining. The U.I.M. only asks that you mine out asteroids while representing the U.I.M.

This contract is a one time agreement on behalf of the Free Colonists. Upon completion of the mining contract you will receive credits and reputation with the Free Colonists. You may only work on one mining contract at a time, but the contract can be paused and resumed at any time as long as the contract is placed in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Mine from asteroids in space until you have fulfilled the contract.
Keep your mining contract, you will need it to complete the contract.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Look at your contract for any additional instructions.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]独立矿工联盟正在寻找承包商代表我们在太空中履行采矿职责.
您将保留采矿时发现的所有矿石和其他材料。U.I.M.仅要求您在代表U.I.M.对小行星进行开采。

该合约是代表自由殖民者的一次性协议,完成采矿合约后,您将获得信用点和自由殖民者的声誉,您一次只能接取一份采矿合同,但只要您把合约保存在个人背包内,该合同可以随时暂停或继续.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
在太空小行星上采矿直到履行合约.
保留您的采矿合同,您将需要它来完成合约.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]查看您的合合约以获取任何额外说明.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Geothermal power provides a large and consistent reduction in power consumption for bases on geologically active planets.
Greatly reduces power consumption.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Requires a specific activation sequence.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Place an inactivate geothermal generator and interact with it and follow the directions to start the activation process.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Can only be activated on planets and moons with a high amount of geological activity, such as lava planets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The full list of planet and moon types is shown below.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Note that these are the internal playfield type names and not the localized names shown on the in-game map so the names you see on the map may differ from what is shown here.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This should be used only as a rough guide. When in doubt perform the geological survey using a geothermal generator before selecting a planet to settle on.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]

Crusted Lava
Decayed Lava
Frozen Inferno
Hell
Lava
LavaNascent
Metallic Moon
Midnight
Molten
Plasma
Sulfur Moon
Toxic Moon
Volcanic Moon[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff][-][/c]

极大减少能量消耗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
需要特定激活流程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]放置未激活的地热发电机，与其互动并按照指引启动激活程序。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]仅能在地质活跃度高的星球和卫星启用，例如熔岩星球。[-][/c]

English: Data on a nearby anomaly has been added to your scanning table. Access a scanning table in the same playfield to initiate scan.
Chinese (simplified): 有关附近异常的数据已添加到您的扫描台中,在同一区域内时访问扫描台以启动扫描.

English: Anomaly detected. Use scanning table to gather scientific data.
Chinese (simplified): 检测到异常,使用扫描台收集科学数据.

English: Preparing to clear PDA missions. This will take about 5 seconds.
Chinese (simplified): 准备清空PDA任务,大概会花费5秒钟.

English: [c][abd1ff]Activating this mission might clear queued PDA events.\nThis may help reset chapter activated missions such as the scanning table or missions involving combat sites for example, allowing you to reactivate the mission.\nThis will take about 20 seconds.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]激活此任务可以会清空队列中的的PDA事件.\n可能有助于重置激活的章节任务,例如扫描台或涉及战斗区域的任务,从而允许您重新激活任务.\n大概会花费20秒.[-][/c]

English: Travel to the galaxy region of Solitude
[c][ffffff][i]U.I.M. Agent[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]I see you have arrived in Solitude.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Find rich ice asteroids and mine them out using your ice mining drills.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]U.I.M.代理人[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]看起来你已经到达了Solitude.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]找到富冰小行星并使用您的冰采集钻头开采它们.[-][/c]

English: A dark matter nebula casts an otherworldly glow over this sector. Periodic power surges may affect your ship's power in this sector.\nYou can barely make out what sounds like a garbled emergency transmission through the interference.
Chinese (simplified): 暗物质星云在这个区域投射出超凡的光芒,周期性的电涌可能会影响您的飞船在该区域的供电.\n由于强烈的干扰你几乎不可能听清杂乱的紧急传输.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

A dark matter nebula casts an otherworldly glow over this sector.
You can barely make out what sounds like a garbled emergency transmission through the interference.

EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

暗物质星云在这个区域投射出超凡的光芒.
由于强烈的干扰你几乎不可能听清杂乱的紧急传输.

English: Find the escape pod in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 在暗物质星云中寻找逃生舱.

English: Rescue the crew member from the escape pod by interacting with the console on the pod.
Chinese (simplified): 通过与逃生舱上的控制台交互,从逃生舱中救出船员.

English: You have pinpointed the location of the first escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第一个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.

English: You have pinpointed the location of the second escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第二个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.

English: A power surge from the nebula has overloaded your ship's systems!\nRestore power to your ship.
Chinese (simplified): 来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n恢复你飞船的电力.

English: You have pinpointed the location of the fourth escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第四个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.

English: A power surge from the nebula has overloaded your ship's systems!\nHostile signals have been detected!\nRestore power to your ship before they arrive.
Chinese (simplified): 来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n检测到敌对信号!\n在他们到达之前恢复你飞船的电力.

English: Find the escape pod in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 在暗物质星云中寻找逃生舱.

English: Rescue the crew member from the escape pod by interacting with the console on the pod.
Chinese (simplified): 通过与逃生舱上的控制台交互,从逃生舱中救出船员.

English: Find the escape pod in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 在暗物质星云中寻找逃生舱.

Chinese (simplified): 通过与逃生舱上的控制台交互,从逃生舱中救出船员.

English: Rescue the crew member from the escape pod by interacting with the console on the pod.
Chinese (simplified): 通过与逃生舱上的控制台交互,从逃生舱中救出船员.

English: Find the escape pod in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 在暗物质星云中寻找逃生舱.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

A dark matter nebula casts an otherworldly glow over this sector.
You can barely make out what sounds like a garbled emergency transmission through the interference.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

暗物质星云在这个区域投射出超凡的光芒.
由于强烈的干扰你几乎不可能听清杂乱的紧急传输.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Return to the freighter in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 返回暗物质星云中的货船.

English: You have rescued a crew member.\nPerform a narrow band scan using your scanning station to track down the position of another escape pod.
Chinese (simplified): 你救下了一名船员.\n使用扫描站执行窄带扫描以追踪另一个逃生舱的位置.

English: You have rescued all the crew before they ran out of oxygen.\nReturn to the medical android on the freighter.
Chinese (simplified): 你在氧气耗尽之前救出了所有船员.\n返回货轮上的医疗机器人处.

English: Speak with the medical android on the freighter in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 与暗物质星云中货轮上的医疗机器人交谈.

English: [c][00ffff][ Medical Android ][-][/c]\nThank you for your assistance. Do not worry about me, I will look after the ship until a salvage team can come tow it out of the nebula.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][医疗机器人][-][/c]\n谢谢你的帮助。不用担心我,我会照顾这艘船,直到救援队能够来把它从星云中拖出来。

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

A dark matter nebula casts an otherworldly glow over this sector.
You can barely make out what sounds like a garbled emergency transmission through the interference.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Start by performing a narrow band scan with your scanning station to find the first escape pod.
Chinese (simplified): 首先,使用扫描站执行窄带扫描,以找到第一个逃生舱.

English: You have pinpointed the location of the third escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第三个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.
来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n恢复你飞船的电力.
来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n恢复你飞船的电力.

English: A pair of hostile interceptors have taken advantage of the power pulse from the nebula to ambush you!
Chinese (simplified): 两架敌对拦截机正要利用星云的能量脉冲来伏击你!

English: You have pinpointed the location of the fifth escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第五个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.

English: Return to the sector that contains the freighter to continue the mission.
Chinese (simplified): 返回货船所在区域继续执行任务.

English: Return to the sector that contains the freighter to continue the mission.
Chinese (simplified): 返回货船所在区域继续执行任务.

English: A strange anomaly sits at the heart of this sector.\nYour scanners detect several strange structures nearby, possibly set up to collect data on the anomaly.\nIt may be possible to retrieve data from them.
Chinese (simplified): 该星区核心处存在一个奇异异常。\n你的扫描仪探测到附近有几处奇怪的建筑，可能是为了收集关于该异常的数据而设立的。\n或许可以从中获取数据。

English:
EdenSpace_POI_HackT3_1

A strange anomaly sits at the heart of this sector.
Your scanners detect several strange structures nearby, possibly set up to collect data on the anomaly.
It may be possible to retrieve data from them.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_HackT3_1

这个星区的中心存在一个奇异的异常体。
你的扫描仪探测到附近有几处奇特的结构，可能是用来收集有关异常体的数据。
或许可以从中获取数据。

English: Speak to the medical android in the medical bay of the freighter.
Chinese (simplified): 与货轮医疗舱中的医疗机器人交谈.

English: These are the nesting grounds for a species of peaceful cosmozoan.\nYou detect signals from several observation satellites placed to monitor the nesting grounds. Perhaps valuable data can be extracted from them.
Chinese (simplified): 这里是一种温和的宇宙动物的筑巢地.\n您检测到了来自几颗用于监视筑巢地的观测卫星的信号。也许可以从中提取有价值的数据.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT1_2

These are the nesting grounds for a species of peaceful cosmozoan.
You detect signals from several observation satellites placed to monitor the nesting grounds. Perhaps valuable data can be extracted from them.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT1_2

这里是一种温和的宇宙动物的筑巢地.
您检测到了来自几颗用于监视筑巢地的观测卫星的信号。也许可以从中提取有价值的数据.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Activate this mission to begin tracking the trade frequency for:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]Beginning the scan will require an [-][/c][c][00ff00]Advanced System Survey Probe[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your personal tool bar.

Keeping this mission active will alert you if you enter a planet or moon that contains the listed factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This tracking will not pinpoint the exact location of the factory, only that one is present.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]激活此任务以开始追踪以下工厂的交易频率:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]你需要将 一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]高级星系调查探针[-][/c][c][abd1ff]装备于工具栏中以开始扫描.

如果您保持此任务处于激活状态,在进入包含目标工厂的行星或卫星时就会收到提醒.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]该追踪功能不会查明工厂的确切位置,只能查明工厂是否存在.[-][/c]

English: A [c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c] has been detected somewhere on this planet.\nYou will still need to pinpoint its position with your detector.
Chinese (simplified): 在该星球的某处检测到了[c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c].\n你仍需要用探测器找出其准确位置.

English: A [c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c] has been detected somewhere on this planet.\nYou will need to scan it down with your detector.

Chinese (simplified): 工厂追踪在PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]中的[c][00ffff]贸易[-][/c]下可用.

English: Advanced System Survey Probe on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 将高级星系调查探针置于工具栏中

English: Place an [c][00ff00]Advanced System Survey Probe[-][/c] on your personal toolbar to begin tracking the frequency.
Chinese (simplified): 将[c][00ff00]高级星系调查探针[-][/c]置于工具栏中来开始追踪频段.

English: A [c][00ff00]Hostile Apparatus Robotics[-][/c] has been detected somewhere on this planet.\nYou will need to scan it down with your detector.
Chinese (simplified): 在该星球的某处检测到了[c][00ff00]Hostile Apparatus Robotics[-][/c].\n你仍需要用探测器找出其准确位置.

English: Tracking trading frequency.\nYou will be alerted if a match is detected within the same planet, moon, or sector.
Chinese (simplified): 追踪交易频段.\n如果在同一行星,卫星或星区内检测到对应的结构,您将收到提醒.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Activate this mission to begin tracking the trade frequency for:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Commercial Starport[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]Beginning the scan will require an [-][/c][c][00ff00]Advanced System Survey Probe[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your personal tool bar.

Keeping this mission active will alert you if you enter a planet or moon that contains the listed factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This tracking will not pinpoint the exact location of the factory, only that one is present.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]你需要将 一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]高级星系调查探针[-][/c][c][abd1ff]装备于工具栏中以开始扫描.

如果您保持此任务处于激活状态,在进入包含目标工厂的行星或卫星时就会收到提醒.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]该追踪功能不会查明工厂的确切位置,只能查明工厂是否存在.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][00ff00]1:[-][/c][/b] Make sure you are connected to a container on a [c][ff0000][b]BASE[/b][-][/c] via logistics with at least 32,000 volume. [c][ffff00][u]Do not[/u] connect to a container on a ship.[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]2:[-][/c][/b] Cross into a biome called either [c][00ff00]Lake[-][/c] or [c][00ff00]Water[-][/c] from a different biome. [c][ffffff](The biome must be called EXACTLY either Lake or Water. Any other biome does not count)[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]3:[-][/c][/b] Use the water report from your connected container to upgrade the extractor using a multitool.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][00ff00]1:[-][/c][/b] 确保你通过物流系统连接到一个[c][ff0000][b]基地(BASE)[/b][-][/c]上的容器,且该容器容量至少为32,000。 [c][ffff00][u]不要[/u]连接到飞船上的容器。[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]2:[-][/c][/b] 从其他生态群落进入名为[c][00ff00]湖泊(Lake)[-][/c]或[c][00ff00]水域(Water)[-][/c]的生态群落。 [c][ffffff](生态群落的名称必须准确为Lake或Water。其他名称的生态群落不计入)[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]3:[-][/c][/b] 使用与你连接的容器中的水质报告,通过多功能工具升级提取器。

English: Enter a biome called [c][00ff00]Lake[-][/c] or a biome called [c][00ff00]Water[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 进入一个名为[c][00ff00]湖泊[-][/c]的生物群落或名为[c][00ff00]水域[-][/c]的生物群落

English: You have obtained a water report.\nUse it to upgrade your industrial water extractor within 2 minutes.
Chinese (simplified): 你获取了一份水文报告.\n使用它花费两分钟时间来升级你的工业用淡水提取器.

English: Your water survey has been cancelled.
Chinese (simplified): 你的水质调查任务被取消.

English: Talk to the lead researcher and ask him about his mission.
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]与首席研究员交谈并询问他关于任务的内容.[-][/c]

English: Speak to captain of UCHN Discovery
Return to the UCHN Discovery in the Alpha system and speak with the captain on board.
Chinese (simplified): 返回Alpha星系的UCHN发现号并和在舰桥的指挥官说话.

English: You've completed your survey of the Alpha system.\nReturn to the [c][00ff00]UCHN Discovery[-][/c] in the [c][00ff00]Alpha system[-][/c] and speak with the captain.
Chinese (simplified): 你完成了 Alpha星系的调查.\n返回[c][00ff00]UCHN 发现号[-][/c] in the [c][00ff00]Alpha星系[-][/c]和指挥官说话.

English: Speak to captain of UCHN Explorer
Return to the UCHN Explorer in the Beta system and speak with the captain on board.
Chinese (simplified): 返回Beta星系的UCHN探索号并和在舰桥的指挥官说话.

English: You've completed your survey of the Beta system.\nReturn to the [c][00ff00]UCHN Explorer[-][/c] in the [c][00ff00]Beta system[-][/c] and speak with the captain.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经完成了调查关于 Beta星系.\n返回[c][00ff00]Beta星系[-][/c]的[c][00ff00]UCHN探索号[-][/c] 和指挥官说话.

English: Speak to captain of UCHN Odyssey
Chinese (simplified): 和UCHN 奥德赛号指挥官说话

English: Return to the UCHN Odyssey in the Delta system and speak with the captain on board.
Chinese (simplified): 返回Delta星系的UCHN奥德赛号并和在舰桥的指挥官说话.

English: You've completed your survey of the Delta system.\nReturn to the [c][00ff00]UCHN Odyssey[-][/c] in the [c][00ff00]Delta system[-][/c] and speak with the captain.

Chinese (simplified): 和 UCHN开拓者号指挥官说话

English: Return to the UCHN Pathfinder in the Epsilon system and speak with the captain on board.
Chinese (simplified): 返回Epsilon星系的UCHN开拓者号并和在舰桥的指挥官说话.

English: You've completed your survey of the Epsilon system.\nReturn to the [c][00ff00]UCHN Pathfinder[-][/c] in the [c][00ff00]Epsilon system[-][/c] and speak with the captain.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经完成了调查关于 Epsilon星系的任务.\n返回[c][00ff00]Epsilon星系[-][/c]的[c][00ff00]UCHN开拓者号[-][/c] 与指挥官说话.

English: Visit the listed planets and moons of the Alpha system.\nYou must visit the surface of planets or moons to get credit for the survey.
Chinese (simplified): 访问Alpha星系列表上的所有行星和卫星.\n你必须到达行星或卫星的地面才能获得调查任务的荣誉点.

Chinese (simplified): 开采合约可用. 打开 PDA > 合约以开始.

English: WARNING: Hostile warp signatures detected.\nPrepare for battle.
Chinese (simplified): 警报: 探测到敌方曲速信号.\n准备战斗.

English: WARNING: Hostile warp signatures detected.\nPrepare for battle.
Chinese (simplified): 警报: 探测到敌方曲速信号.\n准备战斗.

English: You tripped a bandit alarm!\nEnemy fighters incoming!
Chinese (simplified): 你触发了掠夺者警报!\n敌人战斗机接近中!

English: You tripped a bandit alarm!\nEnemy fighters incoming!
Chinese (simplified): 你触发了掠夺者警报!\n敌人战斗机接近中!

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit Ambusher:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]Looks like we got ourselves a little extra salvage today. Get them![-][/c]

English: You tripped a bandit alarm!\nEnemy fighters incoming!
Chinese (simplified): 你触发了掠夺者警报!\n敌人战斗机接近中!
设置: 掠夺者警告 T2
探测到未知的跃迁讯号.\n开始扫描.

English: Destroy the core of 2 Bandit orbital patrol vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁两艘掠夺者巡逻舰的核心.

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit Leader:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]Don't let them get away this time![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]掠夺者首领:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]别让他们在这时候跑了![-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]掠夺者首领[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]把那艘船变成废铁![-][/c]

English: Access the emergency beacon in space.
Chinese (simplified): 访问轨道上的应急信标.

English: You have destroyed the Bandit ambushers.\nIt's probably for the best if you deactivate the beacon to prevent anyone else falling into a trap.
Chinese (simplified): 你遭遇了掠夺者伏击.\n你最好关掉信标以防其他人落入陷阱.

English: You tripped a bandit alarm!\nEnemy fighters incoming!
Chinese (simplified): 你触发了掠夺者警报!\n敌人战斗机接近中!

English: Now hopefully no one else will fall victim to the bandits.
Chinese (simplified): 现在希望其他人不再成为掠夺者的牺牲品.

English: You tripped a bandit alarm!\nEnemy fighters incoming!
Chinese (simplified): 你触发了掠夺者警报!\n敌人战斗机接近中!

English: A weak signal is detected near the center of this asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): 在这个小行星场的中心附近探测到一个微弱的信号.

English: EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_2\n\nA weak signal is detected near the center of this asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_2\n\n在这个小行星场的中心附近探测到一个微弱的信号.

English: [b][c][00ff00]1:[-][/c][/b] Make sure you are connected to a container on a [c][ff0000][b]BASE[/b][-][/c] via logistics with at least 32,000 volume. [c][ffff00][u]Do not[/u] connect to a container on a ship.[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]2:[-][/c][/b] Cross into a biome called either [c][00ff00]Lake[-][/c] or [c][00ff00]Water[-][/c] from a different biome. [c][ffffff](The biome must be called EXACTLY either Lake or Water. Any other biome does not count)[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]3:[-][/c][/b] Use the water report from your connected container to upgrade the extractor using a multitool.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][00ff00]1:[-][/c][/b] 确保你的[c][ff0000][b]基地[/b][-][/c]里拥有一个体积在32000立方的容器. [c][ffff00][u]千万不能[/u] 把容器链接在飞船上.[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]2:[-][/c][/b] 进入一个不同的生物群落称为[c][00ff00]湖[-][/c] 或者 [c][00ff00]水边[-][/c] . [c][ffffff](这个生物群落必须准确地称为湖或水. 其他类型是不计算的)[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]3:[-][/c][/b] 使用多功能工具从连接的容器中使用水文报告来升级提取器.

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]Commander, this appears to be the exit point of the fleet's jump to Andromeda.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]It matches the anomaly found near Jupiter, which means that it is impossible to open with your current technology.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]指挥官,这似乎是舰队跳跃到仙女座的出口点。[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]它与在木星附近发现的异常相匹配,这意味着用您当前的技术无法打开。[-][/c]

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]Commander, this appears to be the exit point of the fleet's jump to Andromeda.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]It matches the anomaly found near Jupiter, which means that it is impossible to open with your current technology.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]指挥官,这似乎是舰队跳跃到仙女座的出口点。[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]它与在木星附近发现的异常相匹配,这意味着用您当前的技术无法打开。[-][/c]

English:
[c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]Commander, I am detecting radio signals coming from this asteroid field.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]The rocks may reduce the range of your detector and are too brittle to provide any cover from incoming weapons fire. [-][/c][c][00fbff]I recommend using caution and be ready for a fight.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]If you need a refresher on mining or combat check the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][00fbff].[-][/c][c][00fbff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]指挥官,我正在检测到来自这个小行星场的无线电信号。[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]这些岩石可能会减少您的探测器的范围,并且太脆弱,无法为来袭的武器火力提供任何掩护。[-][/c][c][00fbff]我建议小心行事,准备好战斗。[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]如果您需要复习采矿或战斗的知识,请查看[c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。[-][/c]

Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]指挥官,这似乎是舰队跳跃到仙女座的出口点。[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]它与在木星附近发现的异常相匹配,这意味着用您当前的技术无法打开。[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00fbff]While you've been busy fiddling around with that armor, I was able to hack into some of the ship's database.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]It looks like they have sealed the main exit with 2 key cards. You will need to find those key cards if you are going to escape.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]Prepare yourself for a fight. I doubt they will simply let you walk out of here.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00fbff]当你忙着摆弄那件盔甲的时候,我成功入侵了这艘船的数据库。[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]看起来他们用两张钥匙卡封住了主要出口。如果你想逃脱,你需要找到那些钥匙卡。[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]准备战斗。我怀疑他们不会就这么让你走出去的。[-][/c]

English: Find the [c][ffff00]Yellow[-][/c] Key Card somewhere in the ship.
Chinese (simplified): 找到飞船上的[c][ffff00]黄色[-][/c]钥匙卡。

English: [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00fbff]You've obtained one of the key cards you need.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00fbff]你已经获得了你需要的钥匙卡之一。[-][/c]

English: Ow. My head. Where am I? What happened?
Chinese (simplified): 哎呀,我的头。我在哪里?发生了什么?

English: Oh my head! What did I get myself into? Last thing I remember was...
Chinese (simplified): 哦,我的头!我给自己惹了什么麻烦?我最后记得的是...

English: What did I get myself into? Last thing I remember was...
Chinese (simplified): 我给自己惹了什么麻烦?我最后记得的是...

English: Gambling. And betting. And losing... Oh no, what did I do? I bet my ship, didn't I?\nIt's all still a blur.
Chinese (simplified): 赌博。下注。然后输了... 哦不,我做了什么?我把我的飞船押上去了,是吗?\n一切都还是模糊的。

English: I lost and those pirates took my ship and dropped me in this pit to rot.\nI have to find a way off this rock before I suffocate or starve.\nAt least they were kind enough to leave me some supplies.
Chinese (simplified): 我输了,那些海盗抢走了我的飞船,把我扔在这个坑里自生自灭。\n我得在窒息或饿死之前找到离开这个鬼地方的方法。\n至少他们还好心给我留了一些补给。

English: Wait, don't these armor suits have an experimental integrated AI? Maybe it can help me.\n[c][ffffff][i]Press[/i][-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] [c][ffffff][i]to access your PDA.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 等等,这些装甲套装不是有实验性的集成人工智能吗?也许它能帮我。\n[c][ffffff][i]按下[/i][-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] [c][ffffff][i]来访问你的PDA。[/i][-][/c]

English: To repair IDA I will need to find 2 [c][00ff00]Electronics[-][/c].\nThere may be ruins on this planet where I can salvage these components from.\nThe ruins may have alien cores I need to destroy first.
Chinese (simplified): 为了修复IDA,我需要找到2个[c][00ff00]电子元件[-][/c]。\n这个星球上可能有遗迹,我可以在那里打捞这些组件。\n遗迹里可能有我需要先摧毁的外星核心。
摧毁你在这个星球上找到的各种被摧毁的基地中的异形核心.

English: I've found the 2 electronics needed and set them aside to repair IDA.\n[c][ffffff][i]Press[/i][-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] [c][ffffff][i]to access your PDA.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 我已经找到了两个必需的电子元件,并把它们放在一旁准备用来修理IDA。\n[c][ffffff][i]按下[/i][-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] [c][ffffff][i]来访问您的PDA。[/i][-][/c]

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, I have gained as much information from the alien cores as I am going to be able to on this planet.\nI am detecting a faint UCH signal coming from a research vessel near the Epsilon star called UCHN Pathfinder. I suggest you get a warp capable ship and find that signal.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官，我已经从这颗星球上的外星核心中获取了尽可能多的信息。\n我检测到一个微弱的UCH信号，来自靠近Epsilon星的一艘名为UCHN 探路者号的研究船。我建议你准备一艘具备翘曲引擎的飞船，前去寻找该信号。

English: Destroy Alien Cores in the various ruined bases you find on the planet.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁你在这个星球上找到的各种被摧毁的基地中的异形核心.

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nFind and destroy more Alien Cores to gain XP to unlock more technology in the tech tree.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n找到并摧毁更多的外星核心,以获得经验值(XP),从而在科技树中解锁更多技术。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nI was able to analyze the core's structure and have added more XP to your tech tree.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n我能够分析核心的结构,并已将更多的经验值(XP)添加到您的科技树中。

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]Commander, I am picking up nearby radio signals. You may be approaching the patrol route of a warship belonging to the Zirax Empire. I suggest you keep an eye on your detector pings and use caution in this area. You probably do not want to take on something like that without a capable warship of your own.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]If you need a refresher on combat check the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][00fbff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]指挥官,我正在接收到附近的无线电信号。你可能正在接近兹瑞克斯帝国战舰的巡逻路线。我建议你密切关注你的探测器信号,并在该区域保持谨慎。你很可能不想在没有自己的强大战舰的情况下去对抗那样的战舰。[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]如果你需要复习战斗技巧,请查看[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][00fbff].[-][/c]

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]Commander, I am picking up nearby radio signals. You may be approaching the patrol route of a warship belonging to the Zirax Empire. I suggest you keep an eye on your detector pings and use caution in this area. You probably do not want to take on something like that without a capable warship of your own.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]If you need a refresher on combat check the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][00fbff].[-][/c][c][00fbff][-][/c]

You probably do not want to take on something like that without a capable warship of your own.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]If you need a refresher on combat check the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][00fbff].[-][/c][c][00fbff][-][/c]

设置:土匪警报器T2新手版

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, I am picking up a sensor sweep. Someone is scanning us.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官,我正在接收到传感器扫描。有人在扫描我们。

English:
[c][ff8000][ Bandit Leader ][-][/c]
Screw this! This star system is under the protection of the Zirax Empire!
We're not going to risk a confrontation with them.
We will have to catch that Terran another day.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ff8000][ 土匪头目 ][-][/c]
受够了!这个星系受到兹瑞克斯帝国的保护!
我们不会冒险与他们对抗。
我们将不得不改天再去抓那个地球人。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nThere are an unusually high number of subspace transmissions passing through this sector.\nThe frequencies used are consistent with that of Progenitor technology.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n这个区域的子空间传输异常频繁。\n使用的频率与先驱者技术的频率一致。

English:
EdenSpace_POI_HackT2_1

There are an unusually high number of subspace transmissions passing through this sector.
The frequencies used are consistent with that of Progenitor technology.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_HackT2_1

这个星区通过的子空间传输数量异常地高。
使用的频率与先驱者技术一致。

English:
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c]
Basic
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Source:[-][/c]
Common on Swamp, Temperate, and Lava planets and Lava moons.
Uncommon in orbit around moons of gas giants.
Bought and sold at traders.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Notes:[-][/c]
Commonly found as surface rocks. Can be extracted from Crushed Stone in a Portable Constructor.
[c][c8c8c8][-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]A stable, crystalline form of carbon that possesses good conductive properties among others. It's both a precursor to industrial diamond production and the manufacture of graphene nanofiber material in high-end electronics.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][-][/c]
[c][969696]Tags: [-][/c][c][969696]Graphite, Plastic, Carbon.[-][/c]

[c][00afff][-][/c]

基础
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]来源:[-][/c]
在沼泽、温带和熔岩行星以及熔岩卫星上常见。
在气体巨星的卫星轨道上不常见。
在贸易协会商人处买卖。

通常作为地表岩石发现。可以在便携式建造机中从破碎的石头中提取。

English: You have been awakened after years in cryosleep.
Chinese (simplified): 您在冷冻睡眠多年后被唤醒。

English: Find a supply cache on Purgatory and retrieve the supplies from the supplies box.
Chinese (simplified): 在炼狱星上找到补给箱，从补给箱中取出物资。

English: There may be supply caches left over from other survivors that can have valuable supplies.\nI should try to find a supply cache and see what it has.\nThis may also help me restore my tech tree to unlock new crafting recipes.
Chinese (simplified): 可能存在其他幸存者留下的补给箱,它们可能含有宝贵的物资。\n我应该尝试寻找一个补给箱,看看里面有什么。\n这也可能帮助我恢复技术树,以解锁新的制作配方。

English: Find a supply cache on Purgatory and retrieve the supplies from the supplies box.
Chinese (simplified): 在炼狱星找到一个补给箱,并从补给箱中取出补给。

English: Find a supply cache and retrieve the supplies from the supplies box.
Chinese (simplified): 找到一个补给箱,并从补给箱中取出补给。

English: Find a supply cache on Purgatory and retrieve the supplies from the supplies box.

Chinese (simplified): 找到一个补给箱,并从补给箱中取出补给。

English: Find a way out of this level.
Chinese (simplified): 找到离开这个层级的方法。

English: Find a way to get to level 2.
Chinese (simplified): 找到通往第二层的路径。

English: Retrieve your supplies from the emergency supplies container on level 2.
Chinese (simplified): 从第二层的紧急补给箱中取回你的补给。

English: Leave the safety of the bunker and venture outside.
Chinese (simplified): 离开掩体的安全并冒险外出。

English: Maybe there's a survival kit around here. I'll need all the supplies I can get to survive outside.
Chinese (simplified): 也许这里有生存包。我需要尽可能多的补给来在外面生存。

English: Nothing left to do but go outside.\nOnce I leave the bunker I can never return. I should make sure I have the Light Armor I got from the survival kit equipped.
Chinese (simplified): 既然没有其他选择,只能走出去。\n\n一旦我离开地堡,就再也不能回来了。我应该确保已经装备了我从生存包中得到的轻型装甲

English: I may be able to find more supply caches on this planet to help me escape.
Chinese (simplified): 我或许能在这颗星球上找到更多的补给箱来帮助我逃脱。

English: Once I escape this planet I can try to find a UCH Research Vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦我逃离这个星球,我可以尝试找到一艘UCH研究船。

English: See if there's anything around that can give you more information on the conditions outside the bunker.
Chinese (simplified): 查看周围是否有任何可以提供更多关于掩体外条件的信息。

English: Whew. Feeling better now. Wait, what happened? Am I the only survivor?\nI need to find a way out of here. The power in this facility won't last long.\nMemory still hazy but wasn't there a control room on this level?
Chinese (simplified): 呼,感觉好多了。等等,发生了什么?我是唯一的幸存者吗?\n我需要找到离开这里的路。这个设施的电力不会持续太久。\n记忆还很模糊,但这个层级上不是有一个控制室吗?

English: Don't forget to equip your light armor.
Chinese (simplified): 别忘了装备你的轻型护甲。
生成0级 [c][ff0000]兹瑞克斯[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成1级 [c][ff0000]兹瑞克斯[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成2级 [c][ff0000]兹瑞克斯[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成3级 [c][ff0000]兹瑞克斯[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成4级 [c][ff0000]兹瑞克斯[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成1级 [c][ff0000]强盗[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成1级 [c][ff0000]掠夺者[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成1级 [c][00ffc6]遗留者[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成2级 [c][00ffc6]遗留者[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成3级 [c][00ffc6]遗留者[-][/c] 巡逻舰。
生成1级 [c][ff0000]掠夺者[-][/c] 舰队。

English: [c][00ffff][ Freighter ][-][/c]\nWe are under attack by bandits! We are a civilian freighter with limited weapons!\nPlease assist us! We will gladly welcome you aboard to arrange payment once the bandits are driven off.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][货船][-][/c]\n我们正遭到强盗的袭击!我们是一艘民用货船,武器有限!\n请帮助我们!一旦强盗被赶走,我们将非常乐意欢迎您登船安排报酬。

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_4

[c][00ffff][ Freighter ][-][/c]
We are under attack by bandits! We are a civilian freighter with limited weapons!
Please assist us! We will gladly welcome you aboard to arrange payment once the bandits are driven off.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_4

[c][00ffff][货船][-][/c]
我们正遭到强盗的袭击!我们是一艘民用货船,武器有限!
请帮助我们!一旦强盗被赶走,我们将非常乐意欢迎您登船安排报酬。
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: [c][00ffff][ Freighter ][-][/c]\nThank you for destroying a bandit!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][货船][-][/c]\n感谢您摧毁了一个强盗!

English: Warp to and approach a UCH Research Vessel.\nResearch Vessels appear as a blue triangle on the solar system map and can be found in the starting systems or in some G, F, or A class systems in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至并接近UCH研究船。\n研究船在太阳系地图上显示为蓝色三角形,可以在起始系统或中立领土的一些G类、F类或A类系统中找到。

English: Approach the UCH Research Vessel in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 接近这个星区的UCH研究船.

English: Enter the main hangar of the UCH Research Vessel.
Visit the quartermaster on the main hangar deck of a UCH Research Vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 访问UCH研究船主机库甲板上的军需官。

English: Talk to the lead researcher and ask him about his mission.
Chinese (simplified): 与主要研究员交谈,询问他的任务。

English: Speak with the captain of the UCH Research Vessel and ask about their mission.
Chinese (simplified): 与UCH研究船的舰长交谈,并询问他们的任务。

English: [c][00ffff][ UCH Captain ][-][/c]\nYou are clear to land in the main hangar.

[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, I am picking up binary subspace signals coming from the center of that moon remnant.\nThis sector is the perfect hiding place for a young drone nest trying to establish itself.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][IDA][-][/c]\n指挥官,我正在接收到来自那个月球残骸中心的二进制子空间信号。\n这个星区是年轻的无人机巢穴试图建立自己的完美藏身之地。

English:
EdenSpaceDrone_POI_CombatT3_1

[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
Commander, I am picking up low frequency binary subspace signals coming from the center of that moon remnant.
it's likely a young rogue drone nest is trying to establish itself in this sector.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpaceDrone_POI_CombatT3_1

[c][ffff00][IDA][-][/c]
指挥官,我正在接收来自那个月球残骸中心的低频二进制子空间信号。
很可能是一个年轻的流氓无人机巢穴正试图在这个星区建立自己。[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
寻找自由殖民者分配中心
寻找自由殖民者分配中心
