English: This is the Free Colonist Distribution Center that the deuterium miner should be at.\nI can find him somewhere on the station. He may be standing near tanks of deuterium and easy to spot.
Chinese (simplified): 这是氘矿工应该在的自由殖民者分配中心。\n我可以在这个站点的某个地方找到他。他可能站在氘的罐子旁边,很容易辨认。

English: Speak with the deuterium miner on board a Free Colonist Distribution Center in a Trade Station Sector in Free Colonists territory in the region of Prosperity.
Chinese (simplified): 在繁荣地区的自由殖民者领土内,贸易站星区的自由殖民者分配中心上与氘矿工交谈。

English: Warp to the system of Syntrax.\nYou can find Syntrax by using the search function of your galaxy map.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至Syntrax系统。\n您可以通过使用银河地图的搜索功能找到Syntrax。

English: Warp to the Syntrax Asteroid Field in the system of Syntrax.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至Syntrax系统中的Syntrax小行星场。\n在Syntrax系统内找到Syntrax小行星场并进行翘曲。

English: Find the wreckage at the coordinates the deuterium miner mentioned.
Chinese (simplified): 根据氘矿工提到的坐标找到残骸。

English: Examine the hull plate in the wreckage.
The deuterium miner has given me a location for the wreckage.\nSearch my galaxy map for a system named Syntrax and warp to the asteroid field there.
Chinese (simplified): 氘矿工给了我一个残骸的位置。\n在我的银河系地图上搜索一个名为Syntrax的星系,并翘曲到那里的小行星带。

English: This looks like the wreckage the miner was talking about.\nI should examine the wreckage carefully before checking out the asteroid.
Chinese (simplified): 这看起来像是矿工提到的残骸。\n在检查小行星之前,我应该仔细检查残骸。

English: This plating looks like it was ripped off by force.\nThis is clearly from a UCH Research Vessel. I'm on the right track.
Chinese (simplified): 这种板材看起来是被强行撕下来的。\n这显然是来自UCH研究船的。我在正确的轨道上。

English: Examine the antenna array in the wreckage.
Chinese (simplified): 检查残骸中的天线阵列。

English: This appears to be a sophisticated sensor and communications array.\nIt looks like it was ripped in half by UCH autocannon fire.
Chinese (simplified): 这似乎是一个复杂的传感器和通信阵列。\n看起来它被UCH机炮的火力撕成了两半。

English: Examine the broken claw in the wreckage.
Chinese (simplified): 检查残骸中的破碎爪子。

English: This looks like it could be used as an industrial cargo claw, but the design doesn't match Polaris or Colonists.
Chinese (simplified): 这看起来可以被用作工业货物爪,但设计不符合极星或殖民者。

English: Examine the thruster assembly in the wreckage.
Chinese (simplified): 检查残骸中的推进器组件。

English: This thruster assembly, what's left of it, has suffered damage consistent with standard UCH missile turrets.
Chinese (simplified): 这个推进器组件,剩下的部分,遭受了与标准UCH导弹炮塔一致的损伤。

English: Find an item that can help you in your investigation.\nThe item must be placed into your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 找到一个可以帮助您进行调查的物品。该物品必须放入您的个人物品库存中。

English: Broken drone processor analyzed in science station
Chinese (simplified): 在科研站分析破碎的无人机处理器

English: Analyze the Broken Drone Processor you found using the science station. The processor must be in your personal inventory.\nIf you lost the Broken Drone Processor, you can obtain a new one by returning to the asteroid field in the Syntrax system.
Chinese (simplified): 使用您船上的科研站分析您找到的破碎无人机处理器。处理器必须在您的个人物品库存中。\n如果您丢失了破碎的无人机处理器,您可以通过返回Syntrax星系的小行星带获得一个新的。

English: I should analyze that broken processor I found using a science station on board my ship.
Chinese (simplified): 我应该使用我船上的科研站分析我找到的那个破碎的处理器。

English: Report your findings to the UCH researcher
Chinese (simplified): 向UCH研究员报告您的发现

English: Open a communication channel with the UCH Researcher by opening your PDA with [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 通过打开您的PDA与UCH研究员建立通信频道,使用 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。

English: I need to report back with the UCH researcher.\nTo open a communication channel, get somewhere safe then press [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 我需要向UCH研究员报告回去。\n要打开通信频道,请先到达安全地点,然后按 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。

English: Examine the warp trail near the wreckage.
Chinese (simplified): 检查残骸附近的翘曲轨迹。

English: This warp trail has an unknown energy signature and appears to lead further into the Dronelands.
Chinese (simplified): 这条翘曲轨迹具有未知的能量特征,似乎通向无人机之地的更深处。

English: Warp to a M2-Drone class star system.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至一个M2-Drone类的恒星系统

English: Launch probes by using your scanning station.
Chinese (simplified): 通过使用您的扫描站来发射探测器。

English: Warp to a D4-Drone class star system.
Launch probes by using your scanning station.
Chinese (simplified): 通过使用您的扫描站来发射探测器。

English: Warp to a T-Drone class star system.
Launch probes by using your scanning station.
Chinese (simplified): 通过使用您的扫描站来发射探测器。

English: Warp to a BH4-Drone class star system.
Launch probes by using your scanning station.
Chinese (simplified): 通过使用您的扫描站来发射探测器。

English: The UCH Researcher has ordered me to launch probes in several star systems near or inside of the Dronelands region of space to safely scout it.\nProbes can be crafted under the decoration tab of a constructor or purchased from UCH Research Vessels.\nI should start my search by warping to a [c][00ff00]M2-Drone[-][/c] class star system. I can use the search function of the galaxy map to search by star class.
Chinese (simplified):
UCH研究员命令我在无人机之地区域附近或内部的几个恒星系统中发射探测器,以安全地侦察该区域。

探测器可以在建造机的装饰标签下制作,或者从UCH研究船上购买。

我应该从翘曲到一个[c][00ff00]M2-Drone[-][/c]级恒星系统开始我的搜索。我可以使用银河系地图的搜索功能,按恒星类别进行搜索。

English: Warp to a [c][00ff00]D4-Drone[-][/c] class star system. I can use the search function of the galaxy map to search by star class.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至一个[c][00ff00]D4-Drone[-][/c]类的恒星系统。 您可以使用银河地图的搜索功能,通过恒星类型进行搜索。

English: Warp to a [c][00ff00]T-Drone[-][/c] class star system. You can use the search function of the galaxy map to search by star class.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至一个[c][00ff00]T-Drone[-][/c]类的恒星系统。 您可以使用银河地图的搜索功能,通过恒星类型进行搜索。

English: These dim, red dwarf stars are too cold to support much life.\nUse a scanning station on board your ship to launch probes to explore this type of star system.
Chinese (simplified): 这些昏暗的红矮星温度太低,无法支持太多生命。\n使用您船上的扫描站来发射探测器,以探索这类恒星系统。

English: Warp to a R-Drone class star system.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至一个R-Drone类的恒星系统。

English: Launch probes by using your scanning station.
Chinese (simplified): 通过使用您的扫描站来发射探测器。

English: Wait for your probes to finish their scans.
Chinese (simplified): 等待您的探测器完成扫描。

English: I need to use a scanning station on board my ship to launch probes to explore this type of star system.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要使用我船上的扫描站来发射探测器,以探索这类恒星系统。

English: I need to use a scanning station on board my ship to launch probes to explore this type of star system.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要使用我船上的扫描站来发射探测器,以探索这类恒星系统。

English: I need to use a scanning station on board my ship to launch probes to explore this type of star system.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要使用我船上的扫描站来发射探测器,以探索这类恒星系统。

English: I need to use a scanning station on board my ship to launch probes to explore this type of star system.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要使用我船上的扫描站来发射探测器,以探索这类恒星系统。

English: I need to use a scanning station on board my ship to launch probes to explore this type of star system.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要使用我船上的扫描站来发射探测器,以探索这类恒星系统。

English: My probes are gathering data from various nearby systems.\nI need to wait for my probes to gather some data.
Chinese (simplified): 我的探测器正在从各个附近的系统收集数据。\n我需要等待我的探测器收集一些数据。
在科学控制站查看结果。

English: Access your science station to view the data from your probes.
Chinese (simplified): 访问您的科研站以查看探测器收集的数据。

English: The data from my probes have been compiled in my science station.\nAccess my science station to view the data and any video footage they may have captured.
Chinese (simplified): 我的探测器收集的数据已在我的科研站中整理完毕。\n请访问我的科研站查看数据和它们可能捕获的任何视频片段。

English: I need to find the deuterium trader on board a Free Colonists Distribution Center in the galactic region of Prosperity.\nI can find Distribution Centers in trade station sectors marked with a white station icon on the solar system map.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要在繁荣星区的自由殖民者分配中心的船上找到氘交易商。\n我可以在星系图上用白色空间站图标标记的贸易站星区找到分配中心。

English: This appears to be the right system.\nCheck the solar system map, there should be an asteroid field detected.
Chinese (simplified): 这似乎是正确的系统。\n检查星系图,应该能探测到一个陨石场。

English: This is the correct asteroid field according to the miner.\nHead to the coordinates shown on the HUD.
Chinese (simplified): 根据矿工的说法,这是正确的小行星带。\n前往抬头显示器(HUD)上显示的坐标。

English: Warp to a [c][00ff00]T-Drone[-][/c] class star system. I can use the search function of the galaxy map to search by star class.
Chinese (simplified): 再次翘曲至一个[c][00ff00]T-Drone[-][/c]类的恒星系统。 您可以使用银河地图的搜索功能,通过恒星类型进行搜索。

English: Warp to a [c][00ff00]R-Drone[-][/c] class star system. I can use the search function of the galaxy map to search by star class.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至一个[c][00ff00]R-Drone[-][/c]类的恒星系统。 您可以使用银河地图的搜索功能,通过恒星类型进行搜索。

English: Warp to a [c][00ff00]BH4-Drone[-][/c] class star system. I can use the search function of the galaxy map to search by star class.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至一个[c][00ff00]BH4-Drone[-][/c]类的恒星系统。 您可以使用银河地图的搜索功能,通过恒星类型进行搜索。

English: Investigate the structure on the asteroid in the wreckage.
Chinese (simplified): 调查残骸中小行星上的结构。

English: It looks like someone started constructing a base here.\nPerhaps they were interrupted and that's why they abandoned the asteroid. The materials used match the nearby wreckage.\nI should see if I can find anything useful inside.
Chinese (simplified): 看起来有人开始在这里建造基地。\n也许他们被打断,这就是他们为什么放弃了这颗小行星。所使用的材料与附近的残骸相匹配。\n我该看看我能否在内部找到任何有用的东西。

English: I've found a strange component inside the asteroid structure. I should hold onto it for analysis.
Chinese (simplified): 我在小行星结构内发现了一个奇怪的组件。我应该保留它以便分析。

English: What were those things? Those ships from the probe footage looked like giant drones of some kind. And that looked like a hatchery. Almost like these things were alive...
Chinese (simplified): 那些是什么?那些来自探测器录像的飞船看起来像是某种巨大的无人机。而且那看起来像是一个孵化场。几乎就像这些东西是活的...

English: Send your probe data to the UCH researcher
Chinese (simplified): 将你的探测器数据发送给UCH研究员

English: Open a communication channel with the UCH Researcher by opening your PDA with [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 通过打开你的PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c],打开与UCH研究员的通信频道。

English: I need to report back with the UCH researcher about what my probes found.\nTo open a communication channel, get somewhere safe then press [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 我需要将我的探测器发现的内容报告给UCH研究员。\n要在安全的地方打开通信频道,然后按 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。

English: Discover a scout or harvester class drone.
Chinese (simplified): 发现侦察机或收割机类的无人机。

English: This lone drone is a fairly weak target on its own.
Chinese (simplified): 这个单独的无人机本身是一个相当弱的目标。

English: Discover a budding drone structure.\nBudding structures can sometimes be found in orbits, asteroid fields, or combat sites in drone infested star systems.
Chinese (simplified): 发现一个萌芽无人机结构。\n萌芽结构有时可以在轨道、小行星场,或无人机感染的星系中的战斗区域找到。

English: This is a newly formed drone structure.
Chinese (simplified): 这是一个新形成的无人机结构。

English: Discover a brood drone structure.\nBrood structures can sometimes be found in orbits, asteroid fields, or combat sites in drone infested star systems.
Chinese (simplified): 发现一个繁殖无人机结构。\n繁殖结构有时可以在轨道、小行星场,或无人机感染的星系中的战斗区域找到。

English: This drone structure is well established.
Chinese (simplified): 这个无人机结构已经非常成熟。

English: Obtain some palladium ingots. You can mine palladium on Barren class planets in the Dronelands, or check the PDA.
Chinese (simplified): 获得一些钯锭。你可以在无人机地带的荒凉类星球上开采钯,或者检查PDA。

English: The researcher said I will need this later.
Chinese (simplified): 研究员说我以后会需要这个。

English: The researcher said I will need this later.
Chinese (simplified): 研究人员说我以后会需要这个。

English: Obtain some salvaged drone processors. You can obtain these from drone ships and structures in drone infested star systems.
Chinese (simplified): 获取一些被回收的无人机处理器。你可以从被无人机侵扰的星系中的无人机飞船和结构中获得这些。

English: The researcher said I will need this later.
Chinese (simplified): 研究人员说我稍后会需要这个。

English: Discover a swarm drone structure.\nSwarm structures can sometimes be found in orbits, asteroid fields, or combat sites in drone infested star systems.
Chinese (simplified): 发现一群无人机结构。\n无人机结构有时可以在轨道、小行星带或无人机泛滥的星系的战斗区域中找到。

English: This drone structure is thriving and would pose a significant challenge.
Chinese (simplified): 这个无人机结构蓬勃发展,将构成重大挑战。

English: The researcher has given me a list of drone structures to discover and resources that I should collect.
Chinese (simplified): 研究者给了我一份无人机结构的发现清单和我应该收集的资源。

English: Test salvaged drone processors in science station.
Chinese (simplified): 在科学站测试回收的无人机处理器。

English: Test salvaged drone processors in science station.
Chinese (simplified): 在科学站测试回收的无人机处理器。
您的飞船电力正在下降。

English: Wait for your ship's systems to come back online.
Chinese (simplified): 等待您的飞船系统重新上线。
来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n恢复你飞船的电力.
来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n恢复你飞船的电力.
准备迎接即将到来的攻击。

English: [c][00ffff][ UCH Researcher ][-][/c]\nI've been monitoring your situation remotely and I think you're about to have company.\nIt seems those drone processors were able to send out some kind of binary signal that has attracted the attention of a nearby swarm of drones. You have about 60 seconds before they warp in on top of you.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ UCH研究员 ][-][/c]\n我一直在远程监视你的情况,我认为你很快就要有伴了。\n看起来那些无人机处理器能够发送出某种二进制信号,这吸引了附近一群无人机的注意。你大约有60秒的时间,它们就会通过翘曲传送到你头上。
准备迎接即将到来的攻击。

English: [c][00ffff][ UCH Researcher ][-][/c]\nThey are almost there! Get ready for a fight!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ UCH研究员 ][-][/c]\n他们快到了!准备战斗!

English: A small swarm of drones have warped in!
Chinese (simplified): 一小群无人机已经翘曲进来了!

English: Destroy the cores of the drone ships.\nIf you somehow lost the drones, you can destroy the cores of most drone patrol vessels or POIs to complete this objective or manually mark this objective as complete.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁无人机飞船的核心。\n如果你不小心丢失了无人机,你可以摧毁大多数无人机巡逻飞船或POI的核心以完成这个目标,或者手动标记这个目标为已完成。

English: Access your science station to view the data from your probes.
Chinese (simplified): 访问你的科学站查看你的探测器收集的数据。

English: [c][00ffff][ UCH Researcher ][-][/c]\nWhew. Glad you made it out of there alive.\nCollect yourself, repair any damage that was done to your ship, and check your science station to see if your probes found a lead on the Copernicus.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ UCH研究员 ][-][/c]\n呼,很高兴你活着出来了。\n收拾一下,修复你的飞船可能受到的任何损伤,检查你的科学站,看看你的探测器是否找到了关于哥白尼号的线索。

English: Warp to the system of Calandras.\nYou can find Calandras by using the search function of your galaxy map.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲到Calandras星系。\n您可以通过使用银河地图的搜索功能找到Calandras。

English: This appears to be the right system.\nCheck the solar system map, there should be a combat site detected.
Chinese (simplified): 这似乎是正确的星系。\n查看太阳系地图,应该能检测到一个战斗区域。

English: Warp to the Calandras Combat Site in the system of Calandras.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲至Calandras恒星系统中的Calandras战斗区域

English: This sector is where I'll find the Copernicus according to my probes.
Chinese (simplified): 根据我的探测器,这个星区是我找到哥白尼号的地方。

English: I need to travel to the system of Calandras and find the Copernicus to rescue the crew in the escape pods before they run out of oxygen or suffer a worse fate.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要前往卡拉德拉斯星系,找到哥白尼号,救援逃生舱中的船员,以免他们氧气耗尽或遭受更糟的命运。

English: The harvesters have not finished dismantling the Copernicus.\nI can use the distraction to attack the budding drone structure and rescue the crew in the escape pods.\nThis may be a difficult fight.
Chinese (simplified): 收割者还没有完成拆卸哥白尼号。\n我可以利用这个干扰攻击萌芽中的无人机结构,并救援逃生舱中的船员。\n这可能是一场艰难的战斗。

English: Report your findings to the UCH researcher
Chinese (simplified): 向UCH研究员报告你的发现
使用 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 打开通信频道

English: Open a communication channel with the UCH Researcher by opening your PDA with [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 通过使用你的PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 打开与UCH研究员的通信频道。

English: I should check in with the UCH researcher before going off to find the Copernicus.\nTo open a communication channel, get somewhere safe then press [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 在去寻找哥白尼号之前,我应该先向UCH研究员报告。\n要打开通信频道,请先找到一个安全的地方,然后按 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。

English: I've rescued one of the crew.
I've rescued one of the crew.
I've rescued one of the crew.
Chinese (simplified): 我救出了一名机组人员。

English: I've rescued one of the crew.
Chinese (simplified): 我救出了一名机组人员。

English: I've rescued one of the crew.
Chinese (simplified): 我救出了一名机组人员。
摧毁无人机结构中的核心
摧毁无人机结构的核心

English: You've disabled the nearby Drone structure. This should make it easier to rescue the escape pods.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经禁用了附近的无人机结构。这应该会使得救援逃生舱变得更容易。

English: Leave the Calandras Combat Site sector and warp somewhere else.
Chinese (simplified): 离开Calandras战斗区域星区,翘曲到其他地方。

English: I have rescued all the crew members from the escape pod.\nI should finish up my business here and then leave this system by warping to another star.
Chinese (simplified): 我从逃生舱中救出了所有机组人员。\n我应该完成我在这里的事务,然后通过翘曲到另一个星星来离开这个星系。

English: Report back to the UCH researcher
Open a communication channel with the UCH Researcher by opening your PDA with [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 通过使用PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]打开与UCH研究员的通信频道。

English: I need to report back with the UCH researcher about what my probes found.\nTo open a communication channel, get somewhere safe then press [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 我需要向UCH研究员汇报我的探测器发现了什么。\n要打开通信频道,请先到达安全地带,然后按下[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。

English: Access your science station to complete the mission and receive your rewards.
Chinese (simplified): 访问你的科研站以完成这个任务并领取你的奖励。

English: All that's left to do is access my science station to complete the mission.
Chinese (simplified): 现在你所需要做的是访问我的科研站来完成任务。

English: Obtain some salvaged drone processors. You can obtain these from drone ships and structures in drone infested stars.
Chinese (simplified): 获取一些被回收的无人机处理器。你可以从被无人机感染的星区内的无人机飞船和建筑中获得它们。

English: I will need this for my tests.
Chinese (simplified): 我将需要这个来进行我的测试。

English: Obtain some palladium ingots. You can mine palladium on Barren class planets in the Dronelands, or check the PDA.
Chinese (simplified): 获取一些钯锭。你可以在Dronelands星区的贫瘠类行星上开采钯,或者查看PDA。

English: I will need this for my tests.
Chinese (simplified): 我将需要这个来进行我的测试。

English: I will need this for my tests.
Open your galaxy map and use the search system function to search for a system by the name of Syntrax.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的银河系地图并使用搜索系统功能,搜索名为Syntrax的星系。

English: Search for the [c][00ffff]Syntrax[-][/c] system by using the [c][00ff00]Search system[-][/c] button at the bottom of the screen.\nType [c][00ffff]Syntrax[-][/c] into the [c][ffffff]name[-][/c] field and select the search result called [c][00ffff]Syntrax (Sun D4-Drone)[-][/c].\nSelect [c][00ff00]Show On Map[-][/c] to find its location in the galaxy.
Chinese (simplified): 使用屏幕底部的[c][00ffff]搜索系统[-][/c]按钮,搜索[c][00ffff]Syntrax[-][/c]系统。\n在[c][ffffff]名称[-][/c]字段中输入[c][00ffff]Syntrax[-][/c],然后选择搜索结果称为[c][00ffff]Syntrax (Sun D4-Drone)[-][/c]。\n选择[c][00ff00]在地图上显示[-][/c]以找到它在银河系中的位置。

English: Open your galaxy map and use the search system function to search for a M2-Drone type star system.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的银河系地图并使用搜索系统功能,搜索M2-Drone类型的恒星系统。

English:
Search for the nearest [c][00ffff]M2-Drone[-][/c] class star system by using the [c][00ff00]Search system[-][/c] button at the bottom of the screen.
Type [c][00ffff]M2-Drone[-][/c] into the [c][ffffff]type[-][/c] field and select a search result from the list.
Select [c][00ff00]Show On Map[-][/c] to find its location in the galaxy.

Note: [c][ffffff]Type[-][/c] searches must be an exact match.
Chinese (simplified):
使用屏幕底部的[c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c]按钮,搜索最近的[c][00ffff]M2-Drone[-][/c]类恒星系统。
在[c][ffffff]类型[-][/c]字段中输入[c][00ffff]M2-Drone[-][/c],然后从列表中选择一个搜索结果。
选择[c][00ff00]在地图上显示[-][/c]以找到它在银河系中的位置。

注意:[c][ffffff]类型[-][/c]搜索必须是完全匹配。

English: Open your galaxy map and use the search system function to search for a system by the name of Calandras.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的银河系地图并使用搜索系统功能,搜索名为Calandras的星系。

English: Search for the [c][00ffff]Calandras[-][/c] system by using the [c][00ff00]Search system[-][/c] button at the bottom of the screen.\nType [c][00ffff]Calandras[-][/c] into the [c][ffffff]name[-][/c] field and select the search result called [c][00ffff]Calandras[-][/c][c][00ffff] (Sun M2-Drone)[-][/c].\nSelect [c][00ff00]Show On Map[-][/c] to find its location in the galaxy.
Chinese (simplified): 使用屏幕底部的[c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c]按钮,搜索[c][00ffff]Calandras[-][/c]系统。\n在[c][ffffff]名称[-][/c]字段中输入[c][00ffff]Calandras[-][/c],然后选择搜索结果称为[c][00ffff]Calandras[-][/c][c][00ffff] (Sun M2-Drone)[-][/c]。\n选择[c][00ff00]在地图上显示[-][/c]以找到它在银河系中的位置。

English: Report your findings to the UCH researcher
Chinese (simplified): 向UCH研究员报告你的发现

English: Open a communication channel with the UCH Researcher by opening your PDA with [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 通过打开你的PDA与[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c],打开与UCH研究员的通信频道。

English: I should check in with the UCH researcher.\nTo open a communication channel, get somewhere safe then press [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 我应该与UCH研究员联系。\n要打开通信频道,请找到一个安全的地方,然后按[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。

English: I need to use a science station to perform tests on some salvaged drone processors.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要使用科学站对一些打捞的无人机处理器进行测试。
你的飞船系统正在重新启动。

English: You've restored power to your ship.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经恢复了你的飞船的电力。

English: Start making your way to The Forge if you haven't already.\nFind a [c][00ff00]Trading Station Sector[-][/c] in Polaris territory.\nTrading Station Sectors show up as a [c][00ff00]white station icon[-][/c] on the [c][00ff00]solar system map[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 如果你还没有到达锻造星云,就动身吧.\n在极星领地中找到[c][00ff00]交易站星区[-][/c].\n交易站会以[c][00ff00]白色空间站的标识[-][/c] 显示在[c][00ff00]恒星系星图上[-][/c].

English: Open your galaxy map and use the search system function to search for a M2-Drone type star system.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的星系地图,使用搜索系统功能来搜索M2-无人机类型的星系。

English:
Search for the nearest [c][00ffff]K2-7[-][/c] class star system by using the [c][00ff00]Search system[-][/c] button at the bottom of the screen.
Type [c][00ffff]K2-7[-][/c] into the [c][ffffff]type[-][/c] field and select a search result from the list.
Select [c][00ff00]Show On Map[-][/c] to find its location in the galaxy.

Note: [c][ffffff]Type[-][/c] searches must be an exact match.
Chinese (simplified):
使用屏幕底部的[c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c]按钮,搜索最近的[c][00ffff]K2-7[-][/c]类星系。
在[c][ffffff]类型[-][/c]字段中输入[c][00ffff]K2-7[-][/c],并从列表中选择一个搜索结果。
选择[c][00ff00]显示在地图上[-][/c]来找到它在银河系中的位置。

注意:[c][ffffff]类型[-][/c]搜索必须是完全匹配。

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nLooks like you got them all!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][轨道精炼厂][-][/c]\n看起来你已经全部得到了!

English: Find the deuterium miner somewhere on a Free Colonists Distribution Center.
Chinese (simplified): 在自由殖民者分配中心的某个地方找到氘矿工。

English: The freighter sent out a distress signal before its core was destroyed!\nOther freighters now know you can't be trusted and will not pay you ransom for 1 hour.
Chinese (simplified): 货船在其核心被摧毁之前发出了求救信号!\n其他货船现在知道你不可信任,并且1小时内不会为你支付赎金。

English: Your piracy has lowered your reputation with the major factions of the galaxy!
Chinese (simplified): 你的海盗行为降低了你在银河系主要派系中的声誉!

English: The freighter sent out a distress signal before its core was destroyed alerting other freighters of your actions!\nFreighters will now know for a period of 1 hour that you can't be trusted to hold up your end of a ransom.
Chinese (simplified): 货船在其核心被摧毁之前发出了求救信号,警告其他货船你的所作所为!\n在接下来的1小时内,货船将会知道你不能被信任来履行赎金的承诺。

English: Subject: So you think you're a pirate?
Chinese (simplified): 主题:所以你认为你是一个海盗?

English:
[c][00ffff]Difficulty: [-][/c][c][ffff00]Medium[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You've received a message from an unknown sender.[-][/c]
{BarSmall_Requirements.png}[c][abd1ff]Combat capable ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Neutral with Pirate Clans.[-][/c]
{BarSmall_Rewards.png}[c][abd1ff]1 [-][/c][c][ff00ff]Ultra Rare Alien Cache[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]100,000 [-][/c][c][ffffff]Credits[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]1 [-][/c][c][ffffff]Specialized Crew[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff]难度:[-][/c][c][ffff00]中等[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你收到了一个未知发送者的消息。[-][/c]
{BarSmall_Requirements.png}[c][abd1ff]具备战斗能力的飞船。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]对海盗部落持中立态度。[-][/c]
{BarSmall_Rewards.png}[c][abd1ff]1 [-][/c][c][ff00ff]超稀有外星宝箱[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]100,000 [-][/c][c][ffffff]信用点[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ Unknown ][-][/c]
Excellent. I knew you wouldn't be able to pass this up.
Go find a colonist freighter and disable the rear thrusters to bring it to a complete stop.
Make sure you don't destroy its core or all its generators.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ 未知 ][-][/c]
太棒了。我知道你不会错过这个机会。
去找一艘殖民者货船并禁用其后部推进器让它完全停下来。
确保你不要破坏它的核心或所有发电机。
从货船舰长那里收到报酬

English: Receive the payment freighter captain provided.
Chinese (simplified): 收到货船舰长提供的报酬。

English: Do not destroy generators or core
Chinese (simplified): 不要破坏发电机或核心

English: Do not destroy the generators or core of the freighter.
Chinese (simplified): 不要破坏货船的发电机或核心。

English: Destroy the rear thrusters of the freighter to bring it to a stop.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁货船的后部推进器以使其停下。

English: [c][ffff00][ Unknown ][-][/c]\nWell done. Yes of course I was watching you. You and I will do great things together, I can see it. Don't bother trying to contact me. I will contact you. Go ahead and keep that payment for yourself for a job well done. Just know the next freighter you try to ransom may not be so quick to accept your offer.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ 未知 ][-][/c]\n干得好。当然了,我一直在观察你。你和我将会一起完成伟大的事情,我能看到这一点。不要尝试联系我,我会联系你。继续保留你为这次工作做得很好而得到的报酬。只需知道,你下次试图勒索的货船可能不会那么快接受你的提议。

English: The destruction of the outpost's core has weakened the depot's shields and drawn the attention of a nearby patrol vessel!
Chinese (simplified): 前哨核心的破坏削弱了仓储的护盾,并引起了附近巡逻船的注意!

English: The destruction of the outpost's core has weakened the depot's shields and drawn the attention of a nearby patrol vessel!
Chinese (simplified): 前哨核心的破坏削弱了仓储的护盾,并引起了附近巡逻船的注意!

English: A bandit gang is using this nebula as a staging ground for raids throughout the system.\nThere are those who would probably pay quite well for removing this nuisance.
Chinese (simplified): 一群土匪正在利用这片星云作为在整个星系进行袭击的集结地。有些人可能会为了消除这个麻烦而支付相当高的报酬。

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_2

A bandit gang is using this nebula as a staging ground for raids throughout the system.
There are those who would probably pay quite well for removing this nuisance.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_2

一群强盗利用这片星云作为在整个星系中进行袭击的集结地。
有人可能会为了消除这个麻烦而支付相当高的报酬。

English: This briefing can be reviewed in the PDA log under [c][00ffc6]Exploration Site[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 这份简报可以在PDA日志的[c][00ffc6]探索区域[-][/c]下查看。

English: This briefing can be reviewed in the PDA log under [c][ff8000]Combat Site[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 这份简报可以在PDA日志的[c][ff8000]战斗区域[-][/c]下查看。

English: A small cluster of automated science satellites sits at the center of this sector. Satellites such as these are often deployed for long term observation of various anomalies.
Chinese (simplified): 一小群自动化科学卫星被放置于该区域的中心,此类卫星通常被部署用于长期观测各种异常现象.

English: It may be possible to hack the satellites to recover valuable reports without being detected.
Chinese (simplified): 你也许可以在不被发现的情况下侵入卫星以获取有价值的报告.

English: These are the nesting grounds for a species of peaceful cosmozoan.\nYou detect signals from several observation satellites placed to monitor the nesting grounds. Perhaps valuable data can be extracted from them.
Chinese (simplified): 这里是一种温和的宇宙动物的筑巢地.\n您检测到了来自几颗用于监视筑巢地的观测卫星的信号。也许可以从中提取有价值的数据.

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nThere are an unusually high number of subspace transmissions passing through this sector.\nThe frequencies used are consistent with that of Progenitor technology.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n本星区内通过的亚空间传输异常频繁。\n所使用的频率与遗留者科技相符。

English: A dark matter nebula casts an otherworldly glow over this sector. Periodic power surges may affect your ship's power in this sector.\nYou can barely make out what sounds like a garbled emergency transmission through the interference.
Chinese (simplified): 暗物质星云在这个区域投射出超凡的光芒,周期性的电涌可能会影响您的飞船在该区域的供电.\n由于强烈的干扰你几乎不可能听清杂乱的紧急传输.

English: A weak signal is detected near the center of this asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): 在这个小行星场的中心附近探测到一个微弱的信号.

English: A strange anomaly sits at the heart of this sector.\nYour scanners detect several strange structures nearby, possibly set up to collect data on the anomaly.\nIt may be possible to retrieve data from them.
Chinese (simplified): 这个领域的中心出现了一个异常.\n你的扫描仪检测到附近有几个奇怪的结构,可能是为了收集异常数据而设置的.\n或许可以从他们那里回收一些数据.

English: A radio beacon sits at the center of this sector. Almost as soon as you warped in the beacon was shut off to hide it but not before you pinpointed its location.
Chinese (simplified): 一个无线电信标位于这个星区的中心。几乎就在你翘曲进入的同时,信标被关闭以隐藏它,但在这之前你已经精确地确定了它的位置。

English: Bandits often use radio networks such as these to spy on patrols and coordinate attacks on passing freighters. Whomever owns this radio beacon will be forced to respond if you were to activate it.
Chinese (simplified): 土匪经常使用这类无线电网络来监视巡逻队,并协调对过往货船的攻击。如果你激活了这个无线电信标,拥有它的主人将被迫作出回应。

English: This sector is supposed to contain a subspace radio outpost operated by the Traders Guild, but it is broadcasting suspicious anti-guild messages.
Chinese (simplified): 该区域有一个本应是由贸易协会会运营的亚空间无线电前哨站,但它正在广播可疑的反协会信息.

English: The signals are being relayed to the main outpost from several smaller radio transmitters. Destroying these transmitters will stop the hijacked signal but may draw unwanted attention.
Chinese (simplified): 信号正从几个较小的无线电发信器转发到主要前哨站。摧毁这些发信器将阻止被劫持的信号,但可能会引起不必要的注意.

English: [c][00ffff][ Civilian Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nWe are under attack and requesting assistance! I repeat, we are under attack! Please help us!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][民用采矿飞船][-][/c]\n我们正遭受攻击,并请求援助!我重复,我们正在遭受攻击!请帮助我们!

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit ][-][/c]\nThis asteroid field belongs to us! There is no help coming for you! Let this be a lesson to any who would defy us!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][强盗][-][/c]\n这片小行星带属于我们!没有人来帮助你们!让这成为任何敢于反抗我们的人的教训!

English: This sector contains an abandoned subspace radio transmitter that is now being used by bandits.\nShutting it down would improve the security of the local system.
Chinese (simplified): 该区域有一个废弃的亚空间无线电发射器,目前正被强盗使用.\n关掉它可以提高本星系的安全性.

English: There have been reports that a local gang of bandits have been reinforcing a derelict shipyard in this sector. Use caution as destroying the sentries may alert nearby ships.
Chinese (simplified): 有报告称,当地的一个强盗团伙正在强化该地区的一个废弃造船厂的防御。请小心,因为摧毁哨戒站可能会引起附近船只的警觉.

English: [c][00ffff][ VIP Transport ][-][/c]\nWe were being escorted to an important meeting when our warp drive failed. Please come aboard and assist.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ VIP 运输 ][-][/c]\n我们的翘曲引擎在护送我们参加重要会议时出现了故障。请登船并提供帮助。

English: [c][00ffff][ Freighter ][-][/c]\nWe are under attack by bandits! We are a civilian freighter with limited weapons!\nPlease assist us! We will gladly welcome you aboard to arrange payment once the bandits are driven off.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 货船 ][-][/c]\n我们正受到强盗的攻击!我们是一艘民用货船,武器有限!\n请帮助我们!一旦强盗被赶走,我们会很高兴欢迎您登船来安排报酬。

English: The Syndicate operates a secure munitions depot in this sector for storing stolen military supplies. The depot's shields are being reinforced by two shield control outposts that you will have to take out first.\n[c][ff8000]Destroying the shield outposts will attract immediate reinforcements.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): Syndicate 在这个星区运营一个安全的军火库,用于储存被盗的军事物资。该军火库的护盾由两个护盾控制前哨基地加固,您必须首先摧毁它们。\n[c][ff8000]摧毁护盾前哨基地将立即吸引增援。[-][/c]

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nHello? I am so glad someone is there! Our long range communications are down. Can you come aboard our station and speak with the manager in the upper hangar? We could use your assistance.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 轨道炼油厂 ][-][/c]\n您好?我很高兴有人在那里!我们的远程通信已经中断。您能登船与上层机库的经理交谈吗?我们可以利用您的帮助。

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, I am picking up binary subspace signals coming from the center of that moon remnant.\nThis sector is the perfect hiding place for a young drone nest trying to establish itself.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官,我正在接收来自那个月球残骸中心的二进制亚空间信号。\n这个星区是年轻无人机巢穴试图建立自己的完美藏身之地。

English: There is a Drone Swarm Nursery detected in this sector. Extreme caution is advised.
Chinese (simplified): 在该星区侦测到无人机虫群培育中心,建议保持高度警惕

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nYou! Yes, you there! I see you on scan. Want to make some quick money? Meet me on board my vessel.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][极星采矿飞船][-][/c]\n你!对,就是你!我在扫描中看到你了。想不想快速赚钱?到我的飞船上来见我。

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nAlso don't mine anything without speaking to me first! I will wait for you on my ship.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][极星采矿飞船][-][/c]\n还有,在和我说话之前不要采矿!我会在我的船上等你。

English: Your scanners detect high levels of radiation coming from a large asteroid in this sector.\nThere is an old communications tower in this system you should investigate before performing any mining.
Chinese (simplified): 您的扫描器检测到来自该区域的一颗大尺寸小行星的高水平辐射.\n该区域中有一个旧的通信塔,您最好在进行任何挖掘活动之前进行调查.

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nWe lost a generator! If we lose too many this mission will fail!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 轨道精炼厂 ][-][/c]\n我们失去了一个发电机!如果我们失去太多,这个任务将会失败!

English: [c][00ffff][ Orbital Refinery ][-][/c]\nWe lost a generator! If we lose too many this mission will fail!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 轨道精炼厂 ][-][/c]\n我们失去了一个发电机!如果我们失去太多,这个任务将会失败!

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Mining Vessel ][-][/c]\nYou can find the crystals all over the local area.\nMine them out either with a hand drill or a vessel mounted drill.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 极星采矿船 ][-][/c]\n你可以在本地区域找到晶体。\n使用手持钻机或船载钻机开采它们。

English: Remove the source of the radiation in the center of the hollow asteroid so the beacon can become functional again.
Chinese (simplified): 移除空心小行星中心的辐射源,以便信标可以再次发挥作用
使用 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 打开通信频道
完成摧毁任何敌对力量。

English: You should report the destruction of the bandit outpost to the local authorities.\nFinish securing the area, make sure you have room in your personal inventory or a connected container, then open a communications channel with [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 你应该向当地当局报告土匪前哨基地的破坏情况。\n确保区域安全,确保你的个人背包或连接的容器中有空间,然后使用 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 打开通信频道。

English: You should report the destruction of the bandit outpost to the local authorities.\nFinish securing the area, make sure you have room in your personal inventory or a connected container, then open a communications channel with [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 你应该向当地当局报告土匪前哨基地的破坏情况。\n确保区域安全,确保你的个人背包或连接的容器中有空间,然后使用 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 打开通信频道。

English: You should report the destruction of the bandit outpost to the local authorities.\nFinish securing the area, make sure you have room in your personal inventory or a connected container, then open a communications channel with [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 你应该向当地当局报告土匪前哨基地的破坏情况。\n确保区域安全,确保你的个人背包或连接的容器中有空间,然后使用 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 打开通信频道。

English: This briefing can be reviewed in the PDA log under [c][9d520b]Mining Site[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 这个简报可以在PDA日志下的 [c][9d520b]Mining Site[-][/c] 中查看。

English: A bandit gang is using this nebula as a staging ground for raids throughout the system.\nThere are those who would probably pay quite well for removing this nuisance.
Chinese (simplified): 一伙土匪利用这片星云作为在整个星系中进行袭击的集结地。\n有些人可能会为消除这个麻烦付一大笔钱。

English: A Tovera-Class Dreadnought is performing training exercises with its escorts in this asteroid field.\nThis is one of the most powerful ships of the Zirax imperial navy and will be an extremely difficult fight.
Chinese (simplified): 一艘托维拉级(Tovera-Class)战列舰正在这个小行星带与其护航舰进行训练演习。\n这是兹瑞克斯帝国海军中最强大的舰船之一,将会是一场极其艰难的战斗。

English: A Tovera-Class Dreadnought is performing training exercises with its escorts in this asteroid field.\nThis is one of the most powerful ships of the Zirax imperial navy and will be an extremely difficult fight.
Chinese (simplified): 一艘托维拉级(Tovera-Class)战列舰正在这个小行星带与其护航舰进行训练演习。\n这是兹瑞克斯帝国海军中最强大的舰船之一,将会是一场极其艰难的战斗。

English: EdenSpaceZirax_POI_CombatT5_1\nA Tovera-Class Dreadnought is performing training exercises with its escorts in this asteroid field.\nThis is one of the most powerful ships of the Zirax imperial navy and will be an extremely difficult fight.
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpaceZirax_POI_CombatT5_1\n在这片小行星带中,一艘Tovera-Class战舰正在与其护卫舰进行训练演习。\n这是兹瑞克斯帝国海军中最强大的战舰之一,将是一场极其艰难的战斗。

English: Shrouded in the nearby nebula, an abandoned supply cache sits at the center of this sector.\nLong forgotten by its original owners, no one would notice if the valuable supplies contained within were taken, though you will have to blast open the outer door and defeat the computer firewalls inside.
Chinese (simplified): 在附近星云的笼罩下,一个被遗弃的补给仓位于此星区的中心。\n原所有者早已将其遗忘,如果有人取走了里面珍贵的补给,也不会有人注意到,尽管你需要炸开外门并击败里面的计算机防火墙。

English: Shrouded in the nearby nebula, an abandoned supply cache sits at the center of this sector.\nLong forgotten by its original owners, no one would notice if the valuable supplies contained within were taken, though you will have to blast open the outer door and defeat the computer firewalls inside.
Chinese (simplified): 在附近星云的笼罩下,一个被遗弃的补给仓位于此星区的中心。\n原所有者早已将其遗忘,如果有人取走了里面珍贵的补给,也不会有人注意到,尽管你需要炸开外门并击败里面的计算机防火墙。

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT2_1

Shrouded in the nearby nebula, an abandoned supply cache sits at the center of this sector.
Long forgotten by its original owners, no one would notice if the valuable supplies contained within were taken, though you will have to blast open the outer door and defeat the computer firewalls inside.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT2_1

在附近星云的笼罩下,一个被遗弃的补给仓位于此星区的中心。
原所有者早已将其遗忘,如果有人取走了里面珍贵的补给,也不会有人注意到,尽管你需要炸开外门并击败里面的计算机防火墙。

English: A Progenitor scanning array still studies this dying wormhole that has long since collapsed beyond the point of being traversable.\nThe mainframe may have valuable data but will be protected by both local and remote security protocols that will need to be deactivated before the mainframe can be accessed.
Chinese (simplified): 一个先驱者扫描阵列仍在研究这个早已坍塌到无法穿越的垂死虫洞。\n主机可能有宝贵的数据,但将受到本地和远程安全协议的保护,这些协议需要在访问主机之前被停用。

English: A Progenitor scanning array still studies this dying wormhole that has long since collapsed beyond the point of being traversable.\nThe mainframe may have valuable data but will be protected by both local and remote security protocols that will need to be deactivated before the mainframe can be accessed.
Chinese (simplified): 一个先驱者扫描阵列仍在研究这个早已坍塌到无法穿越的垂死虫洞。\n主机可能有宝贵的数据,但将受到本地和远程安全协议的保护,这些协议需要在访问主机之前被停用。

English:
EdenSpace_POI_HackT1_1

A Progenitor scanning array still studies this dying wormhole that has long since collapsed beyond the point of being traversable.
The mainframe may have valuable data but will be protected by both local and remote security protocols that will need to be deactivated before the mainframe can be accessed.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_HackT1_1

一个先驱者扫描阵列仍在研究这个早已坍塌到无法穿越的垂死虫洞。
主机可能有宝贵的数据,但将受到本地和远程安全协议的保护,这些协议需要在访问主机之前被停用。

English: The laser sentry satellites of the Pentaxid Mining Facility have been disabled.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲水晶采矿设施的激光哨兵卫星已被禁用。

English: The rocket sentry satellites of the Pentaxid Mining Facility have been disabled. TEST
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲水晶采矿设施的火箭哨兵卫星已被禁用。测试

English: The plasma sentry satellites of the Pentaxid Mining Facility have been disabled.
Chinese (simplified): Pentaxid采矿设施的等离子哨兵卫星已被禁用。
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 翘曲水晶(原料)采矿设施

English: House Rados operates a pentaxid mining facility in this sector under the watchful eye of House Xenu.\nIf you were to board the sentry control stations you may be able to remotely shut down the defense sentries guarding the mining facility.\nTake care as the control stations will still require power to send the shutdown signal.
Chinese (simplified): 拉多斯家族在泽努家族严密的监控下,在这个星区运营着一个翘曲水晶(原料)采矿设施。\n如果你能够登上哨戒控制站,你或许可以远程关闭守护采矿设施的防御哨戒。\n请注意,控制站仍需要电力来发送关闭信号。

English: House Rados operates a pentaxid mining facility in this sector under the watchful eye of House Xenu.\nIf you were to board the sentry control stations you may be able to remotely shut down the defense sentries guarding the mining facility.\nTake care as the control stations will still require power to send the shutdown signal.
Chinese (simplified): 拉多斯家族在泽努家族的严密监视下在这个星区运营着一个翘曲水晶(原料)采矿设施。\n如果你能够登上哨戒控制站,你或许可以远程关闭守护采矿设施的防御哨戒。\n请注意,控制站仍需要电力来发送关闭信号。

English: This briefing can be reviewed in the PDA log under [c][ff8000]Combat Site[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 这份简报可以在PDA日志下查阅,分类为[c][ff8000]战斗区域[-][/c]。

English: House Rados operates a pentaxid mining facility in this sector under the watchful eye of House Xenu.\nIf you were to board the sentry control stations you may be able to remotely shut down the defense sentries guarding the mining facility.\nTake care as the control stations will still require power to send the shutdown signal.
Chinese (simplified): 拉多斯家族在本星区经营着一家翘曲水晶(原料)采矿设施,同时受到Xenu家族的严密监视。\n如果您登上哨兵控制站,您可能能够远程关闭保护采矿设施的防御哨兵。\n请注意,控制站仍然需要电力来发送关闭信号。
测试:微型翘曲跳跃(旧版)
微型跳跃驱动器启动中

English:
[c][ffffff]Note: If you have not restarted your game since entering this playfield, you must first restart your game for the warp jump to work.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]WARNING: THIS FEATURE SHOULD ONLY BE USED FOR TESTING.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]YOU USE THIS AT YOUR OWN RISK.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]IT MAY DESTROY YOUR SHIP OR EVEN CORRUPT YOUR SAVE GAME.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]THIS IS A PROTOTYPE FEATURE.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]A SERVER ADMIN MUST FIRST ENABLE THE FEATURE VIA THE PROJECT EDEN SETTINGS MENU.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]THIS WILL ATTEMPT TO WARP YOUR SHIP FORWARD AFTER 10 SECONDS IN THE DIRECTION YOU ARE FACING.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]IT SHOULD ONLY BE USED WHEN YOU ARE SITTING IN THE PILOT CHAIR OF A SHIP.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO CONTINUE?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):

English:
[c][ffffff]Note: If you have not restarted your game since entering this playfield, you must first restart your game for the warp jump to work.[-][/c]
Activate this mission to attempt to jump your ship forward 10,000 meters after 10 seconds.
Should only be used in space, while piloting a SV or CV.
Requires 1 Refined Pentaxid in your personal inventory.
Will not allow you to jump too close to another structure.
See the console for any debug messages.

[c][ff00ff]Experimental feature: Must be enabled in the Project Eden Admin Settings before this feature can be used.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]Use at your own risk. May cause loss of ship or save game corruption. Save your blueprints and back up your save game.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]For testing only.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff]注意:如果您自进入这个游戏场地以来还没有重启游戏,您必须首先重启游戏才能使翘曲跳跃功能正常工作。[-][/c]
激活这个任务将尝试在10秒后让您的飞船向前跳跃10,000米。
只能在太空中使用,当您驾驶小型飞船(SV)或主力舰(CV)时。
需要您的个人库存中有1个精炼的翘曲水晶(Refined Pentaxid)。
不会让你跳跃得太靠近其他结构。
查看控制台以获取任何调试信息。

[c][ff00ff]实验性功能:必须在伊甸园计划管理员设置中启用此功能后才能使用。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]自行承担风险使用。可能会导致飞船丢失或保存游戏文件损坏。保存您的蓝图并备份您的保存游戏。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]仅限测试使用。[-][/c]
激活原型微型跳跃驱动器

English:
[c][abd1ff]You can activate this mission to initiate a micro jump using a [-][/c][c][00ff00]Prototype Micro Jump Drive[-][/c][c][abd1ff] that is installed on your ship.
You must be piloting a Small Vessel or Capital Vessel and in space before use.
You can also initiate a micro jump by selecting your micro jump drive in the control panel and clicking the ACCESS button to bring up the micro jump drive interface. [-][/c][c][ffff00](Using the ACCESS button is recommended over using this mission)[-][/c][c][abd1ff].
See either the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Small Prototype Micro Jump Drive[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Large Prototype Micro Jump Drive[-][/c][c][abd1ff] unlocked in the tech tree for details.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000]Use at your own risk. May cause loss of ship or save game corruption. Save your blueprints and back up your save game.[-][/c][c][ff00ff][-][/c]

您必须驾驶小型飞船或主力舰并且在太空中才能使用。
您也可以通过选择控制面板中的微型跳跃驱动器并点击ACCESS按钮来启动微型跳跃,以调出微型跳跃驱动器界面。[-][/c][c][ffff00](建议使用ACCESS按钮而不是使用此任务)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。

English:
Kill any Zirax troop.
Troops do not have to be Zirax faction to count.

Does not count base attack troops, commanders, mechanoids, bosses, or other unique troops.

English: The captain of a UCH research vessel has given you the task of getting revenge on the Zirax that attacked the UCH fleet.\nTo complete these objectives, you must personally kill a number of Zirax troops.\nThis mission can be deactivated. It can be resumed by activating the Project Eden Mission Manager.
Chinese (simplified): 一艘UCH研究船的船长给了你一个任务,那就是对攻击UCH舰队的兹瑞克斯进行报复。\n为了完成这些目标,你必须亲自杀死一定数量的兹瑞克斯士兵。\n这个任务可以被停用。可以通过激活伊甸园计划任务管理器来恢复。

Chinese (simplified): 激活这个任务以继续从UCH研究飞船获得的任何可重复任务。

English:
{LogoRE2.png}[c][abd1ff]Reforged Eden 2 is a complete game overhaul that combines Vermillion's Reforged Galaxy 2 and ravien_ff's Project Eden 2 content into a single scenario.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Nearly every block, weapon, POI, planet, trader, and mission has been updated or replaced and a large amount of new content added. This greatly changes the game experience.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Reforged Eden 2 is very different in many ways from Reforged Eden 1 with different block limits, CPU allocation, power usage, etc. Some of the values may seem shocking at first if you are coming from Reforged Eden 1 but this is why it's important to look at Reforged Eden 2 as its own scenario.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Reforged Eden 2 increases the overall difficulty and slows down progression. It is intended for experienced players looking for a more difficult, long term PvE experience with a variety of ways to progress and new things to explore.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Blueprints created for Reforged Eden 2 may not be compatible with the base game or Reforged Eden 1 and blueprints for the base game or Reforged Eden 1 may require extensive refit to work properly in Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The scenario is still under active development so this information is subject to change. Please see the update notes for the latest information.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
{LogoRE2.png}[c][abd1ff]重铸伊甸园2是一个完整的游戏重制,它将Vermillion的重铸银河2和ravien_ff的伊甸园计划2的内容合并到一个单一的场景中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]几乎所有的方块、武器、兴趣点、星球、商人和任务都已经更新或替换,并且添加了大量的新内容。这极大地改变了游戏体验。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]重铸伊甸园2在许多方面与重铸伊甸园1有很大的不同,包括不同的方块限制、CPU分配、电力使用等。如果你来自重铸伊甸园1,一些值可能一开始看起来令人震惊,但这就是为什么重要的是将重铸伊甸园2视为其自己的场景。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]重铸伊甸园2增加了整体难度并放慢了进程。它旨在为寻求更具挑战性、长期PvE体验的经验丰富的玩家,提供多种进展方式和新事物的探索。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为重铸伊甸园2创建的蓝图可能与基础游戏或重铸伊甸园1不兼容,而基础游戏或重铸伊甸园1的蓝图可能需要广泛的改装才能在重铸伊甸园2中正常工作。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这个场景仍在积极开发中,所以这些信息可能会发生变化。请参阅更新说明以获取最新信息。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]For any troubleshooting with the scenario please follow the troubleshooting process outlined at the below link.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Reports that do not follow this process will be ignored.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Reports must be posted on GitHub following the directions in the below linked post.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]GitHub issues are really easy to post! All you need is a free GitHub account, click the report issue button, fill out the 4 mandatory questions on the form and any additional info you want to supply, and submit your issue.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Issues posted to the Workshop page, Discord, YouTube, your kitchen counter, the opinion section of your local paper, or anywhere else will be ignored.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Please help us help you by following the bug report process and posting your issue on GitHub by clicking the link below and following the directions provided in the below link.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]T[-][/c][c][ffff00]roubleshooting and bug reports:[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]对于任何场景的故障排除,请按照下面链接中概述的故障排除过程进行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不遵循此过程的报告将被忽略。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]报告必须按照下面链接中的方向在GitHub上发布。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]If you have a question not answered here please leave a comment on the Workshop![-][/c]

[c][00ffff]Where do I find X resource?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The Empyriopedia lists where to find most resources.[-][/c]

[c][00ffff]Why can't I find X resource on my starting planet?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In general, resources in Reforged Eden 2 are more spread out and harder to obtain. Depending on your chosen starting planet, you may have to build a warp capable small vessel using Iron, Silicon, Copper, and Cobalt to warp to another planet. You will always find the resources to build a warp capable small vessel in your starting sector, and a warp capable capital vessel in your starting solar system.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]如果您在这里没有找到答案,请在工作坊留下评论![-][/c]

[c][00ffff]我在哪里可以找到X资源?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]帝国百科列出了大部分资源的所在地。[-][/c]

[c][00ffff]为什么我在我的起始星球上找不到X资源?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通常情况下,在Reforged Eden 2中的资源分布更为分散,获取难度更大。根据您的起始星球选择,您可能需要建造一个使用铁、硅、铜和钴的能够翘曲的小型飞船,以翘曲到另一个星球。您总是在起始星区找到建造能够翘曲的小型飞船的资源,在起始星系中找到能够翘曲的主力舰的资源。[-][/c]
多人游戏常见问题解答

English:
[c][abd1ff]If you have a question not answered here please leave a comment on the Workshop![-][/c]

[c][ff8000]Please see the [-][/c][c][00ffff][u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1703779262]Reforged Eden Configuration Guide[/url][/u][-][/c][c][ff8000] on Steam for [-][/c][b][c][ff8000]important information[-][/c][/b][c][ff8000] on using Reforged Eden 2 on a dedicated server or for customizing it! [-][/c][c][ffff00][u]You must follow the directions in the guide for your server to function correctly.[/u][-][/c]

[c][00ffff]Does Reforged Eden 2 work in COOP?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Yes it does work, however COOP has several bugs.
16gb of computer memory is strongly recommended for COOP, but it is generally best to run a true dedicated server instead.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]We do not support COOP in the scenario.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]Does Reforged Eden 2 work on a dedicated server?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Yes Reforged Eden 2 works with dedicated servers.
Reforged Eden 2 uses the full galaxy generation so keep in mind the size of the game world will be immense as it's meant to be played solo, COOP, or on dedicated servers for small groups.[-][/c]

[c][00ffff]Why is the loading time longer?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When initially loading the scenario, the game has to generate the fixed sectors and this can cause loading to take longer than normal.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is also more content and custom asset bundles to load.[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]Is there any customization I can make to the scenario for my server?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Yes. You can feel free to edit any of the scenario's configuration or playfield files as you see fit, but [-][/c][u][c][ff0000]doing this is at your own risk[-][/c][/u][c][abd1ff]. I cannot offer support for using customized configurations with the scenario and some things can break your save game.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is also a Project Eden Admin Control you can access from within the game under the Tutorial tab of the PDA to change certain global scenario settings.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]如果您在这里没有找到答案,请在工作坊留下评论![-][/c]

[c][ff8000]请参阅[-][/c][c][00ffff][u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1703779262]Reforged Eden 配置指南[/url][/u][-][/c][c][ff8000]上的Steam,以获取[-][/c][b][c][ff8000]有关在专用服务器上使用Reforged Eden 2或自定义它的重要信息[-][/c][/b][c][ff8000]![-][/c][c][ffff00][u]您必须按照指南中的说明操作,以确保服务器正常运行。[/u][-][/c]

[c][00ffff]Reforged Eden 2在COOP模式下工作吗?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]是的,它确实可以工作,但是COOP有几个漏洞。
强烈推荐COOP使用16GB的计算机内存,但通常最好运行一个真正的专用服务器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]我们不支持场景中的COOP。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]Reforged Eden 2可以在专用服务器上工作吗?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]是的,Reforged Eden 2可以在专用服务器上工作。
Reforged Eden 2使用完整的星系生成,所以请注意游戏世界的规模将是巨大的,因为它旨在单人、COOP或在专用服务器上为小团体游玩。[-][/c]

[c][00ffff]为什么加载时间更长?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当最初加载场景时,游戏需要生成固定星区,这可能导致加载时间比正常情况更长。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]还有更多的内容和自定义资产包需要加载。[-][/c]

[c][00ffff]我可以对场景进行自定义以适应我的服务器吗?[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以。您可以随意编辑任何场景的配置或游戏场地文件,但[-][/c][u][c][ff0000]这样做是您自己的风险[-][/c][/u][c][abd1ff]。我不能为使用自定义配置与场景提供支持,有些东西可能会破坏您的保存游戏。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]还有一个Project Eden Admin Control,您可以从游戏内的PDA的教程标签下访问,以更改某些全局场景设置。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff][-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]There are more trade commodities that are only used for trading and not used for any crafting.\nThose trade commodities are not listed in this section.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff][-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]还有一些贸易商品仅用于交易,不用于任何制作。\n这些贸易商品没有在这一部分列出。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Trading is the process of buying or selling from NPC traders.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Traders can often be found in many POIs, especially factories or dedicated trading stations.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To initiate a trade, simply speak with the trader.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can buy or sell many useful resources at a trader. Everything from raw ore, components, whole blocks, weapons, medical supplies, food, farming equipment, specialized components, and more.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To trade with a faction, you must have at least neutral reputation with that faction. [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Some traders require completion of a mission before they will trade with you.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Traders refresh their stock periodically, typically every 1 to 4 hours.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is recommended to put away your weapons before trading as shooting traders in the face is generally frowned upon.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]交易是从NPC商人那里购买或出售的过程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]商人通常可以在许多兴趣点(POI)找到,尤其是工厂或专门的交易站。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要开始交易,只需与商人交谈。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在商人那里买卖许多有用的资源。从原始矿石、组件、完整的方块、武器、医疗用品、食物、农用设备、专业组件等等。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要与一个派系交易,你必须至少与该派系有中立的声望。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]有些商人要求完成一个任务后才会与你交易。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]商人会定期更新他们的库存,通常每1到4小时一次。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建议在交易前收起你的武器,因为向商人的脸部射击通常被视为不受欢迎的行为。[-][/c]
使用物流系统进行交易

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To buy items too large to fit in your personal inventory, connect to a cargo container using the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] system [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(LogisticsMenu)})[-][/c], then purchase the item. The item will be deposited into your connected cargo container.

To sell items too large to fit in your personal inventory, connect to a cargo container using the Logistics system [c][ffff00]({keybind(LogisticsMenu)})[-][/c], make sure the [c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c] is active, and then place the items from your connected cargo container onto your connected toolbar. You will then be able to sell the items to the trader as long as the connected toolbar is currently active.
Swap to your connected toolbar by clicking the wireless symbol on your toolbar.
[i][sub][c][c8c8c8](Your toolbar will turn orange when the connected toolbar is active.)[-][/c][/sub][/i]{Eden_LogisticToolbar.png}
To complete trader missions, the required items will need to be in your personal inventory. Missions cannot use the Logistics system to turn in items.
You can install [c][00ff00]Transportation Boosters[-][/c] in your armor to increase the maximum volume of your personal inventory to complete missions.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要购买个人库存无法容纳的大件物品，需使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]系统[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(LogisticsMenu)})[-][/c]连接货物箱，然后购买物品。物品会被存入你连接的货物箱中。

要出售个人库存无法容纳的大件物品，先通过物流系统[c][ffff00]({keybind(LogisticsMenu)})[-][/c]连接货物箱，确保[c][00ff00]已连接工具栏[-][/c]处于激活状态，然后将物品从连接的货物箱放入已连接的工具栏中。只要已连接工具栏处于激活状态，你就可以将这些物品卖给商人。
点击工具栏上的无线符号切换到已连接的工具栏。
[i][sub][c][c8c8c8](当已连接工具栏激活时，你的工具栏会变为橙色。)[-][/c][/sub][/i]{Eden_LogisticToolbar.png}
要完成商人任务，所需物品必须在你的个人库存中。任务不支持通过物流系统提交物品。
你可以安装[c][00ff00]运输强化器[-][/c]在护甲中，以增加个人库存的最大容量，从而完成任务。

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]An example of a trader window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Select an item on the trader list, and then specify how many of that item you wish to buy or sell, and whether you want to pay using cash held in your personal inventory, or pay using your bank account.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Item:[-][/c] The item being bought or sold.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Stock:[-][/c] This is the trader's current and maximum stock for that item. You cannot sell more of an item to the trader than their max stock allows.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Sells:[-][/c] The price the trader sells the item for, if they sell it.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Buys:[-][/c] The price the trader buys the item for, if they buy it.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]交易窗口的一个示例。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在商人列表中选择一个物品,然后指定您希望购买或出售该物品的数量,以及您希望使用个人背包中的现金支付,还是使用银行账户支付。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c][c][00afff]物品:[-][/c] 正在购买或出售的物品。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]库存:[-][/c] 这是商人当前的和最大库存量。您不能向商人出售超过他们最大库存允许的物品数量。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]出售:[-][/c] 如果商人出售该物品,这是商人出售物品的价格。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]购买:[-][/c] 如果商人购买该物品,这是商人购买物品的价格。
现金、银行账户和自动取款机
现金、银行账户和自动取款机:

English:
{Eden_MoneyBar.png}[c][00afff]ATMs:[-][/c]
These devices are found on most trading stations or can be placed on your base.
They allow you to deposit or withdraw cash from your bank account.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Galactic Credits:[-][/c]
These are worth 1 credit each.
This is the only currency that can be used for cash trades.
They can be deposited or withdrawn using an ATM.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Galactic Platinum Credits:[-][/c]
These are worth 10,000 credits each.
They can be deposited into an ATM.
10,000 Galactic Credits can be converted into 1 Platinum Galactic Credit using a constructor.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Gold Coins:[-][/c]
These are worth 50 credits each.
They can be deposited into an ATM.
They can be crafted from Gold Ingots using a constructor.

[c][00afff]Bank Account:[-][/c]
Credits deposited into an ATM, items sold at a trader using bank balance, or some mission rewards, will be added directly to your bank account.
You can then use your bank account to purchase items from traders or withdraw cash using an ATM.
You can view your current bank balance on the player stats window, in the trader window, or in an ATM.
Chinese (simplified):
{Eden_MoneyBar.png}[c][00afff]自动取款机:[-][/c]
这些设备通常可以在大多数交易空间站找到,或者可以放置在您的基地上。
它们允许您从银行账户存入或提取现金。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]银河信用点:[-][/c]
每个价值1信用点。
这是唯一可以用于现金交易的货币。
它们可以通过自动取款机存入或提取。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]银河白金信用点:[-][/c]
每个价值10,000信用点。
它们可以存入自动取款机。
可以使用构造器将10,000银河信用点转换为1个银河白金信用点。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]金币:[-][/c]
每个价值50信用点。
它们可以存入自动取款机。
它们可以使用构造器从金锭制作。

[c][00afff]银行账户:[-][/c]
存入自动取款机的信用点,使用银行余额在商人处出售的物品,或某些任务奖励,将直接添加到您的银行账户中。
然后,您可以使用银行账户从商人处购买物品或通过自动取款机提取现金。
您可以在玩家状态窗口、交易窗口或自动取款机上查看您当前的银行余额。

English:
[c][abd1ff]Most traders simply buy and/or sell a range of different goods.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Some traders will also offer [-][/c][c][00ff00]trade missions[-][/c][c][abd1ff] if you speak with them which can pay much higher than normal market price.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]大多数商人只是买卖不同商品的范围。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
有些商人如果你和他们交谈,也会提供[-][/c][c][00ff00]贸易任务[-][/c][c][abd1ff],其支付的价格远高于正常市场价格。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Trading stations contain a wide variety of traders.
You can typically find useful items such as upgrade kits, optronics, auto miner cores, sprouts, medical supplies, food, and armor boosters being sold at trading stations.

Trading stations are admin core and always show on the map while within a playfield without needing a detector.
They can be found on planets, moons, and orbits, or in the dedicated trading station sectors located in the galactic faction territory of major factions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Trading stations only come equipped with a standard Station Teleporter with a maximum outgoing range of 25 light years.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Make sure when teleporting to a station that you will be able to get back.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]贸易空间站包含各种各样的商人。
你通常可以在贸易空间站找到升级套件、光学装置、自动矿机核心、嫩芽、医疗用品、食品和装甲增强器等有用的物品。

贸易空间站是管理员核心,总是在游戏场地内显示在地图上,而不需要探测器。
它们可以在行星、卫星和轨道上找到,或位于主要派系的银河领土内专用的贸易空间站星区。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]贸易空间站只配备了一个标准空间站传送装置,最大出发范围为25光年。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]确保在传送到空间站时你能够返回。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Factories typically buy and sell a limited range of hard to find specialized goods.
They will have better stock and pricing than most other traders.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Commodities[-][/c][c][abd1ff] section of [-][/c][c][00ff00]Resources and Components[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for which factories sell useful components.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
They will sometimes require a [c][00ff00]trade mission[-][/c] to unlock their trades. You can also bring them a [c][00ff00]work order[-][/c] purchased from a GIN console instead of completing their trade mission.

Factories can often be found near planetary trading stations, but can also be elsewhere on a planet or be found in orbits.
Generic factories can be found anywhere the owning faction can be found but factories for [c][00ff00]bulk trading[-][/c] are only found in space in the faction's galactic territory.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]工厂通常买卖有限范围的难以找到的专业化商品。
他们的库存和定价比大多数其他商人更好。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]查看[-][/c][c][00ff00]商品[-][/c][c][abd1ff]部分的[-][/c][c][00ff00]资源和组件[-][/c][c][abd1ff],了解哪些工厂出售有用的组件。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
他们有时会要求进行[c][00ff00]贸易任务[-][/c]来解锁他们的交易。你也可以给他们从GIN控制台购买的[c][00ff00]工作订单[-][/c],而不用完成他们的贸易任务。

工厂通常可以在行星贸易空间站附近找到,但也可能在行星上的其他地方或在轨道上找到。通用工厂可以在拥有派系的任何地方找到,但[c][00ff00]批量交易[-][/c]的工厂只在空间中派系的银河领土内找到。

English:
[c][abd1ff]Sometimes traders will have jobs for you to complete to bring them a certain quantity of an item.
These missions are not tracked in your PDA.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]They will reward much higher than average market price for the items they are looking for.
If the mission is required to unlock a [c][00ff00]factory[-][/c], the mission might also reward reputation with the owning faction.

You can use a [c][00ff00]work order[-][/c] to unlock a factory trader in lieu of completing their trade mission.

Trade missions require the items to be in your personal inventory. You can install [c][00ff00]Transportation Boosters[-][/c] in your armor to increase your carrying capacity.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]有时商人会让你完成一些任务，带给他们一定数量的某种物品。
这些任务不会在你的PDA中进行追踪。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]他们会为所需物品支付远高于市场平均价格的报酬。
如果任务是解锁[c][00ff00]工厂[-][/c]所必需的，完成任务还可能获得与该派系的声望奖励。

你可以使用[c][00ff00]工作订单[-][/c]来解锁工厂商人，替代完成其交易任务。

交易任务要求物品必须在你的个人背包内。你可以在装甲中安装[c][00ff00]运输强化器[-][/c]来提升你的携带容量。

English:
[c][abd1ff]Work orders can be used in lieu of completing a [-][/c][c][00ff00]factory[-][/c] [c][00ff00]trader mission[-][/c] to unlock the trader but you will lose out on any credit and reputation reward.

You can purchase work orders via a [c][00ff00]GIN console[-][/c].

Work orders must be in your personal inventory to turn in to a trader.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]工作订单可以用来代替完成一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]工厂[-][/c] [c][00ff00]商人任务[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来解锁商人,但你将失去任何信用和声望奖励。

你可以通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]GIN控制台[-][/c][c][abd1ff]购买工作订单。

工作订单必须在你的个人库存中才能交给商人。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Trading frequencies can be used to help you locate planetary factories by alerting you if the factory is present on a planet or moon when you visit one.[-][/c]

They can be purchased from [c][00ff00]Distribution Centers[-][/c] located in trading station sectors within a faction's galactic territory once you are friendly with the Trade Federation.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]交易频率可以用来帮助你定位行星工厂,当你访问一个星球或月亮时,如果工厂存在于该星球或月亮上,它们会提醒你。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一旦你与贸易联邦友好,它们可以从[-][/c][c][00ff00]派系银河领土内[-][/c]的[c][00ff00]分销中心[-][/c][c][abd1ff]购买。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Distribution centers are found in the trading station sectors within a faction's galactic territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
They contain traders and services related to [-][/c][c][00ff00]bulk trading[-][/c], [c][00ff00]mining contracts[-][/c], and missions.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]分发中心位于一个派系的银河领土内的贸易站星区内。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
它们包含了与[-][/c][c][00ff00]批量交易[-][/c]、[c][00ff00]采矿合同[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和任务相关的商人和服务。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Bulk Trading involves moving large volume shipments from one galactic region to another.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can buy and sell bulk shipments from [-][/c][c][00ff00]distribution centers[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or certain orbital factories within a faction's galactic territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A dedicated freighter is recommended.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Also known as being a space trucker.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]批量交易涉及从一个银河地区向另一个银河地区转移大量货物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以从[-][/c][c][00ff00]分发中心[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或一个派系银河领土内的某些轨道工厂购买和销售批量货物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]推荐使用专门的货船。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这也被称为成为太空卡车司机。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The GIN, or [-][/c][c][ffff00]G[-][/c][c][abd1ff]alactic [-][/c][c][ffff00]I[-][/c][c][abd1ff]nformation [-][/c][c][ffff00]N[-][/c][c][abd1ff]etwork, allows access to several features.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It allows you to turn in lost cargo for credits, reputation, and unlock points.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can also use the GIN console to purchase [-][/c][c][00ff00]work orders[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to unlock [-][/c][c][00ff00]factory[-][/c][c][abd1ff] traders in lieu of completing their [-][/c][c][00ff00]trader mission[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can find GIN consoles on most trading stations and factories.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]GIN,或[-][/c][c][ffff00]G[-][/c][c][abd1ff]alactic [-][/c][c][ffff00]I[-][/c][c][abd1ff]nformation [-][/c][c][ffff00]N[-][/c][c][abd1ff]etwork,允许访问多个功能。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它允许你交还丢失的货物以换取信用点、声望和解锁点。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你还可以使用GIN控制台购买[-][/c][c][00ff00]工作订单[-][/c][c][abd1ff]以解锁[-][/c][c][00ff00]工厂[-][/c][c][abd1ff]交易者,而不是完成他们的[-][/c][c][00ff00]交易者任务[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以在大多数贸易站和工厂找到GIN控制台。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
In multiplayer games you can use a trading station console on board most trading stations to buy or sell items with other players on a global marketplace.

In single player these consoles do nothing as NPCs do not buy or sell on the multiplayer marketplace.

Another way to trade with players is to place items in a code locked cargo container and directly message them the code so they can pick up the items and leave payment. This of course only works if you trust the other player.

Any third party multiplayer trading mods are not supported by the scenario and you would need to contact the mod author or your server admin for assistance.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
在多人游戏中,你可以使用大多数交易空间站上的交易站控制台,在全局市场上与其他玩家购买或出售物品。

在单人游戏中,这些控制台没有作用,因为NPC不会在多人市场上买卖。

与玩家交易的另一种方式是将物品放入带密码的货物集装箱,并直接发送密码给他们,这样他们就可以取走物品并留下报酬。当然,这只在你信任对方玩家的情况下才有效。

任何第三方多人交易模组都不受场景支持,你需要联系模组作者或你的服务器管理员寻求帮助。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Armor helps protect you from incoming damage and environmental dangers.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each armor has different stats and uses and it's important to use the right armor for the job.[-][/c]

The higher your armor value, the less damage you take from attacks.
Armor does not offer any protection against status effects.
Your armor's protection against damage is reduced based on its remaining durability. Armor at half durability has only half the damage protection.
Keep your armor repaired.

Armor allows use of the suit light and allows breathing using your suit's oxygen supply when in a non-oxygenated environment while your helmet is down.

Armor must be equipped using an armor locker.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]护甲有助于保护你免受即将到来的伤害和环境危险。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每种护甲都有不同的属性和用途,使用适合工作的护甲非常重要。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你的护甲值越高,从攻击中受到的伤害就越少。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]护甲不提供任何防护状态效果。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的护甲对伤害的保护会根据其剩余耐久度减少。耐久度为一半的护甲只有一半的伤害保护。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]保持你的护甲维修。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]护甲允许使用服装灯,并在头盔放下时,在非氧化环境中使用你服装的氧气供应进行呼吸。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]护甲必须使用护甲柜装备。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Armor boosters can be freely added or removed from [-][/c][c][00ff00]armor[-][/c] using an [c][00ff00]Armor Locker[-][/c].

Each booster improves one or more of your stats as long as you are wearing armor that has the booster equipped.

Boosters come in basic and advanced tiers. Basic boosters can typically be bought from [c][00ff00]traders[-][/c].

Check the tooltips of each armor booster to see what stats they improve.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]装甲强化器可以通过[c][00ff00]装甲储物柜[-][/c]自由添加或移除至[-][/c][c][00ff00]装甲[-][/c]上。

只要你穿戴装备了强化器的装甲，每个强化器都会提升一项或多项属性。

强化器分为基础和高级两个等级。基础强化器通常可以从[c][00ff00]商人[-][/c]处购买。

查看每个装甲强化器的工具提示以了解它们提升的属性。

English:
[c][abd1ff]The Armor Locker is used to take on and off [-][/c][c][00ff00]armor[-][/c] and [c][00ff00]armor boosters[-][/c].

You can see your full player stats in the armor locker window.

It has a small inventory for storing extra armor and boosters.

It can be added to any ship or base or found in most trading stations.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]装甲储物柜用于穿戴和脱下[-][/c][c][00ff00]装甲[-][/c]和[c][00ff00]装甲增强器[-][/c]。

[c][abd1ff]你可以在装甲储物柜窗口中查看你的完整玩家属性。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它有一个小的存储空间,用于存放额外的装甲和增强器。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它可以添加到任何飞船或基地,或在大多数交易站找到。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]There are 3 types of armor as well as 3 tiers of each type. There are also specialty armors available from traders.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Light Armor:[-][/c]
This is the armor with the highest mobility and oxygen storage, but offers the least protection against incoming damage.
Basic light armor can be equipped without requiring an armor locker.

[c][00afff]Medium Armor:[-][/c]
This armor provides a balance between mobility and protection.

[c][00afff]Heavy Armor:[-][/c]
This armor has the lowest mobility but offers the most protection against incoming damage.


[c][00afff]Basic:[-][/c]
2 booster slots.

[c][00afff]Improved:[-][/c]
3 booster slots.

[c][00afff]Advanced:[-][/c]
4 booster slots.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]有3种类型的装甲,每种类型都有3个等级。此外,还有商人提供的特种装甲。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]轻型装甲:[-][/c]
这是具有最高机动性和氧气存储量的装甲,但提供对抗伤害的保护最少。
基本轻型装甲可以在不需要装甲储物柜的情况下装备。

[c][00afff]中型装甲:[-][/c]
这种装甲在机动性和保护之间提供了平衡。

[c][00afff]重型装甲:[-][/c]
这种装甲的机动性最低,但提供了最多的对抗伤害的保护。

[c][00afff]基本:[-][/c]
2个增强器插槽。

[c][00afff]改进型:[-][/c]
3个增强器插槽。

[c][00afff]高级:[-][/c]
4个增强器插槽。

English:
[c][abd1ff]Your total armor value is determined by your current armor and armor boosters.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is a hidden reduction based on how damaged your armor's durability is (armor at half durability offers half the damage protection, armor at 0 durability offers no damage protection).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The damage reduction provided by your armor is as follows:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i](Calculated based on testing and may not be 100% accurate)[/i][-][/c]
[c][00afff]0 Armor:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] +100% increased damage taken.[-][/c]
[c][00afff]100 Armor:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 0% damage reduction.[-][/c]
[c][00afff]200 Armor:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 33% damage reduction[-][/c]
[c][00afff]300 Armor:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 50% damage reduction.[-][/c]
[c][00afff]400 Armor:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 60% damage reduction.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]500 Armor:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 66% damage reduction.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]600 Armor:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 71% damage reduction.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您的总护甲值由您当前的护甲和护甲增强器决定。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]根据您护甲的耐久度,有一个隐藏的伤害减免(耐久度为一半时,护甲提供的伤害保护减半;耐久度为0时,不提供任何伤害保护)。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您的护甲提供以下伤害减免:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i](根据测试计算,可能不是100%准确)[/i][-][/c]
[c][00afff]0护甲:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] +100%增加受到的伤害。[-][/c]
[c][00afff]100护甲:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 0%伤害减免。[-][/c]
[c][00afff]200护甲:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 33%伤害减免[-][/c]
[c][00afff]300护甲:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 50%伤害减免。[-][/c]
[c][00afff]400护甲:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 60%伤害减免。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]500护甲:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 66%伤害减免。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]600护甲:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 71%伤害减免。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Incoming damage to the player is scaled based on the Enemy Difficulty setting of your game.[-][/c]
This damage scaling is multiplicative with [c][00ff00]NPC level[-][/c].
This only affects damage dealt to the player character or NPCs and does not affect ships or bases.

[c][00ff00]Easy:[-][/c]
Enemies deal 50% damage and take 200% damage.

[c][ffff00]Normal:[-][/c]
Enemies deal 100% damage and take 100% damage.

[c][ff0000]Hard:[-][/c]
Enemies deal 200% damage and take 50% damage.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]玩家受到的伤害根据游戏的敌对难度设置进行调整。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这种伤害调整与[-][/c][c][00ff00]NPC等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]相乘。
这仅影响对玩家角色或NPC造成的伤害,不影响飞船或基地。[-][/c]

[c][00ff00]简单:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]敌人造成50%的伤害,受到200%的伤害。[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]普通:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]敌人造成100%的伤害,受到100%的伤害。[-][/c]

[c][ff0000]困难:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]敌人造成200%的伤害,受到50%的伤害。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Each hand weapon has different stats and is best used in a different situation. There is no single best weapon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Success in foot combat depends as much on being prepared with the right weapon and [-][/c][c][00ff00]weapon mods[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for the situation as it does on your aim and tactics.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Trying to rush a sniper at the end of a hallway with a shotgun is going to turn you into nothing more than a target dummy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Likewise using a sniper rifle against a horde of enemies in close range is going to turn you into zombie food real fast.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hand weapons are effective at breaking through doors and destroying sentry turrets and ground troops.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hand weapons are ineffective at destroying main turrets, armor, or shields of patrol vessels or POIs. You will want to use ship mounted weapons for those purposes.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]It's best to come prepared with a variety of weapons to quickly adapt to changing situations and to suit your personal play style rather than trying to one trick a single weapon because you think it's the most powerful.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]每种手持武器都有不同的属性,并且最适合在不同情况下使用。没有一种武器是绝对的最好武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]近战成功的关键在于准备适当的武器和[-][/c][c][00ff00]武器改装[-][/c][c][abd1ff]以适应情况,以及你的瞄准和战术。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]试图用霰弹枪冲向走廊尽头的狙击手,只会让你变成一个靶子。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]同样,用狙击步枪对抗近距离的敌人群,会很快让你变成僵尸的食物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]手持武器在破门和摧毁哨兵炮塔及地面部队方面非常有效。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]手持武器在摧毁巡逻舰或POI的主要炮塔、装甲或护盾方面是无效的。你将需要使用舰载武器来达到这些目的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]最好准备各种武器,以便快速适应变化的情况并适合你的个人游戏风格,而不是试图只依赖一种你认为最强大的武器。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Weapons can be one of two types.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This stat is not displayed on the tooltip.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Ranged:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This weapon is hit scan (shots hit instantly). Examples include assault rifles and shotguns.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Tracers for these weapon types are purely visual as the weapon hits the moment the weapon is fired.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These weapons can not deal explosion damage.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can have lower accuracy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Projectile:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This weapon fires a projectile with a travel time. The projectile will hit the first thing it impacts. Examples include  rocket launchers and plasma cannons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These weapons are capable of dealing explosion damage.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They have pinpoint accuracy and can fire homing projectiles.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Projectiles cannot be shot down.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]武器可以是两种类型之一。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这个属性在工具提示中不显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]远程:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这类武器是瞬击型(射击瞬间命中)。例如突击步枪和霰弹枪。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些武器类型的轨迹完全是视觉性的,因为武器在发射的瞬间就命中目标。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些武器不能造成爆炸伤害。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可能具有较低的准确性。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]投射物:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这类武器发射一个有飞行时间的投射物。投射物将击中它首先碰到的任何东西。例如火箭发射器和等离子炮。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些武器能够造成爆炸伤害。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们具有极其精确的准确性,并且可以发射追踪投射物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]投射物不能被击落。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Damage:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The base damage the weapon deals per shot on a direct impact.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A higher number is better.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff]Explosion Damage:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The area of effect damage the weapon deals on impact. Due to how area effect damage is calculated, explosion damage can be inconsistent against some targets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A higher number is better.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff]Bullets Per Shot:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is a hidden stat used for shotgun-style weapons that determines how many pellets are fired per shot. For most shotguns this is 8. Each pellet inflicts full damage and targets can be hit by multiple pellets from a single shot.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For example a shotgun with 100 damage is fired at a target at point blank range, if all 8 pellets hit the target they will take 800 damage.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]伤害:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每次直接命中时武器造成的基础伤害。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]数值越高越好。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff]爆炸伤害:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]武器在命中时产生的范围伤害。由于范围伤害的计算方式,爆炸伤害对某些目标可能不一致。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]数值越高越好。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff]每发子弹数:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是一个隐藏属性,用于散弹枪风格的武器,决定了每次射击发射的弹丸数量。对于大多数散弹枪来说,这个数值是8。每个弹丸造成全部伤害,目标可能在一次射击中被多个弹丸击中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]例如,一把伤害为100的散弹枪在极近距离射击目标,如果8个弹丸全部命中,目标将受到800点伤害。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Weapon Spread:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Affects how spread out the shots are from where the crosshair is aiming.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A lower number is better.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Recoil:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Affects how much your aim is kicked upwards with every shot.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A lower number is better.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]武器散布:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]影响子弹射击的散布范围,即子弹射击点与瞄准点之间的分布。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]数值越低越好。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]后坐力:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]影响每次射击后瞄准点向上弹跳的程度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]数值越低越好。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Homing:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Projectiles fired from weapons with this property will continue to track the target that was under your crosshairs when you first fired the weapon.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Homing Speed:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is a hidden stat that affects how well a homing projectile tracks a target.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A higher number is better.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]追踪:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]从具备此属性的武器发射的弹药会继续追踪你首次射击时瞄准镜下的敌人。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]追踪速度:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是一个隐藏属性,影响追踪弹药追踪目标的效果。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]数值越高越好。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Current Range:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The current range of your weapon after accounting for atmospheric density.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Atmospheric density reduces the range of most weapons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Max Range:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The maximum range of your weapon in this playfield type if there was no atmospheric density.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Weapons can have a different max range in space versus planets, in addition to a reduced range from atmospheric density.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]当前射程:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]考虑大气密度后,你的武器的当前射程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大气密度会减少大多数武器的射程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]最大射程:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果不存在大气密度,在这个游戏场地类型中你的武器的最大射程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]武器在太空与行星上可能有不同的最大射程,此外还会因大气密度而减少射程。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Rate of Fire:[-][/c]
