[c][abd1ff]The rate of fire of the weapon in rounds per minute. For example a rate of fire of 60 means it fires 1 shot every second.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Does not account for magazine size or reload delay.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some weapons are semi-automatic and only fire 1 shot per click, while others are automatic and will continue to fire as long as the mouse button is held and there is ammo in the magazine.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A higher number is better.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]射速:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]武器每分钟的发射速率。例如,射速为60意味着它每秒发射1次。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不考虑弹夹大小或装填延迟。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些武器是半自动的,每次点击只能发射1发,而其他武器是全自动的,只要鼠标按钮被按住并且弹夹中有弹药,就会继续发射。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]数字越大越好。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Magazine Size:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The number of shots the weapon can hold.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Reloading will refill the weapon's ammo up to the magazine size.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The ammo must be in your player inventory to reload the weapon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For some weapons, a single charge will refill the entire magazine. Check the tooltip of the weapon or ammo.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A higher number is better.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Reload Time:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]How long it takes to reload a weapon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can cancel a weapon reload by swapping to a different weapon. The reload animation will continue to play but you will be able to fire the new weapon faster than it takes to reload the old weapon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most weapons automatically reload when they run out of ammo.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A lower number is better.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]弹夹容量:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]武器能装填的弹药数量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]装填会将武器的弹药重新填满到弹夹容量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]弹药必须在你的玩家背包中才能装填武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]对于一些武器,一个电池可以重新填满整个弹夹。检查武器或弹药的提示信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]数字越大越好。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]装填时间:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]装填武器所需的时间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以通过换成不同的武器来取消武器装填。装填动画将继续播放,但你将能够更快地使用新武器发射,而不是等待旧武器装填完成。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数武器在弹药耗尽时会自动装填。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]数字越小越好。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Headshot Multiplier:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The damage multiplier applied for scoring a headshot on an enemy NPC.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can affect any NPC that has a headshot location.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A higher number is better.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]爆头伤害倍数:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]对敌对NPC进行爆头时应用的伤害倍数。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以影响任何有爆头位置的NPC。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]数字越大越好。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Durability:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The current and maximum durability of a weapon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Firing the weapon reduces its current durability.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each shot has a chance to lower the durability of the weapon by 1.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Faster firing weapons typically have a lower chance of durability loss per shot than slower firing weapons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When a weapon runs completely out of durability it can no longer be used until it's repaired.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Broken weapons can still be sold to traders, deconstructed, or placed into the factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Repairs Left:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Weapons can be repaired a limited number of times in a Repair Station.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Repair stations can be added to any ship or base or found at most trading stations.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Alien and advanced weapons may require repair at a weapons mod trader available in most trading stations.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]耐久度:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]武器的当前和最大耐久度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]开火会降低其当前耐久度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每次射击都有一定几率使武器的耐久度降低1。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通常,射击速度更快的武器每发射击造成耐久度损失的几率比射击速度较慢的武器低。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当武器的耐久度完全耗尽时,它将无法再次使用,直到被修理。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]损坏的武器仍然可以卖给商人,拆解,或放入工厂。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]剩余修理次数:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]武器可以在修理站有限次数地修理。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]修理站可以添加到任何飞船或基地,或在大多数贸易站找到。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]外星和高级武器可能需要在大多数贸易站可用的武器改装商人处进行修理。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Weapon modifications can be added to most weapon types to change its stats such as damage and recoil.
Applying a weapon mod requires a Weapon Locker, available on capital vessels or bases or found in most trading stations.

When adding a modification to a weapon, the modification will apply to all weapons of that type that you use and not just the physical weapon you were carrying when applying it and will remain until replaced with a different one for the same weapon type.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In other words: If you apply a mod to an assault rifle, that mod will affect any assault rifle you use.

Weapon modifications cannot be removed, but can be replaced with a new one.

There are 3 tiers of weapon mods, with the higher tiers having fewer or no penalties.

Weapon mods can be found as loot or bought and sold at weapon mod traders found in most [-][/c][c][00ff00]trading stations[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
武器改装可以添加到大多数武器类型上,以改变其属性,如伤害和后坐力。
应用武器改装需要武器箱,可在主力舰或基地上找到,或在大多数贸易站发现。

当向武器添加改装时,该改装将适用于您使用的所有该类型的武器,而不仅仅是您在应用时携带的物理武器,并且将持续存在,直到被同一武器类型的不同改装替换。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]换句话说:如果您对突击步枪应用了一个改装,那么这个改装将影响您使用的所有突击步枪。

武器改装不能移除,但可以用新的改装替换。

有3个等级的武器改装,高等级的改装具有更少或没有的惩罚。

武器改装可以作为战利品找到,或在大多数[-][/c][c][00ff00]贸易站[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的武器改装商处买卖。[-][/c]

English: \n[c][abd1ff]Certain weapons can deal bonus or reduced damage to certain target types.[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]This stat is usually hidden.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]某些武器对某些目标类型可以造成额外或减少的伤害。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]这个属性通常是隐藏的。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Shields protect your entire ship or base from most sources of damage while active.[-][/c]
A shield requires an online [c][00ff00]Shield Generator[-][/c], a Pentaxid Tank with Refined Pentaxid, and a positive shield recharge rate.

Once a shield generator is turned on, it will begin to activate. After a delay, the shield will activate and begin using Refined Pentaxid to charge the shield if it's below maximum shield.

Shield generators will not fully charge if there is not enough Refined Pentaxid in the Pentaxid Tank or if your shield recharge rate is not above 0.

Docked ships have their shield generators automatically disabled and will not be protected by the mothership's shields, however in most cases docked ships are invulnerable to damage while they are docked regardless.
You cannot add blocks to a structure that has an active shield.

Hint: The shield hotkey is [c][ffff00]({keybind(Shield)})[-][/c]. Be careful to not accidentally press this in the middle of battle. Consider changing this in the key binding options to something that's harder to hit accidentally.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]护盾在激活时可以保护你的整个飞船或基地不受大多数伤害来源的影响。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一个护盾需要一个在线的[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾发生器[-][/c][c][abd1ff],一个装有精炼翘曲水晶的翘曲水晶罐,以及一个正的护盾充电率。

一旦护盾发生器被打开,它将开始激活。经过一段延迟后,护盾将激活,并开始使用精炼翘曲水晶充电,如果它的护盾低于最大值。

如果翘曲水晶罐中的精炼翘曲水晶不够,或者你的护盾充电率不低于0,护盾发生器将不会完全充电。

停靠的飞船的护盾发生器会自动禁用,不会被母舰的护盾所保护,然而在大多数情况下,当它们停靠时,飞船对伤害是无敌的。
你不能向激活护盾的结构添加方块。

提示:护盾快捷键是[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Shield)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。注意不要在战斗中不小心按下这个键。考虑在键位绑定选项中更改这个键,使其更不容易意外触发。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The Shield Generator is a device that can be placed on a ship or base. It can be crafted in a constructor.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Required for a structure to have a shield.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A structure can have only 1 shield generator in total.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Shield generators come in multiple tiers with increases in stats for each tier.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Shields automatically recharge if they have not taken damage recently as long as you have Refined Pentaxid in a Pentaxid Tank.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Much more power is used while actively recharging the shield than is used to maintain the shield once fully charged.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Planetary POIs can have an externally mounted shield generator that is much more resistant to damage from CVs.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]CV shields can take much more damage from planetary POIs.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]护盾发生器是一个可以放置在飞船或基地上的设备。它可以在建造机中制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]结构拥有护盾所需的设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一个结构总共只能有一个护盾发生器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]护盾发生器有多个等级,每个等级的属性都会增加。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只要翘曲水晶罐中有精炼翘曲水晶,护盾就会在没有最近受到损害的情况下自动充电。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在积极充电时使用的电力比维持完全充电后使用的电力多得多。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]行星兴趣点可以有一个外部安装的护盾发生器,它对来自主力舰的损害更加抵抗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]主力舰护盾可以承受来自行星兴趣点的更多损害。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The recharge rate of your shield is based on the combined recharge rate from your [-][/c][c][00ff00]Shield Generator[-][/c] and Shield Chargers, minus the penalty from any [c][00ff00]Shield Capacitors[-][/c] or other devices[c][00ff00].[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]Shield Chargers increase your shield recharge rate while lowering your shield capacity.

The shield recharge rate shown on the Shield Generator tooltip is the base recharge rate and does not factor in bonuses and penalties from chargers or capacitors. You will need to add up the amount yourself to determine your recharge rate.

If your shield recharge rate is 0 or less it will not charge.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您的护盾再充电速率基于您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾生成器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和护盾电池的联合再充电速率,减去任何[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾电容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或其他设备的惩罚[-][/c][c][00ff00].[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c][c][abd1ff]护盾电池可以增加您的护盾再充电速率,同时降低您的护盾容量。

护盾生成器工具提示上显示的护盾再充电速率是基础再充电速率,并未考虑电池或电容器的加成和惩罚。您需要自己累加这些数值来确定您的再充电速率。

如果您的护盾再充电速率为0或更低,它将不会充电。[-][/c]
护盾容量和护盾电容器
护盾容量和护盾电容器:

English:
[c][abd1ff]The maximum capacity of your shield is based on the combined shield capacity from your [-][/c][c][00ff00]Shield Generator[-][/c] and Shield Capacitors, minus the penalty from any [c][00ff00]Shield Chargers[-][/c] or other devices[c][00ff00].[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]Shield Capacitors increase your shield capacity while lowering your shield recharge rate.

The shield capacity shown on the Shield Generator tooltip is the base shield capacity and does not factor in bonuses and penalties from chargers or capacitors. You can see your total shield capacity in the control panel.

If your shield recharge rate is 0 or less it will not charge.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您的护盾最大容量基于您的[c][00ff00]护盾生成器[-][/c]和护盾电容器的联合护盾容量,减去任何[c][00ff00]护盾电池[-][/c]或其他设备的惩罚[c][00ff00].[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]护盾电容器可以增加您的护盾容量,同时降低您的护盾再充电速率。

护盾生成器工具提示上显示的护盾容量是基础护盾容量,并未考虑电池或电容器的加成和惩罚。您可以在控制面板中查看您的总护盾容量。

如果您的护盾再充电速率为0或更低,它将不会充电。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some weapon types can partially penetrate shields, dealing a percentage of their damage to blocks that they hit even with an active shield.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This can include missiles, flak, railguns, and Legacy positron beams.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is important to use a well armored ship when fighting enemies that may be armed with shield penetrating weapons to avoid catastrophic damage.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]某些类型的武器可以部分穿透护盾,即使护盾处于激活状态,它们也能对命中的方块造成一定比例的伤害。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这可能包括导弹、高射炮、轨道炮和遗留者正电子束。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当面对可能装备有护盾穿透武器的敌人时,使用装甲良好的飞船非常重要,以避免灾难性的损害。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Prey:[-][/c]
Prey animals are typically docile unless attacked. Some may fight back if provoked but most will flee.
Almost exclusively melee.
Can be taken out with basic equipment.
Typically found on the surface of planets and moons.

[c][00afff]Predator:[-][/c]
Hostile creatures that will attack on sight.
Mostly melee with some ranged enemies.
Can be taken out with early equipment.
Can be found on planets and moons and in some POIs.

[c][00afff]Infected:[-][/c]
Dangerous enemies that can be found on some dangerous planets or moons and in Legacy infected abandoned structures.
Can easily overwhelm with sheer numbers.
Should only be engaged by those who are well prepared.
Mostly melee, but can have deadly ranged infected soldiers.

[c][00afff]Soldiers:[-][/c]
These troops are armed with various weapons such as assault rifles, shotguns, rocket launchers, and sniper rifles.
They should only be engaged by those who are well prepared.

[c][00afff]Mechanical:[-][/c]
These mechanical troops are armed with a variety of built in weaponry and can be quite tough.
They should only be engaged by those who are well prepared.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]猎物:[-][/c]
猎物动物通常很温顺,除非遭到攻击。一些可能会反击,但大多数会逃跑。
几乎都是近战。
可以用基础装备消灭。
通常在行星和卫星表面发现。

[c][00afff]捕食者:[-][/c]
一看到就会攻击的敌对生物。
大多数是近战,有些是远程敌人。
可以用早期装备消灭。
可以在行星和卫星以及一些POI中找到。

[c][00afff]感染体:[-][/c]
在一些危险的行星或卫星以及遗留者感染的废弃建筑物中可以找到的危险敌人。
容易因数量众多而压倒性。
只有准备充分的人才可以与之交战。
大多数是近战,但可能有致命的远程感染士兵。

[c][00afff]士兵:[-][/c]
这些部队装备有各种武器,如突击步枪、霰弹枪、火箭发射器和狙击步枪。
只有准备充分的人才可以与之交战。

[c][00afff]机械:[-][/c]
这些机械部队装备有各种内置武器,可能相当难以对付。
只有准备充分的人才可以与之交战。

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Planetary drones patrol planets and moons and guard resource deposits and faction POIs.

They are typically slow and have trouble aiming upwards.
You can stay above them in a ship where they cannot easily hit you.

They can be destroyed with heavy hand weapons such as rocket launchers or sniper rifles but ship weapons are recommended.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Gatling turrets make excellent defense again drones.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will show up on a detector.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If defeated, they may be replaced, up to a maximum number of reinforcements. They can also spawn as part of [-][/c][c][00ff00]base attacks[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]行星无人机巡逻行星和卫星,守护资源矿藏和派系POI。

它们通常移动缓慢,并且瞄准上方有困难。
你可以在飞船中保持在它们上方,这样它们不容易击中你。

可以用重型手持武器如火箭发射器或狙击步枪摧毁它们,但推荐使用飞船武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]加特林炮塔是防御无人机的极佳选择。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们会在探测器上显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果被击败,它们可能会被替换,最多替换到一定数量的援军。它们也可以作为[-][/c][c][00ff00]基地攻击[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的一部分出现。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Space drones are the big brother of [-][/c][c][00ff00]planetary drones[-][/c].
They patrol resource asteroids and faction POIs in orbits and other space sectors.

They have a maximum speed of 100m/s and will attempt to make hit and run attacks on any target they find.

It is recommended to engage space drones by flying at them to get in close range as they will turn away to try to gain distance.
Fleeing from a space drone is not recommended unless you have no other choice as it gives it a clear shot at you and they can keep up with you.
Gatling turrets make excellent defense again drones.

Space drones do not show on the detector until they are within render range, unless they are [c][00ff00]alerted[-][/c] to your presence.
Use Alarm Sentries to warn of incoming space drones.

If defeated, they will not respawn, but new ones may appear as part of missions or [c][00ff00]Space Defense Reinforcements[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]太空无人机是[c][00ff00]行星无人机[-][/c]的“大哥”。[-][/c]
它们在资源小行星、派系POI的轨道以及其他太空星区巡逻。

它们的最大速度为100米/秒，会尝试对发现的任何目标进行打了就跑的攻击。

建议接近太空无人机与其交战，因为它们会转向尝试拉开距离。
除非别无选择，否则不推荐逃离太空无人机，因为这会让它们轻易对你进行射击，而且它们能追上你。
加特林炮塔对付无人机是极佳的防御手段。

太空无人机在未进入渲染范围前不会显示在探测器上，除非它们已被你[c][00ff00]警觉[-][/c]。
使用警报哨兵来预警即将到来的太空无人机。

如果被击败，它们不会复活，但新的无人机可能会作为任务或[c][00ff00]太空防御增援[-][/c]出现。

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Planetary patrol vessels patrol faction POIs on some planets or moons.

On most planets a single Zirax patrol vessel will guard the Drone Base, remaining close to it.
Some planets have additional patrol vessels that will patrol the entire planet.

Planetary patrol vessels always show their location on the local map.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Destroying the rear thrusters will cause them to come to a complete stop.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroying all its generators or cores will disable them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Patrol vessels can have multiple cores.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If disabled, they will despawn after 30 minutes and will not respawn.

Patrol vessels should only be engaged with a capable combat ship.[-][/c][c][abd1ff]
The [-][/c][c][00ff00]level[-][/c][c][abd1ff] of a patrol vessel only affects the health and damage of the NPCs inside and has no other bearing on the overall difficulty or loot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Note that while you can place your own core on a patrol vessel, you cannot fly it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]行星巡逻飞船在某些星球或卫星上的派系兴趣点进行巡逻。

在大多数星球上,一个兹瑞克斯巡逻飞船会守卫无人机基地,并保持靠近它。
有些星球还有额外的巡逻飞船,它们会绕整个星球巡逻。

行星巡逻飞船总是在当地地图上显示它们的位置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]摧毁它们的后部推进器将使它们完全停止。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]摧毁它们所有的发电机或核心将使它们失效。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]巡逻飞船可能有多个核心。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果被禁用,它们将在30分钟后消失,并且不会重新出现。

巡逻飞船应该只与一艘有能力的战斗飞船交战。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]巡逻飞船的[-][/c][c][00ff00]等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]只影响里面的NPC的生命值和伤害,并没有其他影响整体难度或战利品。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请注意,虽然你可以在巡逻飞船上放置自己的核心,但你不能驾驶它。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Orbital patrol vessels patrol faction POIs in orbits and other space sectors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will show up on a detector or if they are [-][/c][c][00ff00]alerted[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to your presence.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroying the rear thrusters will cause them to come to a complete stop. [-][/c][c][c8c8c8][i](Due to a known game bug, attacking a moving patrol vessel from the rear inflicts less damage)[/i][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you destroy all the thrusters in other directions, it may have trouble coming to a complete stop.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroying all its generators or cores will disable them but this strategy may not always be the best.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Patrol vessels can have multiple cores. They are usually accessible from the interior.

If destroyed, they will not respawn, but new ones may appear as part of missions or [-][/c][c][00ff00]Space Defense Reinforcements[-][/c].
[c][abd1ff]If a patrol vessel loses its original core and then becomes unloaded for any reason (quitting the game, moving out of render range, leaving the playfield), it will despawn.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Patrol vessels can have powerful anti-collision systems that deal heavy damage to ships that attempt to block a patrol vessel's path of movement by getting in their way. It is best to avoid collisions with patrol vessels.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Their difficulty can vary greatly and some can be extremely dangerous.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The [-][/c][c][00ff00]level[-][/c][c][abd1ff] of a patrol vessel only affects the health and damage of the NPCs inside and has no other bearing on the overall difficulty or loot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Patrol vessels should only be engaged with a very capable combat ship, or best avoided by the unprepared.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Note that while you can place your own core on a patrol vessel, you cannot fly it.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]轨道巡逻飞船在轨道和其它太空星区巡逻派系兴趣点。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们会在探测器上显示,或者如果它们被[-][/c][c][00ff00]警觉[-][/c][c][abd1ff]到你的存在。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]摧毁它们的后部推进器将使它们完全停止。[-][/c][c][c8c8c8][i](由于一个已知的游戏错误,从后方攻击移动的巡逻飞船会造成较少的伤害)[/i][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你摧毁了其他方向的所有推进器,它可能难以完全停止。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]摧毁它们所有的发电机或核心将使它们失效,但这个策略可能并不总是最好的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]巡逻飞船可能有多个核心。它们通常可以从内部进入。

如果被摧毁,它们不会重新出现,但新的可能会作为任务的一部分或[-][/c][c][00ff00]太空防御增援[-][/c]出现。
[c][abd1ff]如果一个巡逻飞船失去了它的原始核心,然后由于任何原因(退出游戏,移动到渲染范围之外,离开游戏场地)变得未加载,它将消失。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]巡逻飞船可能有强大的防撞系统,对试图通过阻挡巡逻飞船的移动路径而进入它们路径的船只造成重大伤害。最好避免与巡逻飞船发生碰撞。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们的难度可以有很大的变化,有些可能极其危险。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]巡逻飞船的[-][/c][c][00ff00]等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]只影响里面的NPC的生命值和伤害,并没有其他影响整体难度或战利品。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]巡逻飞船应该只与非常有能力战斗飞船交战,或者最好被没有准备的人避开。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请注意,虽然你可以在巡逻飞船上放置自己的核心,但你不能驾驶它。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Freighters are vessels that carry resources from one place to another and can be a source of bulk materials or trade goods.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be found in orbits or other space sectors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will show up on a detector.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are armed, but will not pursue targets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroying the rear thrusters will cause them to come to a complete stop. [-][/c][c][c8c8c8][i](Due to a known game bug, attacking a moving patrol vessel from the rear inflicts less damage)[/i][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you destroy all the thrusters in other directions, it may have trouble coming to a complete stop.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i][/i][-][/c][c][abd1ff]Destroying all its generators or cores will disable them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Freighters can have multiple cores.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If a freighter loses its original core and then becomes unloaded for any reason (quitting the game, moving out of render range, leaving the playfield), it will despawn.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Freighters can be [-][/c][c][00ff00]ransomed[-][/c][c][abd1ff] if you are neutral with the Pirate Clans.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Freighters should only be engaged with a capable combat ship.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The [-][/c][c][00ff00]level[-][/c][c][abd1ff] of a freighter only affects the health and damage of the NPCs inside and has no other bearing on the overall difficulty or loot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Note that while you can place your own core on a freighter, you cannot fly it.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]货船是携带资源从一个地点到另一个地点的飞船,并且可能是大量材料或贸易商品的来源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在轨道或其它太空星区找到。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们会在探测器上显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们武装了,但不会追击目标。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]摧毁它们的后部推进器将使它们完全停止。[-][/c][c][c8c8c8][i](由于一个已知的游戏错误,从后方攻击移动的巡逻飞船会造成较少的伤害)[/i][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你摧毁了其他方向的所有推进器,它可能难以完全停止。[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i][/i][-][/c][c][abd1ff]摧毁它们所有的发电机或核心将使它们失效。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]货船可能有多个核心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果货船失去了它的原始核心,然后由于任何原因(退出游戏,移动到渲染范围之外,离开游戏场地)变得未加载,它将消失。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你与海盗家族保持中立,货船可以被[-][/c][c][00ff00]勒索[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]货船应该只与有能力的战斗飞船交战。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]货船的[-][/c][c][00ff00]等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]只影响里面的NPC的生命值和伤害,并没有其他影响整体难度或战利品。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请注意,虽然你可以在货船上放置自己的核心,但你不能驾驶它。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Military bases are heavily defended POIs belonging to a faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will typically be defended by both exterior anti-ship turrets and interior troops.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will often be protected by a shield generator you will need to destroy to prevent the shield from recharging.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Military bases on planets will use turrets that deal more damage to capital vessels and have a dome-style shield that takes less damage from capital vessels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Military bases come in multiple tiers from simple defense outposts all the way up to command headquarters.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The [-][/c][c][00ff00]level[-][/c][c][abd1ff] of a base only affects the health and damage of the NPCs inside and has no other bearing on the overall difficulty or loot.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is recommended to use a hover vessel, small vessel, or capital vessel specialized for combat and appropriate to the tier of base you are attacking.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Handheld weapons are ineffective at assaulting the exterior defenses of military bases.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]军事基地是一个派系拥有的重兵把守的兴趣点。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们通常由外部反舰炮塔和内部部队共同防御。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们通常由一个护盾发生器保护,你需要摧毁它以防止护盾重新充电。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]行星上的军事基地会使用对主力舰伤害更大的炮塔,并拥有一个穹顶式护盾,这种护盾对主力舰的伤害较小。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]军事基地有多个等级,从简单的防御前哨一直到指挥总部。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]基地的[-][/c][c][00ff00]等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]只影响内部NPC的生命值和伤害,对整体难度或战利品没有其他影响。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]建议使用适合攻击基地等级的战斗专用的悬浮飞船、小型飞船或主力舰。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]手持武器对攻击军事基地的外部防御是无效的。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Abandoned Bases are dungeons with light exterior defenses but swarming with infected creatures inside.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Being admin cored, these bases must be assaulted on foot. You cannot use weapons to break through the walls.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will need to be well prepared for personal combat, with good armor, weapons, and adequate medical consumables.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are not a place for the unprepared.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Many abandoned bases will have a console on the outside with additional information.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some starting planets contain easier versions of these bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The [-][/c][c][00ff00]level[-][/c][c][abd1ff] of a base only affects the health and damage of the NPCs inside and has no other bearing on the overall difficulty or loot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]废弃基地是拥有薄弱外部防御但内部充斥着感染生物的地下城。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]作为管理员核心,这些基地必须步行攻击。你不能使用武器破坏墙壁。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你需要为个人战斗做好充分准备,配备好的护甲、武器和足够的医疗消耗品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这里不是未准备好的人的地方。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]许多废弃基地外部会有一个控制台,提供额外的信息。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一些起始星球包含这些基地的较易版本。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]基地的[-][/c][c][00ff00]等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]只影响内部NPC的生命值和伤害,对整体难度或战利品没有其他影响。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Civilian bases are often unarmed or lightly armed.

They can include colonies, mines, trading stations, or industrial factories.

They don't contain much loot, but may be a source of trade goods if raided.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
平民基地通常未装备武器或装备轻武器。

它们可以包括殖民地、矿场、交易站或工业工厂。

它们不含大量的战利品,但如果被袭击,可能是贸易商品的来源。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Ancient ruins, wrecked vessels, or derelict stations can be found in many places.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be a source of useful salvage or even a nice surprise or two if you're lucky.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
在许多地方可以发现古老的遗迹、破损的飞船或废弃的空间站。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可能是有用的打捞物品的来源,如果你幸运的话,甚至可能带来一两个惊喜。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Be prepared:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Use the right tool for the right job.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Make sure you're wearing appropriate armor and using armor boosters to fit the situation. [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Don't forget about environmental conditions such as temperature and radiation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Use the most effective weapons for the situations you find yourself in. Carry a variety of weapons so you can adapt on the fly.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Stock up on medical consumables either by buying them from trading stations, looting them, or crafting them. Don't forget bottled water to keep that fever down![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Make sure your armor and weapons are repaired and you're using food that can give you bonuses when eaten.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Go slow:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rushing in a POI can lead to certain doom. This not only means you no longer have cover, but can lead to delayed spawners causing enemies to spawn on top of you instead of in front of you.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Peak around corners, look both ways, and fall back under cover if you get shot. Standing in the open is a good way to become target practice for that sniper at the end of the hall.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Keep your distance from melee enemies. The best defense is to not get hit at all.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Take a few seconds to reload all your weapons before opening a door.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroy enemy spawn pads as you go to prevent them from respawning new enemies.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Watch out for hazards:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Poison gas, explosive barrels, sentry turrets, hidden pits, and enemies dropping from vents can be around every corner.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Check those corners and behind cargo containers to make sure no enemy is hiding that will surprise you later.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Deal with minor status ailments before they become big problems:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Treating a minor status effect is always easier than waiting until it progresses into something worse.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hover your mouse over the status effect icon on the player stats window to see what effects it has and what medical items are needed to cure it.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Dying is not the end of the world:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Putting a clone chamber or medical bay on your ship or placing down a survival tent can give you a safe place to respawn nearby.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can use your drone [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to safely recover your backpack.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Don't be ashamed to come back later when you are more prepared if a POI is too difficult for your current gear level.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Avoid combat:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]And if you find yourself dying over and over again, consider simply avoiding combat.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most personal combat is entirely optional.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]做好准备:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用正确的工具完成正确的工作。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]确保你穿着合适的护甲,并使用适合情况的护甲增强器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不要忘记考虑环境条件,比如温度和辐射。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用对你所处的情况最有效的武器。携带多种武器,以便你能随机应变。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]储备医疗消耗品,无论是从贸易空间站购买、掠夺还是自己制作。别忘了瓶装水,以保持发烧降下来![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]确保你的护甲和武器得到修复,并且使用食用后能给你提供加成的食物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]慢慢来:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在POI中急于行动可能导致必然的灾难。这不仅意味着你不再有掩护,而且可能导致延迟生成器使敌人在你头顶而不是你前面生成。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]探头看角落,两边都看,如果被射中就退回到掩护下。站在开阔地带是成为走廊尽头狙击手练习目标的好方法。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]与近战敌人保持距离。最好的防御就是根本不被击中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在开门之前花几秒钟重新装填你所有的武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在你前进的过程中破坏敌人的生成垫,以防止它们重新生成新的敌人。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]注意危险:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]毒气、爆炸性桶、哨兵炮塔、隐藏的坑洞和从通风口掉落的敌人可能就在每个角落。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]检查那些角落和货物集装箱后面,确保没有敌人隐藏起来,以免稍后给你惊喜。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]在小问题变成大问题之前处理它们:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]治疗一个小的状态效果总是比等到它发展成更严重的问题要容易。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将鼠标悬停在玩家状态窗口的状态效果图标上,查看它的效果以及治疗所需的医疗物品。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]死亡不是世界末日:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在你的飞船上放置一个克隆室或医疗舱,或者放置一个生存帐篷,可以给你一个附近安全的地方复活。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用你的无人机[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]安全地回收你的背包。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果一个POI对你的当前装备水平来说太难了,不要羞于稍后再来。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]避免战斗:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你发现自己一遍又一遍地死去,考虑简单地避免战斗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大部分个人战斗完全是可选的。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Be Prepared:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you think you are prepared, you are not prepared.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Fighting in a ship is no joke and if you're using a poorly armed or armored ship you are unlikely to succeed.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Patrol vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]military bases[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can have powerful [-][/c][c][00ff00]shields[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and devastating weapons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some of these weapons will have a small amount of [-][/c][c][00ff00]shield penetration[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You should make sure your ship is up to the task at hand before engaging an enemy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Install Alarm Sentries:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Alarm sentries are specialized turrets that instead of dealing damage to enemies, will play an audio alert if they see an enemy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be a useful tool for alerting you to danger if you are outside of your ship or focused on mining or salvaging.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Use armor:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A ship protected by hardened or combat steel will prove much more durable than one protected only by carbon fiber or regular steel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Taking a ship built mainly out of carbon fiber or steel into combat is recommended only if you enjoy the inevitable fireworks show as your warp core explodes in a brilliant flash of light moments before waking up in a clone chamber back at your home base.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Use the right weapons for the job:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Choosing your weapon loadout for your ship is one of the most important design decisions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It's important to balance your loadout so you can do the most damage possible versus the target you are fighting.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each weapon has damage bonuses versus certain types of targets, clip sizes, and fire rates. It is up to you to use the right weapons for your ship design, play style, and target.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Remember that you can only fire one type of manual weapon at a time whereas turrets can always fire. Adjust your weapon loadout accordingly.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Higher tier weapons are more CPU efficient but are not always the best option.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Setup your turret targeting so you don't have artillery turrets trying to shoot drones for example.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Don't be afraid to fall back:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Bases can't move and patrol vessels don't move as fast as you. If you start taking too much damage, fall back to a safe distance and re-assess the situation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Remember that [-][/c][c][00ff00]space drones[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can keep up with you, so you should make sure to destroy them as quickly as possible if you do need to retreat.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The shield remaining display on your HUD can be delayed especially on multiplayer servers. Your actual shield amount remaining is always less than what is showing on the display.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Objects in HUD are closer than they appear:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The range to a target shown on your HUD is measured from your camera position to the center of the target. The actual range of your ship's closest targetable devices versus the enemy turrets can be hundreds of meters less than that. Don't be lulled into a mistaken sense of security thinking you're out of range of the enemy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most enemy turrets also have a longer range than your own turrets to prevent you from being able to easily dip in and out of range without risk.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Targeting settings:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can change the settings on your turret's to choose what targets they will fire at.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]if you want to change the entire device group, simply select the group and set your options there, then hit the apply to group button.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is recommended to generally leave Warp Drive off of your targeting options, as that is used to target Rich Asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is also recommended to setup device groups or signals on your control panel to easily turn on or off different types of turrets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Don't turn your ship into a flying bomb:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some devices will explode and damage nearby blocks when they are destroyed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Separating those devices with layers of hardened or combat steel can prevent chain explosions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Old tricks won't work:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your old tricks such as burrowing under a base or pinning a patrol vessel in place may not be as effective as they once were, and sometimes may end up backfiring. The enemy has evolved.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Find what works for you:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There are many tactics for defeating enemy patrol vessels and bases. Some prefer to destroy the generators or cores, while others will destroy the turrets then go in on foot. Some will sit still and tank the damage while others prefer to dodge as much incoming fire as possible.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your personal play style, the type of ship you are flying, the weapons you're using, and the enemy you are fighting will all determine which tactics will be successful for you.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Avoid combat:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]And if you find yourself exploring in a ship not up to the task of combat, consider avoiding combat until you are better prepared.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Use your detector and alarm sentries to avoid enemy patrol vessels and bases and equip your ship with weapons good at destroying enemy drones such as gatling turrets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Different planets, moons, and space sectors will have different quantities and tiers of enemies. There are many which are safe or have few enemies.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Travel to the territory of a friendly faction.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]做好准备:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您认为自己已经准备好了,那您还没有准备好。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在飞船上的战斗不是开玩笑的,如果您使用的是装备简陋或装甲薄弱的飞船,您成功的可能性很小。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]巡逻舰[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]军事基地[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可能有强大的[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和毁灭性武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些武器中有些会对[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾[-][/c][c][abd1ff]有少量穿透。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在与敌人交战之前,您应确保您的飞船能够胜任手头的任务。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]安装警报哨兵:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]警报哨兵是专门化的炮塔,它们不会对敌人造成伤害,而是在发现敌人时播放音频警报。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您在飞船外或专注于采矿或打捞时,它们可以作为提醒您危险的有用工具。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]使用装甲:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]由硬化钢或战斗钢保护的飞船将比仅由碳纤维或普通钢保护的飞船更加耐用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只有碳纤维或钢建造的飞船参加战斗,只推荐给那些喜欢在您的曲速核心在一束光中爆炸,您在克隆室里回到您的基地前一刻的烟花表演的人。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]使用正确的武器:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为您的飞船选择武器装备是最重要的设计决策之一。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]重要的是要平衡您的装备,以便您可以对您正在战斗的目标造成尽可能多的伤害。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每种武器对某些类型的目标都有伤害加成、弹夹大小和射击速率。您需要为您的飞船设计、游戏风格和目标使用正确的武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]记住,您一次只能发射一种手动武器,而炮塔则始终可以射击。相应地调整您的武器装备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]更高级别的武器更节省CPU,但并不总是最佳选择。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]设置您的炮塔目标,以便您不会有火炮炮塔试图射击无人机等。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]不要害怕撤退:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]基地不能移动,巡逻舰也没有您移动得快。如果您开始承受太多伤害,撤退到安全距离并重新评估情况。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]记住[-][/c][c][00ff00]太空无人机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可以跟上您,所以如果需要撤退,您应该尽快摧毁它们。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您HUD上的剩余护盾显示可能会延迟,尤其是在多人服务器上。您实际剩余的护盾量总是比显示屏上的少。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]HUD中的对象比看起来更近:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您HUD上显示的目标范围是从您的摄像机位置到目标中心的距离。您飞船上最接近的目标设备与敌人炮塔的实际范围可能比那少几百米。不要被误认为您不在敌人的射程内而产生错误的安全感。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数敌人炮塔的射程也比您自己的炮塔长,以防止您能够轻易地进出射程而没有风险。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]目标设置:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以更改炮塔的设置,选择它们将射击哪些目标。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您想更改整个设备组,只需选择该组并在那里设置您的选项,然后点击应用到组按钮。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建议通常将翘曲引擎从您的目标选项中移除,因为这是用于瞄准富矿小行星的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]还建议在控制面板上设置设备组或信号,以便轻松打开或关闭不同类型的炮塔。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]不要将您的飞船变成飞行炸弹:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些设备在被摧毁时会爆炸并损坏附近的方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]用硬化钢或战斗钢层分隔这些设备可以防止连锁爆炸。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]老把戏不管用:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您的老把戏,比如在基地下挖洞或固定巡逻舰的位置,可能不再像以前那样有效,有时甚至可能适得其反。敌人已经进化了。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]找到适合您的方法:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有许多战术可以击败敌人的巡逻舰和基地。有些人更喜欢摧毁发电机或核心,而其他人则会先摧毁炮塔然后再步行进入。有些人会静止不动并承受伤害,而其他人则尽可能躲避来袭的火力。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您的个人游戏风格、您正在飞行的飞船类型、您使用的武器以及您正在战斗的敌人,都将决定哪些战术对您成功。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]避免战斗:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您发现自己正在一艘不适合战斗的飞船中探索,请考虑在您准备得更好之前避免战斗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用您的探测器和警报哨兵避开敌人的巡逻舰和基地,并为您的飞船配备擅长摧毁敌人无人机的武器,如加特林炮塔。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不同的行星、卫星和太空区域将拥有不同数量和等级的敌人。有许多是安全的或敌人很少的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]前往友好派系的领土。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Some enemies have a chance of applying negative status effects when attacking.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can also gain negative status effects through exposure to environmental dangers such as temperature or radiation or by eating raw food or consuming certain items.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
These status effects show up on your HUD above your stats, or in the player stats window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hovering the mouse over an icon on the player stats window will show the tooltip for the status effect which includes information on what the status effect does and how to cure it.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i][sub](An indicator for Open Wound)[/sub][/i][-][/c][c][abd1ff]{Eden_Medical1Bar.png}[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A yellow bar around the icon shows the time remaining until the status effect expires.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If the bar is green that means the status effect will be cured when it expires.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most negative status effects progress to a more serious ailment if they are allowed to expire without treatment.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is always better to treat a minor status effect rather than allow it to progress.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]某些敌人在攻击时有机会施加负面状态效果。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您也可能通过暴露在环境危险中,如温度或辐射,或食用生食或消耗某些物品而获得负面状态效果。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
这些状态效果会显示在您的HUD上,位于您的属性上方,或在玩家属性窗口中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将鼠标悬停在玩家属性窗口中的图标上,将显示状态效果的工具提示,其中包括有关状态效果的作用以及如何治愈的信息。[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i][sub](开放性伤口的指示器)[/sub][/i][-][/c][c][abd1ff]{Eden_Medical1Bar.png}[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]图标周围的黄色条显示状态效果剩余的持续时间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果条是绿色的,这意味着状态效果将在到期时被治愈。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数负面状态效果如果未经治疗而允许它们到期,会发展成更严重的疾病。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]总是最好治疗轻微的状态效果,而不是让它发展。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Some status effects can give you buffs instead of harming you.
You can gain beneficial effects from eating certain food or using medical consumables.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These also show up on your HUD and player stats window.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
某些状态效果可以给你增益而不是伤害你。
你可以通过食用特定食物或使用医疗消耗品获得有益效果。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些也会在你的HUD和玩家状态窗口上显示。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]There are many medical consumables that can be used to restore health, cure [-][/c][c][00ff00]negative status effects[-][/c][c][abd1ff], or apply [-][/c][c][00ff00]positive status effects[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most medical treatments cure status effects instantly, while some take time to cure the effect.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Check tooltips to see which conditions they treat or what effects they apply.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Medical consumables can be bought at medical traders in most trading stations, looted, or crafted in a Food Processor.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is recommended to have an ample supply of medical consumables before raiding [-][/c][c][00ff00]abandoned bases[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or [-][/c][c][00ff00]military bases[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]有许多医疗消耗品可以用来恢复健康,治愈[-][/c][c][00ff00]负面状态效果[-][/c][c][abd1ff],或者应用[-][/c][c][00ff00]正面状态效果[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数医疗治疗可以立即治愈状态效果,而有些则需要时间来治愈效果。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
查看工具提示以了解它们治疗的条件或它们应用的效果。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]医疗消耗品可以在大多数贸易空间站的医疗贸易商处购买,从战利品中获取,或在食品处理器中制作。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建议在突袭[-][/c][c][00ff00]废弃基地[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或[-][/c][c][00ff00]军事基地[-][/c][c][abd1ff]之前有足够的医疗消耗品供应。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]You can place medical devices on your ships and bases that can treat a wide variety of medical conditions and allow you to select them as a respawn location.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Also make sure to include a shower for lowering your body radiation level and a toilet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您可以在您的飞船和基地上放置医疗设备,这些设备可以治疗多种医疗状况,并允许您选择它们作为重生位置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
此外,请确保包括淋浴以降低您的身体辐射水平和厕所。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Radiation is sneaky. It's the silent killer that sneaks up on you and can really mess up your day.
Radiation can vary wildly depending on planet and biome. Some devices also give off radiation such as warp drives.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Radiation is indicated by the bottom set of numbers on the upper right side of your HUD, below your minimap.[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]0.7[sub]R[/sub][-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](large number on the left)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the radiation level of the area you are currently in.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If this is higher than your radiation protection then your suit radiation level will slowly increase over time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]0.1[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](small number on the upper right)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is your suit radiation level.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This number will slowly increase the longer you are exposed to radiation beyond your radiation protection level.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once this number reaches 1.0 you will begin to suffer radiation related status effects.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]0.7[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](small number on the lower right)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the current radiation outdoors. If you are inside a sealed ship or base, this number can help you determine if it's safe to go outside in your current equipment.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Radiation symbol[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](large symbol on the right)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This symbol warns you if you are in an area where radiation exceeds your current radiation protection.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A red symbol means you are being exposed to harmful radiation and your suit radiation level is increasing.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A white symbol means the outside radiation is dangerous but you are in a protected indoor area.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A gray symbol means the outside radiation is within tolerance.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
辐射是狡猾的。它是那种悄无声息的杀手，可以在你不经意间袭来，彻底毁了你的一天。
辐射的强度会因行星和生物群系而大相径庭。一些装置也会释放辐射，比如翘曲引擎。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]辐射强度显示在你HUD右上角小地图下方的底部数字组。[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]0.7[sub]R[/sub][-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](左侧的大数字)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是你当前所在区域的辐射等级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果这个数值高于你的辐射防护等级，你的飞行服辐射指数会随时间慢慢上升。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]0.1[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](右上角的小数字)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是你飞行服的辐射等级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你暴露在超过防护等级的辐射环境中时，这个数值会逐渐上升。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦数值达到1.0，你将开始受到辐射相关的状态影响。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]0.7[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](右下角的小数字)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是当前室外辐射值。如果你在密封的飞船或基地内，这个数字可以帮你判断以现有装备出门是否安全。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]辐射符号[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](右侧的大符号)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]该符号会警示你所在区域的辐射是否超过你当前的辐射防护等级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]红色符号表示你正暴露在有害辐射中，飞行服的辐射指数正在升高。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]白色符号表示室外辐射危险，但你处于受保护的室内区域。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]灰色符号表示室外辐射在可接受范围内。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Temperature can vary wildly depending on playfield. Some devices such as thrusters and generators give off high levels of heat.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Temperature is indicated by the top set of numbers on the upper right side of your HUD, below your minimap.[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]4[sub]C[/sub][-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](large number on the left)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the temperature of the area you are in.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If this temperature is beyond your cold or hot tolerance your suit temperature will begin to rise or fall.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]25[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](small number on the upper right)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is your suit temperature.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This number will increase if you are in an area too hot or decrease if you are in an area too cold.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once your suit temperature deviates too far from 25 degrees Celsius (77 degrees Fahrenheit), you will suffer temperature related status effects.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]4[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](small number on the lower right)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the current temperature outdoors. If you are inside a sealed ship or base, this number can help you determine if it's safe to go outside in your current equipment.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Temperature symbol[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](large symbol on the right)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This symbol warns you if you are in an area where temperature exceeds your current tolerance.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A red symbol means you are being exposed to extreme temperature and your suit temperature is rising or falling.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A white symbol means the outside temperature is dangerous but you are in a protected indoor area.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A gray symbol means the outside temperature is within tolerance.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
温度会根据游戏场地而剧烈变化。一些设备,如推进器和发电机,会散发高水平的热量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]温度由您HUD右上角的数字组显示,位于您的小地图下方。[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]4[sub]C[/sub][-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](左边的大数字)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是您所在区域的温度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果这个温度超出您的寒冷或热度耐受度,您的服装温度将开始上升或下降。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]25[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](右上角的小数字)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是您的服装温度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您处于过热或过冷的区域,这个数字将增加或减少。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦您的服装温度偏离25摄氏度(77华氏度)太远,您将遭受与温度相关的状态影响。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]4[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](右下角的小数字)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是当前的室外温度。如果您在密封的飞船或基地内部,这个数字可以帮助您判断是否安全地穿着当前装备外出。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]温度符号[-][/c] [c][c8c8c8](右边的大符号)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这个符号警告您,如果您处于超出当前耐受度的温度区域。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]红色符号意味着您正暴露在极端温度下,您的服装温度正在上升或下降。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]白色符号意味着室外温度危险,但您处于受保护的室内区域。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]灰色符号意味着室外温度在耐受范围内。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Temperature:[-][/c]
Moving to a location that is within your temperature tolerance will slowly begin to bring your suit temperature back to 25C (77F).
Some consumables will change your suit temperature, such as water bottles.
Showers will restore normal suit temperature.
Certain temperature related status effects may require further treatment.

[c][00afff]Radiation:[-][/c]
Suit radiation does not go away on its own.
Showers will lower your suit radiation but will not treat radiation status effects.
Some medical consumables can lower suit radiation.
Radiation related status effects require treatment from medical consumables or medical devices.
Treating a radiation status effect does not mean your suit radiation is lowered. If your suit radiation is still above dangerous levels you may suffer additional radiation status effects after treatment.

See [c][00afff]Mechanics[-][/c] > [c][00ff00]Player Stats and HUD Elements[-][/c] for how to check for dangerous levels of temperature and radiation.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]温度:[-][/c]  
移动到一个在你温度耐受范围内的位置会慢慢使您的宇航服温度回到25°C(77°F)。  
一些消耗品会改变您的宇航服温度,比如水瓶。  
淋浴可以恢复宇航服的正常温度。  
某些与温度相关的状态效果可能需要进一步治疗。

[c][00afff]辐射:[-][/c]  
宇航服的辐射不会自行消失。  
淋浴可以降低宇航服的辐射,但不会治疗辐射状态效果。  
一些医疗消耗品可以降低宇航服的辐射。  
与辐射相关的状态效果需要通过医疗消耗品或医疗设备进行治疗。  
治疗辐射状态效果并不意味着您的宇航服辐射已经降低。如果您的宇航服辐射仍然处于危险水平,治疗后您可能会遭受额外的辐射状态效果。

查看[c][00afff]机制[-][/c] > [c][00ff00]玩家状态和HUD元素[-][/c]来了解如何检查温度和辐射的危险水平。

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Enemy [-][/c][c][00ff00]drones[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]patrol vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in space can become alerted to your presence.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When an enemy has become alerted to your presence, they will show up on your HUD with a ! symbol by their name.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will then travel to the location you were last spotted at.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Enemies can become alerted if a drone, patrol vessel, or base sees you. They will then call for the assistance of nearby allies to hunt you down.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To avoid alerted enemies, move away from the area you were spotted in and avoid further contact with enemies of that faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once they lose sight of you they will no longer be able to track your position and will stop being alerted.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]敌人[-][/c][c][00ff00]无人机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]巡逻飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在太空中可能会察觉到你的存在。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当敌人察觉到你的存在时,他们的名字旁会在你的抬头显示器(HUD)上显示一个感叹号(!)符号。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]他们会随后前往你最后被发现的地点。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果无人机、巡逻飞船或基地发现了你,敌人可能会被警告。他们将呼叫附近盟友的支援来追捕你。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为了避免被敌人察觉,离开你被发现的地区,并避免与那个派系的敌人进一步接触。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦他们失去对你的视野,他们将无法追踪你的位置,并且会停止发出警报。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Some factions will send periodic attacks on your bases on planets and moons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Currently Zirax and Tal'on will send base attacks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Base attacks do not happen in space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These attacks will only happen if the attacking faction has an active drone base or command center on the planet and your reputation is below neutral.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You must also be nearby your base for the base attack to trigger.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each of your bases has their own separate attack timers and strength.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The strength of the base attack is determined by your reputation, how close you are to their bases, the playfield level of the planet, and the strength of your own base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view base attack statistics in the statistics tab of the control panel of your base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you remove the drone base or command center on a planet you will stop the base attacks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]On servers the bases may regenerate after a time however.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is recommended to arm your base with turrets or use a combat ship to defend it from attacks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Zirax Base Attack:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The Zirax Empire will send a wave made up of a combination of drones, bombers, and/or troop transports.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The troop transports will attempt to land near your base and deploy troops.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Troops will assault your base and attempt to find your core. If they are able to get close enough to your core, they can use remote hacking to destroy it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Zirax troops can claim your base as their own if they are able to destroy your core, placing down their own core and converting your base to the Zirax faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To defeat the Zirax base attack, destroy all enemy units.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A base well armed with gatling turrets is recommended.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Tal'on Base Attack:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The Tal'on attack is led by a shaman who will continually call wildlife to attack your base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The shaman will be marked on your map and may be some ways away from your base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To defeat the Tal'on base attack, find and kill the shaman.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]一些派系会定期对你的基地在行星和卫星上发动攻击。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]目前兹瑞克斯和泰隆会发动基地攻击。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]基地攻击不会在太空中发生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果攻击派系在行星上有一个活跃的无人机基地或指挥中心,并且你的声誉低于中立,这些攻击才会发生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你还必须在基地附近,基地攻击才会触发。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的每个基地都有自己的攻击计时器和强度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]基地攻击的强度由你的声誉、你离他们的基地有多近、行星的战场等级以及你自己基地的强度决定。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在基地控制面板的统计标签中查看基地攻击统计数据。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你移除了行星上的无人机基地或指挥中心,你将停止基地攻击。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在服务器上,基地可能会在一段时间后重新生成。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建议用炮塔武装你的基地,或者使用战斗飞船来防御攻击。[-][/c]
[c][00afff]兹瑞克斯基地攻击:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]兹瑞克斯帝国会派出由无人机、轰炸机和/或运兵船组成的一波攻击。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]运兵船会试图降落在你的基地附近并部署部队。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]部队将攻击你的基地并试图找到你的核心。如果他们能够足够接近你的核心,他们可以使用远程黑客技术来摧毁它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果兹瑞克斯部队能够摧毁你的核心,他们可以占领你的基地,放置他们自己的核心,并将你的基地转换为兹瑞克斯派系。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要击败兹瑞克斯基地攻击,摧毁所有敌方单位。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建议基地装备加特林炮塔。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]泰隆基地攻击:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]泰隆攻击由一个萨满领导,他将不断地召唤野生动物来攻击你的基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]萨满会在地图上标记,并且可能离你的基地有一段距离。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要击败泰隆基地攻击,找到并杀死萨满。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Attacking certain bases in space has a chance to trigger reinforcement waves to show up to defend it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If a base calls for reinforcements there will be a warning message displayed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These reinforcements can consist of a number of space drones and/or patrol vessels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Reinforcements will warp out when disarmed or self destruct when disabled or destroyed so they are not a source of loot or salvage.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Defeating all the reinforcement waves will then leave you free to attack the base itself.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]攻击太空中的某些基地有几率触发增援波出现以进行防御。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果基地请求增援,将会显示警告信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些增援可能包括一定数量的太空无人机和/或巡逻飞船。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]增援在被解除武装或自毁时会通过翘曲引擎撤离,因此它们不是战利品或回收资源的来源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]击败所有的增援波将使你能够自由地攻击基地本身。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]R[-][/c][c][00afff]arity:[-][/c]
Uncommon
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Source:[-][/c]
Can be salvaged from wrecks. Bought and sold at traders.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Notes:[-][/c]
Can be purchased from Colonist Scrapyards, Colony Salvager, and Pirate Salvager.
Comes in versions for small vessels and capital vessels.

[c][c8c8c8]An oversized antiquated rocket engine that still operates on chemical propellant.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]This model of thruster hasn't been used in over a century as smaller Ion thrusters replaced the technology.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Nonetheless, it can be retrofitted to function as a normal thruster if you can ignore the ridiculous thruster size.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]品质:[-][/c]
稀有
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]来源:[-][/c]
可以从残骸中回收。在交易者处买卖。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]注意事项:[-][/c]
可以从殖民地废品场、殖民地回收者和海盗回收者处购买。
适用于小型飞船和主力舰。

[c][c8c8c8]一个过时的超大尺寸火箭引擎,仍然使用化学推进剂。[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]这种型号的推进器在过去一个世纪中已不再使用,因为更小的离子推进器取代了这项技术。[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]尽管如此,如果你可以忽略可笑的推进器尺寸,它可以被改装成正常工作的推进器。[-][/c]

English: [c][ffff00]Use the drop down arrows or double click to select a topic and then sub-topic to learn more.[-][/c]{Eden_ArrowExplanationBar.png}
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]使用下拉箭头或双击选择主题和子主题以了解更多信息。[-][/c]{Eden_ArrowExplanationBar.png}

English:
[c][abd1ff]Your health is displayed on your HUD.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can take damage from enemy attacks, explosions, status effects, and mission triggers.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If your health reaches 0 you die and can choose a respawn location.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The contents of your personal inventory is dropped (depending on difficulty settings) as a backpack at your death location and is shown on your HUD.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The backpack will despawn after a period of time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can retrieve your backpack using the drone [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Health does not naturally regenerate on its own and can be restored using food, medical consumables, or medical devices.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您的生命值会在您的抬头显示器上显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可能会因为敌人攻击、爆炸、状态效果和任务触发器而受到伤害。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您的生命值降至0,您将死亡,并可以选择一个复活位置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您的个人背包中的物品(根据难度设置)会作为背包掉落在您的死亡位置,并在您的抬头显示器上显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]背包会在一段时间后消失。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以使用无人机来取回您的背包[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]生命值不会自然恢复,可以通过食物、医疗消耗品或医疗设备来恢复。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Your food is displayed on your HUD.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Food is drained slowly over time, or drained rapidly to regenerate your [-][/c][c][00ff00]stamina[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Certain status effects can also drain your food.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It can be replenished by eating food. Eating raw food may make you sick.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your food drain rate is affected by your armor and armor [-][/c][c][00ff00]boosters[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Certain food can temporarily increase your maximum food value.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you run out of food you will become afflicted with [-][/c][c][00ff00]negative status effects[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and eventually die.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]你的食物量显示在你的HUD上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]食物量会随时间缓慢消耗,或者快速消耗以恢复你的[-][/c][c][00ff00]耐力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]某些状态效果也可能会消耗你的食物。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以通过进食来补充食物。食用生食可能会使你生病。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的食物消耗速率会受到你的护甲和护甲[-][/c][c][00ff00]增强器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的影响。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]某些食物可以暂时增加你的食物最大值。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你耗尽了食物,你将会受到[-][/c][c][00ff00]负面状态效果[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的折磨,最终死亡。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Your stamina is displayed on your HUD.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Stamina is rapidly drained while sprinting. Sprinting does not drain stamina while in space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Certain [-][/c][c][00ff00]status effects[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and firing certain weapons can also drain your stamina.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your stamina rapidly regenerates while not sprinting at the cost of [-][/c][c][00ff00]food[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Certain food can temporarily increase your maximum stamina value.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]你的耐力值在HUD上显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在冲刺时耐力会迅速消耗。在太空中冲刺不会消耗耐力。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]某些[-][/c][c][00ff00]状态效果[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和使用某些武器也可以消耗你的耐力。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你不冲刺时,耐力会迅速恢复,代价是[-][/c][c][00ff00]食物[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]某些食物可以暂时增加你的耐力最大值。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your suit oxygen is displayed on your HUD. Your HUD also tracks if your helmet is on and if you are in an oxygenated environment.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your ship's oxygen is also displayed on your vessel stat HUD while you are piloting a ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
If you are on a planet or moon with a breathable atmosphere, oxygen is not consumed at all even in a sealed room.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you are in an oxygenated environment, oxygen is consumed from your ship or base's oxygen tanks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you are not in an oxygenated environment, oxygen is consumed from your suit oxygen as long as you have your helmet [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Helmet)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] on and are wearing armor that has oxygen supply.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The rate of oxygen consumption is constant and depends on your game difficulty settings.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can refill your suit oxygen with oxygen canisters or by using an oxygen station.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can increase your suit's oxygen capacity using oxygen tank [-][/c][c][00ff00]boosters[-][/c][c][abd1ff].
You can refill the oxygen tanks of your ship or base using oxygen bottles or canisters.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can craft oxygen from water, or produce it directly using an oxygen generator or atmospheric condenser.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you run out of suit oxygen, you will quickly suffer from suffocation and die.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]你的宇航服氧气在HUD上显示。HUD还会跟踪你的头盔是否戴着,以及你是否处于有氧环境中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你驾驶飞船时,你的飞船氧气也会在你的飞船状态HUD上显示。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果你在一个有可呼吸大气的行星或卫星上,即使在封闭的房间里,氧气也不会被消耗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你处于有氧环境中,氧气会从你的飞船或基地的氧气罐中消耗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你不在有氧环境中,只要你戴着头盔[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Helmet)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]并且穿着有氧气供应的盔甲,就会消耗你宇航服的氧气。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]氧气消耗的速率是恒定的,取决于你的游戏难度设置。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用氧气罐或氧气站来补充你的宇航服氧气。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用氧气罐[-][/c][c][00ff00]增压器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来增加你宇航服的氧气容量。
你可以使用氧气瓶或氧气罐来补充你的飞船或基地的氧气罐。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以从水中制造氧气,或者使用氧气发生器或大气凝结器直接产生氧气。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果你的宇航服氧气耗尽,你会迅速窒息并死亡。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your jetpack status and fuel is displayed on your HUD.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It requires any type of armor equipped.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Using your jetpack will slowly increase your vertical height while consuming your jetpack fuel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Jetpack fuel is rapidly recharged for free while not using your jetpack.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In space the jetpack is used for movement in all directions and uses no jetpack fuel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you do not have a nearby gravity generator, a jetpack is required for movement while in space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can reduce the rate your jetpack consumes jetpack fuel using jetpack [-][/c][c][00ff00]boosters[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can toggle your jetpack on and off with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jetpack)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]你的喷气背包状态和燃料在HUD上显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它需要装备任何类型的盔甲。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]使用你的喷气背包会慢慢增加你的垂直高度,同时消耗你的喷气背包燃料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你不使用喷气背包时,喷气背包燃料会迅速免费重新充电。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]在太空中,喷气背包用于全方位移动,不消耗喷气背包燃料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你没有附近的重力发生器,喷气背包是在太空中移动的必要工具。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以使用喷气背包[-][/c][c][00ff00]增压器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来降低喷气背包燃料的消耗速率。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jetpack)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来开启和关闭你的喷气背包。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]While in space, this icon shows you if you are in range of a gravity generator.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
On a planet this icon has no purpose.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]在太空中,这个图标显示你是否在重力发生器的范围内。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
在行星上,这个图标没有作用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]This icon indicates if you are in a no-build zone.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Such areas include the poles and world seam of planets and moons, bases covered by a land claim device (in multiplayer), and areas covered by anti-grief mechanics (depends on server settings).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view anti-grief areas on the planet map.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这个图标表示你是否在禁止建造区域内。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些区域包括行星和卫星的极地和世界接缝,被土地声明装置覆盖的基地(在多人游戏中),以及由反骚扰机制覆盖的区域(取决于服务器设置)。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在行星地图上查看反骚扰区域。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]This icon indicates if you are in a PvP enabled playfield.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In single player PvP is globally enabled everywhere by default. This means you can damage your own ships and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In multiplayer this means you can damage other players or their structures.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]By default, all playfields are set to PvE and you cannot attack other players or damage their structures in any way while playing on a server.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This depends on server settings so if you are not sure contact your server admin.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这个图标表示你是否处于PvP(玩家对战)模式的战场。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在单人游戏中,PvP模式默认在任何地方都是全局启用的。这意味着你可以破坏你自己的飞船和基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在多人游戏中,这意味着你可以破坏其他玩家或他们的建筑。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]默认情况下,所有战场都设置为PvE(玩家对战环境),在服务器上游戏时,你无法以任何方式攻击其他玩家或破坏他们的建筑。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这取决于服务器设置,所以如果你不确定,请联系你的服务器管理员。[-][/c]

English: Explanations of the different HUD elements for the player stats window located in the bottom left of the HUD.
Chinese (simplified): HUD底部左侧的玩家统计窗口中不同HUD元素的解释。

English: Explanations of the different HUD elements for the minimap window located in the top right of the HUD.
Chinese (simplified): HUD右上角的小地图窗口中不同HUD元素的解释。

English:
[c][abd1ff]
This is your minimap.
It displays nearby drones, ships, bases, and resource deposits.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In space it appears differently.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这是你的小地图。
它显示附近的无人机、飞船、基地和资源矿床。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在太空中它看起来会有所不同。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]This displays the current weather on a planet or moon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not all planets have weather.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Weather will change periodically.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some weather can change the ambient temperature or radiation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some weather types can even cause damage to players who are exposed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not applicable in space.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这显示了行星或卫星上当前的天气情况。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]并非所有行星都有天气。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]天气会定期变化。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]某些天气可能会改变环境温度或辐射水平。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]某些天气类型甚至可能对暴露在外的玩家造成损害。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在太空中不适用。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]This shows the name of the current biome you're in.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Biomes affect the flora and fauna you might find as well as temperature and radiation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Different biomes can have different resources.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Biomes are unique to each planet even if they share the same name as a biome on another planet.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not applicable in space.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这显示了你当前所在的生物群落名称。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]生物群落会影响你可能发现的植物和动物,以及温度和辐射。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不同的生物群落可能有不同资源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]即使两个行星上的生物群落名称相同,它们也是独特的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在太空中不适用。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]This displays the time until the next sunrise or sunset.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The time is displayed in game hours and does not reflect a 1 to 1 ratio with real time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This depends on your location on the planet, the planet's axial tilt, and the planet's location in the star system.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]At night solar panels will not produce energy and more dangerous creatures might spawn.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not applicable in space.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这显示了到下次日出或日落的时间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]时间以游戏小时显示,并不与现实时间1:1对应。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这取决于你在行星上的位置,行星的倾角,以及行星在星系中的位置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在夜间,太阳能板将不会产生能量,更多危险的生物可能会出现。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在太空中不适用。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Displays the current faction territory you are in, if you are in one.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Shows an icon indicating your current reputation level with the faction.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Performing certain actions within a territory may affect your reputation. Check the faction info.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroying faction bases will remove their faction territory on a planet.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view faction territory on the planet map.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not to be confused with galactic faction territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not applicable in space.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]如果你在一个派系领土内,它会显示当前派系领土。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示一个图标,指示你与派系的当前声望等级。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]在领土内执行某些行动可能会影响你的声望。查看派系信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]摧毁派系基地将移除该派系在行星上的领土。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在行星地图上查看派系领土。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不要与银河派系领土混淆。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在太空中不适用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each ship and base has a maximum CPU limit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some functional devices take up some CPU.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Going over the CPU limit leads to reduced performance from thrusters, generators, and constructors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you are over the CPU limit by an extreme amount your generators may even overload due to the strain.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]You can increase available CPU by adding [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU extenders[-][/c][c][abd1ff]. Each individual CPU extender increases available CPU by a flat amount.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is a limit to how many of each CPU extender you can add and some require advanced materials to craft.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view a breakdown of your CPU in the CPU Statistics tab of the control panel.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每艘飞船和基地都有一个最大的CPU限制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些功能设备会占用一些CPU。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]超过CPU限制会导致推进器、发电机和建造机的性能降低。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你的CPU超出限制很多,你的发电机甚至可能因为压力过大而过载。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以通过添加[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU扩展器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来增加可用的CPU。每个单独的CPU扩展器都会增加一定数量的可用CPU。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每种CPU扩展器都有添加数量的限制,有些需要高级材料来制作。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在控制面板的CPU统计标签中查看你的CPU分解。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Your structure's current CPU limit is determined by its base CPU plus any additional CPU added from installed [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU extenders[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or other devices.
Each device that uses CPU will list its [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU cost[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in its tooltip.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Tier 1 CPU:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This lists your current CPU limit. Add more CPU extenders to increase the amount of available CPU.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Note that in creative mode the CPU difficulty setting is always disabled.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
您的结构当前的CPU限制由其基础CPU加上从安装的[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU扩展器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或其他设备添加的任何额外CPU确定。
使用CPU的每个设备都会在其工具提示中列出其[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU成本[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]第一级CPU:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]此列出了您当前的CPU限制。增加更多的CPU扩展器以增加可用CPU的数量。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]请注意,在创意模式下,CPU难度设置始终被禁用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
CPU Tiers are not used in Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is no way to increase your CPU Tier beyond tier 1.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Instead, add additional [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU extenders[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to increase your total [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU limit[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Tier 2-4 CPU:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]CPU tiers are not used. You can ignore these stats.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
CPU等级在Reforged Eden 2中未使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]没有办法将您的CPU等级提升到超过第一级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]相反,增加额外的[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU扩展器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]以增加您的总[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU限制[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]第二至第四级CPU:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]CPU等级不被使用。您可以忽略这些统计数据。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]If your [-][/c][c][00ff00]allocated CPU[-][/c][c][abd1ff] surpasses your [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU limit[-][/c][c][abd1ff] it will reduce your CPU efficiency below 100%.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Lower CPU efficiency will reduce the power output of your generators, the amount of thrust generated by your thrusters, and may have other detrimental effects on your ship or base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Efficiency Level:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If your allocated CPU surpasses your CPU limit, this gives an estimate to how much of a penalty you will receive.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]如果您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]分配CPU[-][/c][c][abd1ff]超过您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU限制[-][/c][c][abd1ff],它将使您的CPU效率低于100%。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]较低的CPU效率将降低您的发电机的功率输出,您的推进器产生的推力,以及可能对您的飞船或基地产生其他不利影响。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]效率等级:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您分配的CPU超过您的CPU限制,这提供了您将收到多少处罚的估计。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The total amount of CPU your ship or base uses is based on the CPU required by all the installed devices.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each device that has a CPU cost will list it in its tooltip.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Devices that are turned off will still require CPU.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Allocated:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is how much CPU you are currently using.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You want this number to be lower than your CPU limit.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您的飞船或基地使用的CPU总量基于所有安装设备的CPU需求。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个有CPU成本的设备都会在其工具提示中列出它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]关闭的设备仍然需要CPU。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]分配:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是您当前正在使用的CPU数量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您希望这个数字低于您的CPU限制。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]CPU Extenders are devices that increase the [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU limit[-][/c][c][abd1ff] of the ship or base they are installed on.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]CPU Extenders do not increase the [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU tier[-][/c][c][abd1ff] as CPU tiers are not used. Instead each individual extender increases the CPU limit.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]There is a maximum limit to the amount of each type of CPU extender you can add.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]CPU extenders come in basic, improved, advanced, superior, quantum, and auxiliary types, with each one becoming more difficult and expensive to craft than the previous.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Check the tooltips of each CPU extender to see how much CPU they add and what their limit is.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To reach the highest CPU limit, you will need to install the maximum amount of each CPU extender.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In other words, stick more CPU extenders on to get more CPU.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]CPU扩展器是增加它们安装的飞船或基地的[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU限制[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]CPU扩展器不会增加[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff],因为CPU等级不被使用。相反,每个单独的扩展器增加了CPU限制。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]您可以添加的每种CPU扩展器的数量有最大限制。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]CPU扩展器有基本型、改进型、高级型、优质型、量子型和辅助型,每种都比前一种更难更贵制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]查看每个CPU扩展器的工具提示,了解它们增加了多少CPU以及它们的限制是什么。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要达到最高的CPU限制,您需要安装每种CPU扩展器的最大数量。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]换句话说,多贴一些CPU扩展器以获得更多的CPU。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]In your travels you may encounter specialized crew that offer a small bonus to your [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU limit[-][/c][c][abd1ff] as well as providing other benefits.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It's rumored you may be able to hire these crew at some bars or find them by helping colonies.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Standard crew do not provide any CPU benefits in Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]在您的旅行中,您可能会遇到提供少量[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU限制[-][/c][c][abd1ff]加成以及提供其他好处的专业船员。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有传言称,您可能可以在一些酒吧雇佣这些船员,或通过帮助殖民地找到他们。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在Reforged Eden 2中,标准船员不提供任何CPU好处。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Some devices have a CPU cost.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If a device has a CPU cost, this is listed in the tooltip.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some devices do not use any CPU, such as lights, decoration, doors, etc.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hull and armor blocks do not cost CPU in Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most of your CPU costs will come from propulsion, power generation, weapons, crafting, and shields.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is important to keep your CPU cost in check to prevent you from going over your CPU limit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You may need to use ships that excel in a specific role instead of a single ship that does everything poorly.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]一些设备具有CPU消耗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果设备有CPU消耗,这会在提示中列出。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些设备不使用任何CPU,例如灯光、装饰、门等。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在Reforged Eden 2中,船体和装甲方块不消耗CPU。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的大部分CPU消耗将来自推进器、发电、武器、制造和护盾。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]控制好你的CPU消耗是很重要的,以防止超过你的CPU限制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可能需要使用在特定角色上表现出色的飞船,而不是一艘什么都做不好的单一飞船。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The health and damage of a NPC is scaled with its level and further multiplied by the [-][/c][c][00ff00]difficulty scaling[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]NPC level only affects the health and damage of NPCs and has no effect on the blocks or weapons of ships and bases nor on loot gained.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In Reforged Eden 2 most NPCs will be between level 1 and 4.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Level 1:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]100% total health and damage.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Level 5:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]166% total health and damage.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]Level 10:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]250% total health and damage.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]NPC的生命值和伤害会随着其等级而缩放,并进一步乘以[-][/c][c][00ff00]难度缩放[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]NPC等级只影响NPC的生命值和伤害,对飞船和基地的方块或武器以及获得的战利品没有影响。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在Reforged Eden 2中,大多数NPC的等级将在1到4级之间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]等级1:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]100%的生命值和伤害。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]等级5:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]166%的生命值和伤害。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]等级10:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]250%的生命值和伤害。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Each block and item in the scenario has a mass and volume.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Containers have limits on how much volume they can hold, and mass affects how well your ship will fly.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If mass and volume are disabled in your game difficulty settings then they will have no effect. Reforged Eden 2 is designed around the mass and volume system being enabled, so disabling it is not recommended nor supported.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
场景中的每个方块和物品都有质量和体积。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]容器对它们能容纳的体积有限制,质量影响你的飞船飞行的性能。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你在游戏难度设置中禁用了质量和体积,那么它们将不会有任何效果。Reforged Eden 2是围绕启用质量和体积系统设计的,因此不推荐也不支持禁用它。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Every block and item takes up volume. The volume of an item is listed on its tooltip.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The exceptions are galactic credits and mission tokens, which take up no volume.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your personal inventory, and each storage container, has a maximum volume capacity. You cannot fit more items into a container than what its volume can hold.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Being in god mode will temporarily allow you to bypass volume limits.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Portable constructors do not use volume.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can see a cargo container's used and maximum volume capacity when you are viewing the cargo container.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i][sub](An example of a cargo container that is using 4000 out of its 8000 volume capacity)[/sub][/i][-][/c]{Eden_VolumeBar.jpg}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]每个方块和物品都占用体积。物品的体积会在其提示中列出。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]银河信用点和任务代币是例外,它们不占用体积。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的个人背包和每个存储容器都有最大体积容量。你不能将超过容器体积可容纳的物品放入容器中。[-][/c]
