[c][abd1ff]处于上帝模式将暂时允许你绕过体积限制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]便携式建造机不占用体积。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你查看货物容器时,你可以看到货物容器的使用和最大体积容量。[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i][sub](一个货物容器使用4000体积容量,最大容量为8000的例子)[/sub][/i][-][/c]{Eden_VolumeBar.jpg}

English:
[c][abd1ff]Each container has a maximum number of inventory slots available.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is separate from any volume limit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is typically 64 or 128 slots, depending on the container type.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot place items into a container if there is not a free inventory slot to place them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most non-unique items can stack. Most components can stack up to 4000 for example.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Unique items, such as hand weapons, armor, and missions tokens, will not stack.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To split a stack in half, pick up the stack with right mouse button.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]While holding a stack, you can place down a single item from the stack with right mouse button.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is no way to pick up a specific quantity of items.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]每个容器都有可用的最大背包格数。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是独立于任何体积限制的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这通常是64或128格,取决于容器类型。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果容器中没有空闲的背包格,你不能将物品放入容器中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数非唯一物品可以堆叠。大多数组件可以堆叠至4000个,例如。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]唯一物品,如手持武器、盔甲和任务代币,不会堆叠。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要将一堆物品分成两半,用右键单击拿起这堆物品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]持有一堆物品时,你可以用右键单击放下这堆中的一个物品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]没有办法拿起特定数量的物品。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Each block or item in your cargo, each block installed on your ship, and fuel in your fuel tanks all add to your ship's total mass.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Docked ships also add to your ship's mass.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items in the player inventory do not add to a ship's mass.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The more mass your ship has the harder it is to turn and accelerate.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Using heavy blocks such as combat steel will lead to a much slower ship than using lighter blocks such as carbon fiber or regular steel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The mass of each block or item can be seen in its tooltip.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view your ship's total mass and propulsion stats in the statistics tab of the control panel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is possible to overload a ship with so much cargo that it cannot take off from a planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]你的飞船货仓中的每个方块或物品,每个安装在飞船上的方块,以及油箱中的燃料,都会增加你飞船的总质量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]停靠的飞船也会增加你飞船的质量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]玩家背包中的物品不会增加飞船的质量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的飞船质量越大,转弯和加速就越困难。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用重型方块,如战斗钢,会使飞船比使用轻质方块,如碳纤维或普通钢,慢得多。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个方块或物品的质量可以在其提示信息中看到。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在控制面板的统计标签中查看你飞船的总质量和推进数据。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有可能用过多的货物超载飞船,使其无法从行星上起飞。[-][/c]
基于质量的最大速度惩罚
基于质量的最大速度惩罚:

English:
[c][abd1ff]There is a hidden penalty to the maximum speed of your ship in a given direction based on your ship's mass/thrust ratio.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If your ship has too little acceleration in a particular direction, your max speed will be less than normal in that direction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A good rule of thumb is that your ship needs at least 25m/s[sup]2[/sup] acceleration in a direction to reach its full speed. Anything less and your max speed will start getting lower and lower, meaning not only will you accelerate slower, but you will reach a slower top speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will still be able to eventually accelerate up to the technical max speed for your ship, just at a much slower rate.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]This is not to be confused with the technical max speed for your ship class which depends on your ship type and whether you are in space or on a planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]你的飞船在某个方向上的最大速度会根据飞船的质量/推力比有一个隐藏的惩罚[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你的飞船在特定方向上的加速度过低，那么在该方向上的最大速度将低于正常值。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一个好的经验法则是，你的飞船需要在某个方向上至少有25m/s[sup]2[/sup]的加速度才能达到全速。如果低于这个值，你的最大速度会越来越低，这意味着你不仅会加速更慢，而且会达到一个更低的最高速度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你仍然可以最终加速到飞船的技术最大速度，只是速度会慢很多。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]这不要与飞船类型的技术最大速度混淆，后者取决于你的飞船类型以及你是在太空中还是在星球上。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Cargo containers are basic storage devices that can be placed on ships and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can be used as inputs and outputs of constructors.[-][/c][c][abd1ff]

They come in several styles that have a set [-][/c][c][00ff00]volume[-][/c][c][abd1ff] capacity.
They are generally better for storing a variety of low volume materials that don't stack together, such as assorted hand weapons, medical supplies, and trade goods.

As their maximum volume capacity is rather low and they cannot be expanded, it is recommended to upgrade to using [-][/c][c][00ff00]container controllers and extensions[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for any bulk storage needs.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be accessed directly, through the control panel, or through logistics.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
货柜是基本的存储设备,可以放置在飞船和基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以用作建造机的输入和输出。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]

它们有几种风格,具有固定的[-][/c][c][00ff00]体积[-][/c][c][abd1ff]容量。
它们通常更适合存储各种体积小且不能堆叠在一起的材料,例如各种手持武器、医疗用品和贸易商品。

由于它们的最大体积容量相当低,且无法扩展,建议升级使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]货柜控制器和扩展[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来满足任何批量存储需求。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以直接访问,也可以通过控制面板或物流系统访问。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Container controllers act as expandable containers. They can have a much higher volume capacity than standard cargo containers and are best used for bulk storage of ore and components and for storing large blocks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can be used as inputs and outputs of constructors.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Y[-][/c][c][abd1ff]ou can increase the volume capacity of a container controller by placing [-][/c][c][00ff00]container extensions[-][/c][c][abd1ff] next to it or next to any other container extension that can form a physical link to it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Basically they act like big, modular cargo containers.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Container Controller:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can act as a standalone container, or be placed physically touching one or more container extensions to increase its volume capacity.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A container controller cannot be placed directly adjacent to another container controller, or adjacent to any extensions that are part of another container controller's set.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is a maximum limit to how much you can increase a controller's volume via extensions.
They can be accessed directly, through the control panel, or through logistics.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Harvest Controller:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A container controller used in combination with drills or tool turrets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Materials harvested from ship mounted drills or tools will be automatically deposited into available harvest controllers.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Drills and tools require a harvest controller to harvest materials.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Has a lower maximum volume capacity and inventory slot limit than standard container controllers.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Ammunition Controller:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Used to store ammunition to reload ship mounted turrets and weapons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Weapons require ammunition to be stored in an ammunition controller to be used for reloading.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Has a lower maximum volume capacity and inventory slot limit than standard container controllers.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]容器控制器作为可扩展的货柜。它们可以比标准货柜有更高的体积容量,最适合用于大量存储矿石和组件,以及存储大型方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以用作建造机的输入和输出。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以通过放置[-][/c][c][00ff00]货柜扩展[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在容器控制器旁边或任何其他可以形成物理链接的货柜扩展旁边来增加容器控制器的体积容量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]基本上它们就像大型的模块化货柜。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]容器控制器:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以作为独立的货柜使用,或者放置在物理接触一个或多个货柜扩展以增加其体积容量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]容器控制器不能直接放置在另一个容器控制器旁边,或者放置在任何属于另一个容器控制器集合的扩展旁边。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通过扩展增加控制器的体积有一个最大限制。
它们可以直接访问,也可以通过控制面板或物流系统访问。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]收获控制器:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]与钻机或工具炮结合使用的容器控制器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]从飞船安装的钻机或工具收获的材料将自动存入可用的收获控制器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]钻机和工具需要一个收获控制器来收获材料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]比标准容器控制器有更低的最大体积容量和库存槽限制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]弹药控制器:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]用于存储弹药以重新装填飞船安装的炮塔和武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]武器需要弹药存储在弹药控制器中才能用于重新装填。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]比标准容器控制器有更低的最大体积容量和库存槽限制。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Extensions are used to increase the volume capacity of a linked [-][/c][c][00ff00]container controller[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Container Extension:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Increases the volume capacity of its linked container controller.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To link to a container controller, extensions must be placed adjacent to a container controller, or adjacent to any other extension that has a physical link to a container controller.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Extensions cannot be linked to two controllers at the same time. You will be unable to place an extension if it would cause two controllers to be linked to the same set of extensions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Extensions can be textured and shaped. Smaller shapes contribute less volume capacity.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Example:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In the image to the right, the 4 green extensions are linked to the blue controller giving that controller a total volume capacity of 40,000.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The red extension is not physically adjacent to any controller or extensions, so it is not contributing.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]扩展用于增加链接的[-][/c][c][00ff00]容器控制器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的体积容量。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]容器扩展器:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]增加其链接容器控制器的体积容量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要链接到容器控制器,扩展必须放置在容器控制器旁边,或者放置在任何其他有物理链接到容器控制器的扩展旁边。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]扩展不能同时链接到两个控制器。如果放置扩展会导致两个控制器链接到同一组扩展,你将无法放置扩展。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]扩展可以进行纹理和形状设计。较小的形状贡献的体积容量较少。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]示例:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在右侧的图像中,4个绿色扩展链接到蓝色控制器,使该控制器的总体积容量达到40,000。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]红色扩展没有物理接触任何控制器或扩展,因此它没有贡献。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The logistics system allows you to easily transfer items directly from one container to another and to remotely access containers on a ship or base you own without having to physically access them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is used to move or place items too large to put in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Logistics can only access structures that are within logistics range.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]By default you must be standing on or very close to a structure.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Add [-][/c][c][00ff00]matter transceivers[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to a ship or base to increase the range you can access it via logistics.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]物流系统允许你轻松地将物品直接从一个容器转移到另一个容器,并且可以远程访问你拥有的飞船或基地上的容器,而无需物理访问它们。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它用于移动或放置太大而无法放入个人库存的物品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]物流只能访问在物流范围内的结构。
默认情况下,你必须站在或非常靠近一个结构。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通过在飞船或基地上添加[-][/c][c][00ff00]物质传输器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来增加你可以通过物流访问的范围。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]To access the logistics menu, either access a container, or press [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(LogisticsMenu)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In this menu you will see your personal inventory on the left and the container on the right.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Using the dropdown boxes along the top, you can change which structure and container you are looking at on either side.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This allows you to transfer items from a container on one ship directly to another container on a completely different ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot access containers of two different ships at the same time if one or both of them are in motion.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Containers in the logistics menu are sorted alphabetically.[-][/c]


[c][00afff]Select the structure:[-][/c] {Eden_LogisticsShipBox.jpg}

[c][00afff]Select the container:[-][/c] {Eden_LogisticsContainerBox.jpg}

[c][00afff]Or you can access the fuel, oxygen, or pentaxid tank:[-][/c] {Eden_LogisticsFuelBox.jpg}[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]要访问物流菜单,可以打开一个容器,或者按下[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(LogisticsMenu)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在这个菜单中,你会在左侧看到你的个人库存,右侧是容器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
使用顶部的下拉框,你可以改变你正在查看的结构和容器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这允许你将一个船上的容器中的物品直接转移到另一个完全不同的船上的另一个容器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果两艘船中的一艘或两艘都在移动,你不能同时访问。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]物流菜单中的容器是按字母顺序排序的。[-][/c]


[c][00afff]选择结构:[-][/c] {Eden_LogisticsShipBox.jpg}

[c][00afff]选择容器:[-][/c] {Eden_LogisticsContainerBox.jpg}

[c][00afff]或者你可以访问燃料、氧气或翘曲水晶罐:[-][/c] {Eden_LogisticsFuelBox.jpg}[c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The connected toolbar gives you a second toolbar that is stored on the container you are [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to as long as you remain within logistics range.[-][/c][c][abd1ff]
The connected toolbar can be used for several tasks involving items too large to fit in your personal inventory.

To use the connected toolbar, [-][/c][c][00ff00]connect[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to a container.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can swap between your personal toolbar and connected toolbar with [-][/c][c][ffff00](T)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (default hotkey), [-][/c][c][abd1ff]pressing the wireless button on your toolbar, or hitting a number key twice.[-][/c]
[i][sub][c][c8c8c8](Your toolbar will turn orange when the connected toolbar is active.)[-][/c][/sub][/i]{Eden_LogisticToolbar.png}[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Placing blocks:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Place blocks too large to fit into your personal inventory onto your connected toolbar and then you can place them in the world.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Retrieving output or refueling auto miners and water extractors:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can place fuel on your connected toolbar and then put the fuel into the auto miner's fuel input.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can take outputs from auto miners or water extractors and place it onto your connected toolbar. [-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Inputting resources into the blueprint factory:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can place blocks or items onto your connected toolbar then move them from your toolbar to your factory input to add them to your factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Trading:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can place items too large to fit in your personal inventory on the connected toolbar to sell them to [-][/c][c][00ff00]traders[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff8000]Warning:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items placed on your connected toolbar will automatically return to the container if you lose logistics connection.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]However this may not happen if you lose connection due to a game crash or are disconnected from a server.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In this case you may lose the items that were on your connected toolbar.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]连接工具栏为你提供了第二个工具栏,它存储在你连接的容器上,只要你保持在物流范围内。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]
连接工具栏可用于涉及太大而无法放入个人库存中的物品的多项任务。

要使用连接工具栏,[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接[-][/c][c][abd1ff]到一个容器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用[-][/c][c][ffff00](T)[-][/c][c][abd1ff](默认快捷键),按下工具栏上的无线按钮,或双击数字键来在你的个人工具栏和连接工具栏之间切换。[-][/c]
[i][sub][c][c8c8c8](当你的连接工具栏激活时,工具栏会变成橙色。)[-][/c][/sub][/i]{Eden_LogisticToolbar.png}[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]放置方块:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将太大而无法放入你个人库存的方块放置到你的连接工具栏上,然后你可以将它们放置在世界中。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]取回输出或为自动矿机和水提取器加油:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在连接工具栏上放置燃料,然后将燃料放入自动矿机的燃料输入口。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以从自动矿机或水提取器上取回输出,并将其放置到你的连接工具栏上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]将资源输入到蓝图工厂:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以将方块或物品放置到你的连接工具栏上,然后将它们从工具栏移动到工厂输入口以添加到你的工厂。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]交易:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以将太大而无法放入你个人库存的物品放置在连接工具栏上,然后将它们卖给[-][/c][c][00ff00]商人[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff8000]警告:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]放置在你的连接工具栏上的物品,如果你失去物流连接,将自动返回到容器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]但是,如果你因为游戏崩溃或与服务器断开连接而失去连接,这可能不会发生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在这种情况下,你可能丢失了在你的连接工具栏上的物品。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
You can connect to a container using the logistics system.

While connected to a container, any items that you harvest, any items bought from a trader, and any items looted off the ground from drop boxes or debris will automatically be deposited into your connected container.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Allows access to the [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you move out of logistics range of the container you will lose the connection.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Connecting to a container:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Select a container on the right side of the [-][/c][c][00ff00]logistics menu[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and then press the wireless button to connect to it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The background of the container will turn orange when you are connected and it will appear at the top of the logistics container list.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
你可以使用物流系统连接到一个容器。

连接到容器时,你收获的任何物品、从商人那里购买的任何物品,以及从地面上的掉落箱或残骸中拾取的任何物品都会自动存入你连接的容器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]允许访问[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你从容器的物流范围外移动,你将失去连接。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]连接到容器:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在[-][/c][c][00ff00]物流菜单[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的右侧选择一个容器,然后按下无线按钮连接到它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你连接时,容器的背景会变成橙色,并且它将出现在物流容器列表的顶部。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Matter Transceivers are essential devices that increase the range you can access a structure's logistics.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Multiple can be placed on ships or bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each transceiver allows logistics access in a radius centered on the transceiver.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Adding multiple transceivers does not increase the total range but can allow for more coverage area if spread out.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Transceivers come in multiple tiers with increasing ranges.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Transceivers can work even without power.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]物质传输器是必不可少的设备,它们增加了你可以访问结构物流的范围。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以被放置在飞船或基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个传输器允许以传输器为中心的半径内访问物流。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]增加多个传输器不会增加总范围,但如果分散开来,可以允许更多的覆盖区域。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]传输器有多个等级,范围逐渐增加。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]传输器即使没有电力也可以工作。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff][-][/c]

Can be looted from alien containers. Bought and sold at traders.

Can be purchased from Bertram's Arms traders in most trading stations and from Spaceport traders, Colonist and Pirate Salvagers, P3: Polaris Planetside Production, Zero Horizons Manufacturing, Hover Mechanics, Shipyard traders, and Plumas Ice Mining traders, 

[c][c8c8c8]A thruster reaction chamber module used to convert waste from a ship's generators into ionized gases to be used as propellant for increased thrust.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Used to upgrade an Ion Thruster into a Plasma Thruster.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff][-][/c]

不常见
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]来源:[-][/c]
可以从外星容器中拾取。在交易者处购买和销售。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]备注:[-][/c]
可以从大多数贸易站的Bertram's Arms交易者和太空港交易者、殖民者和海盗打捞者、P3:极星行星侧生产、零地平线制造、悬浮机制、造船厂交易者和Plumas Ice Mining交易者处购买,

[c][c8c8c8]一种推力反应室模块,用于将飞船发电机的废物转换为离子化气体,用作推进剂以增加推力。[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]用于将离子推进器升级为等离子推进器。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff][-][/c]

Rare
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Source:[-][/c]
Can be looted from alien containers. Bought and sold at traders.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Notes:[-][/c]
Can be purchased from Chromium-Sierra, Spaceport traders, and Shipyard traders.

[c][c8c8c8]A dual ring-type particle accelerator encasing a reaction chamber where particles of radioactive waste from a ship's power system are collided to produce antimatter and channel the subsequent explosion as propulsion.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Used to upgrade a Plasma Thruster into an Antimatter Thruster.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff][-][/c]

稀有
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]来源:[-][/c]
可以从外星容器中拾取。在交易者处购买和销售。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]备注:[-][/c]
可以从Chromium-Sierra、太空港交易者和造船厂交易者处购买。

[c][c8c8c8]一种双环型粒子加速器,包裹着一个反应室,其中来自飞船动力系统的放射性废物粒子被碰撞以产生反物质,并将随后的爆炸作为推进力。[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]用于将等离子推进器升级为反物质推进器。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Generates power, increasing maximum power output per generator.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Counts as an active power system.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires at least one [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel tank[-][/c][c][abd1ff] with [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to operate.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If your CPU efficiency is below 100%, your generator maximum output is reduced.
If power consumption exceeds maximum power output, generators can overload and explode.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Generators have 100% power efficiency and generators only consume fuel equal to the power actually being used.[-][/c]

[c][00ff00]Solar[-][/c][c][abd1ff] power is used first if available.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Comes in multiple tiers. Higher tiers are more CPU efficient.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
生成电力,提高每个发电机的最大电力输出。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]被视为一个活跃的电力系统。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]至少需要一个带有[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的[-][/c][c][00ff00]油箱[-][/c][c][abd1ff]才能运行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你的CPU效率低于100%,你的发电机最大输出将会降低。
如果电力消耗超过最大电力输出,发电机可能会过载并爆炸。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]发电机具有100%的电力效率,并且发电机仅消耗实际使用中的电力等量的燃料。[-][/c]

[c][00ff00]太阳能[-][/c][c][abd1ff]如果可用,将首先使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有多个等级。等级越高,CPU效率越高。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Stores [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for use with [-][/c][c][00ff00]generators[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]fusion reactors[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Multiple fuel tanks stack and increase your total fuel capacity.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Can accept various forms of fuel items.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Fuel can be removed from fuel tanks in the form of fuel cells.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Fuel is consumed over time based on total power consumption.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Solar[-][/c][c][abd1ff] power may reduce or even eliminate fuel use.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Power is consumed even when you are away as long as the single player game or multiplayer server is actively running so plan your fuel levels accordingly.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]储存[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c][c][abd1ff],用于[-][/c][c][00ff00]发电机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]聚变反应堆[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]多个燃料箱可以堆叠,增加你的总燃料容量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以接受各种形式的燃料物品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]燃料可以从燃料箱中以燃料电池的形式移除。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]燃料会根据总电力消耗随时间消耗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]太阳能[-][/c][c][abd1ff]电力可能会减少甚至完全消除燃料的使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只要你的单人游戏或多人服务器正在积极运行,即使你不在线,电力也会被消耗,因此请相应规划你的燃料水平。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Fusion reactors are [-][/c][c][00ff00]generators[-][/c][c][abd1ff] that can produce vast amounts of power at a high CPU efficiency.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Counts as an active power system.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Like generators, they require [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel tanks[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]They give a slight boost to [-][/c][c][00ff00]shield recharge rate[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]They incur a passive drain on your power supply, reducing fuel efficiency.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]聚变反应堆是[-][/c][c][00ff00]发电机[-][/c][c][abd1ff],能够以高CPU效率产生大量的电力。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]被视为一个活跃的电力系统。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]像发电机一样,它们需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料箱[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们会略微提高[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾再充电速率[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们会对你的电力供应造成被动损耗,降低燃料效率。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Stores excess power generated by [-][/c][c][00ff00]solar panels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] on a base. More capacitors increases maximum storage capacity.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Counts as an active power system.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can only be charged from solar panels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If power consumption is negative (from passive power systems) and solar panels are installed, the negative power consumption will also charge capacitors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Capacitor charge will drain if power consumption is more than the output of solar panel output. It will charge if consumption is less than solar panel output.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Capacitor charge cannot be transferred to other structures.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Capacitor will continue to charge or drain when away from the area as long as the save game is running.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Cannot be used on ships.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]存储由基地上的[-][/c][c][00ff00]太阳能板[-][/c][c][abd1ff]生成的过剩电力。更多的电容器可以增加最大存储容量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]被视为一个活跃的电力系统。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只能通过太阳能板充电。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果电力消耗为负(来自被动电力系统)且安装了太阳能板,负电力消耗也会充电电容器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果电力消耗大于太阳能板输出,电容器的充电量将会耗尽。如果消耗小于太阳能板输出,它将会充电。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]电容器的充电量不能转移到其他结构。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只要保存的游戏正在运行,即使远离区域,电容器也会继续充电或耗尽。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不能在飞船上使用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Solar power uses [-][/c][c][00ff00]solar panels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to charge [-][/c][c][00ff00]solar capacitors[-][/c][c][abd1ff] on a base.
Solar power is best used on bases close to a star in space or on planets with a thin atmosphere and clear weather.

Solar can struggle in some locations and will provide inconsistent power but can still help reduce average fuel consumption.
Solar power is best used on smaller, power efficient bases or to improve fuel economy on larger bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Output is dependent on distance from the primary star, angle of the solar panels, obstructions, time of day, atmospheric density, current weather, light level of the planet, and latitude on the planet.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Solar power is best used within 2.5AU of a star. After that distance it can begin to sharply drop off.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
太阳能电力使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]太阳能板[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来为基地上的[-][/c][c][00ff00]太阳能电容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]充电。
太阳能电力最适合在空间靠近恒星的基地或在大气层稀薄且天气晴朗的行星上使用。

太阳能在某些地点可能会遇到困难,将提供不稳定的电力,但仍然可以帮助减少平均燃料消耗。
太阳能电力最适合在较小、电力效率高的基地上使用,或在较大的基地上改善燃料经济性。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]输出取决于与主要恒星的距离、太阳能板的角度、障碍物、一天中的时间、大气密度、当前天气、行星的光照水平和行星上的纬度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]太阳能电力最好在距离恒星2.5天文单位(AU)以内使用。超过这个距离,它的输出可能会急剧下降。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Produces power from sunlight and charges [-][/c][c][00ff00]solar capacitors[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Only works with the system's primary star, not secondary stars.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires clear line of sight to the star.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Green lights indicate the average efficiency based on location and angle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Yellow lights indicate the current efficiency and will vary with weather and time of day.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Comes in multiple sizes. Sizes share a limit so it's recommended to use the largest ones possible.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]从阳光中产生电力并为[-][/c][c][00ff00]太阳能电容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]充电。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只能与系统的主要恒星一起工作,而不是次要恒星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要对恒星有清晰的视线。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]绿灯表示基于位置和角度的平均效率。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]黄灯表示当前效率,会随着天气和一天中的时间变化而变化。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有多种尺寸可供选择。尺寸共享一个限制,因此建议尽可能使用最大的尺寸。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_FuelTypesBar.png}Fuel is required to be placed into [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel tanks[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to power [-][/c][c][00ff00]generators[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]fusion reactors[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Fuel is also required for atmospheric condensers, water extractors, and auto mining devices.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To fill a fuel tank, access the fuel tank directly or through the control panel, then insert items into the fuel tank to be converted into raw fuel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There are multiple types of fuel, with each tier storing more fuel per item.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Fuel can be crafted in a constructor.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Raw Fuel:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the fuel stored in fuel tanks. Required to run your ship or base if using generators or fusion reactors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Fuel items inserted into fuel tanks are automatically converted into raw fuel.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Biodiesel:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The most basic fuel source. Good for getting off your starting planet or for emergencies.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Bioethanol:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A renewable fuel source. More costly to create than biodiesel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Fuel Cell:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your standard Promethium based fuel source.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Dual Fuel Cell:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A more energy dense version of the fuel cell.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Promethium Hydrocell:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The ultimate form of fuel. Contains a large amount of energy but requires more materials to craft.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_FuelTypesBar.png}燃料需要放置到[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料箱[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中以驱动[-][/c][c][00ff00]发电机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]聚变反应堆[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]燃料同样用于大气凝结器、水提取器和自动采矿设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要给燃料箱加油,可以直接访问燃料箱或通过控制面板,然后将物品插入燃料箱以转化为原始燃料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有多种类型的燃料,每种等级的物品储存的燃料量更多。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]燃料可以在建造机中制作。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]原始燃料:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是储存在燃料箱中的燃料。如果使用发电机或聚变反应堆,这是运行你的飞船或基地所需的燃料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]插入燃料箱的燃料物品会自动转化为原始燃料。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]生物柴油:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]最基本的燃料来源。适合从起始星球出发或应急使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]生物乙醇:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一种可再生的燃料来源。比生物柴油的制作成本更高。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]燃料电池:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的标准钷基燃料来源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]双燃料电池:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]燃料电池的能量密度更高版本。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]钷氢燃料电池:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]燃料的终极形式。含有大量能量,但需要更多材料来制作。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]These stats are shown in the Statistics tab of the control panel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Max Output and Current Output:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the maximum amount of power your [-][/c][c][00ff00]generators[-][/c][c][abd1ff] are capable of producing.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is not how much power they are currently producing, only their technical max.
If your consumption exceeds your max output your generators will overload and start taking damage, eventually exploding.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Consumption:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is how much power your ship or base is currently using.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] use is based on your consumption.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Turning off devices will lower consumption.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If consumption is 0 or below, your structure will not use fuel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Fuel:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]How much fuel is currently stored in your [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel tanks[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Solar Current Output:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]How much power your solar panels are currently producing.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Solar Average Output:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]How much power your solar panels will produce on average throughout the day, taking into account the day/night cycle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Battery:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]How much energy currently stored in your [-][/c][c][00ff00]solar capacitors[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Power Left:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Time in hours and minutes that your structure can remain powered, based on current consumption, battery charge, and remaining fuel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这些统计数据显示在控制面板的统计标签中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]最大输出和当前输出:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是你的[-][/c][c][00ff00]发电机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]能够产生的最大功率。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这不是它们当前产生的电量,只是技术最大值。
如果你的消耗超过最大输出,你的发电机将过载并开始受损,最终爆炸。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]消耗:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是你的飞船或基地当前使用的电力量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c][c][abd1ff]使用基于你的消耗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]关闭设备将降低消耗。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果消耗为0或以下,你的结构将不使用燃料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]燃料:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你当前储存在[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料箱[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中的燃料量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]太阳能当前输出:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的太阳能板当前产生的电力量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]太阳能平均输出:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的太阳能板在一天中平均产生的电力量,考虑到日/夜循环。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]电池:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你当前储存在[-][/c][c][00ff00]太阳能电容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中的能量量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]剩余电力:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]基于当前消耗、电池充电和剩余燃料,你的结构可以保持供电的小时和分钟数。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Eating food restores your food bar.
If your food bar reaches 0 you will begin to starve.[-][/c]
See [c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c] - [c][00ff00]Player Stats and Hud Elements[-][/c].

You can craft food in a suit constructor, portable constructor, or food processor or buy food from traders.
Most food will spoil after a time if not kept in a [c][00ff00]fridge[-][/c].

Different food can have different uses. There is no single best food option.

[c][00afff]Raw food:[-][/c]
Eating raw food can poison you or lead to other [c][00ff00]negative status effects[-][/c].
Always make sure to process food first.

[c][00afff]Cooked food:[-][/c]
Eating cooked food can restore a combination of food, health, stamina, and give you beneficial status effects.

[c][00afff]Drinks:[-][/c]
Drinks typically restore stamina or give you a buff.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]食用食物可以恢复你的食物条。
如果你的食物条达到0,你将开始挨饿。[-][/c]
查看 [c][00ff00]机制[-][/c] - [c][00ff00]玩家状态和HUD元素[-][/c]。

你可以在太空服建造机、便携式建造机或食品处理器中制作食物,或者从商人那里购买食物。
大多数食物如果不用[c][00ff00]冰箱[-][/c]保存,一段时间后会变质。

不同的食物可能有不同的用途。没有单一的最佳食物选择。

[c][00afff]生食:[-][/c]
食用生食可能会导致你中毒或导致其他[c][00ff00]负面状态效果[-][/c]。
总是确保先加工食物。

[c][00afff]熟食:[-][/c]
食用熟食可以同时恢复食物、健康、耐力,并给你带来有益的状态效果。

[c][00afff]饮品:[-][/c]
饮品通常可以恢复耐力或给你增益效果。

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Fridges are devices that can be placed on a ship or base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
While powered, they will prevent food stored inside of them from spoiling.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view the perish time of food on the food's tooltip.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Fridges come in different shapes which have different volume capacities.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
冰箱是一种可以放置在飞船或基地上的设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
在供电状态下,它们可以防止存放在其中的食物变质。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在食物的工具提示上查看食物的变质时间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]冰箱有不同的形状,具有不同的容量。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]A food processor is a type of [-][/c][c][00ff00]constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] used to craft [-][/c][c][00ff00]food[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]medical items[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]farming[-][/c][c][abd1ff] supplies.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be placed on ships and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The crafting input and output must be linked to a container, typically a fridge.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]食品处理器是一种[c][00ff00]建造机[-][/c],用于制作[c][00ff00]食物[-][/c],[c][00ff00]医疗物品[-][/c],以及[c][00ff00]农业[-][/c]用品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以放置在飞船和基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]制作输入和输出必须链接到一个容器,通常是冰箱。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Farming is the process of growing crops on your capital vessel or base to periodically harvest them for a renewable source of [-][/c][c][00ff00]food[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or [-][/c][c][00ff00]medical[-][/c][c][abd1ff] items.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot grow crops on hover vessels or small vessels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There are many crops available to grow, each with their own growth timers, yield, and resource outputs.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some food items require [-][/c][c][00ff00]commodities[-][/c][c][abd1ff] that you cannot grow or craft yourself.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]While harvesting crops, it can be useful to [-][/c][c][00ff00]connect[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to a [-][/c][c][00ff00]fridge[-][/c][c][abd1ff] using [-][/c][c][00ff00]logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]农业是在您的主力舰或基地上种植作物的过程,以定期收获它们作为可再生的[-][/c][c][00ff00]食物[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或[-][/c][c][00ff00]医疗[-][/c][c][abd1ff]物品来源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您不能在悬浮飞船或小型飞船上种植作物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有许多作物可供种植,每种作物都有自己的生长时间、产量和资源产出。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些食物项目需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]商品[-][/c][c][abd1ff],您不能自己种植或制作。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]在收割作物时,使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将它们[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接[-][/c][c][abd1ff]到一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]冰箱[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可能会很有用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]When planted, sprouts will eventually grow into a full grown crop that can be harvested.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be crafted in a food processor, bought from Grimgar's Garden traders in most trading stations, or looted.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Sprouts must face upright and cannot be rotated to face any other direction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If your ship or base was built with an incorrectly oriented starter block, you might not be able to grow crops in the orientation that you expect.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff]Crops require specific conditions to grow:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-[-][/c][c][00ff00]Temperature[-][/c][c][abd1ff] range between 15C and 35C (59F to 95F)[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-[-][/c][c][00ff00]Radiation[-][/c][c][abd1ff] less than 0.4R.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-Oxygenated environment. Crops do not consume oxygen but they do require the room they are in to have oxygen.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-Placed on top of a [-][/c][c][00ff00]Hydroponics Unit[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-Placed under a [-][/c][c][00ff00]Hydroponics Lamp[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or with an open, completely unobstructed view of the sky.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Crops can also die if exposed to conditions that are too extreme.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is best to grow crops in a sealed environment to prevent harsh weather from killing them.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Sprouts or fully grown crops are not allowed to be saved in blueprints. Remove them before saving.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]种植后,芽苗最终会长成成熟的作物,可以收获。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在食品加工器中制作,在大多数贸易空间站的Grimgar's Garden商人那里购买,或者被掠夺。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
芽苗必须垂直放置,并且不能旋转以面向任何其他方向。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您的船或基地是用方向不正确的起始块建造的,您可能无法以您期望的方向种植作物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][00afff]作物需要特定的条件才能生长:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-[-][/c][c][00ff00]温度[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在15C和35C(59F到95F)之间[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-[-][/c][c][00ff00]辐射[-][/c][c][abd1ff]小于0.4R。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-氧气环境。作物不消耗氧气,但它们确实需要它们所在的房间有氧气。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-放置在[-][/c][c][00ff00]水培单元[-][/c][c][abd1ff]上面。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-放置在[-][/c][c][00ff00]水培灯[-][/c][c][abd1ff]下或具有完全无遮挡的开阔天空视野。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果作物暴露在过于极端的条件下,它们也可能死亡。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]最好在封闭环境中种植作物,以防止恶劣天气杀死它们。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]芽苗或成熟的作物不允许保存在蓝图中。在保存之前请将它们移除。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Hydroponics Unit is a block that can be placed on capital vessels or bases that allow you to grow crops.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be crafted in a constructor, bought from traders, or salvaged.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A single [-][/c][c][00ff00]sprout[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can be placed directly on top of them.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]水培单元是一个可以放置在主力舰或基地上的方块,允许您种植作物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在建造机中制作,从商人那里购买,或被回收。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一个单一的[-][/c][c][00ff00]芽苗[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可以直接放置在它们的上面。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Hydroponics Lamps are required to grow crops indoors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They must be turned on to work.

A single lamp will cover a 3x3 area below itself.
The lamp should be placed directly above the [-][/c][c][00ff00]sprouts[-][/c][c][abd1ff], such that there is a 1 block space between the [-][/c][c][00ff00]hydroponics unit[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and the lamp.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]You can see an example in the image on the right of a proper farming setup.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A single grow lamp is on the ceiling, illuminating a 3x3 area of tomato sprouts directly under it, which are themselves planted on a 3x3 set of hydroponics units.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]室内种植作物需要使用水培灯。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们必须被打开才能发挥作用。
一个水培灯可以覆盖其下方的3x3区域。
水培灯应该直接放置在[-][/c][c][00ff00]萌芽[-][/c][c][abd1ff]上方,使得[-][/c][c][00ff00]水培单元[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和水培灯之间有1个方块的空间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以看到右侧图片中的一个正确农业设置的示例。
一个单独的生长灯在天花板上,照亮了它正下方的3x3区域的番茄萌芽,这些萌芽本身种植在3x3的水培单元上。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Crops grow in different stages, with each stage having a different appearance.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some crops have only 2 stages while others can have multiple.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can pick up all stages of crops as a sprout using a multitool.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Sprout:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the earliest stage of a freshly planted crop.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Growing:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These are stages where the crop is still growing and is not yet ready for harvest.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Pre-harvest:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The crop is almost ready to harvest and the next stage will be harvestable.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some crops revert to this stage once harvested so they do not need to fully grow again.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Harvestable:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This stage is ready for harvest. Walk up to it and press [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to harvest it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once harvested, the crop will revert to an earlier stage and can be harvested again at a later time.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Dead:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Something went wrong! Your crops are dead.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most likely your crops were exposed to harsh environmental conditions due to a power loss or hull breach.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]作物在不同的生长阶段有不同的外观。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些作物只有两个阶段,而其他作物可能有多个阶段。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用多功能工具将所有阶段的作物作为幼苗捡起来。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]幼苗:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是新种植作物的最早阶段。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]生长中:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些阶段的作物仍在生长,尚未准备好收获。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]即将收获:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]作物几乎准备好收获,下一阶段将是可收获的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些作物收获后会恢复到这个阶段,因此它们不需要再次完全生长。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]可收获:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这个阶段已经准备好收获。走到它旁边并按下 [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 来收获它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦收获,作物将恢复到早期阶段,并可以在以后的某个时间再次收获。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]死亡:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]出问题了!你的作物死了。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]最有可能的原因是作物由于断电或船体破裂而暴露在恶劣的环境条件下。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Hydroponics Bays are designed for large scale factory farms.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They allow you to harvest the equivalent of 9 crops with a single button press, saving time and key presses when harvesting large farms.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They have only 2 grow stages.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be unlocked in the tech tree and crafted in a [-][/c][c][00ff00]food processor[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The empty hydroponics bay can be placed as decoration, but is otherwise only used as a crafting ingredient for the different types of hydroponics bays.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hydroponics bays effectively function just like a [-][/c][c][00ff00]sprout[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in all respects except a [-][/c][c][abd1ff]single hydroponics bay takes up a 3x3 area of block space instead of a single block space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They have the same environmental requirements and can still die.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If the crops in a hydroponics bay die, the bay reverts to an empty hydroponics bay.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They must be placed directly on top of a single hydroponics unit, just like you would a sprout.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They still require a hydroponics lamp to be placed directly above them, just like you would a sprout.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hydroponics bays are not allowed to be saved in blueprints. Remove them before saving.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can see an example in the image on the right of a proper farming setup.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A single grow lamp is on the ceiling, illuminating the hydroponics bay directly under it, which is itself planted on top of a single hydroponics unit (not visible since the bay covers it completely).[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]水培舱专为大规模工厂化农场设计。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们允许你通过一次按键操作收获相当于9个作物的量,节省了时间并减少了收获大型农场时的按键次数。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们只有两个生长阶段。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在科技树中解锁,并在 [-][/c][c][00ff00]食品加工器[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 中制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]空的水培舱可以作为装饰品放置,但除此之外,它仅用作不同类型水培舱的制造原料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]水培舱在所有方面都有效地像一个 [-][/c][c][00ff00]幼苗[-][/c][c][abd1ff],除了 [-][/c][c][abd1ff]单个水培舱占用了一个3x3的方块空间而不是一个单独的方块空间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们有相同的环境要求,仍然可能死亡。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果水培舱中的作物死亡,舱位将恢复为空水培舱。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们必须直接放置在单个水培单元的顶部,就像你会放置一个幼苗一样。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们仍然需要一个水培灯直接放置在它们上面,就像你会对一个幼苗一样。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不允许在蓝图中保存水培舱。保存前请先移除它们。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在右侧的图片中看到一个合适的农业设置示例。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一个单一的生长灯在天花板上,直接照亮下面的水培舱,而水培舱本身则种植在一个单独的水培单元上(不可见,因为舱位完全覆盖了它)。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Crafting is the process of using a constructor to turn raw components into a new item.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This section will not go over any special crafting such as the research computers on UCH Research Vessels.
There are several types of constructors, and some work differently than others.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some items require specific constructor types to craft.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items in the tech tree show colored dots on their icon to show which type of constructors they can be crafted in.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The constructors in the list here are colored accordingly.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items shown in red means you do not have enough resources to craft that item.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items shown in blue with a lock symbol means you need to unlock it in the tech tree [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or via a [-][/c][c][00ff00]schematic[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Crafting will continue when you are away from the area as long as the game is running, or when you are logged off on a 24/7 dedicated server.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]However there may be inconsistencies with crafting calculations in these cases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For most reliable crafting it's recommended to stay in the area.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Constructors cannot deposit items into a cargo container that is currently being accessed by a player and will pause their construction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Constructors will also pause construction if the output container runs out of volume or inventory slots.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]制造是使用建造机将原材料转化为新物品的过程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这一节不会涵盖任何特殊制造,例如UCH研究飞船上的研究计算机。
有几种类型的建造机,有些工作方式与其他的不同。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有些物品需要特定类型的建造机来制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]科技树中的物品会在它们的图标上显示彩色点,以显示它们可以在哪种类型的建造机中制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这里列表中的建造机也相应地着色。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示为红色的项目意味着你没有足够的资源来制造该物品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示为蓝色且带有锁形符号的项目意味着你需要在科技树[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中解锁它或通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来解锁。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你不在该区域时,只要游戏在运行,或者你在24/7专用服务器上注销,制造就会继续进行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]然而在这些情况下,制造计算可能会有不一致之处。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为了最可靠的制造,建议留在该区域内。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建造机不能向当前玩家正在访问的货物集装箱存放物品,并且会暂停它们的建造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果输出集装箱的体积或库存槽位用完,建造机也会暂停建造。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In any constructor menu, hovering over a craftable item will show you its crafting time and material cost in the tooltip, as well as indicate which components you have, which components you can craft, and which components you are unable to craft.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Components in green:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You have all the required quantity of this component.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This color and the yellow color look very similar on the tooltip, making it easy to confuse the two.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Components in yellow:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You do not have enough of this component but you have enough materials to craft it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This does not take into account any other components you may also need to craft, so even if all components needed are showing in yellow it does not mean you have enough materials to craft ALL required components.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If the item is still showing in red in the constructor then you do not have enough materials to craft the item.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]Components in red:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You do not have enough of this component and you cannot craft it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在任何建造机菜单中,将鼠标悬停在可制作的物品上会显示其制作时间和材料成本,以及你所拥有的组件、你可以制作哪些组件,以及你无法制作哪些组件。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]绿色组件:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你拥有这个组件所需的所有数量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这种颜色和黄色非常相似,很容易混淆。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]黄色组件:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你没有足够的这个组件,但你有足够的材料来制作它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这不包括你可能还需要制作的其他组件,所以即使所有需要的组件都显示为黄色,也不意味着你有足够的材料来制作所有必需的组件。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果物品在建造机中仍然显示为红色,那么你没有足够的材料来制作这个物品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]红色组件:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你没有足够的这个组件,你无法制作它。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The below sections will go over what the different parts of the normal constructor interface are.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Only applies to normal constructors on ships and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
The suit constructor, portable constructor, furnace, and deconstructor use a different interface.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]以下部分将介绍普通建造机界面的不同部分。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]仅适用于飞船和基地上的普通建造机。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
便携建造机、熔炉和解构器使用不同的界面。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]This section is where you can assign the containers your constructor will use for input and output.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Constructors have no internal inventory of their own and must use a container to pull materials from and to output finished items.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The containers must be on the same ship or base as the constructor.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot interact with the contents of these containers in this screen but there is a button you can press to open them for convenience.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这个部分是你可以分配建造机将使用的容器作为输入和输出的地方。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建造机没有自己的内部库存,必须使用容器来提取材料和输出成品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]容器必须和建造机在同一艘飞船或基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你不能在这个屏幕上与这些容器的内容进行交互,但有一个按钮可以按下以方便地打开它们。[-][/c]

English: \n[c][abd1ff]This button can be used to turn the constructor on or off.[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]Constructors use a small amount of power while on even when not crafting and use a lot more when actively crafting.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]这个按钮可以用来开启或关闭建造机。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]建造机即使在不制造物品时也会消耗少量电力,而在积极制造时会消耗更多。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]This is the current construction queue.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items in the top row are your queued crafting jobs.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items in the bottom row are any sub-components queued up to complete the item the constructor is currently working on.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]You can cancel a crafting job by clicking on an item in the top row:[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Left Mouse:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Remove 1 from crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + Left Mouse: [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]Remove 10 from crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL + Left Mouse: [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]Remove 100 from crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + CTRL + Left Mouse: [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]Remove 1000 from crafting queue.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这是当前的建造队列。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]顶行的项目是你的排队制造任务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]底行的项目是建造机目前正在工作的项目的任何子组件。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]你可以通过点击顶行的项目来取消制造任务:[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]左键鼠标:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]从制造队列中移除1个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + 左键鼠标:[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL + 左键鼠标:[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + CTRL + 左键鼠标:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]从制造队列中移除1000个。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]This is the list of crafting recipes this constructor can craft.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can filter by type, structure, or search by name at the top of this section.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Items shown in red cannot be crafted due to not having enough resources to craft the item.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items shown in blue with a lock symbol are not yet unlocked and must be unlocked in the tech tree [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or via a [-][/c][c][00ff00]schematic[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]You can start a crafting job by clicking on an item in the templates list:[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Left Mouse:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Add 1 to crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + Left Mouse:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Add 10 to crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL + Left Mouse:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Add 100 to crafting queue.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + CTRL + Left Mouse:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Add 1000 to crafting queue.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这是建造机可以制造的制造配方列表。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以通过类型、结构进行筛选,或者在此部分顶部按名称搜索。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
显示为红色的项目由于没有足够的资源而无法制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示为蓝色并带有锁定符号的项目尚未解锁,必须在科技树[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff]进行解锁。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]你可以通过点击模板列表中的项目来开始制造任务:[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]左键鼠标:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]向制造队列添加1个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + 左键鼠标:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]向制造队列添加10个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL + 左键鼠标:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]向制造队列添加100个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + CTRL + 左键鼠标:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]向制造队列添加1000个。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff][-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]This is the [-][/c][c][00ff00]type of constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] you are currently accessing.[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]Different types of constructors can craft different items and have different speeds.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff][-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]您当前正在访问的建造机类型是[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]不同类型的建造机可以制作不同的物品,并且速度各异。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The suit constructor is the very first constructor you will use and is built in to your suit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is represented in the tech tree by a purple dot.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
It requires no power but is extremely slow with a very limited number of basic crafting templates available.
You can access it from the Suit Constructor tab of your personal inventory [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Inventory)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items shown in red means you do not have enough resources to craft that item.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Items shown in blue with a lock symbol means you need to unlock it in the tech tree [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Uses your personal inventory (not toolbar) for input.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Completed items will go into an available output slot in the window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]You can add or cancel a crafting job by clicking on an item in the templates or construction queue section:[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Left Mouse:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Add or remove 1 from crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + Left Mouse: [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Add or remove 10 from crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL + Left Mouse: [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Add or remove 100 from crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + CTRL + Left Mouse: [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Add or remove 1000 from crafting queue.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]套装建造机是您将使用的第一个建造机,它内置于您的套装中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在科技树中以紫色圆点表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
它不需要电力,但速度极慢,可用的基本制作模板数量非常有限。
您可以通过个人库存的套装建造机标签[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Inventory)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来访问它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示为红色的项目意味着您没有足够的资源来制作该项目。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示为蓝色并带有锁形符号的项目意味着您需要在科技树中解锁它[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]使用您的个人库存(非工具栏)作为输入。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]完成的物品将进入窗口中可用的输出槽。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]您可以通过点击模板或建造队列部分中的物品来添加或取消制作任务:[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]鼠标左键:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 从制作队列中添加或移除1个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + 鼠标左键:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]从制作队列中添加或移除10个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL + 鼠标左键:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]从制作队列中添加或移除100个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + CTRL + 鼠标左键:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]从制作队列中添加或移除1000个。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The portable constructor is a terrain placeable survival constructor.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is represented in the tech tree by a yellow dot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
It is very slow to craft and has only a limited number of crafting templates available.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It uses no power and must be placed directly on terrain on the surface of a planet or moon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Must have the Connected to Base setting unchecked in the Build Tools menu [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(BuildMenu)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to place as it cannot be placed on a base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It can be set to allow members of your faction to access it by hitting the Allow Faction Access button in the crafting window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Place resources into the input section at the top of the constructor window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Completed crafting items will appear in the output section at the bottom and can then be moved either to your personal inventory or back into the input section.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Has an effectively unlimited amount of storage capacity as it does not use the volume system.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can use the [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to transfer items directly to or from the portable constructor by dragging items onto or off of your connected toolbar.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]You can add or cancel a crafting job by clicking on an item in the templates or construction queue section:[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Left Mouse:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Add or remove 1 from crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + Left Mouse: [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Add or remove 10 from crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL + Left Mouse: [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Add or remove 100 from crafting queue.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + CTRL + Left Mouse: [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Add or remove 1000 from crafting queue.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]便携式建造机是一种地形放置的生存建造机。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在科技树中以黄色圆点表示。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
它的制作速度非常慢,且可用的制作模板数量有限。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它不需要电力,必须直接放置在行星或月球表面的地形上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]必须在建造工具菜单中取消勾选连接至基地设置[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(BuildMenu)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]才能放置,因为它不能放置在基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以通过点击制作窗口中的允许派系访问按钮,设置允许您的派系成员访问它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将资源放入建造机窗口顶部的输入部分。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]制作完成的物品将出现在窗口底部的输出部分,然后可以移动到您的个人库存或回到输入部分。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
它拥有实际上无限的存储容量,因为它不使用体积系统。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]通过将物品拖拽到您的连接工具栏上或从工具栏上移下来直接将物品转移到便携式建造机。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]您可以通过点击模板或建造队列部分中的物品来添加或取消制作任务:[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]鼠标左键:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 从制作队列中添加或移除1个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + 鼠标左键:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]从制作队列中添加或移除10个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL + 鼠标左键:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]从制作队列中添加或移除100个。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + CTRL + 鼠标左键:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]从制作队列中添加或移除1000个。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The mobile constructor gives you a wider range of crafting possibilities and greater speed than the previous options.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is represented in the tech tree by a pink dot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Same templates and speed as the [-][/c][c][00ff00]small constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c][c][abd1ff]
They come in separate versions for hover vessels and small vessels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]power[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to run and linked [-][/c][c][00ff00]containers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the sections under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Constructor Window Overview[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for use.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]移动建造机为您提供了比之前更多的制造可能性和更快的速度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它在科技树上以粉色点表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
与[-][/c][c][00ff00]小型建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]拥有相同的模板和速度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们分别适用于悬浮飞船和小型飞船。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]电力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行并连接[-][/c][c][00ff00]容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请参阅[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机窗口概览[-][/c][c][abd1ff]下的章节以了解如何使用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The small constructor gives you a wider range of crafting possibilities and greater speed than the previous options.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is represented in the tech tree by a pink dot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Same templates and speed as the [-][/c][c][00ff00]mobile constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff].
Small constructors can be placed on both capital vessels and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]power[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to run and linked [-][/c][c][00ff00]containers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the sections under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Constructor Window Overview[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for use.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]小型建造机为您提供了比之前更多的制造可能性和更快的速度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它在科技树上以粉色点表示。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
与[-][/c][c][00ff00]移动建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]拥有相同的模板和速度。
小型建造机可以放置在主力舰和基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]电力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行并连接[-][/c][c][00ff00]容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请参阅[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机窗口概览[-][/c][c][abd1ff]下的章节以了解如何使用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The large constructor has a much wider range of crafting templates and faster speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is represented in the tech tree by a cyan dot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Large constructors can be placed on both capital vessels and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]power[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to run and linked [-][/c][c][00ff00]containers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the sections under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Constructor Window Overview[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for use.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]大型建造机拥有更广泛的制造模板和更快的速度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它在科技树上以青色点表示。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
大型建造机可以放置在主力舰和基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]电力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行并连接[-][/c][c][00ff00]容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请参阅[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机窗口概览[-][/c][c][abd1ff]下的章节以了解如何使用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The advanced constructor has most crafting recipes and has the fastest crafting speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is represented in the tech tree by a red dot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Advanced constructors can be placed on both capital vessels and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]power[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to run and linked [-][/c][c][00ff00]containers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the sections under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Constructor Window Overview[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for use.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]高级建造机拥有大多数制造配方,并且具有最快的制造速度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它在科技树中以一个红点表示。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
高级建造机可以放置在主力舰和基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]能量[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行,并连接[-][/c][c][00ff00]容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请参阅[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机窗口概览[-][/c][c][abd1ff]部分以获取使用方法。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The universal constructor is a specialized constructor that contains advanced templates not available in any other constructor but has a slow crafting speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is represented in the tech tree by a green dot.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Universal constructors can be placed on both capital vessels and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]power[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to run and linked [-][/c][c][00ff00]containers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the sections under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Constructor Window Overview[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for use.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]通用建造机是一种特殊的建造机,包含其他建造机中没有的高级模板,但制造速度较慢。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它在科技树中以绿色圆点表示。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
通用建造机可以放置在主力舰和基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]电力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行,并连接[-][/c][c][00ff00]容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请参阅[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机窗口概览[-][/c][c][abd1ff]部分的使用说明。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The food processor is a specialized constructor used to craft [-][/c][c][00ff00]food[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]medical items[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]farming[-][/c][c][abd1ff] supplies.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Food processors can be placed on ships and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]power[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to run and linked [-][/c][c][00ff00]containers[-][/c][c][abd1ff]. Recommended to use with fridges.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the sections under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Constructor Window Overview[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for use.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]食品加工机是一种专门用于制造[-][/c][c][00ff00]食物[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]医疗用品[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]农业[-][/c][c][abd1ff]用品的建造机。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]食品加工机可以放置在飞船和基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]电力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行,并连接[-][/c][c][00ff00]容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。建议与冰箱一起使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请参阅[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机窗口概览[-][/c][c][abd1ff]部分的使用说明。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The furnace is a specialized constructor that automatically smelts some types of ore.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not all types of ore can be processed in a furnace.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Furnaces can be placed on bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]power[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to run and linked [-][/c][c][00ff00]containers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
To use, ensure there is at least 10 of a smeltable ore in the input container and then turn on the furnace.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The furnace will automatically process ore from the input container and deposit ingots into the output until there is none left to process.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]熔炉是一种自动冶炼某些类型矿石的专门建造机。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]并非所有类型的矿石都可以在熔炉中加工。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]熔炉可以放置在基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]电力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行,并连接[-][/c][c][00ff00]容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
要使用,确保输入容器中至少有10个可冶炼的矿石,然后打开熔炉。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]熔炉将自动从输入容器中加工矿石,并将锭存入输出容器,直到没有剩余可加工的矿石。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]The deconstuctor is highly destructive and should be used with care.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The deconstructor is a specialized constructor that automatically breaks down items into their base components.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not all items can be broken down, and components cannot be broken down into ingots or other base materials.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Deconstructors can be placed on capital vessels and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]power[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to run and linked [-][/c][c][00ff00]containers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
To use, place an item into the input container.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If an item's crafting template produces multiple of that item per craft then you must also place at least that many of that item into the input box otherwise no resources will be returned.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The deconstructor will automatically process items from the input container, breaking them down into their component parts and depositing components into the output container. Has 100% yield.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Warning: This destroys the item in the process.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is recommended to use a clearly labeled cargo container for input and a separate container for output to avoid accidentally deconstructing items you wish to keep intact (such as auto miner cores or optronics).[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]解构机具有极高的破坏性,使用时需要格外小心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]解构机是一种专业的建造机,可以自动将物品分解成其基础组件。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]并非所有物品都能被分解,而且组件不能被进一步分解成锭或其他基础材料。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]解构机可以安装在主力舰和基地上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]电力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行,并连接[-][/c][c][00ff00]容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
要使用,请将物品放入输入容器中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果一个物品的制造模板每次制造能产出多个该物品,那么你必须也将至少那么多数量的物品放入输入箱中,否则不会返回任何资源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]解构机会自动处理输入容器中的物品,将它们分解成组件部分,并把组件存放到输出容器中。分解效率为100%。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]警告:此过程会销毁物品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建议使用明确标记的货物容器作为输入,并使用另一个容器作为输出,以避免不小心解构你希望保持完整的物品(例如自动矿机核心或光电子设备)。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can see the shield status of other ships or bases with a percentage shown by their names on the HUD. If there's no percentage then the target either doesn't have a shield or their shields are currently offline but may regenerate after not taking damage for a time.[-][/c]{Eden_ShieldHUD2Bar.jpg}
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The status of the shields of the ship you're currently piloting are shown in the HUD directly above the ship toolbar at the bottom of the screen.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In multiplayer the shield status and capacity can take a few seconds to update, so your actual shield capacity may be lower than shown.[-][/c]{Eden_ShieldHUDBar.jpg}
[c][ff0000]Solid red:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The shield is turned off.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]Flashing red:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The shield is still activating.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]Solid blue:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The shield is active.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以通过在HUD上显示的名称旁边的百分比来查看其他飞船或基地的护盾状态。如果没有百分比,则目标要么没有护盾,要么他们的护盾当前处于离线状态,但在一段时间内不受到伤害后可能会重新生成。[-][/c]{Eden_ShieldHUD2Bar.jpg}
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您当前驾驶的飞船的护盾状态显示在屏幕底部飞船工具栏正上方的HUD中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在多人游戏中,护盾状态和容量可能需要几秒钟才能更新,因此您的实际护盾容量可能比显示的要低。[-][/c]{Eden_ShieldHUDBar.jpg}
[c][ff0000]持续红色:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]护盾已关闭。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]闪烁红色:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]护盾仍在激活中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]持续蓝色:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]护盾处于激活状态。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Many enemy bases and patrol vessels have a shield generator.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can tell they have shields by checking for the shield percentage indicator by their names on the HUD (see [-][/c][c][00ff00]Shield HUD[-][/c][c][abd1ff]) or by checking for shield impact effects when you shoot it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Alien shield generators will recharge after not taking damage for a period of time just like player ones.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To prevent them from recharging, destroy the shield generator.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some POIs may also have a switch inside to shut off the shield generator.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some POIs will be specifically set to not recharge their shields if they are brought down to 0%. These are special cases and rare, typically for planetary POIs that use internal shield generators.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most planetary bases will use an externally mounted planetary shield generator that projects a dome-like shield over the base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The dome shield effect is purely visual, the shield still protects all blocks of the base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Alien planetary shields take reduced damage from capital vessel weapons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot obtain functional alien shield generators, but they can be salvaged or deconstructed for materials.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]许多敌对基地和巡逻飞船都配备了护盾发生器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以通过检查HUD上名称旁边的护盾百分比指示器(见[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾界面显示[-][/c][c][abd1ff])或通过检查射击时的护盾撞击效果来判断它们是否有护盾。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]外星护盾发生器会在一段时间内不受到损害后重新充电,就像玩家的护盾一样。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为了防止它们重新充电,摧毁护盾发生器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些兴趣点(POI)内部可能也有一个开关来关闭护盾发生器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些兴趣点特别设置为如果护盾降至0%,则不会重新充电。这些是特殊情况,很少见,通常用于使用内部护盾发生器的行星兴趣点。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数行星基地将使用外部安装的行星护盾发生器,投射出覆盖基地的穹顶状护盾。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]穹顶护盾效果纯属视觉,护盾仍然保护基地的所有方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]外星行星护盾受到主力舰武器的伤害较小。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您无法获得功能正常的外星护盾发生器,但它们可以被回收或拆解以获取材料。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Resource asteroids found in space are technically a kind of POI.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can either have a standard POI icon, or more commonly will have an icon corresponding to their resource type.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If they are shown with a faction color and prefix, mining them is always a hostile action against the owning faction regardless of your reputation level.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]在太空中发现的资源小行星从技术上讲是一种兴趣点(POI)。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以有一个标准的兴趣点图标,或者更常见的是,有一个对应其资源类型的图标。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果它们显示有派系颜色和前缀,无论您的声望等级如何,开采它们始终是对拥有派系的敌对行动。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ff00]POIs[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]patrol vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can have one or more alien cores that must be destroyed before you can claim a POI or salvage it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some will have multiple cores, all of which must be destroyed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To claim a POI or defeated patrol vessel as your own you can place your own core on it. Note that in multiplayer you cannot place a core on a [-][/c][c][00ff00]regenerating[-][/c][c][abd1ff] POI.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Patrol vessels cannot be flown, they can only be salvaged.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]No Core:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some POIs such as some [-][/c][c][00ff00]wrecks[-][/c][c][abd1ff] do not have a core.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These POIs can be salvaged or claimed immediately without needing to find and destroy a core.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This type of POI uses this map icon:[-][/c]{Eden_POIIconBar.png}[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]NPC Core:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the standard type of alien core used on most POIs and patrol vessels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It provides the structure with unlimited fuel, oxygen, ammo, pentaxid, CPU, and power generation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This type of POI uses this map icon:[-][/c]{Eden_POIIconBar.png}
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Admin Core:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is a special type of alien core used for mission, dungeon, admin, or hacking POIs that provides complete immunity to all damage to the entire structure, except for specific blocks that were pre-damaged in the blueprint file.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]So this can allow certain blocks such as turrets, vents, or even the core itself to be destroyed, but no other blocks, on a case by case basis.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It provides the structure with unlimited fuel, oxygen, ammo, pentaxid, CPU, and power generation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This type of POI uses this map icon:[-][/c]{Eden_POIIconAdminBar.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ff00]兴趣点[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]巡逻飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可能拥有一个或多个外星核心,必须在您能够声称兴趣点或打捞它之前将其摧毁。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有些可能拥有多个核心,所有这些都必须被摧毁。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要声称一个兴趣点或击败的巡逻飞船作为您自己的,您可以在其上放置您自己的核心。请注意,在多人游戏中,您不能在[-][/c][c][00ff00]再生[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的兴趣点上放置核心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]巡逻飞船不能飞行,它们只能被打捞。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]无核心:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有些兴趣点,例如一些[-][/c][c][00ff00]残骸[-][/c][c][abd1ff],没有核心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些兴趣点可以立即被打捞或声称,而无需寻找和摧毁核心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这种类型的兴趣点使用此地图图标:[-][/c]{Eden_POIIconBar.png}[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]NPC核心:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是大多数兴趣点和巡逻飞船上使用的标准类型的外星核心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它为结构提供无限的燃料、氧气、弹药、翘曲水晶、CPU和电力生成。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这种类型的兴趣点使用此地图图标:[-][/c]{Eden_POIIconBar.png}
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]管理员核心:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是用于任务、地下城、管理员或黑客兴趣点的特殊类型的外星核心,它为整个结构提供对所有伤害的完全免疫,除了在蓝图文件中预先损坏的特定方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]因此,这可以允许某些方块,如炮塔、通风口或甚至是核心本身被摧毁,但其他方块则不能,在个别案例中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它为结构提供无限的燃料、氧气、弹药、翘曲水晶、CPU和电力生成。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这种类型的兴趣点使用此地图图标:[-][/c]{Eden_POIIconAdminBar.png}

English:
[c][abd1ff]Some [-][/c][c][00ff00]patrol vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]POIs[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can have a [-][/c][c][00ff00]shield generator[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To damage the ship or POI directly you must either deal enough damage to the shield to bring it down or use [-][/c][c][00ff00]shield penetrating weapons[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you do not destroy the shield generator it will begin to recharge if it has not taken damage recently.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Planetary POIs typically have an externally mounted shield generator that can be easily destroyed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some planetary POIs might have an interior shield generator, these POIs are a rare case and usually will not recharge their shields if you bring the shield down to 0%.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is not recommended to attack a POI on foot without first disabling the shields using a ship as you will have difficulty destroying interior sentry turrets or NPC spawners.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some POIs might be special cases designed to be infiltrated on foot to disable the shield generator from within.

See [-][/c][c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Shields[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for more details about shield mechanics.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]一些[-][/c][c][00ff00]巡逻飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]兴趣点[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可能拥有一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾发生器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要直接损伤飞船或兴趣点,您必须要么对护盾造成足够的伤害以将其击落,要么使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾穿透武器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您没有摧毁护盾发生器,如果它最近没有受到伤害,它将开始重新充电。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]行星兴趣点通常有一个外部安装的护盾发生器,可以很容易被摧毁。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些行星兴趣点可能有内部的护盾发生器,这些兴趣点是罕见的案例,通常如果将护盾降至0%,它们不会重新充电。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不建议在没有先使用飞船禁用护盾的情况下步行攻击兴趣点,因为您将难以摧毁内部哨兵炮塔或NPC生成器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些兴趣点可能是特殊案例,设计为步行潜入以从内部禁用护盾发生器。

查看[-][/c][c][00ff00]战斗[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾[-][/c][c][abd1ff]以获取有关护盾机制的更多详细信息。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]A POI is any kind of base spawned by the game.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be anything from a basic wreck, to a full blown fortress.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be discovered on the map using a handheld or ship mounted detector.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The owning faction, if any, will be indicated by the color and possibly a faction prefix such as Zirax, Polaris, etc.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]POIs may be armed and it can be dangerous approaching a hostile POI if you are unprepared.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]兴趣点是由游戏生成的任何类型的基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以是从一个基本的残骸到一个全面的堡垒。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以使用手持或船载探测器在地图上发现。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]所有者派系,如果有的话,将由颜色和可能的派系前缀(如Zirax、Polaris等)表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]兴趣点可能是武装的,如果您没有准备好,接近一个敌对的兴趣点可能是危险的。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Dummy POIs, or technical POIs, are POIs that are hidden from the detector and map.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are used for certain behind the scenes technical functions within the scenario.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be revealed with the [-][/c][c][ffffff]map[-][/c][c][abd1ff] console command and will show on the entities list, but are otherwise invisible and cannot be detected or interacted with.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]虚拟兴趣点,或称为技术兴趣点,是探测器和地图上隐藏的兴趣点。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们用于场景内的某些后台技术功能。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
它们可以通过[-][/c][c][ffffff]地图[-][/c][c][abd1ff]控制台命令显示出来,并会在实体列表中显示,但除此之外是不可见的,无法被探测或交互。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]POIs may list a level on the map.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This determines the [-][/c][c][00ff00]NPC level[-][/c][c][abd1ff] of the NPCs spawned within, but otherwise has no effect or bearing on the actual difficulty of the POI.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
