[c][abd1ff]A level 1 POI will have the same exterior defenses, shield strength, and loot as a level 10 POI of the same type. The NPCs inside will just be harder.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See [-][/c][c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Enemies[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]NPC Level[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for details.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]兴趣点可能在地图上列出一个等级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
这决定了[-][/c][c][00ff00]NPC等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在其中生成的NPC,但对兴趣点的实际难度没有影响或关联。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
一个等级1的兴趣点将与同一类型的等级10兴趣点具有相同的外部防御、护盾强度和战利品。里面的NPC只是更困难一些。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
见[-][/c][c][00ff00]战斗[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]敌人[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]NPC等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]了解详细信息。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]POI regeneration allows most [-][/c][c][00ff00]POIs[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to regenerate back to their freshly spawned state after not being visited for a period of real time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]POI regeneration is not active in single player games, and only counts down while the server is running.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For dedicated servers the game option must be enabled for any POI to regenerate.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If enabled, players will be unable to place their own core on any regenerating POI. Players can still salvage a POI but they won't be able to claim it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not all POIs are set to regenerate.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Regeneration effectively respawns the POI like it was brand new. Damaged or missing blocks will be restored, NPCs will reset, loot will respawn.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Regeneration does not reset dialogue variables, so POI missions that rely on the dialogue system will not be repeatable by the same player at the same POI after a POI regenerates.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]POI regeneration may remove or bug out nearby player terrain placed objects or ships, so it's advised not to leave anything too close to a regenerating POI on a server. Not to mention when it regenerates, its turrets will also become active and will attack any nearby player ships.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If every block of a POI or resource asteroid is removed, it will not regenerate. [-][/c][c][ffff00]This is against most server rules so check with your admin first.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Most orbital [-][/c][c][00ff00]resource asteroids[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will regenerate after 6 hours.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most POIs will regenerate after 12 hours.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Major POIs and resource asteroids in asteroid fields or special sectors will regenerate after 72 hours.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Rich asteroids[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]tungsten[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]palladium[-][/c][c][abd1ff] deposits, and other special resource POIs will regenerate after 72 hours.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Underground planetary resource deposits, surface resources, and patrol vessels never regenerate. Server admin tools or playfield wipes must be used to restore those.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]兴趣点重生允许大多数[-][/c][c][00ff00]兴趣点[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在一段时间内未被访问后,恢复到它们刚刚生成的状态。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]兴趣点重生在单人游戏中不活跃,只有在服务器运行时才会计时。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
对于专用服务器,必须启用游戏选项才能使任何兴趣点重生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果启用,玩家将无法在任何重生的兴趣点上放置自己的核心。玩家仍然可以拆除兴趣点,但他们不能认领它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不是所有的兴趣点都设置为重生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
重生有效地重新生成兴趣点,就像它完全是新的一样。损坏或缺失的方块将被恢复,NPC将重置,战利品将重新生成。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]重生不会重置对话变量,所以依赖对话系统的兴趣点任务在同一个玩家在同一兴趣点重生后将无法重复。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
兴趣点重生可能会移除或使附近的玩家地形放置的物体或飞船出现错误,因此建议不要在服务器上将任何东西留在重生的兴趣点太近的地方。更不用说当它重生时,它的炮塔也会变得活跃,并将攻击附近的玩家飞船。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
如果一个兴趣点或资源小行星的每个方块都被移除,它将不会重生。[-][/c][c][ffff00]这违反了大多数服务器规则,所以先与管理员联系。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]大多数轨道[-][/c][c][00ff00]资源小行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将在6小时后重生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数兴趣点将在12小时后重生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]主要兴趣点和在小行星场或特殊星区的资源小行星将在72小时后重生。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]富矿小行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff],[-][/c][c][00ff00]钯[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]钯[-][/c][c][abd1ff]矿床,以及其他特殊资源兴趣点将在72小时后重生。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]地下行星资源矿床,地表资源和巡逻舰艇永远不会重生。必须使用服务器管理员工具或游戏场地清除来恢复这些。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The tech tree is where you unlock new blocks and items to craft in [-][/c][c][00ff00]constructors[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can access the tech tree with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or by pressing the tech tree button at the top of the window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each item has a [-][/c][c][00ff00]player level[-][/c][c][abd1ff] requirement and costs a certain number of [-][/c][c][00ff00]unlock points[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You must unlock the previous item in the tree before you can unlock the next one.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Adding blueprints to the blueprint factory requires you to have all blocks used in that blueprint unlocked.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The tree is divided into separate tabs. [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Some items can show up in more than one tab and will only need to be unlocked in one of the tabs.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Unlocking a weapon also unlocks the ability to craft that weapon's ammunition.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]You cannot undo a choice, so choose wisely, though you can eventually get enough unlock points to unlock everything.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]科技树是解锁新的方块和物品进行制造的地方,在[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]访问科技树,或者通过点击窗口顶部的科技树按钮。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个项目都有[-][/c][c][00ff00]玩家等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]要求,并需要一定数量的[-][/c][c][00ff00]解锁点[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在解锁下一个项目之前,你必须先解锁科技树中的前一个项目。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将蓝图添加到蓝图工厂需要你已经解锁了该蓝图中使用的所有方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]科技树被分为不同的标签页。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]有些物品可能在多个标签页中出现,只需要在一个标签页中解锁即可。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]解锁一种武器也会解锁制造该武器弹药的能力。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你不能撤销选择,所以要明智地选择,尽管你最终可以获得足够的解锁点来解锁所有东西。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]As you perform different tasks you will earn experience points (XP).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once you gain enough XP you will earn a level.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You start at level 1 and can progress up to level 25.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You gain XP from killing enemies, mining deposits, completing missions, harvesting crops and surface resources, and discovering new POIs.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Each level grants you a set number of unlock points for use in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]tech tree[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Level has no affect on your player's stats, it's only used to determine which items you can unlock in the tech tree.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]You can view your current XP and level in the Stats tab of the player inventory [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Inventory)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你执行不同的任务时,你将获得经验点(XP)。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦你积累了足够的XP,你将获得一个等级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你从1级开始,并可以升级到25级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以通过杀死敌人、开采矿石、完成任务、收割作物和地表资源,以及发现新的POI来获得XP。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]每升一级,你就会获得一定数量的解锁点,用于[-][/c][c][00ff00]科技树[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]等级不会影响你玩家的属性,它只用于确定你可以在科技树中解锁哪些物品。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以在玩家库存的[-][/c][c][ffff00](Stats tab)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中查看你当前的XP和等级[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Inventory)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Some items require a schematic to unlock.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Schematics are physical items you can turn in at schematic computers on board UCH Research Vessels to learn the crafting template.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will also need enough unlock points, a high enough level, and meet any other requirements listed on the schematic's tooltip before you can use the schematic.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some schematics can be purchased from traders.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Others you can obtain from loot, most often in Progenitor data caches in hacking sites and cold orbits.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Extra schematics can be sold to schematic traders on UCH Research Vessels.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]某些物品需要图纸来解锁。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]图纸是实体物品,您可以在UCH研究飞船上的图纸电脑上提交,以学习制作模板。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您还需要足够的解锁点数、足够高的等级,并满足图纸提示上列出的其他要求,才能使用图纸。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些图纸可以从商人那里购买。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]其他图纸您可以从战利品中获得,最常见的是在黑客站点和冷轨道中的祖先数据缓存中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]额外的图纸可以出售给UCH研究飞船上的图纸商人。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Unlock points are used to unlock items in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]tech tree[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and via [-][/c][c][00ff00]schematics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view how many unlock points you have in the tech tree [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or the player inventory [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Inventory)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You obtain unlock points in the following ways:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Leveling:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You gain a set number of unlock points each time you gain a level. Higher levels grant more unlock points.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Completing missions:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some main missions and side missions will grant you unlock points.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Turning in items:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Turning in undelivered cargo, insignias, Progenitor data chips, and data pads will reward you with unlock points.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Hacking:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some hacking systems can reward you with unlock points.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Research:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Performing the repeatable mission Science and Research - Research Unlock Points will reward you with unlock points every few hours.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]解锁点数用于在[-][/c][c][00ff00]科技树[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中解锁物品,以及通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以在科技树[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(TechTree)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或玩家背包[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Inventory)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中查看你拥有的解锁点数。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以通过以下方式获得解锁点数:[-][/c]

[c][00afff]升级:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每次升级时,你都会获得一定数量的解锁点数。更高等级将提供更多的解锁点数。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]完成任务:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些主线任务和支线任务将为你提供解锁点数。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]提交物品:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]提交未交付的货物、徽章、先祖数据芯片和数据板将奖励你解锁点数。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]黑客攻击:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些黑客系统可以为你提供解锁点数。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]研究:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]执行可重复任务“科学与研究 - 研究解锁点数”将每几小时奖励你解锁点数。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Blueprints are a way to save and share your ship and base designs.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To view your blueprint library, use [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(ShowPrefabLibrary)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To save a new blueprint, look directly at a ship or base and press [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(CreateNewPrefab)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Then you can either save it as a new blueprint, or overwrite an existing blueprint.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is strongly recommended to use creative mode to create blueprints as the extra creative mode tools make it much easier to design with.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]But you can also create blueprints in survival mode.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Always save your designs as a blueprint in case your save game becomes corrupted.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Blueprints are kept in your Empyrion save folder so make sure to backup your blueprints if you are ever removing the game entirely.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]蓝图是一种保存和分享你的飞船和基地设计的方法。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要查看你的蓝图库,使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(ShowPrefabLibrary)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要保存一个新的蓝图,直接看向一个飞船或基地并按下[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(CreateNewPrefab)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]然后你可以选择将其保存为一个新的蓝图,或者覆盖一个现有的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]强烈建议使用创意模式来创建蓝图,因为额外的创意模式工具使得设计工作更加容易。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]但你也可以在生存模式中创建蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]总是将你的设计保存为蓝图以防你的存档游戏损坏。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]蓝图保存在你的Empyrion存档文件夹中,所以如果你要完全移除游戏,请确保备份你的蓝图。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The blueprint factory is a way to build ships or bases using a blueprint from your [-][/c][c][00ff00]blueprint library[-][/c][c][abd1ff] instead of having to build it block by block by hand.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You still need to unlock required blocks in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]tech tree[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and have the materials needed to create the blueprint.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can access the blueprint factory with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(ShowPrefabLibrary)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]蓝图工厂是一种使用你的[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图库[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中的蓝图来建造飞船或基地的方法,而不是手工逐块建造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你仍然需要在[-][/c][c][00ff00]科技树[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中解锁所需的方块,并拥有创建蓝图所需的材料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以通过[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(ShowPrefabLibrary)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]访问蓝图工厂。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
The factory is almost like a big invisible storage bank hiding in the sky.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It allows you to insert resources into it and then use those resources to build a ship or base based off of a saved blueprint.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Resources can be inserted into the factory, but cannot be removed from it except by using it to spawn new structures.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some playfields will disallow use of the factory, in which case you can still add resources to the factory but cannot use it to spawn any ships or bases. You will have to build things by hand.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
The below sections will show a step by step guide how to use the blueprint factory to spawn a new ship or base.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
工厂几乎就像是一个隐藏在天空中的巨大的隐形存储库。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它允许你将资源插入其中,然后使用这些资源根据保存的蓝图来建造飞船或基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]资源可以插入工厂,但除了使用它来生成新结构外,不能从工厂中取出。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有些游戏区域将不允许使用工厂,在这种情况下,你仍然可以向工厂添加资源,但不能使用它来生成任何飞船或基地。你将不得不亲手建造东西。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
以下部分将展示如何使用蓝图工厂生成新飞船或基地的逐步指南。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Access the factory with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(ShowPrefabLibrary)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your [-][/c][c][00ff00]blueprints[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will be shown on the left side.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can filter by blueprint type and source using the boxes along the top, or search by blueprint name.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hovering over an icon tells you what it does.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Selecting a blueprint will show you the required resources along the right side, as well as how many of each resource you already have in the factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It will also show you if there's any blocks you need to unlock, if the [-][/c][c][00ff00]player level[-][/c][c][abd1ff] requirement is too high, if the [-][/c][c][00ff00]complexity[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is too high for the current server setting, and several other stats.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is no way to tell if a blueprint has a specific block, so make sure to use creative mode to check out blueprints before spawning them in survival.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]通过[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(ShowPrefabLibrary)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]访问工厂。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将显示在左侧。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用顶部的框按蓝图类型和来源进行过滤,或者按蓝图名称进行搜索。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将鼠标悬停在图标上会告诉你它的作用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]选择一个蓝图将显示右侧所需的资源,以及你已经在工厂中拥有的每种资源的数量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它还会显示你是否需要解锁任何方块,如果[-][/c][c][00ff00]玩家等级[-][/c][c][abd1ff]要求太高,如果[-][/c][c][00ff00]复杂性[-][/c][c][abd1ff]对于当前服务器设置来说太高,以及其他一些统计数据。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]没有办法知道一个蓝图是否有特定的方块,所以确保在生存模式中生成它们之前使用创意模式来检查蓝图。[-][/c]

English: Adding a Blueprint to the Factory
Adding a Blueprint to the Factory:

[c][abd1ff]Once you have selected the blueprint you want to add to the factory, press the Add To Factory button to add it to the factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The blueprint currently in your factory can be changed at any time. You will not lose any resources.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]一旦你选择了想要添加到工厂的蓝图,按下“添加到工厂”按钮将其添加到工厂。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你工厂中当前的蓝图可以随时更改。你不会损失任何资源。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Your blueprint will require resources to spawn. You can't build it for free![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The required resources will be listed on the right side of the window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It will show you the current quantity of each resource that you already have in your factory, if any.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您的蓝图将需要资源才能生成。您不能免费建造它![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]所需的资源将列在窗口的右侧。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它将显示您在工厂中已经拥有的每种资源的当前数量,如果有的话。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]If you need to access the blueprint library to change out what blueprint you are making simply hit the Library button in the upper right.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hit the Factory button to go to the factory screen to add resources and start production of your chosen blueprint, if you had added one.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]如果你想访问蓝图库来更换你正在制作的蓝图,只需点击右上角的图书馆按钮即可。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]点击工厂按钮进入工厂屏幕,添加资源并开始生产你选择的蓝图,如果你添加了一个。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Your blueprint isn't going to build itself. Time to add resources.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can drop almost any block or item onto the resources slot in the factory, including whole blocks, devices, and even ammo.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This will add up what was used to craft that item and add the equivalent raw materials to your factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Adding items will also reduce the build time of your blueprint based on the craft time of the item, if build time is not set to instant in your game difficulty settings.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot add items that do not contribute to a required resource for your current blueprint.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Any resources that are contained in items you drop into the factory that are not used by your current blueprint will be lost![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For example if your blueprint requires only iron and you add something that is made out of iron and titanium, only the iron will be added to your factory and the titanium will be lost.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is no way to directly remove resources from the factory.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]你的蓝图不会自己建造。是时候添加资源了。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以将几乎所有的方块或物品放入工厂的资源槽中,包括整个方块、设备,甚至弹药。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这将累加用于制作该物品的材料,并在您的工厂中添加等量的原材料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]添加物品还将根据物品的制作时间减少你的蓝图的建造时间,如果您的游戏难度设置中建造时间没有设置为瞬间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你不能添加不为您当前蓝图所需资源的项目。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]任何包含在您放入工厂的物品中的资源,如果当前蓝图未使用,将会丢失![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]例如,如果您的蓝图只需要铁,而您添加了由铁和钛制成的物品,那么只有铁会被添加到您的工厂,钛将会丢失。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]没有直接从工厂中移除资源的方法。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Take one last look and make sure this is the blueprint you want to build.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you want to change your blueprint, now is the time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Once you have added all the required resources the Start Production button will light up.

Once you hit the Start Production button, if the factory build time is set to instant in your game difficulty options the blueprint will be built instantly.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If build time is not set to instant then you can safely cancel production at any point before completion without loss of materials.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]最后再看一眼,确保这是你想建造的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你想更改蓝图,现在就是时候。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
一旦你添加了所有必需的资源,开始生产的按钮就会亮起。

一旦你按下开始生产的按钮,如果你的游戏难度选项中设置为即时建造,蓝图将立即建成。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果建造时间没有设置为即时,那么在完成之前,你可以随时安全地取消生产,而不会损失材料。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]When your blueprint is complete it will move to the top of your blueprint library.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can have multiple completed blueprints in your blueprint library at a time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To spawn it, make sure you are on the library tab (press the Library button in the upper right) and find your blueprint at the top of the list.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Make sure you are where you want to spawn it, select your completed blueprint, and then press the Spawn button.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When you hit spawn, you will see a physical ghost of your blueprint and you can place it in an appropriate location.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Use [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(BlueprintRaise)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(BlueprintLower)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to raise and lower the blueprint.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Use[-][/c] [c][ffff00](Insert)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (default hotkey) and [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(BlockRotate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to rotate the blueprint.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hit [-][/c][c][ffff00](0)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (zero) to cancel spawning. It will remain in your blueprint library.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Bases on planets can only be rotated in the cardinal north, south, east, and west directions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Bases in space can face any direction and orientation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you are in space, hold [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(AutoRotate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to make sure you are level to the playfield before spawning a base. This makes it easier to line up with your base for docking.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can use the player drone [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to spawn blueprints for a better view.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]当您的蓝图完成后,它将移动到您的蓝图库顶部。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以在蓝图库中同时拥有多个完成的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要生成它,请确保您在库标签页(按右上角的库按钮)并找到列表顶部的您的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]确保您在想要生成它的地方,选择您的完成的蓝图,然后按生成按钮。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当您点击生成时,您将看到一个蓝图的实体幽灵,您可以将其放置在适当的位置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用 [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(BlueprintRaise)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 和 [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(BlueprintLower)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 来提升和降低蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用[-][/c] [c][ffff00](Insert)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (默认快捷键)和 [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(BlockRotate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 来旋转蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]按 [-][/c][c][ffff00](0)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (零)取消生成。它将保留在您的蓝图库中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]行星上的基地只能在北、南、东、西的基本方向旋转。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]太空中的基地可以面向任何方向和定位。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您在太空中,按住 [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(AutoRotate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 以确保您在生成基地之前与游戏场地水平。这使得与您的基地对接更容易对齐。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以使用玩家无人机 [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 来生成蓝图以获得更好的视角。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][u][u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/383120/workshop/]The Steam Workshop[/url][/u][/u][-][/c][c][abd1ff] is a place you can browse and subscribe to blueprints uploaded by others, or even share your own.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff](It's where this scenario is shared too![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can browse the workshop and use the filters and search options to find the perfect blueprint.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Make sure to carefully read the descriptions of each blueprint. Good authors will provide a detailed description about what their blueprint is, what it's designed to do, and what scenario it's built for.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Since you are playing Reforged Eden 2, you will need to use blueprints that specifically say they are Reforged Eden 2 compatible.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Authors may add something like RE2, RFE2, etc to the titles or descriptions to specify.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Likewise if you upload your own blueprints, please specify that they are for Reforged Eden 2 so people don't try to use your blueprint only to find some of the blocks are missing![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once you've subscribed to a blueprint on the Workshop, you must fully restart your game for it to show up in your blueprint library.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[i][c][ffffff]Note: The Steam Workshop is only usable if you are running the game from Steam. If you are running the game from the Epic Games Store you will not have access to the Steam Workshop.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][u][u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/383120/workshop/]Steam Workshop[/url][/u][/u][-][/c][c][abd1ff] 是一个您可以浏览和订阅他人上传的蓝图的地方,甚至可以分享您自己的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff](这个场景也是在这里分享的![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以浏览Workshop并使用筛选器和搜索选项找到完美的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请仔细阅读每个蓝图的描述。好的作者会提供详细的描述,说明他们的蓝图是什么,它的设计目的是什么,以及它是为了什么场景建造的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]由于您正在玩Reforged Eden 2,您需要使用特别标明与Reforged Eden 2兼容的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]作者可能会在标题或描述中添加类似RE2、RFE2等来指明。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]同样,如果您上传自己的蓝图,请指明它们是为Reforged Eden 2准备的,这样人们就不会尝试使用您的蓝图,结果发现一些方块缺失![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦您在Workshop上订阅了一个蓝图,您必须完全重启游戏,它才会显示在您的蓝图库中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[i][c][ffffff]注意:只有当您从Steam运行游戏时,才能使用Steam Workshop。如果您是从Epic Games Store运行游戏,您将无法访问Steam Workshop。[-][/c][/i]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Creative mode is a separate game mode specifically for designing ships and bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It contains many new tools and quality of life changes for building.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Spawns no enemies, resource deposits, or POIs and the AI is turned off.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]All survival elements are disabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Allows access to the full creative toolset including the ability to copy and paste blocks, expanded block placement options, and more.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Allows easier removal of blocks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To play Reforged Eden 2 in creative mode, start a new save game using Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]On the screen where you select your starting planet, press the Game Mode button to change it to creative mode.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These instructions are also on this screen.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot safely change a survival game into a creative game without risking save game corruption, so you will need to keep a separate creative mode save.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Save your blueprints in creative mode then you can build them in your survival games using the [-][/c][c][00ff00]blueprint factory[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]创造模式是一个专门用于设计飞船和基地的独立游戏模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它包含了许多新的工具和生活质量变化,用于建造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不生成敌人、资源矿床或兴趣点,且AI被关闭。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]所有生存要素都被禁用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]允许访问完整的创造工具集,包括复制和粘贴方块的能力,扩展的方块放置选项等。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]允许更容易地移除方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要玩重铸伊甸园2的创造模式,使用重铸伊甸园2开始一个新的保存游戏。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在选择起始星球的屏幕上,按下游戏模式按钮将其更改为创造模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些说明也在这个屏幕上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你不能安全地将生存游戏更改为创造游戏,而不冒着保存游戏损坏的风险,因此你需要保留一个单独的创造模式保存。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在创造模式中保存你的蓝图,然后你可以在生存游戏中使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图工厂[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来建造它们。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Complexity is a measurement of how much of a performance impact your blueprint might have on the game.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In other words, it's a measurement of how much lag your blueprint will cause.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Complexity is called Size Class in Reforged Eden 1 and in the vanilla game, but has been renamed to Complexity in Reforged Eden 2 to clarify what it actually measures.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is not a measurement of the physical size or strength of your blueprint.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In fact, it has no bearing on gameplay at all. It is simply a performance metric by which server owners can use to restrict lag-inducing blueprints from being built.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In single player there is no complexity limit, even if the complexity is showing as red in the blueprint library.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]On a server, the complexity limit is set by the server admin in the server settings and it will not allow you to spawn a blueprint that goes over this limit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Talk to your server admin for any questions about this limit.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]复杂度是衡量你的蓝图可能会对游戏性能产生多大影响的一种度量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]换句话说,它是用来衡量你的蓝图将导致多少延迟的度量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在重铸伊甸园1和原版游戏中,复杂度被称为尺寸等级,但在重铸伊甸园2中已更名为复杂度,以明确它实际测量的内容。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它不是对你蓝图物理尺寸或强度的度量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]实际上,它对游戏玩法没有任何影响。它仅仅是一个性能指标,服务器所有者可以用它来限制可能导致延迟的蓝图的建造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在单人游戏中,即使蓝图库中显示为红色,也没有复杂度限制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在服务器上,复杂度限制由服务器管理员在服务器设置中设置,它不允许你生成超过这个限制的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]关于这个限制的任何问题,请与你的服务器管理员交谈。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Did you know the Empyrion developers added on-screen tutorials and help screens to many of the game windows?
Well, they did![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Just look for the [-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] icon in the upper right area of any game window and click on it to get a detailed overview of the window you are currently in with full explanations and tips.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Most game windows have this button available, including the map, control panel, etc.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]你知道吗,Empyrion的开发者为游戏中的许多窗口添加了屏幕教程和帮助屏幕?
嗯,他们确实这么做了![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只需在任何游戏窗口的右上角寻找 [-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 图标,点击它就可以获得你当前所在窗口的详细概览,包括完整的解释和提示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
大多数游戏窗口都有这个按钮可用,包括地图、控制面板等。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Insignias are items you can turn in for [-][/c][c][00ff00]credits[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]reputation[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Insignias are looted from defeated bandit and raider [-][/c][c][00ff00]orbital patrol vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in space or earned from some [-][/c][c][00ff00]combat site[-][/c][c][abd1ff] rewards.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Bring insignias to the bounty office of a major faction, located in their [-][/c][c][00ff00]trading station sectors[-][/c][c][abd1ff] within their galactic territory.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]徽章是您可以提交以获取[-][/c][c][00ff00]信用点[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]声望[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的物品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]徽章可以从太空中被击败的强盗和掠夺者[-][/c][c][00ff00]轨道巡逻舰船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中掠夺获得,或者从某些[-][/c][c][00ff00]战斗区域[-][/c][c][abd1ff]奖励中获得。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将徽章带到一个主要派系的赏金办公室,位于他们银河领土内的[-][/c][c][00ff00]贸易空间站星区[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Reputation is your standing with a NPC faction and affects how they will treat you and what services they will offer.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Reputation is a numerical number, with different reputation levels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you are hostile or hated with a faction, they will attack you on sight and your turrets will fire on them automatically.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you are neutral they will not attack you and your turrets will not consider them a valid target.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]声望是您与NPC派系的关系,影响他们对待您的方式以及他们提供的服务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]声望是一个数值,有不同级别的声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您与某个派系关系敌对或憎恨,他们会在看到您时发起攻击,您的炮塔也会自动对他们开火。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您是中立的,他们不会攻击您,您的炮塔也不会将他们视为有效目标。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Your [-][/c][c][00ff00]reputation[-][/c][c][abd1ff] level affects how a [-][/c][c][00ff00]NPC faction[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will treat you.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each faction may have different thresholds and bonuses, so check the faction window for details about each faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view your current reputation level with each discovered faction in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]faction window[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]0-6000 Hated:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They attack you on sight and offer no services.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff8000]6001-12000 Hostile:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They attack you on sight and offer no services.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]12001-18000 Neutral:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They do not attack you and will offer some services.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]18001-24000 Friendly:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They do not attack you and offer more services.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]24001-30000 Honored:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They do not attack you and offer the full range of services and additional discounts.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您的 [-][/c][c][00ff00]声望[-][/c][c][abd1ff]等级决定了一个 [-][/c][c][00ff00]NPC派系[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将如何对待您。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个派系可能有不同的阈值和奖励,因此请检查派系窗口以获取有关每个派系的详细信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以在 [-][/c][c][00ff00]派系窗口[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中查看您与每个已发现的派系的当前声望等级。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]0-6000 憎恨:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]他们一见到您就会攻击,并且不提供任何服务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff8000]6001-12000 敌对:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]他们一见到您就会攻击,并且不提供任何服务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]12001-18000 中立:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]他们不会攻击您,并将提供一些服务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]18001-24000 友好:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]他们不会攻击您,并提供更多服务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]24001-30000 尊敬:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]他们不会攻击您,并提供全范围的服务和额外折扣。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]There are many NPC factions in the scenario.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each NPC faction has their own [-][/c][c][00ff00]reputation[-][/c][c][abd1ff] triggers for gaining or losing reputation, and different perks for being at different reputation levels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can see details about your current reputation and how your actions affect your reputation with a faction in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]faction window[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Only factions that you have discovered will show up here. To discover a faction you must discover a POI, patrol vessel, or NPC belonging to that faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some factions do not use reputation and cannot be discovered, for example the Alien and Warlord faction are always hostile with no way to gain reputation with them, while Admin and Ally factions are always friendly.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Killing members of a faction can affect your reputation with multiple other factions in a positive or negative way.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]在这个场景中有许多NPC派系。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个NPC派系都有他们自己的[-][/c][c][00ff00]声望[-][/c][c][abd1ff]触发机制,用于增加或减少声望,以及在不同声望等级时提供不同的特权。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]派系窗口[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中看到你当前的声望详情以及你的行为如何影响你在某个派系中的声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只有你已经发现的派系才会在这里显示。要发现一个派系,你必须发现一个兴趣点、巡逻舰船或属于该派系的NPC。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有些派系不使用声望系统,也无法被发现,例如外星和军阀派系永远敌对,无法通过任何方式获得声望,而管理员和盟友派系则永远友好。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]杀害某个派系的成员可能会以积极或消极的方式影响你与其他多个派系的声望。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]To access the faction window, press the faction icon at the top of the player [-][/c][c][00ff00]inventory[-][/c][c][abd1ff] window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is no hotkey to access the faction window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Any factions you have discovered will be shown on the left side.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Placing your mouse over a faction will display details on the right side on actions that cause you to gain or lose reputation with that faction, as well as reputation levels where such losses may not apply anymore.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Pay special attention to things such as harvesting plants or killing prey animals within their territory or spawning structures and mining, as these can cause a significant reputation loss if you aren't paying attention.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The three tabs along the top will show you [-][/c][c][00ff00]NPC factions[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]player factions[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Player factions have no reputation, but allow you to browse the different factions and apply to join one.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Only relevant in multiplayer.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]要访问派系窗口,请按玩家[c][00ff00]库存[-][/c]窗口顶部的派系图标。
没有快捷键可以访问派系窗口。

任何您发现的派系都会显示在左侧。

将鼠标悬停在派系上会显示右侧的详细信息,包括导致您与该派系声望增加或减少的行为,以及在某些情况下不再适用的声望等级。

特别要注意在他们的领土内采集植物或杀死猎物动物、生成结构和采矿等行为,因为如果您不注意,这些行为可能会导致声望大幅下降。

顶部的三个标签将向您显示[c][00ff00]NPC派系[-][/c]和[c][00ff00]玩家派系[-][/c]。
玩家派系没有声望,但允许您浏览不同的派系并申请加入其中一个。
这只在多人游戏中相关。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]How you gain reputation with a faction will depend on which faction it is.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the [-][/c][c][00ff00]faction window[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for details about what causes reputation gains and losses with a specific faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For most factions:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Kill their enemies:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Killing NPCs or drones belonging to that faction's competitors or enemies will increase your reputation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Kill predators in their territory:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some factions will appreciate you thinning the population of hostile wildlife within their faction territory on planets.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Complete missions:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Missions for a faction can give reputation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Complete trader missions:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Trader missions that are required to unlock a factory trader will give reputation with the faction that owns the factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Regular trader missions might not give reputation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Turn in insignias:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some factions accept bandit and raider insignias at their bounty offices. See [-][/c][c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Insignias and Bounty Hunting[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Turn in undelivered cargo:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In your travels you may find undelivered cargo as loot. Turning these in at a [-][/c][c][00ff00]GIN Console[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in a [-][/c][c][00ff00]trading station[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will reward you with reputation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Complete sites:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Completing [-][/c][c][00ff00]combat[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]mining[-][/c][c][abd1ff], or [-][/c][c][00ff00]exploration sites[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can reward you with reputation with the faction that you helped.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Complete mining contracts:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Completing a [-][/c][c][00ff00]mining contract[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will reward you with reputation for the faction assigned the contract.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Other:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Sometimes you may find unique items or other ways of gaining the trust of a faction.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]你与某个派系提升声望的方式将取决于该派系是什么。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]查看[-][/c][c][00ff00]派系窗口[-][/c][c][abd1ff],了解特定派系声望增减的详细原因。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]对于大多数派系:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]击杀他们的敌人:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]击杀属于该派系竞争对手或敌人的NPC或无人机将增加你的声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]在他们的领土内击杀掠食者:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些派系会感激你在他们派系领土内的星球上减少敌对野生动物的数量。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]完成任务:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为派系执行的任务可以获得声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]完成商人任务:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为解锁工厂商人所需的商人任务将给予拥有工厂的派系声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]常规商人任务可能不会给予声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]上交徽记:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些派系在他们的赏金办公室接受土匪和袭击者的徽记。见[-][/c][c][00ff00]战斗[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]徽记和赏金狩猎[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]上交未交付的货物:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在你的旅行中,你可能会发现作为战利品的未交付货物。在[-][/c][c][00ff00]交易空间站[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中的[-][/c][c][00ff00]GIN控制台[-][/c][c][abd1ff]上交这些货物,将奖励你声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]完成区域:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]完成[-][/c][c][00ff00]战斗[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]采矿[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或[-][/c][c][00ff00]探索区域[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可以奖励你帮助的派系声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]完成采矿合同:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]完成[-][/c][c][00ff00]采矿合同[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将奖励你为合同指定的派系声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]其他:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有时你可能会发现独特的物品或以其他方式获得派系信任的方法。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]How you lose reputation with a faction will depend on which faction it is.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the [-][/c][c][00ff00]faction window[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for details about what causes reputation gains and losses with a specific faction.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It takes time to build trust, but only takes an instant to lose it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
For most factions:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Attack them:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Damaging NPCs, drones, blocks, or shields will incur a reputation penalty based on the damage dealt.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Kill them:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Killing a NPC or drone belonging to a faction will incur a reputation penalty.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Steal their cargo:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Opening a container, even if you don't take anything, will incur a massive reputation penalty.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Special public containers can be opened without risk.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Containers will give a tooltip warning as well as an additional popup warning when attempting to access any container that would give a reputation penalty.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Steal their crops:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Harvesting any crop on their POIs will incur a massive reputation penalty.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Crops will give a tooltip warning when looking at them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Destroy blocks:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroying blocks will give a reputation penalty based on the block destroyed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroying a piece of wooden fence will give a low penalty.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroying an important piece of equipment such as a generator or door will give a massive penalty.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Destroying a core will instantly set your reputation to 0.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Mining from any faction owned asteroid, or mining rock from any faction owned POI that is anchored to an asteroid, counts as block destruction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]There are also some faction specific actions which can be negated if you are high enough reputation with the faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These do not apply to every faction, so check the faction info.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Harvest or destroy plants in their territory:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Harvesting or destroying wild plants within their planetary territory will incur a small reputation penalty.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Mine deposits in their territory:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Mining underground resource deposits may incur a reputation penalty based on the amount of ore mined.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This may be allowed at higher reputation levels depending on the faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Does not apply to asteroids in space. Mining an asteroid owned by a faction always counts as a hostile act regardless of your reputation level.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Kill prey in their territory:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some factions do not appreciate you hunting prey within their territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Flying a ship in their territory:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some factions do not appreciate the disturbance of you flying a ship through their territory and may give a small reputation penalty for every few minutes you spend in their territory while piloting a ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Spawning a structure in their territory:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some factions absolutely do not appreciate you spawning a new ship or base within their territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Other:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Sometimes there may be other ways of losing reputation, such as choices you make during a mission.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你与某个派系的声望下降方式取决于是哪个派系。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]查看[-][/c][c][00ff00]派系窗口[-][/c][c][abd1ff]了解与特定派系声望增减的详细原因。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建立信任需要时间,但失去它只需一瞬间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
对于大多数派系:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]攻击他们:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]对NPC、无人机、方块或护盾造成伤害,将根据造成的伤害受到声望惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]杀死他们:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]杀死属于某个派系的NPC或无人机将受到声望惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]偷窃他们的货物:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]打开容器,即使你不拿走任何东西,也会受到巨大的声望惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]特殊的公共容器可以安全打开。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]尝试访问任何会导致声望惩罚的容器时,容器会给出提示警告,并且还会有额外的弹出警告。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]偷窃他们的庄稼:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在他们的POI上收割任何庄稼将受到巨大的声望惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]观察庄稼时会给出提示警告。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]破坏方块:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]破坏方块将根据被破坏的方块受到声望惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]破坏一段木制围栏会受到较低的惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]破坏重要设备,如发电机或门,会受到巨大的惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]破坏核心会立即将你的声望降至0。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在任何派系拥有的小行星上采矿,或在任何锚定在小行星上的派系拥有的POI上采矿,都被视为方块破坏。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]还有一些特定于派系的行为,如果你与该派系的声望足够高,可以被抵消。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些不适用于每个派系,所以请查看派系信息。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]在他们的领土内采集或破坏植物:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在他们的星球领土内采集或破坏野生植物将受到轻微的声望惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]在他们的领土内开采矿床:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]开采地下资源矿床可能会根据开采的矿石数量受到声望惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]根据派系的不同,这在更高的声望等级可能被允许。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这不适用于太空中的小行星。开采派系拥有的小行星总是被视为敌对行为,不论你的声望等级如何。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]在他们的领土内捕猎:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些派系不欣赏你在他们的领土内捕猎。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]在他们的领土内飞行飞船:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些派系不欣赏你在他们的领土内飞行飞船造成的干扰,可能会因为你在他们的领土内驾驶飞船而每过几分钟就受到轻微的声望惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]在他们的领土内生成结构:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些派系绝对不欣赏你在他们的领土内生成新飞船或基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]其他:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有时可能会有其他失去声望的方式,比如你在任务中做出的选择。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]In multiplayer, players can form their own factions to share ownership of ships, bases, terrain devices, and [-][/c][c][00ff00]reputation[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In single player this has no practical purpose.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To browse existing player factions, apply to an existing faction, or make your own, select the Human tab of the [-][/c][c][00ff00]faction window[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Factions will be shown on the left side. Selecting a faction will show more details on the right side, as well as options to apply for membership, manage ranks, and more.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Players can only access and edit structures belonging to them or their faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Private structures or structures belonging to other factions cannot be accessed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Missions are not shared with a faction. Each player's mission progress is still individual.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Reputation levels are averaged out whenever a new player joins a faction, and any individual player's reputation gains and losses will apply to the faction as a whole.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For example if a player gains 100 reputation with Polaris, the entire faction will gain 100 Polaris reputation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you are in a faction, structures you spawn and terrain placed devices will still be set to private ownership by default.
You can change the ownership of any ship or base that you own from private to faction in the Main tab of the control panel:[-][/c]{Eden_FactionsOwnerBar.jpg}
[c][abd1ff]Terrain placed devices such as auto mining devices and portable constructors can be set to faction access in their menus.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Doing so will allow all members of your faction to access and edit that structure or use the device as if it was their own.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Ships may only dock to other ships or bases if both structures share the same ownership (either both private, or both faction).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Warning:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] You cannot change a faction ship back to private, so this is a one way transfer.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you need to change a ship back to private, you will have to remove the core and then place a new core.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Before leaving a player faction, make sure you have converted any structures back to private ownership or you will need the assistance of your server admin.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When you first join a multiplayer server you may be automatically placed in a default Human faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This depends on server settings.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Factions may also join an alliance, but this is typically used for PvP and Reforged Eden 2 is a strictly PvE scenario.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]在多人游戏中,玩家可以创建自己的派系,共享船只、基地、地形设备和[-][/c][c][00ff00]声望[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在单人游戏中,这没有实际用途。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要浏览现有的玩家派系,申请加入现有派系或创建自己的派系,请选择[-][/c][c][00ff00]派系窗口[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中的人类标签。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]派系将显示在左侧。选择一个派系将在右侧显示更多详情,以及申请会员、管理等级等选项。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]玩家只能访问和编辑属于他们或他们派系的结构。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]私人结构或属于其他派系的结构无法访问。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]任务不会与派系共享。每个玩家的任务进度仍然是个人的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每当新玩家加入派系时,声望等级会被平均分配,任何个人玩家的声望增减将适用于整个派系。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]例如,如果一个玩家获得了100点与Polaris的声望,整个派系将获得100点Polaris声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你在一个派系中,你生成的结构和地形放置的设备默认将设置为私人所有权。
你可以在控制面板的[-][/c]{Eden_FactionsOwnerBar.jpg}[c][abd1ff]主标签中将任何属于你的船只或基地的所有权从私人更改为派系:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]地形放置的设备,如自动采矿设备和便携式建造机,可以在它们的菜单中设置为派系访问。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这样做将允许你的派系的所有成员访问和编辑该结构或使用该设备,就好像它是他们自己的一样。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只有当两个结构共享相同的所有权(无论是私人还是派系)时,船只才能停靠到其他船只或基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]警告:[-][/c][c][abd1ff]你不能将派系船只更改回私人,所以这是一种单向转移。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你需要将船只更改回私人,你需要移除核心,然后放置一个新的核心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在离开玩家派系之前,请确保你已经将任何结构转换回私人所有权,否则你将需要服务器管理员的帮助。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你第一次加入多人服务器时,你可能会被自动放置在一个默认的人类派系中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这取决于服务器设置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]派系也可以加入联盟,但这通常用于PvP,而Reforged Eden 2是一个严格的PvE场景。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A 4 digit lock code can be set on devices in the control panel.[-][/c]{Eden_LockCodeBar.jpg}
[c][abd1ff]This allows you to restrict who can use specific devices to those players who know the unlock code.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Setting an unlock code of 0000 will allow free public access of that device to all players.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Lock codes are not needed to prevent other players outside of your faction from accessing your devices. If no lock code is set, players not of the same faction as the structure will be unable to use any device or access any cargo.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The owner of the structure or members of the owning faction do not need to input the lock code to access the device unless the private option is selected when setting the code.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When attempting to access a device with a lock code, the player will need to input the correct code.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If they get it wrong too many times in a row they will need to wait before attempting again.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Lock codes can be useful for trading with players that you trust by setting a lock code on a container and giving them the lock code so they can pick up the goods and deposit payment.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Many POIs set some devices such as doors to public access so they can be used by players.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Devices can also be restricted to specific faction roles for members of your faction.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以在控制面板上的设备上设置一个4位数的锁定代码。[-][/c]{Eden_LockCodeBar.jpg}
[c][abd1ff]这允许你限制特定设备的使用权限,只允许知道解锁代码的玩家使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]设置解锁代码为0000将允许所有玩家自由公开访问该设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]锁定代码不需要用来防止你派系之外的其他玩家访问你的设备。如果没有设置锁定代码,与结构物相同派系的玩家将无法使用任何设备或访问任何货物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]结构物的所有者或拥有派系的成员在设置代码时,除非选择了私有选项,否则不需要输入锁定代码即可访问设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当尝试访问带有锁定代码的设备时,玩家需要输入正确的代码。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果他们连续输错太多次,他们将需要等待一段时间后才能再次尝试。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]锁定代码对于与你信任的玩家进行交易非常有用,你可以通过在容器上设置一个锁定代码并给他们锁代码,让他们可以取走货物并支付货款。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]许多兴趣点(POIs)将一些设备如门设置为公共访问,以便玩家可以使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]设备也可以限制为你派系中的特定派系角色。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Reforged Eden 2 does not support PvP in any way.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is a 100% PvE scenario and should not be used for PvP gameplay.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
All playfields are set to PvE by default and the force global PvP option is disabled in multiplayer.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In single player PvP is hard coded to be enabled, so all playfields will show as PvP in single player.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In a PvE playfield you cannot damage other players or their structures.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In a PvP playfield, or when the PvP global setting is enabled, you can damage other players and their structures.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Friendly fire is another game option.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is strongly recommended against editing the game options or playfield files to enable PvP in Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There are other scenarios better suited to PvP gameplay, and the Reforged Eden 2 developers cannot offer support for servers which have enabled PvP.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]重铸伊甸园2不支持任何形式的玩家对战。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是一个100%玩家对环境(PvE)场景,不应该用于玩家对战游戏。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
所有游戏场地默认设置为PvE,并且多人游戏中强制全局PvP选项被禁用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在单人模式中,PvP被硬编码为启用,因此所有游戏场地将显示为单人模式下的PvP。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在一个PvE游戏场地中,你不能伤害其他玩家或他们的建筑。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在一个PvP游戏场地中,或者当PvP全局设置被启用时,你可以伤害其他玩家和他们的建筑。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]友军伤害是另一个游戏选项。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]强烈建议不要编辑游戏选项或游戏场地文件以在重铸伊甸园2中启用PvP。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]还有其他更适合PvP游戏的场景,重铸伊甸园2的开发者无法为启用了PvP的服务器提供支持。[-][/c]
可被黑客入侵的卫星和缓存
可被黑客入侵的卫星和缓存:

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Hackable satellites and caches[-][/c][c][abd1ff] are [-][/c][c][00ff00]admin core[-][/c][c][abd1ff] POIs which require you to solve a puzzle or complete a hacking minigame to access.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be found in sun warp sectors, orbits, and various sectors of space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
You usually start the hacking process by finding a computer console or other interface and using it [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]IDA may be able to analyze the satellite's computer and give you some tips.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There are multiple types of hacking.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can typically reward some combination of sellable reports, [-][/c][c][00ff00]unlock points[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]schematics[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and Progenitor data chips.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hacking into a faction owned satellite will not incur a reputation penalty unless you have to destroy a physical door or are warned about a reputation penalty in the hacking interface.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
可被黑客攻击的卫星和缓存[-][/c][c][abd1ff]是[-][/c][c][00ff00]管理核心[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的POI,需要你解决一个谜题或完成一个黑客小游戏才能访问。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在太阳翘曲星区、轨道和太空的各个星区找到。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
你通常通过找到一个计算机控制台或其他接口并使用它[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来开始黑客攻击过程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]IDA可能能够分析卫星的计算机并给你一些提示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有多种类型的黑客攻击。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们通常可以奖励一些可出售报告的组合,[-][/c][c][00ff00]解锁点[-][/c][c][abd1ff],[-][/c][c][00ff00]图纸[-][/c][c][abd1ff],和先祖数据芯片。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]黑客攻击一个派系拥有的卫星不会受到声望惩罚,除非你必须摧毁一个实体门,或者在黑客界面中被警告有声望惩罚。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Teleporters are devices that allow you to teleport instantaneously to another ship or base that also has a teleporter installed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Teleporters can be placed on capital vessels and bases and come in several types.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The range of your teleport is based on the range of the origin teleporter, not the teleporter at the destination.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Warning:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Just because you can teleport to something doesn't mean you can teleport back.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For example the destination teleporter may be unpowered or shorter range.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Only teleport to destinations that you're sure you can come back from. NPC stations use only the basic station teleporter.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To use a teleporter, the structure's shields on the origin ship or station must be offline.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Walk up to the teleporter and interact with it [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and it will display a list of teleport destinations for you to chose from.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can teleport to any structure owned by you or your faction that has a teleporter, as well as any discovered [-][/c][c][00ff00]POIs[-][/c][c][abd1ff] belonging to a faction you are neutral [-][/c][c][00ff00]reputation[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or above with.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The teleporter must be on and it uses quite a bit of power, so hooking it up to a motion sensor or other signal logic to keep it offline except when you are using it is recommended.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Teleporters do not need to be turned on to be valid destinations.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each structure can have only 1 teleporter.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some POIs will have special teleporters that teleport to a fixed destination elsewhere in the POI, playfield, or even galaxy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This fixed destination option is not available to players.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Mobile Teleporter:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Used on capital vessels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can teleport to a destination within the same sector (the local planet, orbit, or moon).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Enhanced Teleporter:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Used on capital vessels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can teleport to a destination within the same star system.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Station Teleporter:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Used on bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can teleport to a destination in other star systems up to the maximum range in light years specified on the tooltip.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

[c][00afff]Advanced Teleporter:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Used on bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can teleport to a destination in other star systems up to the maximum range in light years specified on the tooltip.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Has a longer range than the previous tier.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Quantum Teleporter:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Used on bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can teleport to a destination in other star systems up to the maximum range in light years specified on the tooltip.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Has a longer range than the previous tier.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]传送装置是一种设备,允许你瞬间传送到另一个也安装了传送装置的飞船或基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]传送装置可以安装在主力舰和基地上,并且有几种类型。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的传送范围基于原始传送装置的范围,而不是目的地的传送装置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]警告:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 仅仅因为你能传送到某个地方,并不意味着你能传送回来。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]例如,目的地的传送装置可能没有供电或者范围较短。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只传送到你确信能够回来的地方。NPC空间站仅使用基本的空间站传送装置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要使用传送装置,原始飞船或空间站的结构护盾必须处于离线状态。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
走到传送装置旁边并与之交互[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff],它将显示一个传送目的地列表供你选择。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以传送到任何属于你或你的派系并且装有传送装置的结构,以及任何你已经发现的[-][/c][c][00ff00]兴趣点[-][/c][c][abd1ff],这些兴趣点属于与你[-][/c][c][00ff00]声望[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中立或以上的派系。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]传送装置必须开启,并且会消耗相当多的电力,因此建议将其连接到运动传感器或其他信号逻辑上,以保持其在不使用时处于离线状态。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]传送装置不需要开启才能成为有效的目的地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个结构只能有一个传送装置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些兴趣点将有特殊的传送装置,它们会传送到POI、游戏场地甚至整个星系中的固定目的地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这个固定目的地选项对玩家不可用。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]

[c][00afff]移动传送装置:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]用于主力舰。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以传送到同一星区内的目的地(当地的行星、轨道或月球)。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]

[c][00afff]增强型传送装置:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]用于主力舰。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以传送到同一星系内的目的地。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]空间站传送装置:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]用于基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以传送到其他星系的目的地,距离可达工具提示上指定的光年最大范围。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

[c][00afff]高级传送装置:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]用于基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以传送到其他星系的目的地,距离可达工具提示上指定的光年最大范围。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]比前一级的范围更长。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]量子传送装置:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]用于基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以传送到其他星系的目的地,距离可达工具提示上指定的光年最大范围。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]比前一级的范围更长。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]A sector is any warpable location within a [-][/c][c][00ff00]star system[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For example, a planet, its orbit, and any moons it has is one sector.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]An asteroid field would be another sector.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You need to use a warp drive to travel between different sectors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
In this section you will find information on the different types of sectors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not all sector types will be listed, just the more common types.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Consider this just as a general guide as listing all possible sectors would be impossible.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]一个星区是[c][00ff00]星系[-][/c][c][abd1ff]内任何可以翘曲到达的地点。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]例如,一个行星、它的轨道以及它拥有的任何卫星都属于一个星区。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一个小行星场将是另一个星区。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]您需要使用翘曲引擎来在不同的星区之间旅行。[-][/c]

在本节中,您将找到有关不同类型星区的信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]并非所有星区类型都会列出,只是更常见的类型。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]请将此视为一般指南,因为列出所有可能的星区是不可能的。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Planets contain a planet, an [-][/c][c][00ff00]orbit[-][/c][c][abd1ff] around that planet, and one or more [-][/c][c][00ff00]moons[-][/c][c][abd1ff] if it has any.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp to the planet's orbit, and then fly normally to the planet or any of its moons.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a colored circle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The color is based on the planet type, and the size of the circle is based on the size of the planet.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
On the map info screen you can toggle between showing info for the orbit or info for the planet.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Planets come in different sizes ranging from small, medium, large, and very large.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can have a wide variety of biomes, atmospheric and environmental conditions, gravity, POIs, resources, flora and fauna, and more.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They come in different [-][/c][c][00ff00]planet types[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]行星包含一个行星本身,围绕该行星的一个[c][00ff00]轨道[-][/c],以及如果有的话,一个或多个[c][00ff00]卫星[-][/c]。

您可以翘曲到行星的轨道,然后正常飞行到行星或其任何卫星。

它们在地图上由一个彩色圆圈表示。

颜色基于行星的类型,圆圈的大小基于行星的大小。

在地图信息屏幕上,您可以切换显示轨道信息或行星信息。

行星有不同的大小,从小型、中型、大型到非常大。

它们可以拥有各种各样的生态系统、大气和环境条件、重力、兴趣点(POI)、资源、植被和动物等。

它们分为不同的[c][00ff00]行星类型[-][/c]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some [-][/c][c][00ff00]planets[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can have one or more moons.
You can warp to the planet's [-][/c][c][00ff00]orbit[-][/c][c][abd1ff] but not directly to a moon.

They are represented on the map by a colored circle next to the planet.
The color is based on the moon type, and the size of the circle is based on the size of the moon.

On the map info screen you can toggle between showing info for the orbit or info for the moon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Moons come in different sizes but are typically either small or medium.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can have a wide variety of biomes, atmospheric and environmental conditions, gravity, POIs, resources, flora and fauna, and more.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They come in different [-][/c][c][00ff00]moon types[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]一些[-][/c][c][00ff00]行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可以拥有一个或多个卫星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您不能直接翘曲到卫星,但可以翘曲到行星的[-][/c][c][00ff00]轨道[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由行星旁边的彩色圆圈表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]颜色基于卫星的类型,圆圈的大小基于卫星的大小。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]在地图信息屏幕上,您可以切换显示轨道信息或卫星信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]卫星有不同的大小,但通常是小的或中等的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以拥有各种各样的生态系统、大气和环境条件、重力、兴趣点(POI)、资源、植被和动物等。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们分为不同的[-][/c][c][00ff00]卫星类型[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Gas giants are a special type of [-][/c][c][00ff00]planet[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot warp directly to a gas giant, and there is no way to enter them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Instead, you select one of its [-][/c][c][00ff00]moons[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to warp to.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each of a gas giant's moons is its own [-][/c][c][00ff00]sector[-][/c][c][abd1ff], that can be warped to independently, and has its own [-][/c][c][00ff00]orbit[-][/c][c][abd1ff]. You must use a warp drive to travel to different gas giant moons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Sometimes multiple gas giant moons can occupy the same sector, in which case you can fly between the moons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]On the map info screen you can toggle between showing info for the orbit or info for the moon for each of the moons.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]气态巨星是一种特殊的[-][/c][c][00ff00]行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您不能直接翘曲到气态巨星,也无法进入它们。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]相反,您选择它的一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]卫星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来翘曲。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个气态巨星的卫星都是它自己的[-][/c][c][00ff00]区域[-][/c][c][abd1ff],可以独立翘曲,并且拥有自己的[-][/c][c][00ff00]轨道[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。您必须使用翘曲引擎来前往不同的气态巨星卫星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有时,多个气态巨星的卫星可以占据同一个区域,在这种情况下,您可以在卫星之间飞行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在地图信息屏幕上,您可以切换显示每个卫星的[-][/c][c][00ff00]轨道[-][/c][c][abd1ff]信息或[-][/c][c][00ff00]卫星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]信息。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Orbits are the space playfield found around a [-][/c][c][00ff00]planet[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or [-][/c][c][00ff00]gas giant moon[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp to a planet's orbit and then fly normally to the surface of the planet or any of its moons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Orbits are not to be confused with a planet's orbit around a star. In the context of Empyrion the word orbit refers specifically to the space orbit playfield around a planet.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]On the map info screen you can toggle between showing info for the orbit or info for the planet.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]They can have a wide variety of POIs, resources, and visual environmental effects.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They come in different [-][/c][c][00ff00]orbit types[-][/c][c][abd1ff] depending on the type of star.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Habitable Orbit:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Found in habitable star systems such as G, F, and A class. Easy difficulty.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Cold Orbit:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Found in cold star systems such as M and D class. Medium difficulty.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]Hot Orbit:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Found in hot star systems such as K, B, and O class. Hard difficulty.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]轨道是围绕[-][/c][c][00ff00]行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或[-][/c][c][00ff00]气态巨星的卫星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]发现的太空场地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以翘曲到一个行星的轨道,然后正常飞行到行星表面或其任何卫星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]轨道不应与行星围绕恒星的轨道混淆。在Empyrion的语境中,"轨道"一词专门指围绕行星的太空轨道场地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在地图信息屏幕上,您可以在显示轨道信息和显示行星信息之间切换。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以拥有各种各样的兴趣点(POI)、资源和视觉效果。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们根据不同的[-][/c][c][00ff00]轨道类型[-][/c][c][abd1ff],这取决于恒星的类型。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]可居住轨道:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在可居住的恒星系统中发现,如G类、F类和A类。难度较易。[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]寒冷轨道:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在寒冷的恒星系统中发现,如M类和D类。难度中等。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

[c][ff0000]炽热轨道:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在炽热的恒星系统中发现,如K类、B类和O类。难度困难。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Asteroid fields are space sectors that contain a lot of asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp directly to an asteroid field.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by an asteroid field icon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The color and type of icon is determined by the type of asteroid field it is and the owning faction, if any.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Resource asteroids in asteroid fields do not show on the map resource info. You will need to explore the asteroid field to find out what resources it has.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Resource asteroids might show up on the map with POI icons instead of resource icons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some asteroid fields interfere with the detector, reducing the range it works.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Asteroid fields contain markers visible on the map where clusters of resource asteroids and POIs might be found. Fly to them to investigate.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Often contains unique visuals, such as dust clouds and decorative asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most decorative asteroids are non-solid and will break apart if you fly through them. They do not block weapons fire.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some decorative asteroids are solid.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]小行星场是包含许多小行星的太空区域。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以直接翘曲到小行星场。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个小行星场图标表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]图标的颜色和类型由小行星场的类型以及拥有它的派系(如果有的话)决定。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]小行星场中的资源小行星不会在地图资源信息上显示。您需要探索小行星场以了解它拥有哪些资源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]资源小行星可能会以兴趣点(POI)图标而不是资源图标显示在地图上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些小行星场会干扰探测器,降低其工作范围。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]小行星场包含在地图上可见的标记,这些标记可能指示资源小行星和兴趣点(POI)的聚集地。飞向它们进行调查。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通常包含独特的视觉效果,如尘埃云和装饰性小行星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数装饰性小行星是非固态的,如果您飞过它们,它们会破碎。它们不会阻挡武器火力。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些装饰性小行星是固态的。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Ice fields are special space sectors that contain a lot of [-][/c][c][00ff00]rich ice asteroids[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp directly to an ice field.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a blue asteroid field icon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The type of icon is determined by the type of ice field it is.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Ice asteroids in ice fields do not show on the map resource info. You will need to explore the ice field to find out what resources it has.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Ice asteroids might show up on the map with POI icons instead of resource icons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some ice fields interfere with the detector, reducing the range it works.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Ice fields contain a cluster of dense or rich ice asteroids near the center of the ice field.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Dense ice and rich ice require specialized [-][/c][c][00ff00]modulated drills[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to harvest.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Often contains unique visuals, such as dust clouds and decorative asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most decorative asteroids are non-solid and will break apart if you fly through them. They do not block weapons fire.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some decorative asteroids are solid.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Turn off Warp Drive from your turret targeting list before entering ice fields to prevent your turrets from firing on dense and rich ice asteroids.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]冰原是特殊的太空区域,其中包含大量的[-][/c][c][00ff00]富冰小行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以直接翘曲到冰原。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个蓝色的小行星场图标表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]图标的类型由冰原的类型决定。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]冰原中的冰小行星不会在地图资源信息上显示。您需要探索冰原来了解它拥有哪些资源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]冰小行星可能会以兴趣点(POI)图标而不是资源图标显示在地图上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些冰原会干扰探测器,降低其工作范围。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]冰原在冰原中心附近包含一簇密集或富冰小行星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]密集冰和富冰需要特殊的[-][/c][c][00ff00]调制钻头[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来采集。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通常包含独特的视觉效果,如尘埃云和装饰性小行星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数装饰性小行星是非固态的,如果您飞过它们,它们会破碎。它们不会阻挡武器火力。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些装饰性小行星是固态的。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]在进入冰原之前,请从炮塔目标列表中关闭翘曲引擎,以防止您的炮塔向密集和富冰小行星开火。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rich asteroid fields are special space sectors that contain a lot of [-][/c][c][00ff00]rich asteroids[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp directly to a rich asteroid field.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a brown asteroid field icon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Rich asteroids in rich asteroid fields do not show on the map resource info. You will need to explore the asteroid field to find out what resources it has.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rich asteroids might show up on the map with POI icons instead of resource icons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some rich fields interfere with the detector, reducing the range it works.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rich asteroid fields contain a cluster of rich ore asteroids near the center of the asteroid field.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rich asteroids require specialized [-][/c][c][00ff00]modulated drills[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to harvest.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Often contains unique visuals, such as dust clouds and decorative asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most decorative asteroids are non-solid and will break apart if you fly through them. They do not block weapons fire.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some decorative asteroids are solid.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Turn off Warp Drive from your turret targeting list before entering rich asteroid fields to prevent your turrets from firing on rich ore asteroids.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]富饶的小行星场是特殊的太空区域,其中包含大量的[-][/c][c][00ff00]富饶小行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以直接翘曲到富饶的小行星场。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个棕色的小行星场图标表示。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]富饶小行星场中的富饶小行星不会在地图资源信息上显示。您需要探索小行星场以了解它拥有哪些资源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]富饶小行星可能会以兴趣点(POI)图标而不是资源图标显示在地图上。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一些富饶的小行星场会干扰探测器,降低其工作范围。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]富饶小行星场在小行星场中心附近包含一簇富矿小行星。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]富饶小行星需要特殊的[-][/c][c][00ff00]调制钻头[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来采集。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]通常包含独特的视觉效果,如尘埃云和装饰性小行星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数装饰性小行星是非固态的,如果您飞过它们,它们会破碎。它们不会阻挡武器火力。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些装饰性小行星是固态的。[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]在进入富饶小行星场之前,请从炮塔目标列表中关闭翘曲引擎,以防止您的炮塔向富矿小行星开火。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Sun warp sectors are special sectors that you arrive in when you warp from one star system to another.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot warp directly to a star's warp sectors normally.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To warp to a star's warp sector you need to either use a bookmark, or warp to the system from the proper angle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They do not show on the map.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each star has 6 hidden sun warp sectors arranged around it, one for each direction (top, bottom, front, back, left, right).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When you warp to a star system, you are placed in a sun warp sector corresponding to the angle you were warping from.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is not recommended to leave ships or bases in these sectors as it can be awkward to return to them using bookmarks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you left a ship or base behind, you can use the registry to place a bookmark for it and use that to warp back.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
They can have a few hackable satellites and not much else.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]恒心翘曲区域是特殊的区域,当您从一个星系翘曲到另一个星系时,您会到达这里。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通常,您不能直接翘曲到恒星的翘曲区域。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]要翘曲到恒星的翘曲区域,您需要使用书签,或者从正确的角度翘曲到系统。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们不会显示在地图上。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]每个恒星周围有6个隐藏的恒心翘曲区域,每个方向(上、下、前、后、左、右)各一个。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]当您翘曲到一个星系时,您会被放置在与您翘曲角度相对应的恒心翘曲区域。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]不建议在这些区域留下飞船或基地,因为使用书签返回它们可能会很尴尬。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您留下了飞船或基地,您可以使用注册表为其放置一个书签,并使用它翘曲回去。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可能有一些可被黑客攻击的卫星,除此之外就没有什么了。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Each star system has a single primary star in the center of the system.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot warp directly to a star nor enter it in any way.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a sun icon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The color and type of icon is determined by the type of star that it is.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rogue sectors will not have a star.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This star type determines the type of star system, the ambient light, the distance planets are from the star, etc.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the only star that is used for solar power calculations.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A star system can contain multiple secondary stars.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These extra stars do not give off light and do not count for solar power calculations.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are purely decorative.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]每个星系中心都有一个单一的主星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您不能直接翘曲到恒星,也不能以任何方式进入它。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个太阳图标表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]图标的颜色和类型由恒星的类型决定。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]流浪区域不会有恒星。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]这种恒星类型决定了星系的类型、环境光、行星与恒星的距离等。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是唯一用于太阳能计算的恒星。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一个星系可以包含多个次要恒星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些额外的恒星不会发光,也不计入太阳能计算。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们纯粹是装饰性的。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]UCH Research Vessels are sectors that contain a UCH Research Vessel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp directly to them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a cyan triangle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most often found in habitable star systems (G, F, A) outside of faction territory.

These vessels offer important services and missions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are used for turning in navigational data to increase warp range, learning [-][/c][c][00ff00]schematics[-][/c][c][abd1ff], turning in Progenitor data chips, and are part of the Project Eden missions.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]UCH研究飞船是包含UCH研究飞船的星区。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以直接翘曲到它们那里。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个青色三角形表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通常在宜居恒星系统(G, F, A)的派系领土之外找到。

这些飞船提供重要的服务和任务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们用于提交导航数据以增加翘曲范围,学习[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff],提交始祖数据芯片,并且是伊甸园计划任务的一部分。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Trading station sectors are the trade hubs of a main faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp directly to them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a white station icon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can only be found within a major faction's galactic territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
These trading sectors offer important traders, services, and are used for missions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They usually contain a trading station, distribution center, and bounty office.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]贸易空间站区域是主要派系的贸易中心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以直接翘曲到它们那里。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个白色的空间站图标表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们只能在一个主要派系的银河领土内找到。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]这些贸易区域提供重要的商人、服务,并用于任务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们通常包含一个贸易空间站、分发中心和赏金办公室。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Faction station sectors contain one or more important stations belonging to a particular faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp directly to them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a colored station icon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The color of the icon is determined by the owning faction.

These sectors can contain trading stations, scrapyards, or guarded mining facilities, or anything else.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]派系星区包含一个或多个属于特定派系的重要站点。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以直接翘曲到它们那里。
[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个有颜色的站点图标表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]图标的颜色由拥有该站点的派系决定。

这些星区可以包含贸易站、拆解场或有守卫的采矿设施,或任何其他东西。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Combat sites are sectors that contain a combat encounter focused around ship to ship combat.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp directly to them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a red triangle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most combat sites are not found within faction territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If they are owned by a specific faction, the triangle might be colored with the faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
These often contain ships or bases and can be accompanied by a scripted encounter.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Sometimes will also contain ships belonging to the Ally faction. These ships do not cause reputation loss if accidentally damaged.
When you first warp to a site you will receive a popup message with a briefing.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Combat sites can give reward caches with valuable loot upon completion.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Bandit and raider combat sites will often drop [-][/c][c][00ff00]insignias[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]战斗区域是包含以飞船间战斗为中心的战斗遭遇的星区。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以直接翘曲到它们那里。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个红色三角形表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数战场不在派系领土内。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果它们属于某个特定派系,三角形可能会被染成派系的颜色。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]这些通常包含飞船或基地,并可能伴随着脚本化的遭遇。
有时还会包含属于盟友派系的飞船。如果不小心损坏了这些飞船,不会造成声望损失。
当你第一次翘曲到一个场所时,你会收到一个弹出消息,里面有简报。

战斗区域在完成后可以给予奖励缓存,里面有宝贵的战利品。
强盗和袭击者的战斗区域通常会掉落[-][/c][c][00ff00]徽章[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Mining sites are sectors that contain a mining encounter focused around ship mining to help out a faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp directly to them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a brown triangle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most mining sites are not found within faction territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If they are owned by a specific faction, the triangle might be colored with the faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
