These often contain special asteroids or other minable objects.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When you first warp to a site you will receive a popup message with a briefing.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Mining sites can give reward caches with valuable loot upon completion.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]采矿点是包含以船只采矿为中心的采矿遭遇的区域,用以帮助某个派系。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以直接翘曲到它们那里。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个棕色三角形表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数采矿点不在派系领土内。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果它们属于特定派系,三角形可能会被染上该派系的颜色。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]这些地方通常包含特殊的小行星或其他可采矿物体。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当您首次翘曲到一个采矿点时,您将收到一个弹出消息,其中包含简报。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]完成采矿点可以给予奖励箱子,里面有贵重的战利品。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Exploration sites are sectors that contain wrecks or hackable satellites.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can warp directly to them.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are represented on the map by a green triangle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most exploration sites are not found within faction territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If they are owned by a specific faction, the triangle might be colored with the faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
These often contain special wrecks, satellites, data caches, or other exploration focused things.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When you first warp to a site you will receive a popup message with a briefing.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Exploration sites often give sellable reports, schematics, upgrade points, trade goods, and salvage.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]探索区域是包含残骸或可被黑客入侵卫星的星区。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以直接翘曲到它们那里。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在地图上由一个绿色三角形表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数探索区域不在派系领土内。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果它们属于某个特定派系,三角形可能会被染成派系的颜色。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]这些通常包含特别的残骸、卫星、数据缓存或其他以探索为中心的事物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你第一次翘曲到一个区域时,你会收到一个弹出消息,里面有简报。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]探索区域通常会给予可出售的报告、图纸、升级点、贸易商品和回收物。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Galaxy map tips:[/b][-][/c]
Use the standard movement keys ([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c]) while holding down [c][ffff00]Left Click[-][/c] to move the camera.
Holding [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] speeds up camera speed.
Use the [c][00ff00]Search System[-][/c] box at the bottom to search by star or playfield name or by star type.
Various filters and a help menu can be accessed with the buttons in the upper left. Press the ? icon for more information.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]银河地图技巧:[/b][-][/c]
在使用按住[c][ffff00]鼠标左键[-][/c]的同时,使用标准移动键([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c])来移动摄像头。
按住[c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c]可以加快摄像头速度。
使用底部的[c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c]框,可以通过恒星或星区名称或恒星类型进行搜索。
可以通过左上角的按钮访问各种过滤器和帮助菜单。点击?图标获取更多信息。

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, I will remind you that the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Large Constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is too large to fit in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will need to use the logistics system to place this device using the [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the logistics system or any other subject you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]指挥官,我会提醒您,[-][/c][c][00ff00]大型建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]太大了,无法放入您的个人背包。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您需要使用物流系统通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来放置这个设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要复习物流系统或其他任何主题,您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到,位于[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]部分。[-][/c]

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, there is a high-intensity plasma field surrounding the nearby drone base that will repel most weapons.\nI recommend reviewing the [c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c] section of the [c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] before you get much closer.

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
You clumsy commander! You appear to have died.
Take a moment. Breath. This isn't the end.
You will soon be able to select a respawn location and continue your journey.

Carefully read over your respawn options so you pick the one best for your situation.
Consider that it may be better to respawn somewhere else to regroup rather
than selecting the current location option.

Depending on the game difficulty settings, some or all of your equipment will
have dropped in a backpack at your death location.
This backpack will be marked on your HUD and will last for 1 hour.

You can use your player drone [c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c] to help retrieve
dropped items from your backpack while you remain under cover.
Use [c][ffff00](Shift+F)[-][/c] (default hotkey) to retrieve all your items.
If you were piloting a ship, you can return to recover what's left of your ship.

What got you? Did you get eaten by raptors? Take a rocket to the face?
Maybe you died of an untreated illness or ran out of food or oxygen?

No matter your cause of death,
I recommend giving the [c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c] section of the [c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]a look.
It is an expansive library of knowledge on Reforged Eden 2
and contains information vital to your survival.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
你这个笨手笨脚的指挥官!你似乎已经死了。
花点时间,呼吸。这并不是结束。
你很快就能选择一个复活地点并继续你的旅程。

仔细阅读你的复活选项,以便你选择最适合你情况的地点。
考虑一下可能更好地在别处复活重新组队,
而不是选择当前位置的选项。

根据游戏难度设置,你的一些或全部装备将会
在你死亡地点的一个背包里掉落。
这个背包会在你的视野中被标记,并且将持续1小时。

你可以使用你的玩家无人机 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c] 来帮助你在掩护下取回
背包中掉落的物品。
使用 [c][ffff00](Shift+F)[-][/c](默认快捷键)来取回你的所有物品。
如果你当时正在驾驶飞船,你可以返回来回收你的飞船残骸。

是什么击败了你?是被迅猛龙吃了吗?脸上挨了一发火箭?
也许你因为未经治疗的疾病而死,或者食物或氧气耗尽?

无论你的死因是什么,
我建议查看 [c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c] 中的 [c][00ff00]战斗[-][/c] 部分 [c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。
它是关于重铸伊甸园2的广泛知识库,
包含了对你的生存至关重要的信息。

[c][abd1ff]Commander, I will remind you that the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Large Constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is too large to fit in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will need to use the logistics system to place this device using the [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the logistics system or any other subject you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,我会提醒您,[-][/c][c][00ff00]大型建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]太大了,无法放入您的个人背包。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您需要使用物流系统通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来放置这个设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要复习物流系统或其他任何主题,您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到,位于[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]部分。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]

Commander, I don't want to alarm you, but you appear to have wandered into the galactic territory of the Zirax Empire.

I don't know if that's what you had intended, but I hope you are not on bad terms with the empire and all its member houses.

Because if you're on their bad side, you better be well prepared before venturing any deeper into their territory.
House Xenu is tasked with protecting the empire's territory and they aren't going to be too happy to see you if you're not at least neutral with them.

I recommend reviewing the [c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] if you need a refresher on getting yourself out of this mess alive.
Please, before you do something we'll both regret. Like trying to take on a Tovera-Class Dreadnought in a mining vessel.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
指挥官,我不想让您感到惊慌,但您似乎无意中走进了兹瑞克斯帝国的银河领域。

我不知道这是否是您的本意,但我希望您与帝国及其所有成员家族没有不和。

因为如果您得罪了他们,您最好在进一步深入他们的领土之前做好充分准备。
轩努家族负责保护帝国的领土,如果您与他们的关系至少不是中立,他们看到您可能不会太高兴。

如果您需要提醒自己如何活着摆脱这种困境,我建议您查阅[c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。
请在您做出我们都会后悔的事情之前三思,比如试图用采矿船去对抗一艘托弗拉级无畏舰。

English: [c][ffff00]WARNING:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]Approaching Zirax Drone base.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Shields and heavy weapons detected. Threat level high.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]警告:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]接近兹瑞克斯无人机基地。[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]侦测到护盾和重型武器。威胁等级高。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]

Commander, I don't want to alarm you, but you appear to have wandered into the galactic territory of the Zirax Empire.

I don't know if that's what you had intended, but I hope you are not on bad terms with the empire and all its member houses.

Because if you're on their bad side, you better be well prepared before venturing any deeper into their territory.
House Xenu is tasked with protecting the empire's territory and they aren't going to be too happy to see you if you're not at least neutral with them.

I recommend reviewing the [c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] if you need a refresher on getting yourself out of this mess alive.
Please, before you do something we'll both regret. Like trying to take on a Tovera-Class Dreadnought in a mining vessel.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]

指挥官,我不想让您惊慌,但您似乎无意中走进了兹瑞克斯帝国的银河领域。

我不知道这是否是您有意为之,但我希望您与帝国及其所有成员家族没有不良关系。

因为如果您得罪了他们,您最好在深入他们的领土之前做好充分准备。
轩努家族负责保护帝国的领土,如果您与他们的关系至少不是中立,他们看到您可能不会太高兴。

如果您需要提醒自己如何活着摆脱这种困境,我建议您查阅[c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。
请在您做出我们都会后悔的事情之前三思,比如试图用采矿船去对抗一艘托维拉级无畏舰。

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, there is a high-intensity plasma field surrounding the nearby drone base that will repel most weapons.\nI recommend reviewing the [c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c] section of the [c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] before you get much closer.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官,附近无人机基地周围有一个高强度等离子场,它会击退大多数武器。\n我建议您在靠近之前,先查阅[c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c]中的[c][00ff00]战斗[-][/c]部分 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。
如何使用这本帝国百科(帝国百科)
如何使用这本帝国百科(帝国百科)

English:
[c][abd1ff]This Empyriopedia has been carefully built by Ravien and Vermillion for Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The entries above the [-][/c][c][ffffff]Project Eden 2 Info[-][/c][c][abd1ff] divider are from Vermillion's Reforged Galaxy and the ones below the divider are from Ravien's Project Eden.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]As such there will be differences in formatting and what info you can find where.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This section only applies to the Project Eden part of the Empyriopedia.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The Empyriopedia is divided into groups, chapters, and sections.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Use the dropdown arrows or double click in the PDA list to select a group, then a chapter, then click on individual sections to read their info.{Eden_ArrowExplanationBar.png}[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_ScrollDownBar.png}[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Each section can have their own image shown on the right side, and additional images embedded within the text.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Important parts of an image are highlighted in a yellow square.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Terms in [-][/c][c][00ff00]green[-][/c][c][abd1ff] text means there is another section in the Empyriopedia that explains what that term is.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Unfortunately the PDA does not support searching or context links, so you will have to find other sections on your own.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Don't forget to look for a scroll bar in any window and scroll down to read the full text of an entry.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Just because it's at the bottom of the window doesn't mean it's not important![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This Empyriopedia is not meant to be a step by step gameplay guide or a replacement for a wiki.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is not going to list every single item or mechanic in full detail. [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Exceptions can apply.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Instead, it is meant as a general guide to arm you with the basic knowledge to be able to make your own decisions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Reforged Eden 2 is designed for experienced players but even experienced players could use a refresher once in awhile.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]On the below sections you will find a completely revamped Empyriopedia, the result of almost 100 hours of work.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这本帝国百科(帝国百科)是由Ravien和Vermillion为重铸伊甸园2精心构建的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Project Eden 2 Info[-][/c][c][abd1ff]分隔线以上的条目来自Vermillion的重铸银河,分隔线以下的条目来自Ravien的项目伊甸园。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]因此,在格式和您可以找到的信息方面会有所不同。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]本节仅适用于帝国百科中的项目伊甸园部分。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]帝国百科被划分为组、章节和小节。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用下拉箭头或双击PDA列表中选择一个组,然后选择一个章节,再点击各个小节阅读它们的信息。{Eden_ArrowExplanationBar.png}[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_ScrollDownBar.png}[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
每个小节都可以在右侧显示自己的图像,并且在文本中嵌入额外的图像。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]图像中的重要部分会用黄色方框标出。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]在[-][/c][c][00ff00]绿色[-][/c][c][abd1ff]文本中的术语意味着帝国百科中有另一个小节解释了该术语的含义。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]遗憾的是,PDA不支持搜索或上下文链接,所以您需要自己找到其他小节。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不要忘记查看任何窗口中的滚动条,并滚动以阅读条目的完整文本。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]仅仅因为它在窗口的底部并不意味着它不重要![-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这本帝国百科不打算是一个逐步的游戏指南或维基的替代品。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它不会列出每一个项目或机制的详细细节。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]例外情况可能适用。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]相反,它的目的是作为一个通用指南,为您提供基本知识,使您能够做出自己的决定。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]重铸伊甸园2是为经验丰富的玩家设计的,但即使是经验丰富的玩家有时也可能需要复习。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在下面的部分中,您将找到一个完全翻新的帝国百科,这是近100小时工作的结果。[-][/c]

English: New to Empyrion - Galactic Survival? Read this
Chinese (simplified): 新加入帝国霸业-银河生存?请阅读此文

English: New to Empyrion - Galactic Survival? Read this:
Chinese (simplified): 新加入帝国霸业-银河生存?请阅读此文:

English:
[c][abd1ff]Reforged Eden 2 is a custom scenario intended for experienced Empyrion players.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]While I have painstakingly crammed as much information as I could think of into this Empyriopedia, it's still assumed that anyone playing this scenario will already be well acquainted with the basic game mechanics.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]I do not recommend Reforged Eden 2 for new players, but that doesn't mean you can't give it a shot![-][/c]

[c][ffff00]I strongly recommend at least playing the dedicated game tutorial from the main game menu (game menu > tutorial) if you haven't already as that will go over many of the basic game mechanics you are expected to already know going into Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]As this scenario uses highly customized configs, most [-][/c][c][00ff00]blueprints[-][/c][c][abd1ff] won't work right unless they were specifically designed for Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]重铸伊甸园2是一个为经验丰富的帝国霸业玩家定制的场景。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]尽管我已经尽可能地将我能想到的尽可能多的信息塞进了这个帝国百科,但我们仍然假定任何玩这个场景的玩家都已经非常熟悉基本的游戏机制。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]我不建议新玩家尝试重铸伊甸园2,但这并不意味着你不能尝试一下![-][/c]

[c][ffff00]我强烈建议至少玩过主游戏菜单中专门设计的游戏教程(游戏菜单 > 教程),如果你还没有的话,因为它会涵盖许多你被期望在进入重铸伊甸园2之前已经知道的基本知识。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]由于这个场景使用了高度定制的配置,大多数[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff]除非它们专门为重铸伊甸园2设计,否则可能无法正常工作。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]If your shield is not charging, check the following:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Is the shield generator turned on:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Check that your [-][/c][c][00ff00]shield generator[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is turned on in the control panel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The hotkey for shields is [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Shield)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and maybe you hit it by accident.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Consider binding it to a hotkey that's harder to hit by accident.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Is your ship turned on:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Shields will not work if your ship is turned off.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Is your ship docked:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Docked ships cannot activate their shields.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Undock your ship to activate the shield.[-][/c][c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Pentaxid:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Charging shields requires pentaxid in a pentaxid tank.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Make sure your ship or base has enough pentaxid to charge your shield.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Not enough recharge rate:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Shield capacitors[-][/c][c][abd1ff] lower your shield [-][/c][c][00ff00]recharge rate[-][/c][c][abd1ff], but this is not reflected in the tooltip for your shield generator.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Make sure you have enough [-][/c][c][00ff00]shield chargers[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to offset the recharge penalty from your capacitors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Add more shield chargers or remove some shield capacitors until you have a positive recharge rate.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]如果您的护盾没有在充电,请检查以下内容:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]护盾发生器是否已开启:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请检查您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾发生器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]是否在控制面板中被打开了。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]护盾的快捷键是[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Shield)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff],也许您不小心按到了。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]考虑将其绑定到一个不容易意外触发的快捷键。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]您的飞船是否已启动:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果飞船关闭,护盾将无法工作。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]您的飞船是否已停靠:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]停靠的飞船不能激活它们的护盾。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]解除飞船的停靠以激活护盾。[-][/c][c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]翘曲水晶(原料):[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]充电护盾需要在翘曲水晶(原料)罐中的翘曲水晶(原料)。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]确保您的飞船或基地有足够的翘曲水晶(原料)来为您的护盾充电。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]充电速率不够:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]护盾电容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]会降低您的护盾[-][/c][c][00ff00]充电速率[-][/c][c][abd1ff],但这在您的护盾发生器的提示信息中没有反映出来。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]确保您有足够的[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾充电器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来抵消电容器带来的充电惩罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]增加更多的护盾充电器或移除一些护盾电容器,直到您有一个正的充电速率。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Turrets are automated weapons systems or ships and bases that will automatically fire on valid targets within range.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require ammunition to be stocked in [-][/c][c][00ff00]ammunition controllers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will automatically reload when they run out of ammo. Currently due to a bug their reload time is instant.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require a clear line of sight to the target and their [-][/c][c][00ff00]targeting settings[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can be configured.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Turrets can be manually controlled via the control panel, but it's usually more effective to let them fire on their own.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot manually control multiple turrets at once or control their targeting except by using the targeting settings.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be turned off in the control panel or controlled via signals.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some turrets have multiple variants available when placing.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Retractable turrets will not automatically turn themselves on if they detect a threat.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Turrets can make excellent defense against enemy drones and troops.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Like [-][/c][c][00ff00]mounted weapons[-][/c][c][abd1ff], different turrets excel at different tasks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It's up to you to fit your ship or base with a turret loadout appropriate for your ship design, play style, and situation.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Destroying enemy turrets can make a fight easier as it reduces incoming damage, but you will lose out on the salvage from the turrets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For an overview of what the different stats do, see [-][/c][c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Handheld Weapons[-][/c][c][abd1ff] as most things there also apply to ship weapons.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]炮塔是自动武器系统,能够自动射击在射程内的有效目标。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要在[-][/c][c][00ff00]弹药控制器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中储备弹药。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当弹药用尽时,它们会自动重新装填。目前由于一个漏洞,它们的重新装填时间是即时的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要对目标有清晰的视线,并且它们的[-][/c][c][00ff00]目标设置[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可以配置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]炮塔可以通过控制面板手动控制,但通常让它们自行射击更有效。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您不能一次性手动控制多个炮塔,也不能控制它们的目标,除非使用目标设置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在控制面板中关闭,或通过信号控制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些炮塔在放置时有多种变体可供选择。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可伸缩炮塔在检测到威胁时不会自动启动。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
炮塔可以成为对抗敌方无人机和部队的出色防御。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]像[-][/c][c][00ff00]固定武器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]一样,不同的炮塔在不同的任务中表现出色。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如何为您的飞船或基地配备适合您的飞船设计、游戏风格和情况的炮塔装备,这取决于您。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]摧毁敌方炮塔可以使战斗变得更容易,因为它减少了来犯的伤害,但您将失去从炮塔回收的机会。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要了解不同统计数据的作用,请参见[-][/c][c][00ff00]战斗[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]手持武器[-][/c][c][abd1ff],因为那里的大部分内容也适用于飞船武器。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Turrets require a clear line of sight to their target.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Any block in the way can obstruct their line of sight, preventing them from attacking a target.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Turrets also have a maximum and minimum angle they can aim up and down.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The angle varies by the physical turret model.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is up to you to position your turrets and ship so that they can fire on your enemies.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For most turrets they can aim slightly below and decently above like in this example.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i](Angles NOT accurate, just used as a general representation)[/i][-][/c][c][abd1ff]{Eden_TurretRangeHuman2Box.jpg}[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For some turret designs they cannot aim down but they can aim straight up like in this example.[-][/c][c][abd1ff]{Eden_TurretRangeAlienBox.jpg}[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]炮塔需要对其目标有清晰的视线。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]任何阻挡视线的方块都可能阻碍它们的视线,阻止它们攻击目标。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]炮塔还有它们可以上下瞄准的最大和最小角度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]角度因物理炮塔模型而异。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如何定位您的炮塔和飞船,以便它们能够向敌人开火,这取决于您。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]对于大多数炮塔,它们可以稍微向下瞄准,也可以像这个例子一样适当地向上瞄准。[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8][i](角度不准确,仅用作一般表示)[/i][-][/c][c][abd1ff]{Eden_TurretRangeHuman2Box.jpg}[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]对于一些炮塔设计,它们不能向下瞄准,但可以像这个例子一样直接向上瞄准。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]{Eden_TurretRangeAlienBox.jpg}[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The targets that turrets will fire at can be configured on a per-turret or per-group basis.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
To set your turret's targeting parameters, open the control panel under the Devices tab and select a turret.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is important to properly configure your turret targeting so turrets fire at appropriate targets to be most effective.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To apply targeting to the entire group, [-][/c][c][abd1ff]select the device group, setup your targeting options, then hit the Apply to Group button. If a checkbox is marked in orange it means some of the turrets have it enabled while some do not.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Turrets will never fire on NPC factions that are neutral standing or above.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Turrets will fire on valid interior devices even if they are buried inside the target structure.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Both the main targeting group and sub-targeting group conditions must be met for a target to be considered valid. For example marking [-][/c][c][ffffff]NPCs, Drones, Players[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will not fire on predator wildlife unless you also checked [-][/c][c][ffffff]Predator[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If target is an enemy structure, the [-][/c][c][ffffff]Device Targeting[-][/c][c][abd1ff] setting must also match.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]Main targeting group:[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Player Factions:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Players that are not in your faction or alliance while in a PvP enabled playfield.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Since Reforged Eden 2 is a PvE scenario it is best to leave this option disabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]NPC Factions:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hostile or hated NPC factions. NPC Factions include Polaris, Zirax, Alien, Warlord, etc.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Will not target factions neutral or above.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Prey:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Prey[-][/c][c][abd1ff] wildlife found on planets. Also some rich resource asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Predator:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Predator[-][/c][c][abd1ff] wildlife found on planets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]Sub-targeting group:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]NPCs, Drones, Players:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Any NPC or drone or player. For example, wildlife, troops, space drones, etc.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Good to set for minigun turrets and sentry turrets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Hover Vessels, Small Vessels, Capital Vessels, Bases:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Any structure that also matches both the main targeting group and device targeting.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]Device Targeting:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Warp Drive:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the warp drive in a small or capital vessel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This also targets rich asteroids so it's recommended to leave this unchecked.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Turret:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Any main turret.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Sentry turrets and tool turrets are ignored.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Mounted Weapon:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Fixed vessel mounted weapons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Since NPC factions cannot fire these weapons it's recommended to leave this option disabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Thruster:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The thrusters of a ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Generator:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The generators of a ship or base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Solar capacitors and RTGs are ignored.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]炮塔将射击的目标可以根据每个炮塔或每组炮塔进行配置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
要设置您的炮塔目标参数,请在设备标签下打开控制面板并选择一个炮塔。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
正确配置您的炮塔目标非常重要,以使炮塔射击适当的目标,发挥最大的效果。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要将目标应用于整个组,[-][/c][c][abd1ff]选择设备组,设置您的目标选项,然后点击“应用到组”按钮。如果复选框是橙色的,这意味着一些炮塔启用了它,而一些没有。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]炮塔永远不会射击中立或以上立场的NPC派系。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]炮塔会射击有效的内部设备,即使它们被埋在目标结构内。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]主要目标组和子目标组的条件都必须满足,目标才被认为是有效的。例如,标记[-][/c][c][ffffff]NPCs, Drones, Players[-][/c][c][abd1ff]不会射击掠食性野生动物,除非您也选中了[-][/c][c][ffffff]Predator[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果目标是敌方结构,[-][/c][c][ffffff]设备目标[-][/c][c][abd1ff]设置也必须匹配。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]主要目标组:[-][/c]

[c][00afff]玩家派系:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在PvP启用的场地中,不在您的派系或联盟中的玩家。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]由于Reforged Eden 2是一个PvE场景,最好保持此选项禁用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]NPC派系:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]敌对或憎恨的NPC派系。NPC派系包括Polaris, Zirax, Alien, Warlord等。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不会针对中立或以上的派系。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]猎物:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]猎物[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在行星上发现的野生动物。还有一些资源丰富的小行星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]掠食者:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]掠食者[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在行星上发现的野生动物。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]子目标组:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]NPCs, Drones, Players:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]任何NPC或无人机或玩家。例如,野生动物,部队,太空无人机等。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]适合设置在机枪炮塔和哨兵炮塔上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]悬浮飞船,小型飞船,主力舰,基地:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]任何结构,只要同时符合主要目标组和设备目标。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00ffff]设备目标:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]翘曲引擎:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是小型或主力舰的翘曲引擎。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这也针对资源丰富的小行星,所以建议保持此选项未选中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]炮塔:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]任何主炮塔。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]哨兵炮塔和工具炮塔被忽略。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]固定武器:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]固定在飞船上的武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]由于NPC派系不能发射这些武器,建议保持此选项禁用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]推进器:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]飞船的推进器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]发电机:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]飞船或基地的发电机。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]太阳能电容器和RTGs被忽略。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Mounted weapons are fixed weapons systems used on ships.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require ammunition to be stocked in [-][/c][c][00ff00]ammunition controllers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will automatically reload when they run out of ammo or can be manually reloaded while piloting with [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Reload)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require a clear line of sight to the target.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Fixed weapons will converge on the point of your crosshair if your crosshair was over a target.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Homing[-][/c][c][abd1ff] weapons will track whatever was under your crosshair when you fired the weapon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can only be used by the pilot of a ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Only one type of manual weapon can be fired at a time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Placing a mounted weapon on your ship automatically adds it to your ship's toolbar.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To fire it, pilot your ship, select the desired weapon in the ship toolbar, and fire it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Make sure weapons are turned on in the Main tab of the control panel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is a total, combined limit of 21 mounted weapons any ship can have, but the first of each type of weapon does not count towards this limit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Additional mounted weapons will stop showing up on the ship toolbar.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is no way to re-arrange your ship toolbar, weapons are added based on their physical placement location on your ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Mounted weapons can have multiple visual styles to choose from when placing, but they will only fire in the forward direction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Mounted weapons can make excellent siege weapons against bases or snipe off critical devices from targets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Like [-][/c][c][00ff00]Turrets[-][/c][c][abd1ff], different mounted weapons excel at different tasks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It's up to you to fit your ship with a weapon loadout appropriate for your ship design, play style, and situation.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For an overview of what the different stats do, see [-][/c][c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Handheld Weapons[-][/c][c][abd1ff] as most things there also apply to ship weapons.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]固定武器系统是安装在飞船上的固定武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要弹药,弹药必须储存在[-][/c][c][00ff00]弹药控制器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当它们弹药用尽时,它们会自动重新装填,或者在驾驶时可以手动重新装填,使用[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Reload)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要对目标有清晰的视线。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]固定武器会汇聚到你的准心点,如果你的准心在目标上。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]追踪[-][/c][c][abd1ff]武器会在你发射武器时跟踪你的准心下的目标。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们只能由飞船的驾驶员使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一次只能发射一种手动武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在飞船上放置固定武器会自动将其添加到你的飞船工具栏中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要发射它,驾驶你的飞船,在飞船工具栏中选择所需的武器,并发射它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]确保在控制面板的主标签中打开武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]任何飞船总共可以有21个固定武器,但每种武器的第一个不计入此限制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]额外的固定武器将不再显示在飞船工具栏上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]没有办法重新排列你的飞船工具栏,武器是根据它们在飞船上的物理放置位置添加的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
固定武器在放置时可以选择多种视觉样式,但它们只会向前方发射。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]固定武器可以作为对抗基地的优秀围攻武器,或者从目标上狙击关键设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]像[-][/c][c][00ff00]炮塔[-][/c][c][abd1ff]一样,不同的固定武器在不同的任务中表现出色。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]由你来为你的飞船配备适合你的飞船设计、游戏风格和情况的武器装备。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有关不同统计数据的概述,请参阅[-][/c][c][00ff00]战斗[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]手持武器[-][/c][c][abd1ff],因为那里的大部分内容也适用于飞船武器。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ff00]Mounted weapons[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]turrets[-][/c][c][abd1ff] come in 3 tiers.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each tier has a total, shared, maximum number of mounted weapons and turrets you can add of that tier.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The limit is shared between mounted weapons and turrets and is denoted by the Equipment Group on the tooltip.{Eden_EquipmentGroupBar.png}[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For example if the limit is 12 medium weapons, then you can add any combination of 12 medium mounted weapons and/or turrets, but if you try to add the 13th you will be unable to.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You would still be able to add additional light or heavy weapons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Weapon limits are still active even when the block limit game difficulty setting is disabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is strongly recommended to keep block limits enabled in your game difficulty settings to prevent exploits.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Higher tier weapons are more [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU[-][/c][c][abd1ff] efficient for the damage they deal, are physically larger, and more expensive to craft.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Generally speaking 4 light weapons are equivalent to 2 medium weapons, and 2 medium weapons are equivalent to 1 heavy weapon but this is just a simplification, not a rule.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Balancing your weapon loadout between tiers, CPU, mounted versus turret, types, and roles is up to you.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the tooltips of each weapon for details to what their limits are and other features.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Light:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Light weapons do less damage, cost less CPU, and are less expensive.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They have the highest limit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will typically want to upgrade light weapons as soon as possible.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Medium:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Medium weapons do moderate damage.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Heavy:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Heavy weapons do massive damage, cost more CPU, and require expensive materials.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They have the lowest limit.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ff00]固定武器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]炮塔[-][/c][c][abd1ff]分为3个等级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个等级都有一个固定的、共享的、该等级可添加的最大固定武器和炮塔数量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这个限制在固定武器和炮塔之间共享,并在提示信息中的装备组标识中表示。{Eden_EquipmentGroupBar.png}[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]例如,如果限制是12个中等武器,那么您可以添加任何组合的12个中等固定武器和/或炮塔,但如果您尝试添加第13个,您将无法做到。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您仍然可以添加额外的轻型或重型武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]即使在禁用游戏难度设置中的方块限制时,武器限制仍然有效。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]强烈建议在您的游戏难度设置中保持启用方块限制,以防止滥用。[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]较高等级的武器在造成伤害方面更具[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU[-][/c][c][abd1ff]效率,体积更大,制造成本更高。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通常来说,4个轻型武器相当于2个中等武器,2个中等武器相当于1个重型武器,但这只是一个简化的说法,并非规则。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在等级、CPU、固定武器与炮塔、类型和角色之间平衡您的武器装备取决于您。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]查看每种武器的提示信息,了解它们的限制和其他特性的详细信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]轻型:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]轻型武器伤害较小,占用CPU较少,成本较低。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们有最高的限制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您通常希望尽快升级轻型武器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]中型:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]中型武器造成中等伤害。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]重型:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]重型武器造成巨大伤害,占用更多CPU,需要昂贵的材料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们有最低的限制。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Nearly every block, item, device, weapon, mission item, crafting template, and upgrade has a tooltip explaining its use and listing any stats that it has.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To view an item's tooltip, hover your mouse over the item.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Pay attention as stats on tooltips are not necessarily organized in any logical way.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most buttons have tooltips as well, and again you can hover your mouse over them to view their name and any info they may have.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is important to read tooltips, as an item's tooltip will often answer any questions you have about it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]几乎所有的方块、物品、设备、武器、任务物品、制作模板和升级都有提示信息来解释它们的用途,并列出它们拥有的任何属性。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]要查看一个物品的提示信息,将鼠标悬停在该物品上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请注意,提示信息中的属性并不一定以任何逻辑方式组织。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]大多数按钮也有提示信息,同样,您可以将鼠标悬停在它们上面来查看它们的名称及可能拥有的任何信息。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]阅读提示信息很重要,因为一个物品的提示信息通常会回答您关于它的任何问题。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Ammunition for your [-][/c][c][00ff00]mounted weapons[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]turrets[-][/c][c][abd1ff] must be stored in [-][/c][c][00ff00]ammunition controllers[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to be accessible by your weapons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Ammunition is automatically unlocked when you unlock a weapon that uses it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some ammunition is shared among multiple weapon types.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can craft ammunition in a [-][/c][c][00ff00]constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff], purchase it at [-][/c][c][00ff00]traders[-][/c][c][abd1ff], refill it using station services, or find it as loot.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can keep spare ammo in a standard cargo container but your weapon will be unable to use that ammo to reload.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The ammunition types needed by your ship and how many of each you have in ammunition controllers are listed in the Main tab of the control panel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To refill your ship or base's ammunition, you can either press the Manage button in the ammunition section, or manually open an ammunition controller in the device list or using [-][/c][c][00ff00]logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can have multiple ammunition controllers and it does not matter which one ammo is stored in.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The Fill All button does not have a practical purpose with the mass and volume system.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mass and Volume[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for more information on using ammunition controllers.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]固定武器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]炮塔[-][/c][c][abd1ff]所需的弹药必须存放在[-][/c][c][00ff00]弹药控制器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中才能被武器使用。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]当您解锁使用该弹药的武器时,弹药会自动解锁。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]某些弹药可被多种武器类型共享。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中制造弹药,在[-][/c][c][00ff00]商人[-][/c][c][abd1ff]处购买,使用站点服务补充,或作为战利品找到它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以将备用弹药存放在标准货运容器中,但您的武器将无法使用该弹药进行装填。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您的飞船所需的弹药类型以及您在弹药控制器中各有多少,都列在控制面板的“主要”标签页中。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]要补充您的飞船或基地的弹药,您可以在弹药部分按下管理按钮,或手动在设备列表中打开弹药控制器,或使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以拥有多个弹药控制器,存放弹药的控制器无所谓。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]“填满全部”按钮在质量和体积系统中没有实际用途。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请参阅[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]质量与体积[-][/c][c][abd1ff]以及[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff],以获取有关使用弹药控制器的更多信息。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Some planetary and space stations will offer station services to those neutral and above.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The types of services offered and cost varies per station.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To use station services, you must be piloting a ship and be close to a station that offers services.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When you approach a station offering services you will get a message at the top of your HUD.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The system map will show if a sector has a station that offers station services, but this can often be misleading and it's best to not rely on it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To use station services, go to the Station Services tab of the control panel while you are piloting a ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Along the top is shown details about the station, what services it offers, the price multiplier, and any price discount or penalty you may have.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Along the center is where you can purchase the various services.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Along the bottom are your ship's stats.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Repair:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Instantly repairs your ship using the last saved repair template.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Will repair damaged blocks and replace lost blocks.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Fill up shield:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Recharges your [-][/c][c][00ff00]shields[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Ammunition:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can purchase [-][/c][c][00ff00]ammunition[-][/c][c][abd1ff] that your ship uses in multiples of 10, 100, or 1000.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Select which ammo types and what quantity and press the Buy button to purchase.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Ammunition will be placed into your [-][/c][c][00ff00]ammunition controllers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Oxygen:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can purchase oxygen to refill your oxygen tanks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Move the slider to set how much to purchase.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot purchase more oxygen than free space in your oxygen tanks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Fuel:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can purchase [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to refill your [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel tanks[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Move the slider to set how much to purchase.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot purchase more fuel than free space in your fuel tanks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Pentaxid:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can purchase [-][/c][c][00ff00]refined pentaxid [-][/c][c][abd1ff]to refill your [-][/c][c][00ff00]pentaxid tank[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Move the slider to set how much to purchase.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot purchase more refined pentaxid than free space in your pentaxid tanks.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]一些行星和空间站将为中立及更高级别的玩家提供站点服务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]提供的服务类型和成本因站点而异。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要使用站点服务,您必须驾驶一艘飞船并靠近提供服务的站点。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当您接近提供服务的站点时,您将在HUD顶部收到一条消息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]系统地图将显示一个星区是否有提供站点服务的站点,但这通常可能具有误导性,最好不要依赖它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要使用站点服务,请在驾驶飞船时转到控制面板的站点服务标签页。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]顶部显示了站点的详细信息,它提供的服务,价格乘数,以及您可能拥有的任何价格折扣或处罚。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]中间部分是您可以购买各种服务的地方。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]底部是您飞船的状态。[-][/c]
[c][00afff]修理:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用最后保存的修理模板立即修理您的飞船。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将修理损坏的方块并替换丢失的方块。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]充满护盾:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]护盾[-][/c][c][abd1ff]充电。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]弹药:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以按10、100或1000的倍数购买您的飞船使用的[-][/c][c][00ff00]弹药[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]选择弹药类型和数量,然后按购买按钮进行购买。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]弹药将被放置到您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]弹药控制器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中。[-][/c]
[c][00afff]氧气:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以购买氧气来补充您的氧气罐。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]移动滑块来设置购买量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您不能购买超过氧气罐中空闲空间的氧气。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]燃料:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以购买[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来补充您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料罐[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]移动滑块来设置购买量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您不能购买超过燃料罐中空闲空间的燃料。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]翘曲水晶:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以购买[-][/c][c][00ff00]精炼翘曲水晶[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来补充您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]翘曲水晶罐[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]移动滑块来设置购买量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您不能购买超过翘曲水晶罐中空闲空间的精炼翘曲水晶。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Here are a few of the common terms for galaxies and sectors.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Sun:[-][/c] The central star of a solar system. You cannot warp to a star directly.
[c][00afff]Planet:[-][/c] A rocky body you can typically land on. Contains an orbit and sometimes one or more moons.
[c][00afff]Gas Giant:[-][/c] A special type of planet that cannot be warped to or landed on directly. Instead you can warp to each of its moons.

[c][00afff]Moon:[-][/c] A rocky body you can typically land on that orbits a planet or gas giant.
[c][00afff]Orbit:[-][/c] The area of space around a planet.
[c][00afff]Sector POI:[-][/c] Areas of space that lack a planet in the solar system, such as asteroid fields or standalone Trade Stations[c][00ff00].[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Playfield:[-][/c] An area of the game world. A planet is its own playfield, as is a moon and a space orbit. Going from planet to orbit means you enter a new playfield.
[c][00afff]Sector:[-][/c] Any location on the solar system map that you can warp to. A sector encompasses a planet, its orbit, and any of its moons. A standalone asteroid field can also be a sector.

[c][00afff]Star System:[-][/c] An object on the galaxy map containing a star with various planets and sector POIs. Can also be referred to as a Solar System, System, or Star. The star type influences what you will find there.
[c][00afff]Nebula:[-][/c] A gaseous cloud located within the galaxy.
[c][00afff]Galaxy:[-][/c] The entire game world seen in the galaxy map containing thousands of stars.
[c][00afff]Faction Territory:[-][/c] This can refer to the faction territory displayed on a planet's surface, or on the faction territory on the galactic map. Galactic faction territories influence which factions will be found within that territory.
Planetary territory can be gained or lost by NPC factions. Galactic territory is static.

[c][00afff]Kilometer (km):[-][/c] Unit of measurement within a playfield. 1,000 meters. 1 BA/CV block is 2x2x2 meters and 1 HV/SV block is 0.5x0.5x0.5 meters in size for reference. Standard propulsion can cover this distance.
[c][00afff]Astronomical Unit (au):[-][/c] Unit of measurement within a solar system. 1au is the average distance between the Sun and the Earth. Requires a jump drive or warp drive to travel between sectors within a star system.
[c][00afff]Light Year (ly):[-][/c] Unit of measurement on the galaxy map. 1ly is the distance light travels in one year in a vacuum. A warp drive on a capital vessel is required to warp between star systems.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]以下是一些常见的银河系和星区术语。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]太阳:[-][/c] 太阳系的中心恒星。您不能直接翘曲到恒星。
[c][00afff]行星:[-][/c] 通常可以着陆的岩石质天体。包含一个轨道,有时还有一个或多个卫星。
[c][00afff]气态巨星:[-][/c] 一种特殊的行星,不能直接翘曲或着陆。相反,您可以翘曲到它的每个卫星上。

[c][00afff]卫星:[-][/c] 通常可以着陆的岩石质天体,绕着行星或气态巨星运行。
[c][00afff]轨道:[-][/c] 行星周围的空间区域。
[c][00afff]星区兴趣点(POI):[-][/c] 太阳系中没有行星的空间区域,如小行星场或独立的贸易站[c][00ff00]。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]游戏区域:[-][/c] 游戏世界的区域。一个行星是它自己的游戏区域,卫星和太空轨道也是如此。从行星到轨道意味着您进入了一个新的游戏区域。
[c][00afff]星区:[-][/c] 您可以在太阳系地图上翘曲到达的任何位置。一个星区包括一个行星、它的轨道和它的任何卫星。一个独立的小行星场也可以是一个星区。

[c][00afff]恒星系统:[-][/c] 银河系地图上包含一个恒星以及各种行星和星区兴趣点的对象。也可以称为太阳系、系统或恒星。恒星类型影响您在那里会发现什么。
[c][00afff]星云:[-][/c] 位于银河系内的气体云。
[c][00afff]银河系:[-][/c] 银河系地图中显示的整个游戏世界,包含数千个恒星。
[c][00afff]派系领土:[-][/c] 这可以指在行星表面显示的派系领土,或在银河系地图上的派系领土。银河派系领土影响那个领土内可以发现的派系。
行星领土可以通过NPC派系获得或失去。银河领土是静态的。

[c][00afff]千米(km):[-][/c] 游戏区域内的测量单位。1,000米。参考一下,1个BA/CV区块是2x2x2米,1个HV/SV区块是0.5x0.5x0.5米。标准推进可以覆盖这个距离。
[c][00afff]天文单位(au):[-][/c] 太阳系内的测量单位。1au是太阳和地球之间的平均距离。需要跳跃驱动器或翘曲驱动器在恒星系统内各星区之间旅行。
[c][00afff]光年(ly):[-][/c] 银河系地图上的测量单位。1ly是光在一年内在真空中传播的距离。需要在主力舰上安装翘曲驱动器才能在恒星系统之间翘曲。

English:
[c][abd1ff]You can access the galaxy map by pressing the galaxy map icon on the top of the screen while in the local map [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Map)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff], player inventory [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Inventory)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff], or other windows. There is no hotkey for accessing it directly.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]Press the [-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] icon in the upper right corner of the galaxy map for an on-screen help window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There are filters on the upper left side of the galaxy map:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Info Panel:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Displays the info panel on the right side with useful information. The info panel has 3 tabs to swap between a description of the selected system, a list of visited systems, and a list of your galactic bookmarks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It's recommended to always turn this on so you have access to all the information that you need.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Warp Lines:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This shows you a trail of your previous warps. Useful if you want to see where you've been.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]System Names:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Shows the names and star types of systems near your camera.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Territories:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Toggles the faction faction display on or off.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Enabling it hides nebula and star colors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Stars will be colored based on their owning faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Faction territories will display as large colored spheres.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Region Names:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Shows region labels throughout the galaxy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Useful for navigation.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您可以通过在本地地图[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Map)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、玩家库存[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Inventory)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或其他窗口的顶部按下银河系地图图标来访问银河系地图。没有直接访问的快捷键。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]按下银河系地图右上角的[-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]图标,打开屏幕上的帮助窗口。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]银河系地图左上角有过滤器:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]信息面板:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在右侧显示信息面板,包含有用信息。信息面板有3个标签页可供切换,分别显示选定系统的描述、已访问系统的列表和您的银河系书签列表。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]建议始终打开此功能,以便您可以访问所有需要的信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]翘曲轨迹:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示您之前的翘曲轨迹。如果您想看到自己去过的地方,这很有用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]系统名称:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示摄像机附近系统的名称和恒星类型。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]领土:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]开启或关闭派系领土显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]启用后会隐藏星云和恒星颜色。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]恒星将根据其拥有派系着色。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]派系领土将显示为大型彩色球体。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]区域名称:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在银河系中显示区域标签。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有助于导航。[-][/c]

English: \n[c][abd1ff]The below sections are a step by step guide on how to use the galaxy map.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]以下部分是关于如何使用银河系地图的逐步指南。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]You can search by playfield name or star type in the galaxy map using the button at the bottom of the map.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Search results are sorted by distance to your current location.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Searching by name will return a list of partial matches based on playfield or star system name.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For example searching for [-][/c][c][ffffff]Alpha[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will return a list of all playfields and stars with the word Alpha in the name.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Searching by type will return a list of exact star systems that match the type.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For example searching for [-][/c][c][ffffff]G[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will only return G class systems and not G2, G3, etc.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can select a search result and hit the show on map button to move your camera to the position of the star system if the search result was a star, or to the solar system map for the star system if the search result was a planet, moon, or sector.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Sometimes your mouse click will click through the menu and you will accidentally hit a star on the map.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]An example of the search box:{Eden_GalaxySearch2Box.jpg}[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]您可以在银河系地图上使用地图底部的按钮通过游戏区域名称或恒星类型进行搜索。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]搜索结果将根据与您当前位置的距离进行排序。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]按名称搜索将根据游戏区域或恒星系统名称返回部分匹配的列表。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]例如,搜索[-][/c][c][ffffff]Alpha[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将返回所有名称中包含Alpha这个词的游戏区域和恒星的列表。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]按类型搜索将返回与类型完全匹配的恒星系统的列表。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]例如,搜索[-][/c][c][ffffff]G[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将只返回G类系统,而不是G2、G3等。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]您可以选择一个搜索结果并点击在地图上显示按钮,将您的摄像机移动到恒星系统的位置,如果搜索结果是一颗恒星,或者如果搜索结果是一颗行星、卫星或星区,则移动到恒星系统的太阳系地图上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有时您的鼠标点击会穿过菜单,您会不小心点击到地图上的一颗恒星。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]搜索框的示例:{Eden_GalaxySearch2Box.jpg}[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The info panel is shown on the right side of the galaxy map and must be turned on in the filters on the upper left.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can swap between 3 tabs using the buttons at the top of the info panel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See image to the right for examples of all 3 tabs.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]System Info:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This shows basic info on the star system you have currently selected or that is under your mouse cursor.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Contains flavor information like the star's mass, age, luminosity, etc.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Also contains a description of the star system which can clue you in on what kind of content you might find there.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Visited Systems:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Shows a list of systems you have previously visited.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Clicking on a system will focus your camera on it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Map Markers:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Shows a list of galaxy map markers you have placed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Clicking on a bookmark will pan your camera to it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Also gives you options to edit, delete, or share bookmarks on this screen using the buttons at the bottom of the info panel. Hover over a button to see what it does.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]信息面板显示在银河系地图的右侧,必须在左上角的过滤器中打开。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以使用信息面板顶部的按钮在3个标签之间切换。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请参阅右侧的图片,查看所有3个标签的示例。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]系统信息:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这显示了您当前选定的或鼠标指针下的恒星系统的基本信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]包含恒星的质量、年龄、光度等风味信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]还包含恒星系统的描述,可以为您提供关于那里可能找到的内容的线索。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]已访问系统:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示了您以前访问过的系统的列表。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]点击一个系统将使您的摄像机聚焦于它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]地图标记:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]显示了您放置的银河系地图标记的列表。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]点击一个书签将使您的摄像机平移至它。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]还允许您使用信息面板底部的按钮在此屏幕上编辑、删除或共享书签。将鼠标悬停在按钮上以查看其功能。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The galaxy map is a 3D representation of the entire galaxy and can feel a bit intimidating at first.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Camera controls (all hotkeys are based on defaults. Yours may vary):[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hold [-][/c][c][ffff00]Left Mouse:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Rotate the camera around the camera's current location or a selected star system or use in combination with other camera controls.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]W, A, S, D, Space, C:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Move the camera. Can be used while holding [-][/c][c][ffff00]left mouse[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to fly through the galaxy map.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Hold to increase camera speed.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift + CTRL:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Hold both to greatly increase camera speed.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Middle Mouse:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Focus camera on your current position.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Click on a bookmark or search result:[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Pan your camera to that location.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Basically hold left mouse and a movement key while holding down Shift + CTRL to quickly move your camera around the map.[-][/c][c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Get basic info on a star system:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hover over a star system to populate the [-][/c][c][00ff00]info panel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] on the right with the star system's information.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c][c][ffff00]Left click[-][/c][c][abd1ff] on a star to select a star system. Your camera will be centered on it.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL-left click[-][/c][c][abd1ff] a star system to lock it as a warp target, or hit the Lock Target button at the bottom of the screen to lock your currently selected star system as a warp target.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Double Click[-][/c][c][abd1ff] a star to open the system map for that star system, if it has been previously visited by anyone. Only basic planetary and sector info will be available while outside of a star system.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Calculating distances:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hover over a star system to display a line between your currently selected star system and the star you are hovering over. [-][/c][c][abd1ff]This line will show the range in light years between the selected star and the star you are hovering over.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hovering over a star will also show the range from your current location to the star you are hovering over in the bottom left of the galaxy window.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See image to the right for an example.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Icon types:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Press the [-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] button in the upper right corner of the galaxy map to view a list of icons and their meanings.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]银河地图为整个银河系的三维展示，初看可能略显复杂。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]摄像机控制（所有快捷键基于默认设置，实际可能有所不同）：[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]按住[-][/c][c][ffff00]左键鼠标：[-][/c][c][abd1ff]围绕当前摄像机位置或选中的恒星系统旋转摄像机，或与其他控制键组合使用。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]W、A、S、D、空格、C键：[-][/c][c][abd1ff]移动摄像机。可配合[-][/c][c][ffff00]左键鼠标[-][/c][c][abd1ff]自由穿梭银河地图。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL键：[-][/c][c][abd1ff]按住加速摄像机移动速度。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Shift键+CTRL键：[-][/c][c][abd1ff]同时按住大幅提升摄像机速度。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]中键鼠标：[-][/c][c][abd1ff]聚焦摄像机至当前位置。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]点击书签或搜索结果：[-][/c][c][abd1ff]摄像机平移至对应位置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
基本操作为：按住左键鼠标并搭配移动键，持续按住Shift+CTRL可快速移动摄像机。[-][/c][c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]获取恒星系统基本信息：[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将鼠标悬停在恒星系统上，右侧[-][/c][c][00ff00]信息面板[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将显示该恒星系统信息。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c][c][ffff00]左键点击[-][/c][c][abd1ff]恒星以选择该系统，摄像机将聚焦于此。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CTRL+左键点击[-][/c][c][abd1ff]锁定该恒星系为翘曲目标，或点击屏幕底部的锁定目标按钮锁定当前选中系统。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]双击[-][/c][c][abd1ff]恒星打开该系统地图，前提是该系统曾被访问。若处于系统外，仅显示基础星球和星区信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]距离计算：[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将鼠标悬停在恒星上，屏幕会显示当前选中恒星与悬停恒星之间的连线，并标出光年距离。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]悬停恒星时，银河窗口左下角还显示从当前位置到该恒星的距离。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]右侧图片示例供参考。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]图标类型：[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]按下银河地图右上角的[-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]按钮查看图标及其含义列表。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some factions control their own area of territory in the galaxy.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]To view faction territory, select the Territories filter in the upper left of the [-][/c][c][00ff00]galaxy map[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]While in territory view, stars will be colored based on the owning faction and nebula will be hidden.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Territories are represented by colored spheres representing the faction. There will be a legend along the left side for each faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Region labels will also display the name of the owning faction for each territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Neutral space is represented by no faction bubble and gray star colors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each territory, including neutral space, can affect what kinds of factions, POIs, planets, resources, and sectors can be found within the territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Neutral space does not mean lacking faction presence or dangers and you should still use caution when exploring it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]银河中有一些派系控制着他们自己的领土区域。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]要查看派系领土,请在[-][/c][c][00ff00]银河系地图[-][/c][c][abd1ff]左上角选择领土过滤器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在领土视图中,恒星会根据拥有派系着色,星云会被隐藏。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]领土由代表派系的彩色球体表示。左侧将为每个派系提供图例。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]区域标签也会显示每个领土拥有派系的名称。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]中立空间由没有派系泡泡和灰色恒星颜色来表示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个领土,包括中立空间,都可能影响领土内可以发现的派系类型、兴趣点(POIs)、行星、资源和区域。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]中立空间并不意味着缺乏派系存在或没有危险,探索时您仍应保持谨慎。[-][/c]

English: \n[c][abd1ff]This section will go over the various methods of travel.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]The most basic way to get from point A to point B is to simply run there.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can sprint [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Run)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to increase your movement speed while running but doing so will consume [-][/c][c][00ff00]stamina[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Jumping [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jump)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can help you clear small vertical obstacles. Your jump height is affected by gravity.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Your [-][/c][c][00ff00]jetpack [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jetpack)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will help you clear vertical obstacles such as cliffs but will not be effective at horizontal speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your jetpack's effectiveness will be reduced in higher gravity.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You need to use your jetpack to move in space unless you are under the influence of a gravity generator.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your base movement speed and stamina usage while sprinting will depend on your equipped [-][/c][c][00ff00]armor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]boosters[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Certain [-][/c][c][00ff00]status effects[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can also increase or decrease your movement speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To swim in water you need to have nothing equipped in your hands [-][/c][c][ffff00](0)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (that's the zero key).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you are holding any tool, weapon, or other item in your hands you will sink to the bottom.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To breath underwater you need armor, [-][/c][c][00ff00]oxygen[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your armor, and your helmet [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Helmet)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to be on.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most tools will work underwater but most weapons will not.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]最基本的从A点移动到B点的方式就是直接跑过去。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以冲刺[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Run)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来提高跑步时的移动速度,但这样做会消耗[-][/c][c][00ff00]耐力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]跳跃[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jump)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可以帮助你越过小的垂直障碍。你的跳跃高度受重力影响。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的[-][/c][c][00ff00]喷气背包[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jetpack)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将帮助你清除如悬崖这样的垂直障碍,但对水平速度无效。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的喷气背包在高重力环境下的效果会降低。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]除非你受到引力发生器的影响,否则你需要使用喷气背包在太空中移动。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你的基本移动速度和冲刺时耐力的使用将取决于你装备的[-][/c][c][00ff00]护甲[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]助推器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]某些[-][/c][c][00ff00]状态效果[-][/c][c][abd1ff]也可以增加或减少你的移动速度。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]要在水中游泳,你需要双手不装备任何物品[-][/c][c][ffff00](0)[-][/c][c][abd1ff](那是数字0键)。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果你手中持有任何工具、武器或其他物品,你将会沉到水底。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]要在水中呼吸,你需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]护甲[-][/c][c][abd1ff],护甲中的[-][/c][c][00ff00]氧气[-][/c][c][abd1ff],以及你的头盔[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Helmet)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]要戴上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数工具在水下都能使用,但大多数武器则不能。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
The hoverbike is a cheap and convenient mode of transportation in the early game.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can craft it in a [-][/c][c][00ff00]portable constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] from a hoverbike construction kit, which is crafted from basic resources in a portable constructor.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It requires no [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To use the hoverbike, place it on your toolbar and then place it on the ground. It cannot be used in space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can get on the hoverbike with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or pick it up into your inventory with [-][/c][c][ffff00](Shift + {keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If a hoverbike is left out for too long it will eventually despawn.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]While piloting the hoverbike, hold [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jump)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to increase your hover height, [-][/c][c][ffff00](W)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (default hotkey) to go forward, and your mouse to turn.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Cruise control[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]auto brake[-][/c][c][abd1ff] options are not available on hoverbikes.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The headlights will automatically turn on at night.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The hoverbike has difficulty climbing steep hills or going over water.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It will not protect you from environmental conditions and has no storage or utility functions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It does not have a built in detector.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]悬浮摩托是游戏早期一种便宜且方便的交通工具。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以在[c][00ff00]便携式建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中用悬浮摩托建造套件制作它,而建造套件是在便携式建造机中用基本资源制作的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它不需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]要使用悬浮摩托,将其放在你的工具栏上,然后将其放置在地面上。它不能在太空中使用。[-][/c][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]骑上悬浮摩托,或者使用[-][/c][c][ffff00](Shift + {keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将其捡起来放入你的库存中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果悬浮摩托放置时间过长,它最终会消失。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]在驾驶悬浮摩托时,按住[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jump)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可以增加悬浮高度,按[-][/c][c][ffff00](W)[-][/c][c][abd1ff](默认快捷键)前进,使用鼠标转向。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]巡航控制[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]自动刹车[-][/c][c][abd1ff]选项在悬浮摩托上不可用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]前灯会在夜晚自动开启。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]悬浮摩托在爬陡峭的山坡或过水面时有困难。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
它不能保护你免受环境条件的影响,没有存储或实用功能。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
它没有内置探测器。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Hover Vessels are player built ships that use hover engines to float above terrain and water.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be constructed block by block in survival, or designed in a creative mode save and saved as a [-][/c][c][00ff00]blueprint[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to build via the [-][/c][c][00ff00]factory[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can use a variety of weapons and utility devices.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hover vessels are controlled with the keyboard for movement and the mouse or keyboard for turning.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can make scouts, miners, mobile bases, or heavy combat tanks or anything in between.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can have difficulty navigating some terrain or thick forests.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hover vessels are not effective in space. If flown in space, speed will be limited to 3m/s and they will be affected by any nearby gravity generators.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Thrusters[-][/c][c][abd1ff] on hover vessels are only required in the front, back, left, and right directions. They are not needed facing up or down.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Holding [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jump)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will increase the hover height.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If a hover vessel is stuck upside down you can press [-][/c][c][ffff00](Shift)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (default hotkey) to flip it over.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Hover vessels make use of the following devices for propulsion:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Ground Repulsor Engines[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]Hover Engines[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]Hover Booster[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]Thrusters[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]RCS[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]悬浮飞船是由玩家建造的飞船,它们使用悬浮引擎在地形和水面上空浮动。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以在生存模式中逐块建造,或者在创意模式中设计并保存为[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff],然后通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]工厂[-][/c][c][abd1ff]建造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以使用各种武器和实用设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]悬浮飞船通过键盘控制移动,使用鼠标或键盘控制转向。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以成为侦察船、采矿船、移动基地,或重型战斗坦克,或介于两者之间的任何类型。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在某些地形或茂密森林中可能难以航行。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]悬浮飞船在太空中效果不佳。如果在太空中飞行,速度将限制在3米/秒,并且会受到附近引力发生器的影响。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]推进器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在悬浮飞船上只在前、后、左、右方向需要。它们不需要朝上或朝下。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]按住[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jump)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]将增加悬浮高度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果悬浮飞船卡在下面,你可以按[-][/c][c][ffff00](Shift)[-][/c][c][abd1ff](默认快捷键)将其翻转过来。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]悬浮飞船使用以下设备进行推进:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]地面排斥引擎[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]悬浮引擎[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]悬浮助推器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]推进器[-][/c][c][abd1ff],以及[-][/c][c][00ff00]定向陀螺仪(RCS)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Small Vessels are player built ships that use thrusters to fly on planets or space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be constructed block by block in survival, or designed in a creative mode save and saved as a [-][/c][c][00ff00]blueprint[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to build via the [-][/c][c][00ff00]factory[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can use a variety of weapons and utility devices.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Small vessels are controlled with the keyboard for movement and the mouse or keyboard for turning.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can make great scouts, miners, attack fighters, heavy gunships, and exploratory craft.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can take advantage of [-][/c][c][00ff00]atmospheric lift[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to become gliders.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Small vessels make use of the following devices for propulsion:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Thrusters[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]RCS[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]Prototype Micro Jump Drives[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]Jump Drives[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]小型飞船是由玩家建造的船只,它们使用推进器在行星或太空中飞行。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以在生存模式中逐块建造,或者在创意模式中设计并保存为[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff],然后通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]工厂[-][/c][c][abd1ff]建造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以使用各种武器和实用设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]小型飞船通过键盘控制移动,使用鼠标或键盘控制转向。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以成为出色的侦察船、采矿船、攻击战斗机、重型炮艇和探测船。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以利用[-][/c][c][00ff00]大气升力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]成为滑翔机。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]小型飞船使用以下设备进行推进:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]推进器[-][/c][c][abd1ff],[-][/c][c][00ff00]定向陀螺仪[-][/c][c][abd1ff],[-][/c][c][00ff00]原型微型跳跃驱动器[-][/c][c][abd1ff],以及[-][/c][c][00ff00]跳跃驱动器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Capital Vessels are player built ships that use thrusters to fly on planets or space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be constructed block by block in survival, or designed in a creative mode save and saved as a [-][/c][c][00ff00]blueprint[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to build via the [-][/c][c][00ff00]factory[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can use a variety of weapons and utility devices.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Capital vessels are controlled with the keyboard for movement and the mouse or keyboard for turning.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can make great exploratory craft, attack craft, battleships, carriers, motherships, freighters, space mining barges, and mobile bases.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can take advantage of [-][/c][c][00ff00]atmospheric lift[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to become gliders.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Capital vessels make use of the following devices for propulsion:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Thrusters[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]RCS[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]Prototype Micro Jump Drives[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]Warp Drives[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]主力舰是由玩家建造的飞船,它们使用推进器在行星或太空中飞行。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以在生存模式中逐块建造,或者在创意模式中设计并保存为[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff],然后通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]工厂[-][/c][c][abd1ff]建造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以使用各种武器和实用设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]主力舰通过键盘控制移动,使用鼠标或键盘控制转向。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以成为出色的探测船、攻击船、战舰、航母、母舰、货船、太空采矿驳船和移动基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以利用[-][/c][c][00ff00]大气升力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]成为滑翔机。[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]主力舰使用以下设备进行推进:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]推进器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]定向陀螺仪(RCS)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]原型微型跳跃驱动器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]翘曲引擎[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English: \n[c][abd1ff]This section will go over the various types of ship propulsion.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]本节将介绍各种类型的飞船推进方式。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Ground Repulsor Engines are a specialized type of [-][/c][c][00ff00]hover engine[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for [-][/c][c][00ff00]hover vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] that includes the functionality of hover engines, [-][/c][c][00ff00]thrusters[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]RCS[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in one unit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are very weak and only suited to small, cheap hover vessels but are all that is needed to move a hover vessel.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They have a maximum limit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They have difficulty going over water and have a lower hover height than standard hover engines.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]地面斥力引擎是一种专门类型的[-][/c][c][00ff00]悬浮引擎[-][/c][c][abd1ff],用于[-][/c][c][00ff00]悬浮飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff],它集成了悬浮引擎、[-][/c][c][00ff00]推进器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]定向陀螺仪(RCS)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的功能于一身。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们的推力非常弱,只适合小型、廉价的悬浮飞船,但它们是移动悬浮飞船所需的全部。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们有一个最大限制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在水面上行驶有困难,并且比标准悬浮引擎的悬停高度要低。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Hover Engines provide the lift for [-][/c][c][00ff00]hover vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff], allowing them to hover over terrain and water.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are required for hover vessels to move, unless [-][/c][c][00ff00]ground repulsor engines[-][/c][c][abd1ff] are used instead.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]悬浮引擎为[c][00ff00]悬浮飞船[-][/c]提供升力,使它们能够在地形和水面上悬停。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]它们是悬浮飞船移动所必需的,除非改用[-][/c][c][00ff00]地面排斥引擎[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The hover booster is a specialized device that allows a [-][/c][c][00ff00]hover vessel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to make a vertical jump into the air.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can only be used while not in motion.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Only 1 is required.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]悬浮助推器是一种特殊设备,它允许[-][/c][c][00ff00]悬浮飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]进行垂直跳跃进入空中。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]只能在静止时使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只需要1个。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Thrusters are required to provide thrust to [-][/c][c][00ff00]hover vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]small vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]capital vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Thrusters can be rotated and will apply thrust in the direction they are facing.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]For example thrusters that are facing backwards will help propel your ship forwards.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hover vessels require thrusters in the front, back, left, and right directions but do not require them in the top or bottom directions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Small vessels and capital vessels require thrusters in all directions unless they are intended to use [-][/c][c][00ff00]atmospheric lift[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to be a glider.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Thrusters come in multiple sizes and each size has 3 tiers.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Thrusters can be upgraded in-place to the next tier using a multitool.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Larger thrusters and higher tier thrusters are generally more power and CPU efficient.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Thrusters can have the ability to boost. Boosting temporarily increases your maximum speed and is indicated by an icon on the [-][/c][c][00ff00]ship HUD[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Thrusters show their boost factor in the tooltip, if they have one.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To boost, hold a movement key and [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Run)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] at the same time. Your remaining boost will show on the HUD and it will recharge automatically when not boosting.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The thruster flame can be colored individually from the rest of the thruster.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Thrusters can provide torque based on their placement. Generally thrusters placed further from the center of mass will contribute more to torque than those placed closer.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The more mass your ship has, the more thrust is required to move it.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A ship that has lost all thrusters in a direction will be unable to provide breaking thrust in that direction and therefor will be unable to stop if moving unless the ship is turned to face thrusters in the direction of travel.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]推进器是必需的,以提供推力给[-][/c][c][00ff00]悬浮飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]小型飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]主力舰[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]推进器可以旋转,并将推力应用在它们所面向的方向。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]例如,面向后方的推进器将有助于推动您的飞船向前。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]悬浮飞船需要前后左右方向的推进器,但不需要上下方向的推进器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]小型飞船和主力舰需要所有方向的推进器,除非它们打算使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]大气升力[-][/c][c][abd1ff]成为滑翔机。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]推进器有多种尺寸,每种尺寸都有3个等级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以使用多功能工具就地将推进器升级到下一个等级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]较大的推进器和较高等级的推进器通常更有动力和CPU效率。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]推进器有能力进行加速。加速暂时增加您的最高速度,并在[-][/c][c][00ff00]飞船HUD[-][/c][c][abd1ff]上通过图标指示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果推进器具有加速能力,它们将在提示信息中显示加速因子。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要加速,同时按住移动键和[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Run)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。您剩余的加速将在HUD上显示,并且在不加速时将自动重新充电。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]推进器的火焰颜色可以与推进器的其余部分单独着色。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]根据放置位置,推进器可以提供扭矩。通常,放置在质心更远的推进器比那些放置得更近的对扭矩的贡献更大。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您的飞船质量越大,移动它所需的推力就越大。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果一艘飞船在一个方向上失去了所有推进器,它将无法提供该方向的制动推力,因此如果正在移动,除非将飞船转向以面向旅行方向的推进器,否则将无法停止。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]RCS are devices that can be placed on [-][/c][c][00ff00]hover vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]small vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]capital vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] that provide torque to aid in turning speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]An RCS can be placed anywhere on your ship and will apply a flat amount of torque to all axis of rotation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]More massive ships will require more RCS to turn.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be used to supplement the torque provided by [-][/c][c][00ff00]thrusters[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]定向陀螺仪是可放置在[-][/c][c][00ff00]悬浮飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]小型飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]主力舰[-][/c][c][abd1ff]上的设备,它们提供扭矩以帮助提高转向速度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]定向陀螺仪可以放置在飞船的任何位置,并将对所有旋转轴施加相同的扭矩。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]更重的飞船需要更多的RCS来转向。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以用来补充[-][/c][c][00ff00]推进器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]提供的扭矩。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The micro jump drive allows [-][/c][c][00ff00]small vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]capital vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to make short range jumps within a sector of space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be placed anywhere on the ship, but should face in the forward direction (arrows pointing towards the front of your ship).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They should be kept off as their power state will be automatically controlled by the jump sequence.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When activated, a micro jump drive will attempt to teleport the ship you are flying forward the set distance.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They cannot teleport you if your teleport destination would be too close to any other object.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require specific steps to use and there is currently a game bug that requires an additional step. See their tooltip for details.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Prototype micro jump drives can be disabled in the Project Eden Settings admin menu (available in the Tutorial tab of the PDA).[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]微型跳跃驱动器允许[-][/c][c][00ff00]小型飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]主力舰[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在太空的一个星区内进行短距离跳跃。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以放置在飞船的任何位置,但应面向前方(箭头指向飞船的前端)。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们应该保持关闭状态,因为它们的能量状态将由跳跃序列自动控制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]激活时,微型跳跃驱动器将尝试将您正在驾驶的飞船向前传送到设定的距离。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果传送目的地太接近任何其他物体,它们将无法传送您。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用它们需要特定的步骤,并且目前游戏中存在一个错误,需要一个额外的步骤。详见它们的提示信息。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]原型微型跳跃驱动器可以在伊甸园计划设置的管理员菜单中禁用(在PDA的教程标签中可用)。[-][/c]
跳跃驱动器和翘曲引擎
跳跃驱动器和翘曲引擎

English:
[c][abd1ff]Jump drives are short range warp drives used on [-][/c][c][00ff00]small vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to travel between sectors in a star system.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are typically limited in range to the current star system but can be upgraded to an advanced version with limited range to travel beyond.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Warp drives are used by [-][/c][c][00ff00]capital vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to travel between star systems and explore the galaxy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be upgraded to an advanced version with longer range and better pentaxid efficiency.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]All warp drives require pentaxid in a pentaxid tank to make warps.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The cost to warp depends on the warp drive type, the range warping, and whether it is an in-system warp measured in [-][/c][c][00ff00]AU[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or a warp between star systems measured in [-][/c][c][00ff00]LY[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See the tooltip of the warp drive for the pentaxid cost per AU and LY.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Warp drive range can be upgraded using navigational data bought from UCH Research Vessels, found in loot, or given as mission rewards.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Navigational data increases the warp range of any capital vessel, or any small vessel using an advanced jump drive, by 1 light year per navigational data turned in, or 2 light years if using a capital vessel advanced warp drive.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Navigational data is applied to the player, not the ship, so it will apply to any ship you pilot.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
