[c][abd1ff]You can warp to a locked playfield, or to any HUD visible bookmark, or to any visible celestial object.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Locked playfields will display on your HUD with an orange marker and an orange arrow if outside of your current view.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
To warp to a target, you must fly towards the target and aim directly at it, reach a speed threshold, and then activate the warp with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(WarpDrive)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You cannot warp to a target that is in the same sector as yourself, or any target that is outside of your ship's current warp range.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]跳跃驱动器是用于[-][/c][c][00ff00]小型飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]在星系内不同星区间旅行的短程翘曲引擎。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们通常限制在当前星系的范围内,但可以升级到有限范围的先进版本,以进行更远距离的旅行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]翘曲引擎被[-][/c][c][00ff00]主力舰[-][/c][c][abd1ff]用来在星系间旅行和探索银河系。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以升级到具有更长距离和更好的翘曲水晶效率的先进版本。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]所有翘曲引擎都需要在翘曲水晶罐中装有翘曲水晶来进行翘曲。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]翘曲的成本取决于翘曲引擎类型、翘曲范围,以及是在星系内翘曲(以[-][/c][c][00ff00]天文单位[-][/c][c][abd1ff]计量)还是星系间翘曲(以[-][/c][c][00ff00]光年[-][/c][c][abd1ff]计量)。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]查看翘曲引擎的提示,了解每天文单位和每光年的翘曲水晶成本。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]翘曲引擎的范围可以通过购买UCH研究船只提供的导航数据、在战利品中找到或作为任务奖励获得来升级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]导航数据可以将任何主力舰或使用先进跳跃驱动器的小型飞船的翘曲范围增加1光年,或者如果使用主力舰的先进翘曲引擎,则增加2光年。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]导航数据应用于玩家,而不是飞船,因此它将适用于你驾驶的任何飞船。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以翘曲到一个锁定的战场,或者任何HUD可见的书签,或者任何可见的天体。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]锁定的战场将在你的HUD上以橙色标记和橙色箭头显示,如果它们在你的当前视图之外。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为了翘曲到目标,你必须朝目标飞行并直接瞄准它,达到速度阈值,然后激活翘曲与[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(WarpDrive)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你不能翘曲到与你自己在同一星区的目标,或者任何超出你的飞船当前翘曲范围的目标。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]On planets with an atmosphere, ships will gain additional lifting power from the planet's atmosphere.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This lift is dependent on the bottom facing surface area of the ship, the ship's speed, and the atmospheric density of the planet or moon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This can be used to make [-][/c][c][00ff00]small vessel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or [-][/c][c][00ff00]capital vessel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] gliders that use atmospheric lift to stay in the air.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To make a glider, you only need rear facing [-][/c][c][00ff00]thrusters[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for forward propulsion and [-][/c][c][00ff00]RCS[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for turning.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Take off like an airplane and as you gain speed you will be able to lift into the air and stay afloat as long as you maintain speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To land, slow down and you will begin to fall.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Gliders can be very cheap to build and fuel efficient, but will not work in space or on planets without an atmosphere.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]在有大气层的行星上,飞船将从行星的大气中获得额外的升力。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]这种升力取决于飞船底部面向的表面积、飞船的速度以及行星或卫星的大气密度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这可以用来制造[-][/c][c][00ff00]小型飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或[-][/c][c][00ff00]主力舰[-][/c][c][abd1ff]滑翔机,它们利用大气升力来保持在空中。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]要制造一个滑翔机,你只需要后向[-][/c][c][00ff00]推进器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]用于向前推进和[-][/c][c][00ff00]RCS[-][/c][c][abd1ff]用于转向。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]像飞机一样起飞,随着你增加速度,你将能够升入空中,并只要保持速度就能保持浮空。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要着陆,减速,你将开始下降。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]滑翔机建造成本可以非常低,而且燃油效率高,但它们在太空中或没有大气层的行星上无法工作。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Auto brake allows the computer to control your ship's movement, such that if a movement input stops being pressed, your ship's thrusters will automatically fire to bring you to a stop.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It is also used to keep your ship hovering while on a planet.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There may be times you wish to disable auto [-][/c][c][abd1ff]brake [-][/c][c][abd1ff]to conserve fuel, such as when coasting in space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can toggle auto brake with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(AutoBreak)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]. Your current auto [-][/c][c][abd1ff]brake [-][/c][c][abd1ff]setting is shown by the icon in the lower right of the pilot HUD.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]There are three modes of auto [-][/c][c][abd1ff]brake[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_AutoBrakeOnBar.png}[-][/c][c][00afff]Auto brake on (default):[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Flight systems will attempt to stop your ship if you are not actively thrusting in that direction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Flight systems will attempt to counter gravity so your ship can hover in place on planets.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_AutoBrakeOff2Bar.png}[-][/c][c][00afff]Auto brake off:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Flight systems will make no attempt to stop your ship. If you let go of a movement input you will continue drifting.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Flight systems will not counter gravity.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_AutoBrakeOffBar.png}[-][/c][c][00afff]Maintain height (only on planets):[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Flight systems will make no attempt to stop your ship. If you let go of a movement input you will continue drifting.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Flight systems will attempt to counter gravity so your ship can hover in place on planets.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]自动刹车允许计算机控制您的飞船移动,这样如果停止按下移动输入,您的飞船推进器将自动点火以使您停止。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它也用于在行星上保持您的飞船悬停。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有时您可能希望禁用自动刹车以节省燃料,例如在太空中滑行时。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(AutoBreak)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]切换自动刹车。您当前的自动刹车设置由飞行员HUD右下角的图标显示。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]自动刹车有三种模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_AutoBrakeOnBar.png}[-][/c][c][00afff]自动刹车开启(默认):[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您没有在该方向上积极推进,飞行系统将尝试停止您的飞船。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]飞行系统将尝试抵消重力,以便您的飞船可以在行星上悬停。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_AutoBrakeOff2Bar.png}[-][/c][c][00afff]自动刹车关闭:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]飞行系统不会尝试停止您的飞船。如果您放开移动输入,您将继续漂移。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]飞行系统不会抵消重力。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_AutoBrakeOffBar.png}[-][/c][c][00afff]保持高度(仅限行星):[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]飞行系统不会尝试停止您的飞船。如果您放开移动输入,您将继续漂移。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]飞行系统将尝试抵消重力,以便您的飞船可以在行星上悬停。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ff00]Hover vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]small vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]capital vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can make use of cruise control to continue flying in a direction without needing to hold down a key.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Cruise control is indicated by a marker along the right side of your ship HUD (see image to the right) and an icon on the ship stats HUD in the lower right.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The marker shows you the current speed your cruise control is set to as a percentage of your current maximum speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To cancel cruise control, hit any movement input.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]There are two ways to activate cruise control:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hold down a movement key until you are at maximum speed, then while continuing to hold that movement key tap [-][/c][c][ffff00](Ctrl)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (default hotkey).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Hold down a movement key and [-][/c][c][ffff00](Ctrl)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (default hotkey)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] at the same time and you will see the cruise control setting on the right side of the ship HUD rising as you hold it. This lets you set a precise speed for cruise control in case you want to move slower.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ff00]悬浮飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]小型飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]主力舰[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可以使用巡航控制继续朝一个方向飞行,而不需要按住一个键。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]巡航控制由您飞船HUD右侧的一个标记(见右侧图片)以及位于右下角的飞船状态HUD上的一个图标指示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]该标记显示您的巡航控制设置为您当前最大速度的百分比。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要取消巡航控制,按任意移动输入键。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]有三种激活巡航控制的方式:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]按住一个移动键直到达到最大速度,然后继续按住该移动键并轻敲 [-][/c][c][ffff00](Ctrl)[-][/c][c][abd1ff](默认快捷键)。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]按住一个移动键,并同时按住 [-][/c][c][ffff00](Ctrl)[-][/c][c][abd1ff](默认快捷键)[-][/c][c][abd1ff],您将看到飞船HUD右侧的巡航控制设置随着按住的时间上升。这允许您为巡航控制设置一个精确的速度,以防您想要移动得更慢。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]\nExplanations of the different HUD elements for the ship HUD and stats window located in the bottom right of the HUD.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]对位于HUD右下角的飞船HUD和状态窗口的不同HUD元素的解释。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
The left side of the ship HUD displays altitude info.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It will display distance to orbit (or nearest planet or moon if in space), distance to ground, and absolute altitude.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]飞船HUD的左侧显示高度信息。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它将显示到轨道(或在太空中最近的行星或卫星)的距离、到地面的距离以及绝对高度。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
The right side of the ship HUD displays speed and boost info.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The numbers at the top show your max speed in the direction of travel and your current speed.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The arrow on the right side is your [-][/c][c][00ff00]cruise control[-][/c][c][abd1ff] indicator.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]At the bottom is a boost indicator, if your ship has thrusters capable of boosting.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]飞船HUD的右侧显示速度和加速信息。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]顶部的数字显示您在旅行方向上的最大速度和当前速度。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]右侧的箭头是您的巡航控制[-][/c][c][00ff00]指示器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]底部是一个加速指示器,如果您的飞船有能够加速的推进器。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]\nThis icon shows if the ship you are piloting is docked to another ship or base.[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]To undock, hold down [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jump)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]这个图标显示您正在驾驶的飞船是否停靠在另一艘飞船或基地上。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]要脱离停靠,按住 [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Jump)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]\nThis icon shows the current [-][/c][c][00ff00]auto brake[-][/c][c][abd1ff] setting.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]这个图标显示当前的[-][/c][c][00ff00]自动制动[-][/c][c][abd1ff]设置。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]\nThis icon shows if [-][/c][c][00ff00]cruise control[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is enabled.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]这个图标显示是否启用了[-][/c][c][00ff00]巡航控制[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
This icon shows how many passengers are sitting in passenger seats in your ship[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Passengers must be seated to move your ship otherwise they will fall through the ship if it moves.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If seated passengers log off and then the ship is moved, they will log in at the location they logged off at, not the current location of the ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]In other words, passengers that are logged off do not move with the ship.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is an exception if the ship was moved only a small distance.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这个图标显示了有多少乘客坐在您飞船的乘客座位上[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]乘客必须坐下才能移动您的飞船,否则如果飞船移动,他们会从飞船中掉落。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果坐着的乘客下线,然后飞船被移动,他们会在他们下线时的位置登录,而不是飞船当前的位置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]换句话说,离线的乘客不会随飞船移动。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果飞飞船移动了很短的距离,有一个例外。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]\nThis indicates if [-][/c][c][00ff00]mining mode[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is active.[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]Hover vessels equipped with [-][/c][c][00ff00]drill modules[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can activate mining mode with [-][/c][c][ffff00](Shift + O)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (default hotkey).[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]这表示是否激活了[-][/c][c][00ff00]采矿模式[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]装备有[-][/c][c][00ff00]钻探模块[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的悬浮飞船可以通过[-][/c][c][ffff00](Shift + O)[-][/c][c][abd1ff](默认快捷键)激活采矿模式。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]\nThe current [-][/c][c][00ff00]power consumption[-][/c][c][abd1ff] of your ship compared to your [-][/c][c][00ff00]generator[-][/c][c][abd1ff] maximum output.[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]If power consumption exceeds generator maximum output, this bar will display in red and your generators will be at risk of overloading.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]您的飞船当前的[-][/c][c][00ff00]电力消耗[-][/c][c][abd1ff]与您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]发电机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]最大输出的比较。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]如果电力消耗超过了发电机的最大输出,这个条将会显示为红色,并且您的发电机有超负荷的风险。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]\nShows how much [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] remains in your [-][/c][c][00ff00]fuel tanks[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and the estimated time your fuel will last given current [-][/c][c][00ff00]power consumption[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]显示您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料箱[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中剩余的[-][/c][c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c][c][abd1ff]量,以及根据当前[-][/c][c][00ff00]能耗[-][/c][c][abd1ff],您的燃料可持续的估计时间。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]\nShows how much [-][/c][c][00ff00]oxygen[-][/c][c][abd1ff] remains in your oxygen tanks.[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]Oxygen is used to refill your suit oxygen via oxygen stations or to breath while in oxygenated compartments.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]显示您的氧气罐中剩余的[-][/c][c][00ff00]氧气[-][/c][c][abd1ff]量。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]氧气用于通过氧气站给您的宇航服氧气补给,或者在有氧气的舱室中呼吸。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
Shows how much refined pentaxid remains in your pentaxid tank.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Note that the AU or LY distance shown on the HUD may not be an accurate representation due to differences in warp drive efficiency.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Check the tooltip of your jump drive or warp drive for the pentaxid cost per warp.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]
显示您的翘曲水晶(精炼)储存罐中剩余的翘曲水晶数量。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]请注意,HUD上显示的AU(天文单位)或LY(光年)距离可能由于翘曲引擎效率的差异而不准确。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]检查您的跳跃驱动器或翘曲驱动器的工具提示,了解每次翘曲所需的翘曲水晶成本。[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]\nThe center of the ship HUD shows your current direction.[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]If on a planet will show indicators for north, south, east, and west.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): \n[c][abd1ff]飞船HUD的中心显示您当前的方向。[-][/c]\n[c][abd1ff]如果在星球上,将显示北、南、东和西的指示器。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Bases are player built structures that cannot move.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be constructed block by block in survival, or designed in a creative mode save and saved as a [-][/c][c][00ff00]blueprint[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to build via the [-][/c][c][00ff00]factory[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can use a variety of weapons and utility devices.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]About the only transportation they can do is allowing access to long range [-][/c][c][00ff00]teleporters[-][/c][c][abd1ff].
They are listed here only as a reference.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]基地是玩家建造的固定结构,不能移动。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以在生存模式中逐块建造,或者在创意模式下设计并保存为[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图[-][/c][c][abd1ff],然后通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]工厂[-][/c][c][abd1ff]建造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以使用各种武器和实用设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们唯一的交通工具是允许使用远程[-][/c][c][00ff00]传送装置[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Mining is the process of ore and other raw resources from rocks, terrain, deposits, or asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If mining with a hand tool, harvested resources will be deposited into your personal inventory, or your [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected container[-][/c][c][abd1ff] if connected via [-][/c][c][00ff00]logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If mining with a ship mounted tool, harvested resources will be deposited into your ship's [-][/c][c][00ff00]harvest controllers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]采矿是从岩石、地形、矿床或小行星中提取矿石和其他原始资源的过程。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果使用手持工具采矿,收获的资源将存入您的个人背包,或者如果通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]连接,将存入您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果使用船载工具采矿,收获的资源将存入您飞船的[-][/c][c][00ff00]收获控制器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]
The below sections will list the types of mineable resources you can find.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See [-][/c][c][00ff00]Ores[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or [-][/c][c][00ff00]Commodities[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for a list of different ores.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]以下部分将列出您可以找到的可开采资源类型。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]查看[-][/c][c][00ff00]矿石[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或[-][/c][c][00ff00]商品[-][/c][c][abd1ff],了解不同矿石的列表。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]These are rocks or other things that can be found on the surface of planets and moons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Surface rocks do not show on the planet map info.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They do not show on a detector.

They can be harvested with any mining tool.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To mine, break the rock using a mining tool.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once mined, they will not come back.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Placement depends on biome and planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这些是可以在行星和卫星表面发现的岩石或其他物质。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]地表岩石在星球地图信息中不会显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在探测器上不会显示。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以用任何采矿工具进行采集。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要开采,使用采矿工具打破岩石。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一旦开采,它们将不会再次出现。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们的分布取决于生物群落和星球。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]These ore deposits found underground on planets and moons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Deposits show on the planet map info with number of deposits discovered versus total number of deposits present.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
They show on the planetary map with an icon representing the ore type and a percentage of ore remaining.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Completely mining out a deposit removes it from the map.
They can be discovered using a detector.

They can be harvested with any mining tool.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To mine, you need to dig down to the deposit and then mine the ore terrain.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once mined, they will not come back.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Placement depends on biome and planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这些矿石矿床位于行星和卫星的地下。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]矿床在星球地图信息中显示,包括已发现矿床数量与矿床总数的对比。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们在星球地图上以图标显示,代表矿石类型和剩余矿石的百分比。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]完全开采完一个矿床会将其从地图上移除。它们可以使用探测器发现。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以用任何采矿工具进行采集。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要开采,你需要挖掘到矿床位置,然后开采矿石地形。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一旦开采,它们将不会再次出现。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们的分布取决于生物群落和星球。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]These are specialized deposits found underground on planets and moons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This style of deposit does not show on the planet map info.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
They show on the planetary map with a [-][/c][c][00ff00]POI[-][/c][c][abd1ff] map icon.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Mining them out completely does not remove them from the map.
They can be discovered using a detector.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Deposits for custom ore types are spawned as a POI using this nugget style due to technical reasons.

They can be harvested with any mining tool.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To mine, you need to dig down to the deposit and then mine the ore nuggets found near the deposit marker.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once mined, they will regenerate after a time on servers if POI regeneration is enabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Placement depends on biome, planet, and galactic faction territory.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这些是行星和卫星地下发现的专门矿床。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这种风格的矿床不会在星球地图信息中显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们在星球地图上以一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]兴趣点(POI)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]地图图标显示。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]完全开采它们并不会从地图上移除它们。
它们可以使用探测器发现。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]由于技术原因,自定义矿石类型的矿床作为POI以这种矿粒风格生成。

它们可以用任何采矿工具进行采集。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要开采,你需要挖掘到矿床位置,然后开采矿床标记附近发现的矿粒。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一旦开采,如果启用了POI再生功能,它们将在服务器上经过一段时间后再生。
它们的放置取决于生物群落、星球和银河派系领土。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Asteroids are found in space sectors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Asteroids show on the local map info with a listing of what types of asteroids there are[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Asteroids show on the system map info with a listing of what types and quantities of asteroids there are.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Asteroids can show on the map either with an icon representing their resource or with a POI icon.
They can be discovered using a detector.

They can be harvested with any mining tool.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To mine, you need to dig out the resource rock on the asteroid.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once mined, they will regenerate after a time on servers if POI regeneration is enabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Placement depends on type of sector and galactic faction territory.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]小行星可以在太空星区中找到。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]小行星在本地地图信息中显示,并列出有哪些类型的小行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]小行星在系统地图信息中显示,并列出有哪些类型和数量的小行星。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]小行星可以在地图上显示,要么是代表其资源的图标,要么是兴趣点(POI)图标。
它们可以使用探测器发现。

它们可以用任何采矿工具进行采集。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要开采,你需要挖掘小行星上的资源岩石。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一旦开采,如果启用了POI再生功能,它们将在服务器上经过一段时间后再生。
它们的放置取决于星区的类型和银河派系领土。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]When most of a type of deposit is mined out on a planet, resource meteors can begin to fall, bringing fresh ore to the planet's surface.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The type of depletion meteorites available will show on the planet map.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]When a meteorite is triggered you will see a message at the top of your HUD and a meteorite will fall somewhere on the planet and land on the ground.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Meteorites show on the detector.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be mined with any mining tool but take quite awhile.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If not mined after a time it will despawn.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]After a period of time another meteorite will fall.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]当一个星球上的某种矿床大部分被开采完后,资源陨石可能开始坠落,为星球表面带来新的矿石。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可用的枯竭陨石类型将在星球地图上显示。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]当触发一个陨石时,您将在HUD顶部看到一条消息,并且一个陨石将在某处坠落到星球上并落到地面。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]陨石在探测器上会显示。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以用任何采矿工具开采,但需要相当长的时间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果在一段时间后没有被开采,它将会消失。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]经过一段时间后,另一个陨石将会坠落。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The below sections will list the different mining tools available.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Mining tools all have 100% efficiency. Only their speed, radius, and available mining modes differ.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Capital vessel tools are only usable in space.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]以下部分将列出不同的可用采矿工具。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]所有采矿工具都具有100%的效率。它们之间只有速度、半径和可用的采矿模式不同。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]主力舰工具只能在太空中使用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The survival tool has a very basic mining function available when in resource mode.[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Change modes with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It can be crafted for free in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]suit constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It does not require any ammunition.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
It is suitable for mining surface rocks but is very slow at everything else.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It can be used with the player drone [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]生存工具在资源模式下有一个非常基础的采矿功能。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]切换模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]宇航服建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中免费制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它不需要任何弹药。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它适合开采地表岩石,但在其他方面速度非常慢。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它可以与玩家无人机[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]一起使用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Handheld drills are faster at mining [-][/c][c][00ff00]surface rocks[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and are an upgrade to the [-][/c][c][00ff00]survival tool[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be crafted in [-][/c][c][00ff00]constructors[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require ammunition.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They come in 3 tiers.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be used with the player drone [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Mechanical Drill:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is the first drill you can craft and is made in a [-][/c][c][00ff00]portable constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]biodiesel[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to operate.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Suitable for breaking surface rocks. Will slowly mine [-][/c][c][00ff00]planetary deposits[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can be used to mine small amounts off [-][/c][c][00ff00]resource asteroids[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Laser Drill:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is an upgrade to the mechanical drill with faster mining and a large radius and additional mining modes.[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Change modes with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It can be crafted in a [-][/c][c][00ff00]large constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]drill charges[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to operate.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Suitable for breaking surface rocks or mining planetary deposits.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can be used to mine small amounts off resource asteroids.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

[c][00afff]Advanced Laser Drill:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is a drill with even faster mining and an even large radius. It can be found in alien loot containers.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]drill charges[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to operate.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Suitable for breaking surface rocks or mining planetary deposits.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Can be used to mine small amounts off resource asteroids.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]手持钻机在开采[-][/c][c][00ff00]地表岩石[-][/c][c][abd1ff]方面速度更快,并且是[-][/c][c][00ff00]生存工具[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的升级版。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要弹药。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们有3个等级。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以与玩家无人机[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]一起使用。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]无[-][/c]
[c][00afff]无[-][/c]
[c][00afff]机械钻:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是您可以制造的第一种钻机,它在[-][/c][c][00ff00]便携式建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]生物柴油[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]适合破碎地表岩石。可以缓慢开采[-][/c][c][00ff00]行星矿床[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以用来从小行星上开采少量[-][/c][c][00ff00]资源[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]激光钻:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是机械钻的升级版,具有更快的开采速度和更大的半径以及额外的开采模式。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]切换模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]大型建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]钻探弹药[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]无[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]适合破碎地表岩石或开采行星矿床。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以用来从小行星上开采少量资源。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]高级激光钻:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是一种钻机,具有更快的开采速度和更大的半径。它可以在外星人的战利品容器中找到。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]钻探弹药[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来运行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]适合破碎地表岩石或开采行星矿床。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以用来从小行星上开采少量资源。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Ship mounted drills are much faster at mining [-][/c][c][00ff00]planetary deposits[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]resource asteroids[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be crafted in [-][/c][c][00ff00]constructors[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]They come in multiple types and can be used on [-][/c][c][00ff00]hover vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff], [-][/c][c][00ff00]small vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and [-][/c][c][00ff00]capital vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are much faster than handheld drills.
Capital vessel tools cannot be used on planets.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Mechanical Drill Modules:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These are heavy duty mounted drills suitable for mining any planetary deposit or resource asteroid.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Multiple can be used at once to increase mining area.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Laser Drill Modules:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These are upgrades to the mechanical drill modules with increased speed and range.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Multiple can be used at once to increase mining area.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Tool Turrets:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This is a specialized type of manual turret usable on hover vessels and capital vessels that allows you to mine. [-][/c][c][abd1ff] Change modes with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Must be manually controlled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Also allows for salvaging.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]船载钻机在开采[-][/c][c][00ff00]行星矿床[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]资源小行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]方面速度快得多。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中制造。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们有多种类型,并且可以用于[-][/c][c][00ff00]悬浮飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]、[-][/c][c][00ff00]小型飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]主力舰[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们比手持钻机快得多。
主力舰工具不能在行星上使用。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]机械钻探模块:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些是重型安装钻机,适用于开采任何行星矿床或资源小行星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以同时使用多个以增加开采区域。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]激光钻探模块:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些是机械钻探模块的升级版,具有更快的速度和范围。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以同时使用多个以增加开采区域。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]工具炮塔:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这是一种专用的手动炮塔,可用于悬浮飞船和主力舰,允许您进行采矿。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]切换模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]必须手动控制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]也允许回收。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Mining mode is a specialized pilot mode for [-][/c][c][00ff00]hover vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] equipped with [-][/c][c][00ff00]drill modules[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]It can be toggled with [-][/c][c][ffff00](Shift + O)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] (default hotkey).[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]While in mining mode, your hover vessel's position is locked in place unless you move it manually. It will not tilt or drift on its own even from gravity.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can rotate and climb nearly any incline.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Your rotational speed is greatly reduced.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your speed is limited to a maximum of 3m/s.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Your drills can be automatically enabled by tapping the fire button instead of having to hold down fire.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If you get too far away from a flat surface mining mode will deactivate.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]采矿模式是为装备有[-][/c][c][00ff00]钻探模块[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的[-][/c][c][00ff00]悬浮飞船[-][/c][c][abd1ff]设计的专门飞行员模式。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它可以通过[-][/c][c][ffff00](Shift + O)[-][/c][c][abd1ff](默认快捷键)切换。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]在采矿模式下,您的悬浮飞船位置会被锁定,除非您手动移动它。即使在重力作用下,它也不会自行倾斜或漂移。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以旋转并攀登几乎任何斜坡。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]您的旋转速度大大减少。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您的速度被限制在最大3米/秒。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您的钻头可以通过轻敲射击按钮而不是持续按住射击来自动启用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]无[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您离平坦表面太远,采矿模式将被停用。[-][/c]

English: Modulated Drills and Automated Drill Turrets
Chinese (simplified): 调制钻机和自动钻探炮塔

English: Modulated Drills and Automated Drill Turrets:
Chinese (simplified): 调制钻机和自动钻探炮塔:

English:
[c][abd1ff]Modulated drills and automated drill turrets are specialized tools used to mine [-][/c][c][00ff00]rich ice[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]rich asteroids[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be bought from traders or crafted in a constructor after learning the schematic.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]They come in multiple types and can be used in space on capital vessels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are usable only in space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]As the automated drill turrets can automatically fire it is recommended to use a full set of them for the fastest mining.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They do not operate while you are outside render range of your ship.[-][/c][c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Modulated Ice Harvester Drill:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These mounted drills are modulated to harvest dense ice and rich ice.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will have little effect on anything else.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Automated Ice Harvester Drill Turrets:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These are turrets that will automatically mine dense ice or rich ice.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They need their [-][/c][c][00ff00]targeting settings[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to be set up for NPC factions, bases, and warp drives.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This will allow them to target the rich ice.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Modulated Asteroid Harvester Drills:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These mounted drills are modulated to harvest rich asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require deuterium fuel cells to run.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They will have little effect on anything else.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Automated Asteroid Harvester Drill Turrets:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These are turrets that will automatically mine rich asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They need their [-][/c][c][00ff00]targeting settings[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to be set up for NPC factions, bases, and warp drives.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require deuterium fuel cells to run.[-][/c][c][abd1ff]
This will allow them to target the rich asteroids.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Asteroid Excavator Turret:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]These are large, industrial scale turrets that will automatically mine rich asteroids.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They need their [-][/c][c][00ff00]targeting settings[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to be set up for NPC factions, bases, and warp drives.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require deuterium fuel cells to run.[-][/c][c][abd1ff]
This will allow them to target the rich asteroids.[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]调制钻机和自动钻探炮塔是专门用来开采[-][/c][c][00ff00]富冰[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]富矿小行星[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的工具。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以从商人那里购买,或者在学会图纸后在建造机中制造。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们有多种类型,并且可以在太空中的主力舰上使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们只能在太空中使用。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]由于自动钻探炮塔可以自动开火,建议使用一整套它们进行最快的开采。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]当你不在船的渲染范围内时,它们不会操作。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]调制冰矿采集钻头:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些安装的钻头被调制用于采集高密度冰和富冰。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们对其他东西几乎没有效果。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]自动冰矿采集钻探炮塔:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些炮塔会自动开采高密度冰或富冰。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要设置[-][/c][c][00ff00]目标设置[-][/c][c][abd1ff],勾选NPC派系、基地和翘曲驱动器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这将使它们能够瞄准富冰。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]调制小行星采集钻头:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些安装的钻头被调制用于采集富矿小行星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要氘燃料电池来运行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们对其他东西几乎没有效果。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]自动小行星采集钻探炮塔:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些炮塔会自动开采富矿小行星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要设置[-][/c][c][00ff00]目标设置[-][/c][c][abd1ff],勾选NPC派系、基地和翘曲驱动器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要氘燃料电池来运行。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]
这将使它们能够瞄准富矿小行星。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]小行星挖掘机炮塔:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这些是大型的、工业规模的炮塔,将自动开采富矿小行星。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要设置[-][/c][c][00ff00]目标设置[-][/c][c][abd1ff],勾选NPC派系、基地和翘曲驱动器。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要氘燃料电池来运行。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]
这将使它们能够瞄准富矿小行星。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Rich ice asteroids are found in space sectors, typically in cold space [-][/c][c][00ff00]orbits[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or in [-][/c][c][00ff00]ice field[-][/c][c][abd1ff] sectors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rich ice asteroids do not show on the map info[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rich ice asteroids show on the map as a POI icon.
They can be discovered using a detector.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Dense ice asteroids are just a lower tier version of rich ice asteroids with lower yield.

They can only be harvested with [-][/c][c][00ff00]modulated drills[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]automated drill turrets[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To mine, drill with a modulated drill or automated drill turret until the asteroid completely breaks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once mined, they will regenerate after a time on servers if POI regeneration is enabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Placement depends on type of sector and galactic faction territory.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]富冰小行星可以在太空星区找到,通常位于寒冷的[-][/c][c][00ff00]轨道[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或在[-][/c][c][00ff00]冰原[-][/c][c][abd1ff]星区。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]富冰小行星在地图信息中不会显示。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]富冰小行星在地图上显示为兴趣点(POI)图标。
它们可以使用探测器发现。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]高密度冰小行星只是富冰小行星的低等级版本,产量较低。

它们只能使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]调制钻机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]自动钻探炮塔[-][/c][c][abd1ff]进行开采。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要开采,使用调制钻机或自动钻探炮塔钻探,直到小行星完全破碎。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]一旦开采,如果启用了兴趣点(POI)再生功能,它们将在服务器上经过一段时间后再生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]放置取决于星区的类型和银河派系领土。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Rich asteroids are found in space sectors or rarely orbits within a major faction's galactic territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rich asteroids do not show on the map info[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Rich asteroids show on the map as a POI icon.
They can be discovered using a detector.[-][/c][c][abd1ff]

They can only be harvested with [-][/c][c][00ff00]modulated drills[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]automated drill turrets[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To mine, drill with a modulated drill or automated drill turret until the asteroid completely breaks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once mined, they will regenerate after a time on servers if POI regeneration is enabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Placement depends on type of sector and galactic faction territory.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]富矿小行星可以在太空星区中找到,或很少情况下在主要派系的银河领土内的轨道上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]富矿小行星在地图信息中不会显示。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]无[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]富矿小行星在地图上显示为兴趣点(POI)图标。
它们可以使用探测器发现。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]

它们只能使用[-][/c][c][00ff00]调制钻机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]自动钻探炮塔[-][/c][c][abd1ff]进行开采。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]要开采,使用调制钻机或自动钻探炮塔钻探,直到小行星完全破碎。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]无[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦开采,如果启用了兴趣点(POI)再生功能,它们将在服务器上经过一段时间后再生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]放置取决于星区的类型和银河派系领土。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Pilot mode is an alternate control scheme for flying ships.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It can be toggled with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(ShiftModifier)} + {keybind(AutoBreak)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]While active, a circle will appear next to your crosshair.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can move this circle using the mouse.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See image to the right for an example.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
When the circle is near your crosshair your ship will fly straight ahead.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Moving the circle towards the edge of the screen will cause your ship to continually turn faster and faster in that direction the further away from the crosshair you move the circle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Using auto level [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(AutoRotate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] will recenter the circle on your crosshair.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Mounted weapons will still fire at your crosshair, not the circle.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Pilot mode is useful for turning large, slow moving ships without having to move your mouse so much.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It can be easy to accidentally hit this hotkey, so consider changing the hotkey for [-][/c][c][00ff00]auto brake[-][/c][c][abd1ff] it in the control panel.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]飞行员模式是飞船飞行的替代控制方案。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]可以通过[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(ShiftModifier)} + {keybind(AutoBreak)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来切换。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]激活时,准心旁边会出现一个圆圈。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以使用鼠标移动这个圆圈。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]见右侧图片示例。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
当圆圈靠近你的准心时,你的飞船将直线飞行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]将圆圈移向屏幕边缘将使你的飞船在那个方向上不断加速转弯,你将圆圈从准心移得越远,转弯速度越快。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用自动水平[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(AutoRotate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]会将圆圈重新定位到你的准心上。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]固定武器仍然会瞄准你的准心,而不是圆圈。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]飞行员模式适用于在不需要大幅度移动鼠标的情况下,转动大型、慢速移动的飞船。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]很容易不小心按下这个快捷键,所以考虑在控制面板中更改[-][/c][c][00ff00]自动刹车[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的快捷键。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Auto mining devices are specialized devices used for extracting resources from [-][/c][c][00ff00]underground deposits[-][/c][c][abd1ff] without depleting the deposit.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They cannot be placed on asteroids or on underground ore nugget deposits.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be crafted in [-][/c][c][00ff00]constructors[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and require [-][/c][c][00ff00]auto miner cores[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They come in multiple tiers with increased mining speeds and maximum yields per tier.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Place an auto mining device on top of an ore deposit and access it with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to bring up its interface.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not all ores can be auto mined.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Insert fuel into the fuel slots. Using the highest fuel will increase the run time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]On this window you can see details about how much ore per hour it will extract as well as the run time using the fuel given.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Auto mining devices can be left alone and will continue to run as long as the game is running.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]On a dedicated server they will continue to work while you are logged off.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]As they do not deplete deposits they are a source of renewable resources.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Each player may place only 1 auto mining device per deposit, but multiple players can each place their own.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Auto mining devices can be shared with your faction by checking the share with faction option in their interface.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are not attacked by NPCs and do not trigger base attacks.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]自动采矿设备是专门用于从[-][/c][c][00ff00]地下矿床[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中提取资源而不会耗尽矿床的设备。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们不能放置在小行星上或地下矿粒矿床中。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中制造,并且需要[-][/c][c][00ff00]自动采矿核心[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们有多个等级,每个等级的采矿速度和最大产量都会增加。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]将自动采矿设备放置在矿床上方,并通过[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(Activate)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]访问其界面。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不是所有矿石都可以自动开采。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]将燃料放入燃料槽中。使用最高等级的燃料可以增加运行时间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在这个窗口中,你可以看到它每小时将提取多少矿石以及使用给定燃料的运行时间的详细信息。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]只要游戏在运行,自动采矿设备就可以单独运行。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在专用服务器上,即使你离线,它们也会继续工作。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]由于它们不会耗尽矿床,它们是可再生资源的来源。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]每个玩家在每个矿床上只能放置1个自动采矿设备,但多个玩家可以各自放置他们自己的。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通过在其界面中勾选与派系共享选项,自动采矿设备可以与你的派系共享。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们不会被NPC攻击,也不会触发基地攻击。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Salvaging is breaking down ships or bases to retrieve raw materials or blocks.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There are 3 ways to salvage materials from a structure.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]If salvaging with a hand tool, harvested resources will be deposited into your personal inventory, or your [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected container[-][/c][c][abd1ff] if connected via [-][/c][c][00ff00]logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]If salvaging with a ship mounted tool, harvested resources will be deposited into your ship's [-][/c][c][00ff00]harvest controllers[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Salvage:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Using the salvage mode of a multitool to salvage blocks from a structure as raw components.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The percentage of components returned depends on the multitool used.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Useful as components take up less [-][/c][c][00ff00]volume[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and will save time when used for crafting.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Retrieve blocks:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Using the retrieve blocks mode of a multitool to retrieve intact blocks for use on your own structures, in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]factory[-][/c][c][abd1ff], or to be broken down in a [-][/c][c][00ff00]deconstructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Only works on structures you own that have a core. On unowned structures it will retrieve components like salvage mode, except with a small chance to pick up the whole block.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Useful as whole blocks can be placed in the factory or used in a [-][/c][c][00ff00]deconstructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to obtain 100% of the resources back but takes up a lot of volume.[-][/c]
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Structure collapse:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]By collapsing a base by taking out all its supports, you can pick up the debris that are dropped.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This has a lower yield than salvaging but can be a quick way to get large amounts of raw components.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Components will go into your personal inventory, or a connected container if connected via logistics.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]回收是分解飞船或基地以回收原材料或方块的过程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]有3种方法可以从结构中回收材料。[-][/c]


[c][abd1ff]如果使用手持工具进行回收,收获的资源将被存入您的个人背包,或者如果通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]连接,将存入您的[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接容器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果使用船载工具进行回收,收获的资源将被存入您的飞船的[-][/c][c][00ff00]收获控制器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]打捞:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用多用途工具的打捞模式从结构中拆解方块为原始零件。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]回收的零件百分比取决于所使用的多用途工具。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]由于零件占用的[-][/c][c][00ff00]体积[-][/c][c][abd1ff]较少,在用于制作时可以节省时间。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]拆解方块:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用多用途工具的拆解方块模式来回收完整的方块,以便在您自己的结构中使用,在[-][/c][c][00ff00]工厂[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中,或者在[-][/c][c][00ff00]解构器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中分解。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]只适用于您拥有并且有核心的建筑。在无主结构上,它将像打捞模式一样回收零件,只是有机会完整地拾取整个方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]由于整个方块可以放置在工厂中或在[-][/c][c][00ff00]解构器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中使用以100%回收资源,但占用大量体积。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]结构崩塌:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]通过移除所有支撑使基地崩塌,你可以拾取掉落的碎片。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这比回收的产量要低,但可以快速获得大量的原始零件。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]零件将进入您的个人背包,或者如果通过物流连接,将进入连接的容器。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The below sections will list the different salvaging tools available.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Salvaging tools can differ in their yield, speeds, and modes.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Capital vessel tools are only usable in space.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]以下部分将列出不同的可用回收工具。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]回收工具在产量、速度和模式上可能会有所不同。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]主力舰工具只能在太空中使用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The survival tool has a very basic salvage mode available. Change modes with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It can be crafted for free in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]suit constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It does not require any ammunition.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
It is suitable for grabbing a few materials off of a wreck but too slow for anything else.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]It can be used with the player drone [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]生存工具有一个非常基础的回收模式可用。使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来切换模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]宇航服建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中免费制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它不需要任何弹药。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它适合从残骸中获取一些材料,但对于其他用途来说太慢了。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它可以与玩家无人机[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]一起使用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Handheld multitools have salvage or retrieve blocks modes. Change modes with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be crafted in [-][/c][c][00ff00]constructors[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They require multi-charges.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Multitools are suitable for small to moderate scale salvage operations.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They come in 2 tiers, with increased salvage yield and speed per tier.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are vital tools for any building or repairs due to their various building modes accessible with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be used with the player drone [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]手持多用途工具具有回收或拾取方块模式。使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来切换模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中被制造。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们需要多次充能。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]多用途工具适用于小到中等规模的回收作业。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们有2个等级,每个等级的回收产量和速度都会提高。[-][/c]


[c][abd1ff]由于它们可以通过[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]访问各种建筑模式,它们是任何建筑或修复工作中不可或缺的工具。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以与玩家无人机[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PlayerDrone)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]一起使用。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Industrial multitools are a mounted repair and salvage tool available on small vessels. [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Change modes with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They can be crafted in [-][/c][c][00ff00]constructors[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]They only have repair or salvage modes available.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]As multiple can be used at the same time they are suitable for large scale salvaging operations.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]工业多用途工具是小型飞船上可用的固定式修复和回收工具。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来切换模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中被制造。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]它们只有修复或回收模式可用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]由于可以同时使用多个,它们适合于大规模的回收作业。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]This is a specialized type of manual turret usable on hover vessels and capital vessels that allows you to salvage, retrieve blocks, and repair.[-][/c][c][abd1ff] Change modes with [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Must be manually controlled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Also allows for mining.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Salvaging and retrieve blocks modes fire an aoe in a cone, removing multiple blocks at a time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They are suitable for large scale salvaging operations.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]这是一种专用的手动炮塔,可用于悬浮飞船和主力舰,它允许你进行回收、拾取方块以及修复。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]使用[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(SecondaryAction)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来切换模式。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]必须手动控制。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]也允许进行采矿。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]回收和拾取方块模式会发射一个锥形区域内的区域效果(AoE),一次可以移除多个方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]它们适用于大规模的回收作业。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]There are several mining missions you can find out in the galaxy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Mining Contracts:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can obtain mining contracts from [-][/c][c][00ff00]distribution centers[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in [-][/c][c][00ff00]trading station sectors[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or from Polaris orbital refineries.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Mining contracts ask you to mine a certain number of blocks from resource asteroids in space.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]They do not need you to turn in any ore and are essentially free money and reputation.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Mining Sites:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Mining sites[-][/c][c][abd1ff] can be found in star systems in neutral territory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will be tasked with mining a specific type of ore or crystal to help a faction and can be a good source of money and reputation.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Trader Missions:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Some traders will ask for mineable resources.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]While not exactly a mining mission, mining can help you obtain these resources.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]在银河中你可以找到几种采矿任务。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]采矿合同:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以从[-][/c][c][00ff00]贸易空间站星区(trading station sectors)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的[-][/c][c][00ff00]配送中心(distribution centers)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或 极星轨道精炼厂(orbital refineries) 获得采矿合同。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]采矿合同要求你从太空中的资源小行星上开采一定数量的方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你不需要上交任何矿石,这基本上是免费的金钱和声望。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]采矿区域:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]采矿区域[-][/c][c][abd1ff]可以在中立领土的恒星系统中找到。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你将被要求开采特定类型的矿石或晶体以帮助某个派系,这可以是一个良好的金钱和声望来源。[-][/c]

[c][00afff]商人任务:[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一些商人会要求可开采的资源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]虽然这不完全是采矿任务,但采矿可以帮助你获得这些资源。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]You can sometimes obtain resources by mining certain types of terrain on a planet.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You might even get lucky with a layer of ore in some types of biome.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The terrain will depend on the biome and planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]有时,你可以通过在星球上开采某些类型的地形来获取资源。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在某些类型的生物群落中,你甚至可能幸运地得到一层矿石。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]地形将取决于生物群落和星球。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Galaxy map tips:[/b][-][/c]
Use the standard movement keys ([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c]) while holding down [c][ffff00]Left Click[-][/c] to move the camera.
Holding [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] speeds up camera speed.
Use the [c][00ff00]Search System[-][/c] box at the bottom to search by star or playfield name or by star type.
Various filters and a help menu can be accessed with the buttons in the upper left. Press the ? icon for more information.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]星系地图技巧:[/b][-][/c]
在按住[c][ffff00]鼠标左键[-][/c]的同时,使用标准移动键([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c])来移动摄像头。
按住[c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c]可以加快摄像头速度。
使用底部的[c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c]框,可以通过恒星或场地名称或恒星类型进行搜索。
可以通过左上角的按钮访问各种过滤器和帮助菜单。点击?图标获取更多信息。

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, a reminder that it is important to use blueprints that are compatible with Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Blueprints designed for vanilla or Reforged Eden 1 may not work very well.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Role specific ships may work better than trying to make a ship that can do everything.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A mining ship won't be that good at combat and a combat ship won't be that good at mining.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Use the right tool for the job.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]After completing a blueprint in the factory it will be available to spawn at the top of the Blueprint Library list.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Consider checking the Steam Workshop for blueprints if you are not comfortable making your own.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the blueprint factory or any other subject, [-][/c][c][abd1ff]you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Press the [-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] icon in the upper right corner to view a help screen.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官，提醒您务必使用与Reforged Eden 2兼容的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为原版或Reforged Eden 1设计的蓝图可能无法很好地工作。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用针对特定功能的舰船可能比尝试制造一艘全能舰船效果更好。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]采矿船在战斗中表现不会太好，而战斗舰船在采矿方面也不会很出色。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]针对任务使用合适的工具。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在工厂中完成蓝图后，它将出现在蓝图库列表的顶部以供生成。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您不擅长制作自己的蓝图，可以考虑查看Steam创意工坊。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要关于蓝图工厂或任何其他主题的复习资料，[-][/c][c][abd1ff]您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到相关信息，[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]按右上角的[-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]图标可以查看帮助界面。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, a reminder that it is important to use blueprints that are compatible with Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Blueprints designed for vanilla or Reforged Eden 1 may not work very well.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Role specific ships may work better than trying to make a ship that can do everything.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A mining ship won't be that good at combat and a combat ship won't be that good at mining.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Use the right tool for the job.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]After completing a blueprint in the factory it will be available to spawn at the top of the Blueprint Library list.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Consider checking the Steam Workshop for blueprints if you are not comfortable making your own.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the blueprint factory or any other subject, [-][/c][c][abd1ff]you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Press the [-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] icon in the upper right corner to view a help screen.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官，提醒您务必使用与Reforged Eden 2兼容的蓝图。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]为原版或Reforged Eden 1设计的蓝图可能无法很好地工作。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用针对特定功能的舰船可能比尝试制造一艘全能舰船效果更好。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]采矿船在战斗中表现不会太好，而战斗舰船在采矿方面也不会很出色。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]针对任务使用合适的工具。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]在工厂中完成蓝图后，它将出现在蓝图库列表的顶部以供生成。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]如果您不擅长制作自己的蓝图，可以考虑查看Steam创意工坊。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要关于蓝图工厂或任何其他主题的复习资料，[-][/c][c][abd1ff]您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到相关信息，[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]按右上角的[-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]图标可以查看帮助界面。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, I will remind you that the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Large Constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is too large to fit in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will need to use the logistics system to place this device using the [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the logistics system or any other subject you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]您需要使用物流系统通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]放置这个设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要复习物流系统或其他任何主题,您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到,位于[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]部分。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Galaxy map tips:[/b][-][/c]
Use the standard movement keys ([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c]) while holding down [c][ffff00]Left Click[-][/c] to move the camera.
Holding [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] speeds up camera speed.
Use the [c][00ff00]Search System[-][/c] box at the bottom to search by star or playfield name or by star type.
Various filters and a help menu can be accessed with the buttons in the upper left. Press the ? icon for more information.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]星系地图提示:[/b][-][/c]
使用标准移动键([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c])同时按住 [c][ffff00]左键点击[-][/c] 来移动摄像机。
按住 [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] 可以加快摄像机速度。
使用底部的 [c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c] 框,可以通过恒星或游戏场地名称或恒星类型进行搜索。
可以通过左上角的按钮访问各种过滤器和帮助菜单。按 ? 图标获取更多信息。

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, [-][/c][c][00ff00]quantum CPU extenders[-][/c][c][abd1ff] are high end devices that require a significant number of quantum processors to craft.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]While you can obtain small numbers from some sources it will take much longer than going after more difficult targets that give more quantum processors.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can also use auxiliary CPU extenders which are an alternative and can be used alongside quantum CPU extenders.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can find information on the CPU system and how to obtain quantum processors and other components in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):

[c][ffff00][-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]虽然你可以从一些来源获得少量,但这将比追求更困难的目标,以获得更多的量子处理器要花费更长的时间。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你也可以使用辅助CPU扩展器,这是另一种选择,可以与量子CPU扩展器一起使用。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到关于CPU系统的信息,以及如何获得量子处理器和其他组件。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, [-][/c][c][00ff00]jump drives[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]warp drives[-][/c][c][abd1ff] are used to visit other [-][/c][c][00ff00]planets[-][/c][c][abd1ff] or [-][/c][c][00ff00]sectors[-][/c][c][abd1ff] using refined pentaxid.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Jump drives are devices for [-][/c][c][00ff00]small vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] that can travel to other planets and sectors within the same [-][/c][c][00ff00]star system[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is an advanced version that can go to other star systems.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Warp drives are devices for [-][/c][c][00ff00]capital vessels[-][/c][c][abd1ff] that can travel to other star systems.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is an advanced version with improved range and pentaxid efficiency.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Check the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] for more information on propulsion systems and navigation as well as hints on where to find resources to progress.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,[-][/c][c][00ff00]跳跃驱动器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]和[-][/c][c][00ff00]翘曲驱动器[-][/c][c][abd1ff]是用来使用精炼翘曲水晶访问其他[-][/c][c][00ff00]星球[-][/c][c][abd1ff]或[-][/c][c][00ff00]星区[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]有一个更高级的版本,具有更远的航程和翘曲水晶效率。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, I will remind you that the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Large Constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is too large to fit in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will need to use the logistics system to place this device using the [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the logistics system or any other subject you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,我会提醒您,[-][/c][c][00ff00]大型建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]体积过大,无法放入您的个人背包。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您需要使用物流系统,通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来放置这个设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要物流系统或其他任何主题的复习,您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]下找到,位于[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Galaxy map tips:[/b][-][/c]
Use the standard movement keys ([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c]) while holding down [c][ffff00]Left Click[-][/c] to move the camera.
Holding [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] speeds up camera speed.
Use the [c][00ff00]Search System[-][/c] box at the bottom to search by star or playfield name or by star type.
Various filters and a help menu can be accessed with the buttons in the upper left. Press the ? icon for more information.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]星系地图提示:[/b][-][/c]
使用标准移动键([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c])同时按住 [c][ffff00]左键点击[-][/c] 来移动摄像机。
按住 [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] 可以加快摄像机速度。
使用底部的 [c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c] 框,可以通过恒星或游戏场地名称或恒星类型进行搜索。
可以通过左上角的按钮访问各种过滤器和帮助菜单。按 ? 图标获取更多信息。

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, this window lists every [-][/c][c][00ff00]faction[-][/c][c][abd1ff] with a [-][/c][c][00ff00]reputation[-][/c][c][abd1ff] that you have discovered so far.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Factions that you have not encountered will not show up here.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Factions each have activities that can increase or decrease your reputation level, varying per faction.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Attacking one faction may also increase or decrease your reputation with other factions.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Not every faction has a reputation that you can change. Some will always be hostile or always be friendly.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This window is also where you can apply for or leave a [-][/c][c][00ff00]player created faction[-][/c][c][abd1ff].

You can find explanations on factions and reputations [-][/c][c][abd1ff]in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,这个窗口列出了你迄今为止发现的每一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]派系[-][/c][c][abd1ff]及其[-][/c][c][00ff00]声誉[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你尚未遇到的派系将不会出现在这里。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个派系都有活动,可以增加或减少你的声誉等级,每个派系各不相同。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]攻击一个派系也可能增加或减少你与其他派系的声誉。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]并非每个派系都有你可以改变的声誉。有些将永远敌对或永远友好。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这个窗口也是你可以申请加入或离开[-][/c][c][00ff00]玩家创建的派系[-][/c][c][abd1ff]的地方。

你可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]找到关于派系和声誉的解释。[-][/c]

[c][00ffff]Difficulty: [-][/c][c][ffff00]Medium[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]The captain of a UCH research vessel has given you the task of getting revenge on the Zirax that attacked the UCH fleet.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]To complete these objectives, you must personally kill a number of Zirax troops.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This mission can be deactivated. It can be resumed by activating the Project Eden Mission Manager.[-][/c]{BarSmall_Requirements.png}[c][abd1ff]Recommended medium armor with basic hand weapons.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]A well stocked medical bay.[-][/c][c][abd1ff]
Must personally land the killing blow to receive credit.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]1 [-][/c][c][ff00ff]Ultra Rare Alien Cache[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]2-4 [-][/c][c][ffffff]Plasma Converter[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]100,000 [-][/c][c][ffffff]Credits[-][/c]

[c][00ffff]难度:[-][/c][c][ffff00]中等[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]为了完成这些目标,你必须亲自击杀一定数量的兹瑞克斯部队。[-][/c]

必须亲自给予致命一击才能获得信用币。[-][/c]
{BarSmall_Rewards.png}[c][abd1ff]1 [-][/c][c][ff0000]非常稀有外星物资[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]2-4 [-][/c][c][ffffff]等离子转换器[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]100,000 [-][/c][c][ffffff]信用点[-][/c]
兹瑞克斯指挥官被击杀

English: Kill Zirax commanders.\nCommanders do not have to be Zirax faction to count.
Chinese (simplified): 击杀兹瑞克斯指挥官。\n指挥官不必是兹瑞克斯派系才能算数。

English: The captain of a UCH research vessel has given you the task of clearing out abandoned legacy infected structures.\nThis mission can be deactivated. It can be resumed by activating the Project Eden Mission Manager.
Chinese (simplified): 一艘UCH研究船的船长给了你清除废弃遗留者感染结构的任务。\n这个任务可以被停用。可以通过激活伊甸园计划任务管理器来恢复。
消灭遗留者感染的生物

English: Kill Legacy infected troops..\nNot all troops found inside abandoned structures will count towards this objective.
Chinese (simplified): 击杀遗留者感染的部队。\n并非所有在废弃结构内发现的部队都会算作此目标。

English: Connect to a cargo container via logistics
Connect to a cargo container with plenty of free space and then complete mission by opening the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 连接到一个有足够空闲空间的货柜,然后通过打开PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 完成任务。

English: You have finished cleansing the Legacy infection.\nConnect to a cargo container with plenty of free space and then complete mission by opening the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 你已经完成了清除遗留者感染的任务。\n连接到一个有足够空闲空间的货柜,然后通过打开PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 完成任务。

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, that Zirax space station has considerable firepower and a strong shield.\nI recommend reviewing the [c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c] section of the [c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] before you get much closer.

English: [c][ffff00]WARNING:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]Approaching Zirax Drone base.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Shields and heavy weapons detected. Threat level high.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]警告:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]接近兹瑞克斯无人机基地。[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]检测到护盾和重型武器。威胁等级高。[-][/c]

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, that Zirax space station has considerable firepower and a strong shield.\nI recommend reviewing the [c][00ff00]Combat[-][/c] section of the [c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] before you get much closer.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官,那个兹瑞克斯空间站拥有相当大的火力和强大的护盾。\n我建议在靠近之前,先查看一下 [c][00ff00]战斗[-][/c] 部分的 [c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]。

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Galaxy map tips:[/b][-][/c]
Use the standard movement keys ([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c]) while holding down [c][ffff00]Left Click[-][/c] to move the camera.
Holding [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] speeds up camera speed.
Use the [c][00ff00]Search System[-][/c] box at the bottom to search by star or playfield name or by star type.
Various filters and a help menu can be accessed with the buttons in the upper left. Press the ? icon for more information.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]银河地图提示:[/b][-][/c]
使用标准移动键([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c])同时按住 [c][ffff00]左键点击[-][/c] 来移动镜头。
按住 [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] 加快速度。
使用底部的 [c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c] 框按星体或游戏场地名称或按星体类型搜索。
可以通过左上角的按钮访问各种过滤器和帮助菜单。按下 ? 图标以获取更多信息。

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, you just unlocked a device that requires [-][/c][c][00ff00]Robotics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to craft.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]You can find where to obtain Robotics and other rare components in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] under [-][/c][c][ff8000]Resources and Components[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]你可以在 [-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 下的 [-][/c][c][ff8000]资源和组件[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 中找到如何获得机器人技术和其他稀有组件。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, I will remind you that the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Large Constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is too large to fit in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will need to use the logistics system to place this device using the [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the logistics system or any other subject you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,我提醒你 [-][/c][c][00ff00]大型建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 太大,无法放入你的个人库存中。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你需要使用物流系统通过 [-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 来放置这个设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果你需要物流系统或其他任何主题的复习,你可以在 [-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 下的 [-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 中找到。[-][/c]

Use the standard movement keys ([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c]) while holding down [c][ffff00]Left Click[-][/c] to move the camera.

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, I noticed you have begun to craft a Base Starter block.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This planet has an active [-][/c][c][00ff00]Drone Base[-][/c][c][abd1ff] belonging to the Zirax Empire.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once you place a base on this planet it may be detected and they may send siege drones and troop transports to attack your base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You should prepare to defend your new base either by arming it with gatling turrets or having an armed vessel to defend your new base with. [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Hand weapons such as a sniper rifle or rocket launcher can be used in a pinch if you have no other means of defense.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You may want to consider waiting to place down a base until you are prepared to defend it, or utilize the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Blueprint Factory[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to place down a base already armed with turrets to defend itself with.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
The more powerful your base is, the more troops and drones they will send to assault it each time.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Base attacks can only happen every few days but sleeping in a bed will make the next base attack happen sooner.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can view the base attack statistics in the control panel of your base.

If you need more information on base attacks or any other subject, [-][/c][c][abd1ff]check the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,我注意到你已经开始制作基础建筑方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这个星球有一个活跃的 [-][/c][c][00ff00]无人机基地[-][/c][c][abd1ff],属于兹瑞克斯帝国。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦你在这颗星球上放置基地,它可能会被探测到,他们可能会派遣围攻无人机和运兵船来攻击你的基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你应该准备通过装备加特林炮塔或拥有武装飞船来保卫你的新基地。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]如果别无他法,可以使用狙击步枪或火箭发射器等手持武器作为紧急防御手段。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可能需要考虑等到准备好防御后再放置基地,或者利用 [-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图工厂[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 放置一个已经装备了炮塔的基地来自卫。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你的基地越强大,他们每次攻击时就会派遣更多的部队和无人机。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]基地攻击可能每隔几天才会发生,但在床上睡觉会使下一次基地攻击更快发生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你可以在基地的控制面板中查看基地攻击统计数据。

如果你需要更多关于基地攻击或其他主题的信息,[-][/c][c][abd1ff]请查看[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, I noticed you have begun to craft a Base Starter block.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This planet has an active [-][/c][c][00ff00]Drone Base[-][/c][c][abd1ff] belonging to the Zirax Empire.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once you place a base on this planet it may be detected and they may send siege drones and troop transports to attack your base.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You should prepare to defend your new base either by arming it with gatling turrets or having an armed vessel to defend your new base with. [-][/c][c][abd1ff]Hand weapons such as a sniper rifle or rocket launcher can be used in a pinch if you have no other means of defense.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You may want to consider waiting to place down a base until you are prepared to defend it, or utilize the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Blueprint Factory[-][/c][c][abd1ff] to place down a base already armed with turrets to defend itself with.[-][/c]

The more powerful your base is, the more troops and drones they will send to assault it each time.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,我注意到您已经开始制作基地起始方块。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]这个星球有一个活跃的[-][/c][c][00ff00]无人机基地[-][/c][c][abd1ff],属于兹瑞克斯帝国。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦您在这个星球上放置基地,它可能会被探测到,他们可能会派遣围攻无人机和运兵船来攻击您的基地。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您应该准备通过装备加特林炮塔或拥有武装飞船来保卫您的新基地。[-][/c][c][abd1ff]如果没有其他防御手段,可以使用狙击步枪或火箭发射器等手持武器作为应急措施。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可能需要考虑等到准备好防御后再放置基地,或者利用[-][/c][c][00ff00]蓝图工厂[-][/c][c][abd1ff]放置一个已经装备了炮塔的基地来自卫。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您的基地越强大,他们每次攻击时派遣的部队和无人机就越多。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]基地攻击只能每隔几天发生一次,但在床上睡觉会使下一次基地攻击更快发生。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您可以在基地的控制面板中查看基地攻击统计数据。

如果您需要更多关于基地攻击或其他任何主题的信息,[-][/c][c][abd1ff]请查看[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]

[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,我提醒您,[-][/c][c][00ff00]大型建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]体积过大,无法放入您的个人背包。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您需要使用物流系统通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来放置这个设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要物流系统或其他任何主题的复习,您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]下找到[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
触发:遗留者树突细胞分裂

English: Wait for the menu to come up.
[c][abd1ff]This is a trigger for disabling the tutorials.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]这是一个禁用教程的触发器。[-][/c]

English: Most Project Eden tutorial messages have been disabled.\nYou can still access all information at any time in the Empyriopedia.\nThis action cannot be undone.
Chinese (simplified): 大多数伊甸园计划教程信息已被禁用。\n您仍然可以随时在Empyriopedia中访问所有信息。\n此操作无法撤销。
触发:遗留者噬菌体产生

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]

Commander, I am detecting numerous alien signals from within the Sea of Silence. The entire region appears to be controlled by The Legacy.

I have only limited information in my data banks about this region of space and I may not be able to warn you ahead of time of any danger.
It's highly likely you will face Legacy constructs that are unlike anything we've encountered before.

If you continue you may risk the complete destruction of your ship. I advise turning back while you still can.
Or continue, if you want, but I will say I told you so when you respawn in your clone chamber after suffering some horrible fate.

Unfortunately I don't think even the [c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] can help you this time.
If you choose to continue, you'll be on your own. Don't say I didn't warn you.

Good luck, Commander. You're going to need it.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]

指挥官,我检测到来自沉默之海的众多外星信号。整个区域似乎被遗留者控制。

我的数据库中关于这个太空区域的信息有限,我可能无法提前警告您任何危险。

您很可能会面对与我们之前遇到的任何构造都不同的遗留者构造。

如果您继续前进,可能会冒着您的飞船被完全摧毁的风险。我建议您在还来得及的时候回头。
或者,如果您愿意,可以继续前进,但当您在遭受可怕命运后在克隆室重生时,我会说我告诉过您。

不幸的是,我认为即使是[c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]这次也无法帮助您。
如果您选择继续,您将独自一人。别说我没警告过您。

祝您好运,指挥官。您将需要它。

English: [i]You have entered the Sea of Silence.[/i]\n[i]While here you are at extreme risk of being attacked while inside any sector that has a Legacy presence.[/i]\n[i]This place is not for you.[/i]
Chinese (simplified): [i]您已进入沉默之海。[/i]\n[i]在这里,您在任何有遗留者存在的星区内都极易受到攻击。[/i]\n[i]这个地方不适合您。[/i]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]

Commander, I am detecting numerous alien signals from within the Sea of Silence. The entire region appears to be controlled by The Legacy.

I have only limited information in my data banks about this region of space and I may not be able to warn you ahead of time of any danger.
It's highly likely you will face Legacy constructs that are unlike anything we've encountered before.

If you continue you may risk the complete destruction of your ship. I advise turning back while you still can.
Or continue, if you want, but I will say I told you so when you respawn in your clone chamber after suffering some horrible fate.

Unfortunately I don't think even the [c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] can help you this time.
If you choose to continue, you'll be on your own. Don't say I didn't warn you.

Good luck, Commander. You're going to need it.

[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]

我的数据库中关于这个太空区域的信息有限,我可能无法提前警告您任何危险。

您很可能会面对与我们之前遇到的任何构造都不同的遗留者构造。

如果您继续前进,可能会冒着您的飞船被完全摧毁的风险。我建议您在还来得及的时候回头。
或者,如果您愿意,可以继续前进,但当您在遭受可怕命运后在克隆室重生时,我会说我告诉过您。

不幸的是,我认为即使是[c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c] [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]这次也无法帮助您。
如果您选择继续,您将独自一人。别说我没警告过您。

English:
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Clicking a link in the table of contents will open your Steam Overlay web browser to an external searchable Empyriopedia page on the Empyrion Buddy site.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Internet access and Steam Overlay required for using in-game links.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This table of contents will also work from within Empyrion Buddy to take you directly to the linked page.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You can also access Empyrion Buddy from any web browser allowing you to read and search the Empyriopedia while not in the game. Make sure to change the scenario from Vanilla to Reforged Eden 2 when using Empyrion Buddy.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See [-][/c][u][u][u][u][u][u][u][u][u][u][u][url=https://empyrionbuddy.com/][c][00afff]https://empyrionbuddy.com/[-][/c][/url][/u][/u][/u][/u][/u][/u][/u][/u][/u][/u][/u] [c][abd1ff]for more information.[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]"Empyrion Buddy is a companion application to Empyrion: Galactic Survival, a space survival game developed by Eleon Studios. Its purpose is to aid the players of the game into getting detailed information about the items of the game, along with their crafting recipes, which vendors to buy them from and where to find them. You can also find a complete web version of the game's Empyriopedia for easy off-game reading"[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[i][c][969696]Empyrion Buddy is not affiliated with Eleon or the Reforged Eden 2 creators.[-][/c][/i][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]点击目录中的链接将在您的Steam Overlay网页浏览器中打开Empyriopedia页面,该页面位于Empyrion Buddy网站上,可以进行搜索。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]使用游戏内链接需要互联网访问和Steam Overlay。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]从Empyrion Buddy内部也可以使用此目录,直接带您前往链接页面。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您还可以在任何网页浏览器中访问Empyrion Buddy,允许您在不玩游戏时阅读和搜索Empyriopedia。使用Empyrion Buddy时,请确保将情景从Vanilla更改为Reforged Eden 2。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]See [-][/c][u][url=https://empyrionbuddy.com/][c][00afff]https://empyrionbuddy.com/[-][/c][/url][/u][c][abd1ff]for more information.[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]“Empyrion Buddy是Empyrion: Galactic Survival的辅助应用程序,这是一款由Eleon Studios开发的空间生存游戏。它的目的是帮助游戏玩家获取关于游戏物品的详细信息,包括它们的制作配方、从哪些供应商购买以及在哪里找到它们。您还可以找到游戏Empyriopedia的完整网络版本,方便您在游戏之外阅读。”[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[i][c][969696]Empyrion Buddy与Eleon或Reforged Eden 2的创造者无关。[-][/c][/i][c][abd1ff][-][/c]
