English:
[c][00ffff][b]Galaxy map tips:[/b][-][/c]
Use the standard movement keys ([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c]) while holding down [c][ffff00]Left Click[-][/c] to move the camera.
Holding [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] speeds up camera speed.
Use the [c][00ff00]Search System[-][/c] box at the bottom to search by star or playfield name or by star type.
Various filters and a help menu can be accessed with the buttons in the upper left. Press the ? icon for more information.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]银河地图提示:[/b][-][/c]
使用标准移动键([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c])按住[c][ffff00]左键点击[-][/c]移动摄像头。
按住[c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c]加速摄像头速度。
使用底部的[c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c]框通过星名或游戏场地名或星型进行搜索。
可以通过左上角的按钮访问各种过滤器和帮助菜单。按下?图标获取更多信息。

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, be careful about teleporting to NPC controlled stations.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is no guarantee the teleporter on the other end will have enough range for a return trip.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most trading stations come equipped with only the standard station teleporter.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Teleporters use a large amount of power. I recommend using signal logic to keep it turned off when not in use.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the teleporters or any other subject, [-][/c][c][abd1ff]you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Press the [-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] icon in the upper right corner to view a help screen.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,传送到NPC控制的空间站时要小心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不能保证另一端的传送装置有足够的范围进行返回行程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数贸易空间站只配备了标准的站内传送装置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]传送装置使用大量的能量。我建议使用信号逻辑在不使用时将其关闭。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要传送装置或其他任何主题的复习,[-][/c][c][abd1ff]您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到,位于[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]按下右上角的[-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]图标查看帮助屏幕。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, be careful about teleporting to NPC controlled stations.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]There is no guarantee the teleporter on the other end will have enough range for a return trip.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Most trading stations come equipped with only the standard station teleporter.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Teleporters use a large amount of power. I recommend using signal logic to keep it turned off when not in use.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the teleporters or any other subject, [-][/c][c][abd1ff]you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Press the [-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff] icon in the upper right corner to view a help screen.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,传送到NPC控制的空间站时要小心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]不能保证另一端的传送装置有足够的范围进行返回行程。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]大多数贸易空间站只配备了标准的站内传送装置。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]传送装置使用大量的能量。我建议使用信号逻辑在不使用时将其关闭。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要传送装置或其他任何主题的复习,[-][/c][c][abd1ff]您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到,位于[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]按下右上角的[-][/c][c][ffff00](?)[-][/c][c][abd1ff]图标查看帮助屏幕。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, I will remind you that the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Large Constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is too large to fit in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will need to use the logistics system to place this device using the [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the logistics system or any other subject you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,我提醒您,[-][/c][c][00ff00]大型建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]太大了,无法放入您的个人物品栏。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]您需要使用物流系统通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]放置这个设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要物流系统或其他任何主题的复习,您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到,位于[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]下的[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
管理员核心保护已移除

English:
[c][ff0000]WARNING: MODIFIED SCENARIO CONFIGURATION FILES DETECTED.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]THE ADMIN CORE OF A MAIN STORY MISSION POI HAS BEEN DESTROYED.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]THIS IS NORMALLY NOT POSSIBLE AND IS A SIGN OF USING MODIFIED CONFIGURATION FILES OR ADMIN COMMANDS TO REMOVE ADMIN CORE PROTECTION.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]THE DEVELOPERS OF REFORGED EDEN 2 CANNOT ASSIST WITH ANY PROBLEMS ENCOUNTERED WHILE PLAYING THE CURRENT SAVE GAME.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]DO NOT SEEK ASSISTANCE FROM THE REFORGED EDEN 2 DEVELOPERS.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]CONTINUE TO PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000]警告:检测到修改过的场景配置文件。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]一个主线任务兴趣点的管理员核心已被摧毁。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]这通常是不可能的,是使用修改过的配置文件或管理员命令移除管理员核心保护的标志。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]重生伊甸园2的开发者无法协助解决在玩当前存档游戏时遇到的任何问题。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]不要寻求重生伊甸园2开发者的帮助。[-][/c]

[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, I will remind you that the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Large Constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is too large to fit in your personal inventory.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the logistics system or any other subject you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]您需要使用物流系统,通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来放置这个设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果您需要复习物流系统或其他任何主题,您可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]下找到[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
管理员核心保护已移除 2

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Galaxy map tips:[/b][-][/c]
Use the standard movement keys ([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c]) while holding down [c][ffff00]Left Click[-][/c] to move the camera.
Holding [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] speeds up camera speed.
Use the [c][00ff00]Search System[-][/c] box at the bottom to search by star or playfield name or by star type.
Various filters and a help menu can be accessed with the buttons in the upper left. Press the ? icon for more information.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]银河地图提示:[/b][-][/c]
使用标准移动键([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c])同时按住[c][ffff00]左键点击[-][/c]来移动摄像头。
按住[c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c]可以加快摄像头速度。
使用底部的[c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c]框,可以通过星星或游戏区域名称或星星类型进行搜索。
可以通过左上角的按钮访问各种过滤器和帮助菜单。按下?图标了解更多信息。

[c][abd1ff]3,000[-][/c][c][ffffff]声望[-][/c][c][abd1ff]，与[-][/c][c][00ffff]贸易联邦[-][/c]关系提升。

English: Travel to the asteroid field in the system of Trealt and find the Trade Federation executive.\nSearch the galaxy map to find it.
Chinese (simplified): 前往Trealt系统中的小行星场并找到贸易联合会的高管。\n搜索星系地图来找到它。

English: Open your galaxy map and use the search system function to search for a system by the name of Trealt.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的星系地图,使用搜索系统功能来搜索名为Trealt的系统。

English: Search for the [c][00ffff]Trealt[-][/c] system by using the [c][00ff00]Search system[-][/c] button at the bottom of the screen.\nType [c][00ffff]Trealt[-][/c] into the [c][ffffff]name[-][/c] field and select the search result called [c][00ffff]Trealt (Sun D)[-][/c].\nSelect [c][00ff00]Show On Map[-][/c] to find its location in the galaxy.
Chinese (simplified): 通过屏幕底部的 [c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c] 按钮搜索名为Trealt的系统。\n在 [c][ffffff]名称[-][/c] 字段中输入 [c][00ffff]Trealt[-][/c] 并选择搜索结果名为 [c][00ffff]Trealt (Sun D)[-][/c] 的结果。\n选择 [c][00ff00]在地图上显示[-][/c] 来找到它在星系中的位置。

English: Warp to the system of Trealt.\nYou can find Trealt by using the search function of your galaxy map.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲到Trealt系统。\n你可以通过使用你的星系地图的搜索功能找到Trealt。

English: This appears to be the right system.\nCheck the solar system map, there should be an asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): 这似乎是正确的系统。\n检查太阳系地图,应该有一个小型行星场。

English: Warp to the Trealt Asteroid Field in the system of Trealt.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲到Trealt系统中的Trealt小行星场。

English: The scanner picks up a small shuttle near the center of the asteroid field.\nThis must be the individual that sent the message.
Chinese (simplified): 扫描器在小行星场中心附近探测到一艘小型穿梭机。\n这一定是发送消息的个人。

English: Approach the Unregistered Shuttle in the Trealt Asteroid Field.
Chinese (simplified): 接近Trealt小行星场中的未注册穿梭机。

English: Approach the pilot of the Unmarked Shuttle in the Trealt Asteroid Field.
Chinese (simplified): 接近Trealt小行星场中的未标记穿梭机的飞行员。

English: Speak with the pilot on board the Unregistered Shuttle in the Trealt Asteroid Field.
Chinese (simplified): 在Trealt小行星场的未注册穿梭机上与飞行员交谈。

English: [c][00ffff][ Unregistered Shuttle ][-][/c]\nPlease speak to me on board my shuttle.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]未注册的穿梭机[-][/c]\n\n请到我的穿梭机上与我交谈。

English: Find an interesting sector in a BH, BH2, BH3, BH5, or BH6 system
Chinese (simplified): 在BH、BH2、BH3、BH5或BH6系统中找到一个有趣的星区

English: Warp to an interesting sector within black hole class star systems.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲到黑洞级恒星系统中一个有趣的星区。

English: Open your galaxy map and use the search system function to search for black hole systems.\nBlack hole systems can be of types:\n[c][ffffff]BH[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH2[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH3[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH5[-][/c], or [c][ffffff]BH6[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的星系地图,使用搜索系统功能来搜索黑洞系统。\n黑洞系统可以是以下类型:\n[c][ffffff]BH[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH2[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH3[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH5[-][/c], 或 [c][ffffff]BH6[-][/c]

English:
Find a nearby black hole system by using the [c][00ff00]Search system[-][/c] button at the bottom of the screen.
Type either [c][ffffff]BH[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH2[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH3[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH5[-][/c], or [c][ffffff]BH6[-][/c] into the [c][ffffff]Type[-][/c] field and select the nearest black hole system that is in neutral territory.
Select [c][00ff00]Show On Map[-][/c] to find its location in the galaxy.

[c][fafe10]Make sure you check black hole systems in neutral territory.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
通过屏幕底部的 [c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c] 按钮找到附近的黑洞系统。
在 [c][ffffff]类型[-][/c] 字段中输入 [c][ffffff]BH[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH2[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH3[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH5[-][/c], 或 [c][ffffff]BH6[-][/c],然后选择位于中立领土最近的黑洞系统。
选择 [c][00ff00]在地图上显示[-][/c] 来找到它在星系中的位置。

[c][fafe10]确保你检查位于中立领土的黑洞系统。[-][/c]

English: This eerie asteroid field looks out of place, even for exotic systems like black holes.\nI should carefully investigate and see if I can discover anything that doesn't belong.
Chinese (simplified): 这个诡异的小行星场看起来格格不入,即使是在黑洞这样的奇异系统中也是如此。\n我应该仔细调查,看看是否能够发现任何不属于这里的东西。

English: I need to search for a nearby black hole system.\nI can do this on the galaxy map by making use of the Search system function to search for type [c][ffffff]BH[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH2[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH3[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH5[-][/c], or [c][ffffff]BH6[-][/c] systems.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要寻找一个附近的黑洞系统。\n我可以通过使用星系地图上的搜索系统功能来搜索类型为 [c][ffffff]BH[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH2[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH3[-][/c], [c][ffffff]BH5[-][/c], 或 [c][ffffff]BH6[-][/c] 的系统。

English: Launch a High-Tech System Survey Probe
Chinese (simplified): 发射一个高科技系统探测探测器

English: Use your scanning station to launch a High-Tech System Survey Probe
Chinese (simplified): 使用你的扫描站发射一个高科技系统探测探测器

English: Access your scanning station on your ship.
Chinese (simplified): 访问你的飞船上的扫描站。

English: Wait for the scan to finish
[c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, that appears to be an object of Legacy construction.\nI recommend keeping a safe distance.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官,那看起来像是一个遗留者构造的物体。\n我建议保持安全距离。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nScan in progress.\nI recommend keeping a safe distance from the asteroid field while the probe is scanning.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n扫描进行中。\n我建议在探测器扫描时与小行星场保持安全距离。

English: [ IDA ]\nI recommend launching a High-Tech System Survey Probe using your scanning station.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n我建议使用你的扫描站发射一个高科技系统探测探测器。

English: Access your science station and select mission actions.
Chinese (simplified): 访问你的科研站并选择任务行动。

English: Open your galaxy map and use the search system function to search for a system by the name of The Bulwark.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的星系地图,使用搜索系统功能搜索名为The Bulwark的星系。

English: Search for [c][00ffff]The Bulwark[-][/c] system by using the [c][00ff00]Search system[-][/c] button at the bottom of the screen.\nType [c][00ffff]The Bulwark[-][/c] into the [c][ffffff]name[-][/c] field and select the search result called [c][00ffff]The Bulwark (Sun D)[-][/c].\nSelect [c][00ff00]Show On Map[-][/c] to find its location in the galaxy.
Chinese (simplified): 使用屏幕底部的[c][00ff00]搜索系统[-][/c]按钮搜索名为The Bulwark的星系。\n在[c][ffffff]名称[-][/c]字段中输入[c][00ffff]The Bulwark[-][/c]并选择搜索结果名为[c][00ffff]The Bulwark (Sun D)[-][/c]。\n选择[c][00ff00]在地图上显示[-][/c]以在星系中找到它的位置。

English: Warp to Observatory 27 in the system of The Bulkwark.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲到The Bulwark星系的观测站27。

English: Keep safe distance from asteroid field
Chinese (simplified): 与小行星场保持安全距离

English: Keep safe distance from asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): 与小行星场保持安全距离。

English: Find a safe location in the asteroid field
Chinese (simplified): 在小行星场中找到一个安全的位置

English: Fly to the safe location in the alien asteroid field in the black hole system.
Chinese (simplified): 飞向黑洞系统中外星小行星场中的安全位置。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, I am detecting unusual activity in this asteroid field. I recommend staying away from its center.\nI have marked a location on your HUD that appears to be relatively safe. Fly to the marker on your HUD while avoiding anything dangerous before you begin performing your scans.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官,我在这个小行星场检测到了不寻常的活动。我建议远离其中心。\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了一个相对安全的位置。在开始执行扫描之前,飞向你的HUD上的标记点,同时避开任何危险。

English: Fly to the gravimetric disturbance located on your HUD in the alien asteroid field in the black hole system.
Chinese (simplified): 飞向你的HUD上标记的位于黑洞系统中外星小行星场中的引力异常。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nI have marked the location of the gravimetric disturbance on your HUD.\nGet closer so I can identify it.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了引力异常的位置。\n靠近以便我能识别它。

English: Access your scanning station on your ship.
Chinese (simplified): 访问你的飞船上的扫描站。

English: Launch a High-Tech System Survey Probe
Chinese (simplified): 发射一个高科技系统探测探测器

English: Use your scanning station to launch a High-Tech System Survey Probe
Chinese (simplified): 使用你的扫描站发射一个高科技系统探测探测器

English: Wait for the scan to finish
[c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nI am performing the scan now. Please stand by.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n我现在正在执行扫描。请稍候。

English: Sit in pilot seat or control station
Sit down in the pilot seat or control station of your capital vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 坐在你的主力舰的驾驶座或控制站。

English: Overload the micro jump drive on board your capital vessel by opening the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 通过打开PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]来过载你的主力舰上的微型跳跃驱动器。
正在充电微型跳跃驱动器

English: Spooling up the micro jump drive.
Chinese (simplified): 微型跳跃驱动器启动中。

English: Shutting down the micro jump drive.
Keep safe distance from asteroid field
Chinese (simplified): 与小行星场保持安全距离

English: Keep safe distance from asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): 与小行星场保持安全距离。

English: Access your science station and select mission actions.
Chinese (simplified): 访问你的科研站并选择任务行动。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, the probe has finished its scans and has run out of power.\nYou can now review the probe data in your science station.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官,探测器已经完成了扫描并耗尽了电源。\n现在你可以在你的科研站审查探测器数据。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nYou will have to launch another High-Tech System Survey Probe using your scanning station.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n你将不得不使用你的扫描站发射另一个高科技系统探测探测器。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nFascinating. This is indeed a collapsed wormhole, microscopic in size.\nI have calculated a potential plan of action and have downloaded it to your science station for your review.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n太神奇了。这确实是一个微型的坍塌虫洞。\n我已经计算出了一个潜在的行动计划,并已将其下载到你的科研站供你审查。

English: Preparing to overload micro jump drive.
Chinese (simplified): 准备过载微型跳跃驱动器。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nTo start off, get in the pilot seat or control station of your capital vessel.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n首先,进入你的主力舰的驾驶座或控制站。

English: Access your science station and select mission actions to review probe data.
Chinese (simplified): 访问你的科学站并选择任务行动来审查探测器数据。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nIt worked. The wormhole re-opened and I have sent the probe on a course through it.\nIt should reach the other side any second now. Use your science station to see a live feed.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n成功了。虫洞重新打开,我已经让探测器沿着它航行。\n它应该随时到达另一边。使用你的科学站查看实时画面。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nWhen you are ready to begin, press [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] to start the process.\nStay in the pilot seat during the entire process.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n当你准备好开始时,按[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]开始这个过程。\n在整个过程中保持在飞行员座位上。

English: Fly closer to Observatory 27 located in The Bulwark system.
Chinese (simplified): 飞得更靠近位于堡垒系统内的观测站27。

English: [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\nI am detecting the observatory in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c]\n我检测到了本星区的天文台。

English: Speak with the Trade Federation Executive on board Observatory 27.
Chinese (simplified): 与观测站27上的贸易联邦行政官交谈。

English: [c][00ffff][ Federation Executive ][-][/c]\nAh, you have returned. I'm on board the observatory. Could use your assistance with a stubborn door.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 联邦行政官 ][-][/c]\n啊,你回来了。我在观测站上。一个顽固的门需要你的帮助。

English: Find the Executive on board Observatory 27.
Chinese (simplified): 在观测站27上找到行政官。
到达天线阿尔法控制台。

English: [c][00ffff][ Federation Executive ][-][/c]\nCareful! This corridor is used for power transfer and is normally shut down before anyone enters it.\nAll those electrical arcs will be dangerous.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 联邦行政官 ][-][/c]\n小心!这条走廊用于电力传输,通常在任何人进入之前都会关闭。\n所有这些电弧都将是危险的。

English: Continue your way through the station.
[c][00ffff][ Federation Executive ][-][/c]\nAh, there you go! You've reached the first control center.\nFind the main console and reroute power from antenna alpha.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 联邦执行官 ][-][/c]\n啊，你到了！你已经到达了第一个控制中心。\n找到主控台，将电源从天线alpha重新导向。

English: Reroute power using the control console.
Chinese (simplified): 使用控制台重新布线电源。

English: Reroute the power using the console.
Chinese (simplified): 使用控制台重新布线电源。

English:
[c][ff0000]You have just placed a POI only device that is not intended for player use.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000]Obtaining POI only devices is not possible in survival mode without console commands or modifications to the scenario or with use of 3rd party mods and the Reforged Eden 2 developers will be unable to offer any assistance or troubleshooting while playing.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000]If you are using console commands, you are responsible for using them responsibly.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]If you are using a modified version of RE2 or using 3rd party scripting mods, contact the authors of those mods for any and all support.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]If you are playing on a server, contact your server admin.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000]Please do not ask for any support or leave any feedback with the RE2 developers while playing with a modified scenario as they will be unable to offer any assistance.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ff0000]你刚刚放置了一个仅供POI使用的设备,这不是供玩家使用的。[-][/c]

[c][ff0000]在生存模式下,没有控制台命令或对场景的修改,或者使用第三方模组,是无法获得仅POI使用的设备的。在使用修改过的场景进行游戏时,Reforged Eden 2开发者将无法提供任何帮助或故障排除。[-][/c]

[c][ff0000]如果你使用控制台命令,你需要对其负责使用。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]如果你使用修改过的RE2版本或第三方脚本模组,请联系这些模组的作者以获得任何支持。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]如果你在服务器上游戏,请联系你的服务器管理员。[-][/c]

[c][ff0000]请不要在使用修改过的场景时向RE2开发者寻求任何支持或留下反馈,因为他们将无法提供任何帮助。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Commander, I will remind you that the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Large Constructor[-][/c][c][abd1ff] is too large to fit in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will need to use the logistics system to place this device using the [-][/c][c][00ff00]connected toolbar[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]If you need a refresher on the logistics system or any other subject you can find one in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff] under [-][/c][c][00ff00]Mechanics[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]Logistics[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]指挥官,我要提醒你,[-][/c][c][00ff00]大型建造机[-][/c][c][abd1ff]太大,无法放入你的个人库存。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]你需要使用物流系统通过[-][/c][c][00ff00]连接的工具栏[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来放置这个设备。[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]如果你需要复习物流系统或其他主题,你可以在[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][abd1ff]中找到相关信息[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][abd1ff]位于[-][/c][c][00ff00]机制[-][/c][c][abd1ff] - [-][/c][c][00ff00]物流[-][/c][c][abd1ff]下。[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00]You are playing using modified configs or 3rd party mods.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]This is not recommended and may negatively impact your game experience and cause issues.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]You will not be able to obtain support from the RE2 developers if something goes wrong.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00]你正在使用修改过的配置或第三方模组。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]不建议这样做,可能会对你的游戏体验产生负面影响并导致问题。[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]如果出现问题,你将无法从RE2开发者那里获得支持。[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]There are special upgraded cores you can place on your ship or base [-][/c][c][abd1ff]that increase the [-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU limit[-][/c][c][abd1ff] of the ship or base they are installed on.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Only one core may be installed on a structure, and you must first remove the existing core to install one as they directly replace your core.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Once placed, cores cannot be picked up whole. If retrieved with a multitool they will only return some of the components used to construct them, so only place them down once you are sure of their placement.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Advanced Cores can be crafted using [-][/c][c][00ff00]Data Cores[-][/c][c][abd1ff] obtained from high tier Zirax POIs and patrol vessels.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Quantum Cores can be crafted using materials obtained from the Legacy in the Sea of Silence. [-][/c][c][969696](not yet in)[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]有一些特殊的升级核心可以放置在你的飞船或基地上，[-][/c][c][abd1ff]它们可以增加所安装的飞船或基地的[-][/c][c][00ff00]CPU上限[-][/c][c][abd1ff]。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每个结构只能安装一个核心，必须先移除现有核心才能安装新的核心，因为它们会直接替换你的核心。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]一旦放置，核心无法完整拾取。如果使用多功能工具取回，它们只会返还部分构造时使用的组件，所以放置时要确保位置合适。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]高级核心可以通过使用从高级兹瑞克斯区域和巡逻飞船获得的[-][/c][c][00ff00]数据核心[-][/c][c][abd1ff]来制作。[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]量子核心可以通过使用在寂静之海从遗留者获得的材料来制作。[-][/c][c][969696](尚未实装)[-][/c]

English:
[c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c]
Exotic
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Source:[-][/c]
Can be looted in small quantities from high tier Zirax military structures and patrol vessels.
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]Notes:[-][/c]
Used in the construction of [c][00ff00]Advanced Cores[-][/c].

[c][c8c8c8]Proprietary Data Processing Core developed and utilized primarily by the Empire as an attempt to reproduce the Legacy's quantum computer technology.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c]
异域
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]来源:[-][/c]
可以从高等级兹瑞克斯军事结构和巡逻飞船中少量掠夺获得。
[c][00afff][-][/c]
[c][00afff]备注:[-][/c]
用于建造[c][00ff00]高级核心[-][/c]。

[c][c8c8c8]帝国开发并主要使用的专有数据处理核心，作为尝试复制遗留者量子计算机技术的一部分。[-][/c]

English: This is the Stage 0 > Stage 1 Colony Builder system and is not visible in-game, activating in the background upon completing the dialog checks for colony development.\nIf you do see this in-game, report it on the Reforged Eden 2 github as a bug with the steps used to produce/reproduce it so we can fix it.
Chinese (simplified): 这是阶段0 > 阶段1的殖民地建设系统，在游戏中不可见，会在完成殖民地发展的对话检查后在后台激活。\n如果你在游戏中看到了这个信息，请在Reforged Eden 2的github上报告此错误，并附上产生/重现此错误的步骤，以便我们修复。

English: [b][c][00ff00]This undeveloped colony has now been upgraded to Stage 1[-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]New tasks are now available[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][00ff00]这个未开发的殖民地现在已升级到阶段1[-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]新任务现在可用[-][/c]

English: [b][c][00ff00]You have successfully completed the construction of this Colony![-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Colonists may have additional tasks for you![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][00ff00]你已成功完成这个殖民地的建设！[-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]殖民者可能有额外的任务给你！[-][/c]

English: Wait for the construction to complete.
[c][00ffff][ Construction Foreman ][-][/c]\nGetting to work! Keep an eye on things in case that bandit ship shows up to start trouble while we work on building the mine!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][建筑工头][-][/c]\n开始工作！注意周围情况，以防海盗飞船在我们建造矿场时出现麻烦！

English: Destroy the core of the bandit patrol vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁海盗巡逻飞船的核心。

English: Finalize the construction at the console at the construction site.
Chinese (simplified): 在建筑工地的控制台上完成建造。

English: [c][00ffff][ Construction Foreman ][-][/c]\nGood job keeping those bandits away from us! Now that the mine is operational you better head back to the surveyor and report in assuming you finished everything they asked you to do. I'm sure you're eager for your paycheck.\nAlso check in with the miners before you go, they might need some further assistance.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][建筑工头][-][/c]\n干得好，赶走了那些强盗！现在矿场已经运转，你最好回到勘测员那里汇报，假设你已经完成了他们要求你做的所有事情。我相信你很期待你的薪水。\n在离开前也和矿工们确认一下，他们可能需要进一步的帮助。

English: [c][ff0000][ Bandit Captain ][-][/c]\nThese supplies are ours! Take everything, boys!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][ 强盗头领 ][-][/c]\n这些物资是我们的！兄弟们，全部拿走！

English: [c][00ffff][ Construction Foreman ][-][/c]\nThank you for dealing with the pests.\nNow use the console at the construction site to finalize the construction process.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][建筑工头][-][/c]\n谢谢你处理了那些害虫。\n现在使用施工现场的控制台来完成施工过程。

English: Kill Silica Limax on Crystal Desert class planets.\nYou can find Silica Limax typically in the Canyon or Crystal Basin biomes. You can find more during the night.\nThey appear as a slow moving orange crystalline lifeform crawling along the surface.
Chinese (simplified): 在水晶沙漠类星球上击杀硅土蛞蝓。\n你通常可以在峡谷或水晶盆地生物群落中找到硅土蛞蝓。夜晚时你能找到更多。\n它们看起来像缓慢移动的橙色水晶生物，在表面爬行。

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Surveyor ][-][/c]\nYou are looking for Silica Limax. Find them in the Canyon or Crystal Basin biomes on this planet.\nReturn to me once you've thinned their numbers.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 极星勘测员 ][-][/c]\n你在寻找硅土蛞蝓。你可以在这个星球的峡谷或水晶盆地生物群落中找到它们。\n当你减少了它们的数量后，回来找我。

English: Speak with the Polaris Surveyor on his Survey Vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 与他的勘测船上的极星勘测员交谈。

English: Return to the Polaris Survey Vessel on Crystal Desert class planets.
Chinese (simplified): 返回水晶沙漠类星球的极星勘测船。

English: [c][00ffff][ Polaris Surveyor ][-][/c]\nYou are looking for Silica Limax. Find them in the Canyon or Crystal Basin biomes on this planet.\nReturn to me once you've thinned their numbers.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ 极星勘测员 ][-][/c]\n你在寻找硅土蛞蝓。你可以在这个星球的峡谷或水晶盆地生物群落中找到它们。\n当你减少了它们的数量后，回来找我。

English: I've probably killed enough of these creatures now.\nI should return to the Polaris Survey Vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 我已经杀了足够多的这些生物了。\n我应该返回极星勘测船。

English: This sector seems completely void of any matter or energy, yet there are short range radio transmissions being picked up.
Chinese (simplified): 这个星区似乎完全没有物质或能量，但有短距离的无线电传输被接收到。

English: This briefing can be reviewed in the PDA log under [c][00ffc6]Exploration Site[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 此简报可以在PDA日志中的[c][00ffc6]探索站点[-][/c]下查看。

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nThis sector seems completely void of any matter or energy, yet there are short range radio transmissions being picked up.\nI recommend performing scans using your scanning station. Access your scanning station and select perform narrow band scan to continue.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n这个星区似乎完全没有物质或能量，但有短距离的无线电传输被接收到。\n我建议使用你的扫描站进行扫描。访问你的扫描站并选择执行窄带扫描以继续。

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nThis sector seems completely void of any matter or energy, yet there are short range radio transmissions being picked up.\nI recommend performing scans using your scanning station. Access your scanning station and select perform narrow band scan to continue.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n这个星区似乎完全没有物质或能量，但有短距离的无线电传输被接收到。\n我建议使用你的扫描站进行扫描。访问你的扫描站并选择执行窄带扫描以继续。
探索T4_1 - 黑暗中的幽灵

English: Access your scanning station on board your ship and perform a narrow band scan.
Chinese (simplified): 访问你飞船上的扫描站并执行窄带扫描。

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nI have now calibrated your scanning station for scanning this sector.\nAccess it and perform a [c][ff00ff]narrow band scan[-][/c] to continue.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n我已完成本星区扫描站的校准。\n访问它并执行[c][ff00ff]窄带扫描[-][/c]以继续。
正在停用当前激活的任务章节。

English: Find the source of the first signal.

[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, your probe has located one of the sources of the radio transmissions. The signal appears to be Colonists in origin.\nI have marked the location on your HUD. Approach the source of the signal.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官，你的探测器已经定位了一个无线电传输的来源。信号似乎是殖民者发出的。\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了位置。接近信号源。

English: [c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, you have located one of the sources of the radio transmissions.\nI have marked the location on your HUD. Approach the source of the signal.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官，你已定位到一个无线电传输的来源。\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了位置。接近信号源。

English: Find the source of the first signal.
Wait for IDA to scan the area
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nI am currently scanning the area. \nStand by.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n我正在扫描区域。\n请等待。

English: Access your scanning station on board your ship and perform a narrow band scan.
Chinese (simplified): 进入你飞船上的扫描站并执行窄带扫描。

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, you have found a second source of radio transmissions. This one appears to be Polaris.\nI have marked the location on your HUD. Approach the source of the signal.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官，你找到了第二个无线电信号源。这个信号似乎是极星的。\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了位置。接近信号源。

English: Find the source of the second signal.
[c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, you have located one of the sources of the radio transmissions.\nI have marked the location on your HUD. Approach the source of the signal.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官，你已经定位到了无线电传输的一个信号源。\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了位置。接近信号源。

English: Find the source of the second signal.
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nI am currently scanning the area. \nStand by.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n我正在扫描区域。\n请稍等。

English: Wait for IDA to scan the area
Access your scanning station on board your ship and perform a narrow band scan.
Chinese (simplified): 进入你飞船上的扫描站并执行窄带扫描。

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nThis is the third radio source in this sector. This one appears to be using Pirate code. Caution is advised.\nI have marked the location on your HUD. Approach the source of the signal.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n这是这个星区内的第三个无线电信号源。这个信号似乎在使用海盗代码。建议谨慎行事。\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了位置。接近信号源。

English: Find the source of the third signal.
[c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, you have located one of the sources of the radio transmissions.\nI have marked the location on your HUD. Approach the source of the signal.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官，你已经定位到了无线电传输的一个信号源。\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了位置。接近信号源。

English: Find the source of the third signal.
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nI am currently scanning the area. \nStand by.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n我正在扫描该区域。\n请稍等。

English: Wait for IDA to scan the area
Access your science station on board your ship and perform a narrow band scan.
Chinese (simplified): 进入你飞船上的科学站并进行窄带扫描。

English: [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nThis is the last radio signal coming from this sector. This one has a UCH origin.\nI have marked the location on your HUD. Approach the source of the signal.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n这是来自这个星区的最后一个无线电信号。这个信号来自UCH。\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了位置。接近信号来源。

English: Find the source of the final signal.
Find the source of the final signal.
[c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\nCommander, you have located one of the sources of the radio transmissions.\nI have marked the location on your HUD. Approach the source of the signal.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\n指挥官，你已经找到了无线电传输的其中一个来源。\n我已经在你的HUD上标记了位置。接近信号来源。

English: Find the source of the final signal.
[c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\nI am currently scanning the area. \nStand by.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][ IDA ][-][/c]\n我正在扫描区域。\n请稍候。

English: Wait for IDA to scan the area
Board the ghost UCH Research Vessel.

[c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\nSince there is nothing more to be found in this sector, leaving would be the sensible thing to do.\nBut you're not going to leave, are you? No matter how many times I say there's nothing showing on scans you will insist on chasing the mystery. Silly, silly humans.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][ IDA ][-][/c]\n这个星区已经没有更多可发现的东西了，离开才是明智的选择。\n但你不会离开，对吧？无论我说多少次扫描没有发现任何东西，你都会坚持追逐这个谜团。愚蠢，愚蠢的人类。

English: Speak with someone in the mess hall
Speak with someone in the mess hall
Speak to the doctor in the medical bay
Chinese (simplified): 与医疗舱内的医生交谈

English: Speak to the doctor in the medical bay.
Chinese (simplified): 与医疗舱内的医生交谈。

English: Speak to the captain on the bridge
Speak to the captain on the bridge.
Figure out what is going on
Find a clue about what is going on. Look around the bridge and briefing room. Maybe someone will tell you something useful.
Chinese (simplified): 找到关于事情经过的线索。在舰桥和简报室四处查看。也许有人会告诉你一些有用的信息。

English: Speak to the captain on the bridge
Speak to the captain on the bridge.
Speak to the captain on the bridge
Speak to the captain on the bridge.
Speak with chief engineer in engineering
Chinese (simplified): 与工程部的主工程师交谈

English: Speak with chief engineer in engineering.
Chinese (simplified): 与工程部的主工程师交谈。

English:
[c][ff0000]YOU HAVE ENTERED AN AREA OF REFORGED EDEN 2 THAT IS UNFINISHED AND INACCESSIBLE VIA NORMAL MEANS.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]YOU MAY ENCOUNTER PROBLEMS IF YOU CONTINUE TO EXPLORE THIS REGION.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]The Progenitor missions and the galactic region of Decay are unfinished and not yet officially updated for RE2 and are not accessible in survival mode.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]If you were able to get here in survival without console commands or cheats that means you are playing a modified version of Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]The developers of Reforged Eden 2 cannot assist when playing a modified version of Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Please direct all inquiries or problems to the person you got this scenario from or the admin team that runs the server you are playing on.[-][/c][c][ffff00][-][/c]

[c][ff0000]你已进入重铸伊甸2的一个未完成且无法通过正常手段访问的区域。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]如果你继续探索这个区域，可能会遇到问题。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]起源者任务和衰败星区尚未完成，未针对重铸伊甸2正式更新，无法在生存模式中访问。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]如果你能够在没有使用控制台命令或作弊手段的情况下到达这里，意味着你正在玩一个修改版的重铸伊甸2。[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]请将所有疑问或问题反馈给你获取该场景的人或你所玩服务器的管理团队。[-][/c][c][ffff00][-][/c]
